82a8(phal chen): kyi zhing nye bar nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par stan te/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par mdzad pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
82b1(phal chen): kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni rnam par rol pa'i ye shes kyi chos yongs su rdzogs te/ chos thams cad rdzogs par
82b2(phal chen): byang chub par bya ba la mtha' dang dbus med pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi
82b3(phal chen): dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi skad cig gcig
82b4(phal chen): la ye shes kyi mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par bstan pa'o// bcu gang zhe na skad gcig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'pho ba yongs su
82b5(phal chen): bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i tshe yongs su bstan pa dang / skad gcig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams
82b6(phal chen): cad du mngon par 'byung ba yongasu bstan pa dang / skad gcig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs shing mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yongasu bstan
82b7(phal chen): pa dang / skad gcig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
82b8(phal chen): 'dul ba'i sems can yongasu smin pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du dus la bab pa shes pas/ sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba yongs su snyan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rte
83a1(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad du sems can ji ltar 'dul ba'i tshul bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku sna
83a2(phal chen): tshogs rnam par dmigs pa yongs su snyan pa dang / skad gcig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyan sna tshogs dang / rgyan brjod du med pas de bzhin
83a3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod yongasu bstan pa dang / skad gcig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam
83a4(phal chen): par dag pa cig ma yin pa thams cad yongs su ston pa dang / skad gcig gcig lnga 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba
83a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad du/ dbang po dang brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa 'byung ba dang / mos pa dang spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa 'byung ba la du gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyud du
83a6(phal chen): mngon par 'tshang rgyab yongs su bstan pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi skad cig la ye shes mngon par
83a7(phal chen): sgrub pa yang dag par bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi du sangs rgyas kyi dus las mi 'da' ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/
83a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mngon par 'tshang brgya pa ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas/ dus las babs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dag pa'i rnam par
83b1(phal chen): smin pa dang / rnam par smin pa mnyam pa nyid ni de'i dus la mi mda' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems
83b2(phal chen): dpa' rnams lung snyan pa ni de'i dus las mi mda' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud du che 'phrul yongs su
83b3(phal chen): bstan pa ni/ de'i dus la mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can mos pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i tshul bzhin du sku yongasu
83b4(phal chen): snyan pa ni dus las mi 'da' ba dus la babs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gtang snyoms su bzhugs pa ni de'i dus la mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/
83b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang yul dang / grong dang grong rdal du gshegs pa de ni/ de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus blabs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
83b6(phal chen): rnams dad pa ji lta bu dang / ldan pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can yongasu 'dzin pa de'i dus la mi 'da' bas dus la babs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems
83b7(phal chen): can kun nas spongs pa dang ldan zhing gdul bka' ba la/ gzhan la ltas pa mi mnga' bar gdul ba de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
83b8(phal chen): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa ni/ de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la babs pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras cu
84a1(phal chen): po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dus las mi 'dra'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas
84a2(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi yul dpe med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par dkyil mo krung cig
84a3(phal chen): gi rgyas par bgang ba dang / dus gcig tu sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su snyan pa dang / 'od zer gcig gi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad snang bar bya ba dang /
84a4(phal chen): sku gzug cig gi lus dang gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa dang / gnas gcig na bzhugs kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par byon pa'i skur 'byung ba dang /
84a5(phal chen): ye shes gcig rtogs pas chos thams cad la sgrib pa med par 'gyur ba dang / thugs cig skyed pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / sangs
84a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi che ba nyid tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i gshegs stabs gcig gi de kho na nyid yang dag par bstan pa dang / dus gsum thams cad sangs rgyas kyi go 'phangs gis rgyas par 'gengs
84a7(phal chen): pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang ma 'dres par bzhugs shing / 'das pa dang ma byon par dang ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi rgyud kyi tshul
84a8(phal chen): gcig pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi yul dpe med cing bsam gyi khyab pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po
84b1(phal chen): 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs mngon par sgrubs pa'i ye shes te/ bcu gang zhe na 'jug pa med pa'i chos thams cad la 'jug pas/
84b2(phal chen): smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes dang / lus med pa la lus mngon par sgrubs pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad mi gnyis pa la mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mdo
84b3(phal chen): par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / sems can gyi mthar thug par bdag med pa la sems can 'dul ba mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la mtsha
84b4(phal chen): ma sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul ma skyes pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang 'jig pa mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / yul
84b5(phal chen): thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad brjod du med pa la chos kyi dbyings su gsung mngon par sgrub pa'i
84b6(phal chen): ye shes dang / chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bas 'jug pa med pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang /
84b7(phal chen): chos thams cad ma skyes pa la skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs
84b8(phal chen): bla rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshad med pa'i khod du chud pa dag ste/
85a1(phal chen): #bcu gang zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku ni dus gsum thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i khong du chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
85a2(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa ni/ cho 'phrul chen po gsum gyi khong du chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshig rab tu dbye ba thams
85a3(phal chen): cad mkhas pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gzungs thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad de bzhin gshegs
85a4(phal chen): pa'i tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa bzhir khong du chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba ni thugs rje chen po'i khong du chud pa yin/
85a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa ni/ dus thams cad du sems can thams cad la rnam par gzigs pa'i khong su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
85a6(phal chen): bldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni sems can rnam par 'dul ba thams cad khongasu chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa mi mnga' bar spyod pa ni chos
85a7(phal chen): kyi dbyings thams cad khong su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skad cig gcig tu 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad
85a8(phal chen): khong du chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis nyi ma gcig tu ni dus gsum gyi bskal pa'i grangs khong du chud par bstan pa thams cad khong du chud pa yin/ kye rgyal
85b1(phal chen): ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshad med pa'i khong du chud pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi shin turgyu
85b2(phal chen): che ba'i chos bzod par bka' ba rnams te/ bcu gang zhen bdud kyi dkrugs ma rab 'joms shing rnam par mthong ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che
85b3(phal chen): chos bzod par bka' ba'o// mu stegs can gzhan dang phas kyi rgol ba tshar bcad pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya ba'i gzod par dka' ba'o//
85b4(phal chen): 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad rab tu tshim par mdzad pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i bzod par bka' ba'o// sems can 'dul
85b5(phal chen): ba'i dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i bzod par bka' ba'o// chos kyi dbyings thugasu
85b6(phal chen): chud pa'i ye shes ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgyas pa'i chos bzod par bka' ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par smras khyab cing /
85b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par phye ba sna tshogs thams cad du mi gnyis pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i gzod par bka' ba'o// gsung gi yan
85b8(phal chen): lag thams cad la sems can mos par bya ba dang thos par bya ba dang / 'dul bar bya ba don yod par tha dad par yang dag par mkhyen pa/ thogs pa med pas bstan pa'i tshul du
86a1(phal chen): b.latha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa bzhi 'byung ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos gzod par bka' ba'o//
86a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ba spu'i bu ga gcig nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bsam gyi mi khyab cing thogs
86a3(phal chen): med pa'i tshul du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis thabs kyi 'byung zhing / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku bu ga thams cad nas 'byung ba ni/
86a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos gzod par bka' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdul shi
86a5(phal chen): tu phra ba gcig la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongasu ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi brgyan dang rang bzhin gyi lhab lhub dang /
86a6(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rgyun mi mchad cing sems can rnam par 'dul ba thog med pa la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rtogs pa rnams la'ang mi bde ba dang / gnod
86a7(phal chen): ba med kyang shin tu phra ba de yang yangs par ma byas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang chub par ma byas par ji ltar gnas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyang thubs su chung ba'i ye shes
86a8(phal chen): mnga' ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bya che ba'i chos gzod par bka' ba'o// mun pa med pa'i khams de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas te/
86b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mun pa med cing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba/ sems can pha rol gyi sgribs pa sna tshogs kyi gnas rnam par sel na/ de la bcom ldan 'das de
86b2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos gzod par bka' ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni
86b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos gzod par bka' ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
86b4(phal chen): kyi bdag nyid che ba'i rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu dag pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag par sgrub pa bdag nyid che ba ni/
86b5(phal chen): sngon gyi mtha' nas rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs
86b6(phal chen): rgyas kyi rgyud du/ rigs dang ldan par 'byung ba'i bdag nyid che ba ni de gshegs pa'i rigs rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag
86b7(phal chen): pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par
86b8(phal chen): gnas pas rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dus gsum la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing /
87a1(phal chen): phalachos thams cad la rten pa yang dag par bcom pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na
87a2(phal chen): ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par drag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dngos po rnam pa tha dad pa la rnam par bzhag pa cig gi len pa med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
87a3(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi mtha'
87a4(phal chen): dang phyi ma'i mthar chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas/ mnyam pa'i bsod nams mi zad pa dang ldan pas/ mi zad pa'i bsod nams mnga' ba ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
87a5(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gzugs dang kha dog
87a6(phal chen): mtha' yas pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can 'dul ba'i dus dang / dbang gi chags pa med par bzhugs pas/ sangs rgyasra bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid
87a7(phal chen): che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi 'jig pa bzhi brnyes par bag tsha ba mi mnga' bar bzhugs
87a8(phal chen): shing khyamachog dang seng ge'i ro 'byin te/ rgol ba'i nang da steg lta bu'i mthu nga ldan la/ chos thams cad bstan pa la thugs sgron ma lta bu mnga' bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnas
87b1(phal chen): kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad kha na tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang
87b2(phal chen): brjod du med pa zhig lon yang mtshan gyi tshig thos pa tsam gyis bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar sems can rnams kyi yon tan shin tu sbyong zhing mya ngan las 'das nas de srid kyi yun ring por 'das kyang /
87b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas la skyed pa'i yon tan zad par mi 'gyur bas sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
87b4(phal chen): rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag na bzhugs shing 'jig rten gyi khams rgyang ring po na bzhugs kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i sems
87b5(phal chen): can rnams kyi rjes su dran par byas nas/ sku mngon par ston pa mdzad pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing / shin tu rnam par
87b6(phal chen): dag pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med ni rnam par dag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
87b7(phal chen): bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi tshangs par spyod pa rnam par dag pa la
87b8(phal chen): slo na pa gyis ga rnam pa pa'i/ sa rgyam sa rnam sa ma segs pa da pa tshu ba rjim gyis pa na pa'i/ pang rgyas pos las
88a1(phal chen): @##/ ni sems can thams cad kyi yon mongs pa sel bas shin tu rnam par dga' yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi shin
88a2(phal chen): tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor gyi shin tu rnam par dag yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs rnam drag pas shin tu rnam par dag pa
88a3(phal chen): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byed bzang po'i rnam par dag pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
88a4(phal chen): chos kyi sku rlog pa med pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po sgrib pa med pas rnam par dag pa yin/
88a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa thams cad la mthu chen po skyes shing po la tu phyin pa dam parnyes pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
88a6(phal chen): bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pas 'jig rten gyi
88a7(phal chen): khams thams cad du 'byung zhing dus thams cad du gnas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob pa'i sems can rnams la dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bstan pa dang /
88a8(phal chen): sems can thams cad shis pa dang ldan pa rnams la dus thams cad du chos bstan dang / sems can sangs rgyas la dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba du thams cad du skyid pa dang /
88b1(phal chen): chos kyi skyon med par 'das pa'i sems can rnams dus thams cad du ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad du rgyun mi chad pa dang / de bzhin
88b2(phal chen): gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ dus thams cad du chags pa mi mnga' bar gshegs pa dang / sems can thams cad la thugs rje chen po dus thams cad du
88b3(phal chen): mi gtong ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dus thams cad du thog pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa
88b4(phal chen): sna tshogs dus thams cad du mi gtong ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i sang+yas dus thams cad du 'byung ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag
88b5(phal chen): ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'byung zhing / dus thams cad du gnas pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni de bzhin
88b6(phal chen): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i tshul rnams te bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de bzhin
88b7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sku'i ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las tshad med pa skyes pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o// sangs rgyas
88b8(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi spun gyi yul mnga' bas/ mi shes rgya mtsho ma zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'ing bcad med pa'i bas macis
89a1(phal chen): @##/ mi khyab pa mnga' bas ye shes bya mi zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi char mngon par 'bebs pas ye shes rgya mtsho ma dzad pa'o//
89a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan legs pa mang po mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho ma zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi mtha'i thams
89a3(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam dang / khyad par mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mur 'gro ba thams cad/ sangs rgyas
89a4(phal chen): gyi 'phrin las rgyun mchid par bsgrub pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi rigs thams cad ma lus pa'i sems dang / spyod pa la
89a5(phal chen): ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams zil gyis mi non pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
89a6(phal chen): dag bcu po de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'di dag ni
89a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul rnams te/ bcug zhen 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
89a8(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste thams cad kyang thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste thams cad kyang stobs
89b1(phal chen): bcu tshad med pa dang ldan pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste thams cad kyang blan med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas
89b2(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste thams cad kyang sems can 'dul ba la yang dag par bzhugs pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin//
89b3(phal chen): 'di lta ste thams cad kyang 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du mngon par sangs rgyas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dres rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste 'dul ba'i sems can rnams
89b4(phal chen): 'dul ba la thogs pa mi mnga' ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste mi gnyis par yang dag par spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos la rab tu
89b5(phal chen): bzhol ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste ji ltar yongasu smin par gyur pa dang / dul bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yul
89b6(phal chen): mu med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ston pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs
89b7(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pa shin tu bstan pa'i
89b8(phal chen): sgo rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi khams shin tu bstan pa'i sgo mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/
90a1(phal chen): sems can gyi sna tshogs shin tu mtha' snyan pa'i sgo mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can thams
90a2(phal chen): cad kyi las dang / rnam par smin pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la gdam ngag dang man ngag shin tu
90a3(phal chen): bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems cad mtha' yas pa rnam par spong ba'i nan gyi sgor mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
90a4(phal chen): 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la gdam ngag gi yongasu gzhogs pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byang chub sem
90a5(phal chen): dpa'i khyad par gyi smon lam rnam par tha dad pas/ 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
90a6(phal chen): ma lus pa 'dul ba dang / 'jig pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ning rnam par dag pa ni/ byang chub sems
90a7(phal chen): dpa' bsam pa dad pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongasu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du/
90a8(phal chen): 'das pa dang ma byon dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas gcog nas cig tu rgyud pa ni/ skal pa de dang de dag tu bstan cing brjod pa dang / yongasu bshad pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thams cad
90b1(phal chen): kyi sangs rgyas
90b2(phal chen): khong du chud par bya ba'i sgor mtha' yas paste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos mtha' yas pas shin tu snyan pa'i sgo'o// kye rgyas
90b3(phal chen): ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sems can rnams la sgrubs pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
90b4(phal chen): rnams kyi yongasu bstan pa ni/ sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrubs po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsungs yang sems can lo sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub
90b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams len pa mdzad pa yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bsgrub bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams len pa mi 'dzin pa yang /
90b6(phal chen): sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bsgrub bo// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo// sangs
90b7(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byin rlabs kyi yul dang mangs/ dmig pa thams cad yul du mdzad pas kyang sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub po// sangs rgyas
90b8(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phri las sgrub po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhing la dmig bar mdzad pas kyang /
90b9(phal chen): sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pas kyang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas
91a1(phal chen): kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mi gsung bar bzhugs pa yang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub
91a2(phal chen): te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'phrin las sems can rnams la sgrub bo// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas pa
91a3(phal chen): po che zhes bya ba las// / bam po drug bcu bzhi pa'o// rangs rgyas / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
91a4(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos te/ bcu gang zhe na smon lam chen po la rab tu brten zhing smon lam zhig mi mngal bas ji skad du gsungs pa de ltar mdzad cing gnyi su mi
91a5(phal chen): gsung ba 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo chos dang po'o// phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i skal pa thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yon tan thams cad la yongasu
91a6(phal chen): rdzogs par mdzad pas/ rab tu brtsom zhing bgyid lug pa mi mnga' ba 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos gnyis pa'o// sems can 'dul bar gyur pa gcig gcig gzig
91a7(phal chen): kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par gshegs shing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs pa la thag thog med pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi
91a8(phal chen): gtso bo'i chos gsum pa'o// ge sdang ba'i sems can rnams lathugs rje chen pos sdom pa dang / dad pa'i sems can rnams la thugs rjechen pos sdom pa 'di ni/ sems can
91b1(phal chen): gyi gtso bo'i chos bzhi pa'o// gang gi de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bzhugs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
91b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu mi 'gyuraro// snyam du byang chub kyi sems nyams pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos lnga
91b3(phal chen): pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yongasu bsngo bas 'jug go/ 'jig rten pa'i rgyud la ma yin pa 'di sems can gyig
91b4(phal chen): bo'i chos drug go// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su sngon sangs rgyas kyi spyad pa'i semasu lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kyis slob cing / nyan thos
91b5(phal chen): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du songasu sngo ba med pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa 'di ni sems
91b6(phal chen): can gyi gtso bo'i chos bdun pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sems rnam par dag cing 'od gsal la dad pa thams cad du snang zhing kun tu 'byung ba sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
91b7(phal chen): la snang zhing thams cad du spobs pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos brgyad pa'o// 'jig rten pa'i bde ba thams cad yod
91b8(phal chen): su spangs te/ 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba thams cad ma chags pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med pa'i smon lam thams ca du mnyam pa nyid kyis 'jig rten thams
92a1(phal chen): ba#cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa byas/ sdug bsngal dang spros pa thams cad rab tu 'joms pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos dgu pa'o//
92a2(phal chen): sdug bsngal gyi mi bde ba thams cad nyam su bab ste/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du bka' thub kyi gnas shin tu bdungs kyang bya bar sems skyed pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
92a3(phal chen): rigs yongasu bsrungs pa dang ldan pa dang / stobs bcu'i se'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi yul la mos pas mthar thugs pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos bcu po ste/
92a4(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gtso bo'i chos so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
92a5(phal chen): kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa chags pa med pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gshegs pas chags
92a6(phal chen): bya mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na bzhugs pas chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin
92a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bzhugs pa dang / bzhengs pa dang bzhud pa chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
92a8(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du chos ston pas chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi kham
92b1(phal chen): ma lus pa thams cad kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs kyang chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams
92b2(phal chen): cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung ba'i mtha' la chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus
92b3(phal chen): pa thams cad tsam gyi 'khor dkyil 'khor na bzhugs kyang chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can ma lus pa thams cad
92b4(phal chen): kyi sems dang spyod pa la gzigs shing thugs kyi skad cig gcig la cho 'phrul chen po gsum gyis sems can rnam par 'dul ba yang chags pa mi mnga' bar spyod pa yin/ sangs
92b5(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gcig gis kyang tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa chen pos rnam par spyod kyang chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa
92b6(phal chen): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can gyi khams 'byam klas pa ma lus pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi mtha' thug
92b7(phal chen): pas/ bsam gyis mi khyab par ston cing / gsung yang chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
92b8(phal chen): kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa chags pa mi mnga'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi brgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa
93a1(phal chen): rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku mtshan dang dpe byed bzang po sna tshogs kyi rnam par brgyan pa ni/ sangs rgyas
93a2(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i brgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung yan lag gi mchog dam pa drug bcu dang ldan zhing /
93a3(phal chen): yan lag lnga brgyas yongs su gzung ba dang / rgyan brgya stong du mas rab tu brgyan pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag mtha' yas mu med pas rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas
93a4(phal chen): kyi chos kyi don dang / tshigs dang yi ge brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas rab tu tshim par mdzad pa dang / bag tsha ba mi mnga' bar seng ge'i nga ro chen po sgrogs pa dang /
93a5(phal chen): 'jig pa med pa chen po'i zhes pa mi mnga' bar gyur pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du sems can thams cad la grag cing bsal te/ khong du chud par
93a6(phal chen): gyur pa dang / sems can bsam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul ba nye bar gnas pa 'di ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
93a7(phal chen): kyi gsung gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi 'phrin las ni stobs bcus brgyan pa sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin
93a8(phal chen): chen po thams cad kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi rkyen gyi shin tu brgyan cing bsgrub pas chags pa med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa /
93b1(phal chen): kyi dbyings kyi bzhi la rab tu brten pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos gting med pa rab tu rnyes pa chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi brgyan du gyur pa/ dus gsum gyi
93b2(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can kun gyis sems dang spyod pa thams cad skad cig cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi rab tu mkhyen pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
93b3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi brgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'od zer bye ba brjod du med pa rab tu 'gyed par mdzad do//
93b4(phal chen): 'od zer de dag re re la yang 'od zer gyi 'khor byi dra ba brjod du med pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus pa snang bar byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams
93b5(phal chen): kyi rgyud thams cad mun pa med par ston pa sangs rgyas skye ba dang mi 'bral bas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las phyir mi ldog cing don yod pas sangs rgyas kyi ba brjod du med pas gnas pa
93b6(phal chen): med par rang bzhin rnam par dag cing kun tu sgom par 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od zer gyi brgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas
93b7(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das bzhad mo 'dzum par ston na/ zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma dang ldan pa/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phyogs bcu'i
93b8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad snang bar byed pa/ sems can gyi khams tshad med grangs mid bsam gyis mi khyab par rnam par ston pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par
94a1(phal chen): #rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam pa bzhin du mi 'gyur bar lung ston pa 'gro ba thams cad du shin tu gsal ba 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas btso/
94a2(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi bzhad mo 'dzum pa ston pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni tshad med pa ste/ sgrib pa med pas rnam
94a3(phal chen): par dag pa chos thams cad chags pa med pa nyid kyi mthar thugs pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa/ 'jig rten gyi thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/ 'jig
94a4(phal chen): rten thams cad dang 'dzin pa med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la yang dag par zhugs pa 'jig rten thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
94a5(phal chen): chos kyis yang dag par spyod pa/ tshig gi lam dang bral brjod du med pa'i mthar phyin pa phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang bral ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
94a6(phal chen): rnams ni tshad med pa mnga' ba ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'od ma 'dres shing brgyan du ma dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod
94a7(phal chen): du med pa'i brgyan dang ldan pa/ 'od kyi snang ba kun tu thogs pa med cing thams cad du chags pa med pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sgribs pa tshad med pa'i mdzod du gyur pa/ 'od thams
94a8(phal chen): cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni kha dog mtha' yas/
94b1(phal chen): ba mnga' ba'o// kha dog yid du 'ong ba mnga' ba'o// kha dog 'od gsal ba mnga' ba'o// kha dog tshad med pa mnga' ba'o// sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams
94b2(phal chen): cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa bzhin du rnam par dmig pa'i kha dog mnga' ba'o// de ma yin pa'i kha dog bzhan kham gsum du rtogs pa thams cad zil gyi gnon pa'i kha
94b3(phal chen): dog mnga' ba'o// kha dog thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin parnyes pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni kha dog bla na med pa mnga' ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bco
94b4(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi kha dog gi brgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge bas shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa
94b5(phal chen): dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs dge ba rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa la shin tu 'byung ba'i chos nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad du khyab par yod pa/
94b6(phal chen): khyab par med pa'i spyod pas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan gyis ye shes skye ba thams cad kyi nang du rtogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs sgrib pa med pa'i rgyud rnam par dag
94b7(phal chen): ba sa 'jig rten gyi ma snyan pa thams cad kyi ma snyan par brjod du med pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang rgyud rnam par dag pa'i rgyan
94b8(phal chen): mchog dam pa bla na med pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byams pa chen po'i mthu dang / rang bzhin gyi rgyan mnga' ba ste/ shin tu dang ba dang yongs su rtogs pa
95a1(phal chen): rnyog pa mi mnga' ba/ sku'i 'phrin las yongs su rtsal blta bas mi skyo ba thugs shin tu rnam par gsal ba/ thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/
95a2(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad skyob pa/ yon gyi gnas dam pa bla na med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i nang na/ thugs rtse ba can phan par mdzad pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don du ye shes
95a3(phal chen): chen po'i byin gyi rlabs ste/ bsod nams chen pos yongasu 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa/ sems can rnams kyi yon tan dang ye
95a4(phal chen): shes kyi phung po thams cad rnam par 'phel bar mdzad pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byams pa chen po dang / thugs rjes chen po'i mthar thug pa'i
95a5(phal chen): bsod nams kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi brgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// kye
95a6(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' chen pos sbyar ba'i chos rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos tham
95a7(phal chen): cad la mnga' ba dang / chos thams cad snang ba mdzad pa'i mnga' sbyar bas/ tshig dang yige mtha' yas pa la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i spobs pa mi mnga' ba dang / chos
95a8(phal chen): thams cad ma lus par yongasu brjod pas mnga' ba che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' sgyur ba'i chos dang po'o//
95b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can ji ltar yongs su smin pa dang / smon lam ji ltar btab pa'i tshul bzhin du 'dul ba la thogs pa mi mnga' ba ste/
95b2(phal chen): 'di ni sangs rgyas mnga' chen pos mnga' sbyar ba'i chos gnyis pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad sems can
95b3(phal chen): gcig pa la'ang gnod pa med par rnam pa drug tu rab tu spyod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya rnam par bkod pa grangs med pa tshad med pa dang ldan pas na mkha'i dbyings
95b4(phal chen): gyis mthas btub pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu 'phang ba dang / gcig nas gcig tu bzhud pa dang / gcig nas gcig tu sdu ba dang / gcig nas gcig tu sre bas
95b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bzhan dang bzhin dag/ bzhan dang bzhin gyi phyogs su rab tu bzhag kyang / sems can gyi khams rnams 'khor cing rmongs par mi 'gyur la the tshom du
95b6(phal chen): mi 'gyur ba mdzad pas mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' sbyar ba'i chos gsum pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten kha
95b7(phal chen): ma lus pa thams cad du byin gyi rlobs pa'i ye shes kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phran tshun du byin gyi brlabs pa dang / thugs skad cig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams
95b8(phal chen): cad kyi rgyan yang dag par bstan pa dang / skal pa grangs med par brjod kyang / yi ge shin tu bstan pa pa zad mi shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad
96a1(phal chen): #brgyan thams cad rnam par brgyan pa dang / mi mthun pa med cing nye bar nyon mongs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ning gcig tu yongs su
96a2(phal chen): 'du bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa thams cad byin gyi rlabs pa mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyis mnga' chen pos
96a3(phal chen): mnga' sgyur ba'i chos bzhi pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi 'dul ba'i sems can gzigs na/ sems can gcig gi don du bskal pa
96a4(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par dkyil mo dkrungs gcig gi bzhugs na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mi bde ba mi mnga' zhing / thugs la mi bde ba mi
96a5(phal chen): mnga' ste/ gang zag de yang mi snyel bas/ 'dul ba'i dus las mi mnga' ba dang / gang zag gcig la lta ba de bzhin du rim pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa
96a6(phal chen): thams cad phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thugs pa'i sku'i lam mnga' bar byin gyi rlabs te bzhugs kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skye ba mi mnga' ste/ de ltar sem
96a7(phal chen): can gyi khams thams cad mthar gyis rims par sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i gang zag gi don du yongs su skyong ba mdzad pa la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
96a8(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' sbyar ba'i chos lnga pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du yang dag par bzhol ba'i de
96b1(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bzhugs pa la thag thog mi mnga' ba dang / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad
96b2(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa dang / phyogs kyi dra ba'i rgyud thams cad du thugs skad cig gcig dang ldan pas bzhud par byin gyis rlobs cing /
96b3(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pas khong du chud par byas pas chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med par rab tu skor ba la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad/
96b4(phal chen): rnams kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' sbyar ba'i chos drug pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi don du thugs skad
96b5(phal chen): cig re re la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mnga' che ba ste/ de la chos thams cad mngon par rgya sangs ma rgyas 'ang gang
96b6(phal chen): med la/ mngon par sangs rgyas pa'ang med de/ mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba med kyang / slob pa'i sa la gnas pa shing mngon par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi brjod
96b7(phal chen): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgribs pa med par rtogs par thugs su chud pas/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i don du ye shes tshad med pa'i tshul gyis/
96b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i yul yongasu rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga'
97a1(phal chen): phasbyar ba'i chos bdun pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spun gyi skye mched kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang sgrubs/
97a2(phal chen): pa de snyed kyi skye mched kyis/ de yongs su grub par mdzad do// sman gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang sgrub pa de/ shad kyi mched kyis yongasu grub
97a3(phal chen): par mdzad do// shad kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang sgrub pa de/ ljags kyi skye mched kyis de yongasu grub par mdzad do// ljags kyi skye mched kyis
97a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang sgrubs pa de/ sku'i skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do// sku'i skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang sgrub pa de/ thugs
97a5(phal chen): kyi skye mched kyis yongasu grub par mdzad do// thugs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang sgrib pa de/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi dmig
97a6(phal chen): pa 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sna tshogs rnam par phye ba thams cad du grub par mdzad do// de bzhin du dmigs pa thams cad re re yang snrel bzhir sgrub
97a7(phal chen): pas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub pa la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po dbang ba'i tshes brgyad pal
97a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ring gi skra'i ba spu'i bu ga gcig gi nang du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad bzung bar mdzad cing / khongasu chud par mdzad//
97b1(phal chen): sems can re re yang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa tsam du yangs par mdzad kyang / sems can de dag la gnod pa dang mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de dag/
97b2(phal chen): tu yang sems can re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams cig nas gcig tu rgyud pas/ bskal pa grangs med par zad par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med
97b3(phal chen): bar gom pa gcig gis phyin pas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams kyi spyan sngar 'gro bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshe yang brjod
97b4(phal chen): du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dang / gling de dag na sems can gyi gtso bos brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang /
97b5(phal chen): ba spu'i bu ga de dag nas sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par 'byung bar bya ba dang / sems can cig nas cig tu rgyud pa brjod
97b6(phal chen): du med pa'i yang brjod med par 'byung ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bskor bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbying/
97b7(phal chen): cig nas gcig tu rgyud pa brjod med pa'i yang brjod du med pa shin tu sten par bya ba dang / 'das pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa brjod med pa dang / ma 'ongs pa gcig
97b8(phal chen): nas gcig tu rgyud pa brjod du med pa dang / da ltar byung ba gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa brjod du med pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang / na mkha'i dbyings mtha' dang dbus med
98a1(phal chen): phalapar bstan pa kun tu 'tshams med par sems can thams can 'ong zhing 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du 'dod pa'i longs spyod
98a2(phal chen): rgya chen po bgegs med pa thams cad 'byung bar bya ba mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' sbyar ba'i chos dgu
98a3(phal chen): pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du/ pang mo'i brgyan chen pos brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can la de bzhin
98a4(phal chen): gshegs pa cig gi chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa/ thams cad du khyab pa'i skus/ byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad
98a5(phal chen): yongasu bstan pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa cig gi ji lta bor 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ sems can gtso bo thams cad kyang de bzhin
98a6(phal chen): tu dgongs pa skad cig ma re re'i byin gyis rlabs pa/ dgongs pa skad cig la ji lta ba bzhin du dgongs pa skad cig ma thams cad la'ang pad mo'i rgyud kyis yongs su dag par
98a7(phal chen): mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang / de bzhin tu chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa/ rnam par dag pa brgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i
98a8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams su dmig pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i zhing rnam par dag pa 'byam klas pa brjod du med pa mtshan nyid tha dad pa/ rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud tshad med pa cing
98b1(phal chen): 'byam klas pa/ dus kyi rgyud grangs med pa dang ldan pa snyan pa ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa/ blo tshad med pa dang mos pa shin tu yangs pa dang ldan pa mtshan nyid sna tshogs kyi
98b2(phal chen): gnas med pa/ mtshan nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dang ldan pa tshad med pa thams cad dgongs pa skad cig ma las/ dgongs pa skad cig gi thams cad yongs su bstan kyang
98b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mched du sgrub pa ma mdzad pa la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga'
98b4(phal chen): sbyar ba'i chos bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' sbyar ba'i cho so// kye rgyal ba'i
98b5(phal chen): sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na mtshan re re/
98b6(phal chen): zhing / bsod nams rgya ba'i mtshan yongs su dag par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ yongs su rdzogs pa dang po ste/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par
98b7(phal chen): 'tshang rgya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
98b8(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa'i spyod pa yod
99a1(phal chen): / su dag pa yongs su rdzogs pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sems can yongs su
99a2(phal chen): smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba yongs su rdzogs par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sangs rgyas kyi mnga' 'gro ba thams cad kyi
99a3(phal chen): mi non pa yongs su rdzogs par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// zhing yongs su dag par bya ba yongasu rdzogs pas sangs rgyas
99a4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu ma/
99a5(phal chen): par 'tshang rgya'o// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang gzugs kyi sku lta na don yod pa yongasu rdzogs pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang
99a6(phal chen): rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid yongasu rdzogs pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/ sangs
99a7(phal chen): rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad yongasu rdzogs par mdzad na/ yongs su mya ngan las mda'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/
99a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs ma/
99b1(phal chen): pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs pa med cing / spros pa thams cad med par yang thugs su chud la/ dge ba'i sgo nas sangs rgyas
99b2(phal chen): kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang shin tu ston cing brjod de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa dang po'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
99b3(phal chen): rnams kyi chos thams cad la gzigs pa med cing phan tshun du mkhyen pa med do// ma cing ma grol ba dang / gzung ba med cing gsags pa med de/ yongasu rdzogs pa med pas yang
99b4(phal chen): thugs su chud cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mda' dam pa yang rnyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos thams cad la mnga' sbyar ba de'ang yang
99b5(phal chen): dag par de kho na nyid ma nor bar rnam pa bzhin du mi 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad bdag med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med la/ de kho na nyid kyi mtha' las rnam par mi 'da' yang
99b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mnga' chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad snang ba la rab tu mkhyen pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas
99b7(phal chen): kyi thabs mkhas pa gnyis pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mtshan ma'i mtha' thams cad mi mnga' ste/ mtshan ma thams cad dang mi 'grogs shing /
99b8(phal chen): mtshan ma'i mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ma 'dres la/ de'i rang bzhin du ngo bo nyid med pa dang / ji ltar ngo bo nyid med pa'i sgra'i tshul thams cad thugasu chud kyang /
100a1(phal chen): phal / gzugs kyi mtshan ma'i sku'i gzugs rnam par dag pa grangs med pa dang / zhing gi mtshan ma dang rnam par spong ba'i mtshan ma zad mi
100a2(phal chen): shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par bstan cing bshad pa'i ye shes kyi phung po mun pa med pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgron ma chen por gyur pas/ mun pa med pa'i
100a3(phal chen): snang ba ston pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa gsum pa'o// chags pa med pa'i mtha' ni sngon gyi mtha' yang ma yin
100a4(phal chen): phyi ma'i mtha' yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings su gnas pa ni 'das pa'am/ ma 'ong ba'am/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin pas//
100a5(phal chen): de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis 'byung ba med kyang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams kyi rigs tshad med pa'i phyir shin tu bstan pa brjod du med pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
100a6(phal chen): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba yang rab tu brjod cing / kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis de bzhin du gzigs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom lda
100a7(phal chen): 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa bzhi pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i 'phrin las dang / gsung gi 'phrin las dang
100a8(phal chen): thugs ga'i 'phrin las kyi mngon par 'du mdzad pa'ang mi mnga' la/ yongs su blang ba mi mnga' bas bzhugs shing rnam par phye ba med pa'i mthar thugs pa ste/
100b1(phal chen): dor ba med pa'i chos kyi gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bgrang ba'i tshul las rnam par 'das kyang tshul nges pa med pa'i mdzod du gyur cing bgrang ba dang / mngon par sgrub
100b2(phal chen): pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i grangs kyi tshul thugs chud pa/ ye shes sgribs pa med pas
100b3(phal chen): gzigs pa rnams te/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can gdul ba rnam par dmig pa la rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs tshad med mu med par mngon par
100b4(phal chen): sgrub mdzad pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa lnga pa'o// chos thams cad lta ba med pas mi dad pa dang / bye brag med pa dang / 'byung ba
100b5(phal chen): med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / sna tshogs med pa dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang / rang bzhin med par rab tu mkhyen kyang / chos kyi rgyud shin tu
100b6(phal chen): nges pa yang dag par bsgrub cing / 'jig rten gyi tshul dang 'gal ba med pa dang / rang bzhin med pa'ang yang dag par gzigs pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa thams
100b7(phal chen): gzigs pas mkhyen par bya ba thams cad ma lus par gzigs pas chos la yang mnga' sbyar ba thams cad kyang rab tu ston pa de bzhin du nyid kyis rang bzhin las kyang
100b8(phal chen): mi nyams pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa drug pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs su chud pa'i
101a1(phal chen): bal#/ rnam pa cig gis bzhan dang bzhan mkhyen par bya ba/ chos de'i skyon med pa las rnam par ma 'das pa/ gnas med pa dag pa'i rtsa ba rnam
101a2(phal chen): par dag pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyi chos skyon med pas dus thams cad du gnas par rab tu mkhyen te/ de la yang nyi ma gcig gam zla phyed dam/ lo cig gam lo brgya'am/
101a3(phal chen): bskal pa 'jig pa dang / 'du bas rjes su rnyeg pa dang / phyir phyogs pa mi mnga' bar dus tshad med pa dang / nyi ma gcig dang yud tsam cig gi dus dang / sngo gro nas mi
101a4(phal chen): ma phyed kyi dus dang / byi dro nas snga dro'i dus dang / nyi ma mang nas byi dro'i dus dang / nyi ma bgrang ba'i dus dang / nyi ma bdun dang / zla ba phyed kyi dus dang / zla dang lo dang /
101a5(phal chen): brgya'i dus dang / bskal pa gcig gi dus dang / tshad med grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus nas/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thugs pa'i dus su chos bstan pa dang / chos
101a6(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo thog pa med cing phyir mi ldog/ rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/ bral bar mi 'gyur/ bar chad par mi 'gyur/ med par mi 'gyur/ 'jig par mi 'gyur/ g.yo
101a7(phal chen): bar mi 'gyur/ ring du mi 'gyur/ 'khor de na gnas pa nyid du mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa bdun pa'o//
101a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du/ rtag tu dus la bab par bzhugs pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi 'jig
101b1(phal chen): pa tshad med pa mnga' ba'o// tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa grangs med pa mnga' ba'o// tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa tshad med pa mnga' ba'o// tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen
101b2(phal chen): bzang mi shes pa lnga'o// tha dad pa yang dag pa mkhyen pa thog pa med pa mnga' ba'o// tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa mtha' yas pa mnga' ba'o// thun mongs ma yin pa'i
101b3(phal chen): mkhyen pa yang dag par mnga' ba'o// tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa mthar thugs pa mnga' ba'o// tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa de kho na dang ldan pa mnga' ba'o//
101b4(phal chen): tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshig gis tshul thams cad rab tu rtogs pa mnga' ba'o// chos thams cad tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa mnga' ba'o// bsam pa dang
101b5(phal chen): mos pa dang dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi tshul dang / rnam grangs tshul ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par bkod pa bzhin du sa 'tshams med par ston te/ mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brjod
101b6(phal chen): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnams mdo sde de dang de la/ thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus kyi tshul gyis yang dag par ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs
101b7(phal chen): mkhas pa brgyad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ming med kyang / ming dang rigasu 'byung ba'i chos thams cad tshigs dang yi ges shin tu sbyangs pa'i dbyings mngon
101b8(phal chen): bar sangs rgyas pa ste/ ming 'das pa ma yin pa dang / ming ma 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / ming da ltar byung ba ma yin pa dang / ming sems can ma yin pa dang / ming zhing ma yin pa dang /
102a1(phal chen): b.laming chos ma yin pa dang / ming yon tan ma yin pa dang / ming byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa dang / ming sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang //
102a2(phal chen): ming grangs ma yin pa dang / ming grang med pa ma yin pa dang / ming skye ba ma yin pa dang / ming 'gag pa ma yin pa dang / ming med pa ma yin pa dang / ming yod pa ma yin pa
102a3(phal chen): dang / ming gcig pa ma yin pa dang / ming tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / ming thams cad ma yin pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gi brjod du med pa dang / phyogs med pa dang /
102a4(phal chen): brda' med pa dang / tshig gi lam med pa sgra dang bral ba sgra'i rnam pa thams cad mi 'byung ba yongs su sgrub pa med pa byas pa dang / rnam par byas pa med/ rnam pa gcig ma
102a5(phal chen): yin pa dang / rnam pa mang po ma yin pa yang thugs su chud la/ brjod pa dang sprad pa thams cad la yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog rnyes pa dag ste/ rnam par rtogs pa'i
102a6(phal chen): yul mi mnga' ba dag go/ mngon par 'du mdzad pa med pa la rab tu brtson pa dag go/ rtogs pa dang kun tu rtog pa dang / yongs su rtogs pa ma gags pa dag go// spyod pa
102a7(phal chen): thams cad la mi gnas par spyod pa dag go/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa dgu pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
102a8(phal chen): rnams ni/ chos thams cad kyi gzugs ma skyes pa rab tu mkhyen pa ste/ tshor ba'i spros pa med pa dang / 'du shes kyi grangs med pa dang / 'du byed kyi kun tu rgyu ba med pa dang /
102b1(phal chen): rnam par shes pa'i nye bar len pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyi zhi ba rab tu mkhyen te/ chos thams cad skye mched kyi rgyun med pa dang / khams rnams mi dmig pa dang /
102b2(phal chen): chos thams cad mi 'jig pa dang / chos thams cad skyed du med cing / rang bzhin gyi ni mkha' lta bu dang / chos thams cad dben pa dang / las med pa dang / rnam par
102b3(phal chen): smin pa med pa dang / spyod pas 'byung ba med pa dang / ma grub pa dang / ma 'byung ba dang / grangs kyi mi brjod pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa dang / med pa ma yin pa dang /
102b4(phal chen): ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gegs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / skyon med pa dang gnas med pa dang / yongs su gnas pa
102b5(phal chen): med pa dang / yongasasu smin par bya ba med pa dang / rnam par brtul ba med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / tshe sems can med pa ma yin pa dang / srog med pa dang /
102b6(phal chen): srog med pa ma yin pa dang / rkyen med pa dang / rkyen med pa ma yin pa dang / rten pa med pa dang / rten med pa ma yin pa dang / chos thams cad thug su chud pas kyang
102b7(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad shin tu bstan pa la/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa skyes dag ste nges pa dang ma nges pa dang / log par nges pa'i phung po gsum rnam par bkod pa rnam
102b8(phal chen): dang / stobs bcu thug su chud pa'i ye shes mi 'jig pa bzhis rnam par dag pa'i/ sangs rgyas kyi yul chen po dang / ldan pas seng ga'i sgra sgrogs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas
103a1(phal chen): la/ ts+tshaH/ bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa bcu pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/
103a2(phal chen): kyi thabs mkhas pa bcu pa'o// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las// bam po drug bcu rtsa lnga pa'o//
103a3(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'phrin las brgya chen po tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam te/
103a4(phal chen): de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs ma rtogs pa/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
103a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi 'jug par mi nus pa'o// bcu gang zhe na phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas rtags pa'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma
103a6(phal chen): lus pa thams cad du dga' dga' ldan du skye bston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mu med pa dag la/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ kha dog tshad med
103a7(phal chen): pa gzi brjid tshad med pa snang ba tshad med pa/ dbyangs tshad med pa dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa tshad med pa/ gsung brjod pas rnam par dmigs pa
103a8(phal chen): tshad med pa/ ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab dang ye shes yul tshad med pa mnga' ba rnams lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan mdog pa mdzad de/
103b1(phal chen): bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyongs dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan mdog pa mdzad do/ byams
103b2(phal chen): chen po'i spyod yul thog pa med pa dang / thabs dang thugs rje chen po'i sgo'i mthar thug pa/ sems can la phan mdog pa mdzad do// bsod nams kyi stobs dang mnga'
103b3(phal chen): phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang po rnam par spang ba dang / cang shes kyi sems yongs su dag pas kyang / sems can rnams la phan 'dog pa mdzad do// theg pa sna tshog
103b4(phal chen): rnam par dag pas kyang sems can rnams la bon 'dog pa mdzad do// theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byas pas kyang / sems can rnams la phan 'dog par mdzad/
103b5(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad gnod pas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phrin las dang po'o// dga' ldan gyi pho brang
103b6(phal chen): nas 'phos pa med kyang yum gyi skur gshegs shing / byang chub sems dpa'i sku mtha' mar skye ba bstan pa sgyu ma lta bur yongs su spyod pa sprul pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
103b7(phal chen): mthar thugs pa mig yor lta bur rnam par dmigs pa/ na mkha'i yul tshad med par khyab pa bzhed pa bzhin du skye ba yang chags pa mi mnga' bsri skya ba lta bur bstan/
103b8(phal chen): ba nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la yang dag par gzhol ba gnas med pa'i ye shes la gnas pa/ rang bzhin gyi 'dod chags dang bral bas rnam par dag pa brgyan shin tu
104a1(phal chen): pag sa/ che ba'i mdzod kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// khang brtsegs pa'i rin po che las byas pa'i pho brang chen po'i rin po che'i rgyan
104a2(phal chen): mang po dang ldan pa na/ bzhugs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// ye shes kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// yid la bya ba'i
104a3(phal chen): byin gyis rlab chen pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// rnam par 'phrul pa'i mdzod chen po yang dag par bstan pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do//
104a4(phal chen): ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen pos sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// yum sku skyed pa'i sku na bzhugs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sangs rgyas
104a5(phal chen): kyi yul gyi spyod yul chen po brnyes pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'brin las mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis 'jig rten byin du rlabs pa mtha' yas pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi
104a6(phal chen): 'phrin las mdzad do// ting nge 'dzin chen po grangs med pa la rnam par spyod cing sgom par 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa
104a7(phal chen): de dang de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// spyod pa'i thog ma la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mthar thugs pa'i bar du thog ma dang dbus dang tha
104b1(phal chen): ma'i tshul gyis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sa 'di la gnyi su med pas thams cad mthar byin bar byas nas/ tha mar 'jig rten gyi grangs kyi skye ba yongs su
104b2(phal chen): ston te/ skye bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// gzhon nur gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do//
104b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpar gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// mngon par 'byung bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
104b4(phal chen): las mdzad do// mngon par 'tshang rgya bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du
104b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs kyis kyang 'jig rten sna tshogs 'jig rten tshad med pa 'jig rten kun tu mtha' yas pa phyogs kyi dra ba
104b6(phal chen): rgyud dang / rigs thams cad kyis 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// zhing gi rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
104b7(phal chen): las mdzad do// las kyi rnam par spyod pa ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sems can rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad//
105a1(phal chen): bag bya/ skye ba dang shi 'pho ba'i rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sprul pa chen po'i rgyud dang / sangs rgyas
105a2(phal chen): kyi rigs dang / chos dran pa'i sgo'i 'khor los kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'phrin las gnyis pa'o//
105a3(phal chen): dge bcod pa'i las rnam par dag cing gdung rab thams cad du ye shes kyi tshul rnam par dag pas/ sku tshe'i rgyud kyi tshul dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad gdul ba
105a4(phal chen): thugs su chud pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yong su rdzogs par mdzad cing / btsun mo'i 'khor gyis nang na bzhugs pa ston pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dod chags
105a5(phal chen): dang bral ba'i tshul gyi gnas la bzhugs pa rnams/ sgra dang tshig thams cad dang bral bar rtags pas/ dngos po thams cad dngos po med pa las byung bar khong du chud par bya
105a6(phal chen): ba dang / dngos po thams cad shes pa la gzud par bya ba dang / tshul khrims thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thugs par yongasu rdzogs par bye ba dang / snying rje chen pos
105a7(phal chen): 'gro ba dang / mu med pa la rnam par lta bya ba dang / byams pa chen pos sems can med pa'i yul la rab tu rtog par bya ba dang / dga' ba chen po'i yul la 'jig rten brjo
105a8(phal chen): med par khong du chud par bya ba dang / gtang snyoms chen pos sems la dbang sgyur ba la gnas par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan gyi rang yos su rgyas par byed pa dang /
105b1(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyi lu lus par mngon par sgrub par bya ba dang / thams cad du gnas med pa'i lus yongasu rdzogs par byed pa bya ba dang / 'khor thams cad rnam par dag par nan
105b2(phal chen): tan du byed par bya ba dang / chos bstan pa rnam par brjod par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dngos po la smos par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyes pa la rtog par bya ba mdzad cing
105b3(phal chen): smod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par smin par yang dag par ston pa dang / ji ltar bkod pa'i tshul du sems can gdul ba dang / yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can yong su smin
105b4(phal chen): par bya ba dang / yongs su smin pa rnams tshul bzhin du gdul ba dang / grangs med pa'i thabs mkhas pa mngon par sgrubs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las phyir mi ldog pa
105b5(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa dang / sgo sna tshogs nas chos kyi spyod pa rab tu skrod pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs rnam par spangs pa dang / thugs rje chen po las byung
105b6(phal chen): ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi mngon par spang ba dang / thams cad la skyob po'i byams pa chen po skyed pa'i cho 'phrul gsum gyis yongs su rlan pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang
105b7(phal chen): rnam par dmigs par btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bstan pa yon chad du/ 'jig rten mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las yongasu bstan par mdzad cing / ye shes
105b8(phal chen): kyi mthu chen po thogs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mngon par mkhyen pa sgrib pa med par sgrub pa dang / chos rnam pa gsum gyi thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i 'phrin las kyi mthu
106a1(phal chen): gdang / sgra'i 'phrin las kyi mtha' shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / gsung gi 'phrin las ye shes nyams pa med par dag pa dang / thugs
106a2(phal chen): kyi 'phrin las kyi mtha' zab cing chags pa med pa'i mthar thugs pa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can gyi mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
106a3(phal chen): kyi 'phrin las gsum pa'o// rnam par rgyal ba chen po mnga' ba rnams ni/ brdzun mo'i 'khor brgyan rnam par phye ba tshad med pa dang ldan pa yi du 'ongs pa spangs te/ mngon
106a4(phal chen): par 'byung ba'i spyod pa yongasu ston pas/ sems can rnams la 'jig rten gyi gnas las skyod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mngon par zhen pa rnam par zlog pa dang / 'jig rten
106a5(phal chen): tu rtogs pa thams cad mi rtag par shes par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi tshul la mngon par zhen pa rnam par zlog pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba la sred pa yongasasu bcad pa dang /
106a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi nyon mongs pa byang shing nub pa la yang dag par spyod pa bya ba dang / sems can gyi don rje su dran par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par 'byung ba'i don la rab tu bzhol ba dang /
106a7(phal chen): khyim pa'i tshul yongs su spangs pa bstan pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi sbyor ba la yang dag par gnas par bya ba dang / mngon gyi smon lam yongasu rdzogs par bya/
106a8(phal chen): ba dang / yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa yongs su snang bar bya ba dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnyes pas sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa'i sgrib pa rab tu gsal
106b1(phal chen): pa dang / bdag nyid bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med par sbyar bar 'gro ba thams cad la bstan pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sangs rgyas la skyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
106b2(phal chen): nang du 'dus par 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag par rdzogs pa dang / bdag nyid kyi ye shes kyi don gzigs par bstan pa dang / sems can rnams rnam par dag pa'i sbyor
106b3(phal chen): brjod pa dang / sems can rnams kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sgor sgrub pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du 'byung ba'i sgo rab tu ston pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
106b4(phal chen): rgyal mtshan yang dag par sgreng ba mdzad cing 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bzhi pa'o// don cig ma yin pa mkhyen
106b5(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thugs pa rnams ni/ chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes byang chub kyi dashing drung du byon te/ byang chub
106b6(phal chen): tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bas kyang / bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu bzhom pa dang / sku'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod kyi chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par dbang
106b7(phal chen): ba'i phyir byin gyi rlabs zad mi shes pa'i mthar thugs pas mtha' rnam par spangs pa spyod pa tshad med pa rab tu skyes pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul gyi rnam par rol
106b8(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyi don dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yang dag par sgrub po yongs su rdzogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du bdan rnam par
107a1(phal chen): @#/ bkram par yongs su rgyas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpas rnam par dmigs pa byang chub sems
107a2(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa dam pa thob pa rnams kyi zhal du lta ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam pa dang / smon lam khyad par nan dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi
107a3(phal chen): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis yang dag par bsam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo zab mo rab tu skor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yul tshad med pa bsags pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i
107a4(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs spyod pa la yang dag par bzhol ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
107a5(phal chen): dag pa mnga' ba 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlobs pa'i yul mnga' ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'i sems can gyi rnam par dmig pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
107a6(phal chen): thams cad tha mi dad pa dang ldan pa'i sa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i mthu'i gnas la yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad rab tu rnyes pas bzhugs pa/
107a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thugs pa/ sems can gyi rnam pa thams cad dang / zhing gi rnam pa thams cad dang / chos kyi rnam pa thams cad dang /
107a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa thams cad dang / yongs su smin par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / dus kyi rnam pa thams cad dang / bdul ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang /
107b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnam pa thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thugs pa rnams/ 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad du mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par 'tshang rgya
107b2(phal chen): bas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'phrin las lnga pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi 'khor
107b3(phal chen): lo bskor bar mdzad pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyi tshad med pa'i 'khor lo dang /
107b4(phal chen): mi 'jig pa'i seng ge'i nga ro chen po'i tshul gyis thams cad ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i 'khor lo dang / chos kyi mdzod mu med pa'i sgo snang bar byed pa'i tshul gyis
107b5(phal chen): sgrib pa med pa'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo dang / ye shes na mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa'i tshul gyis chags pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rab tu rtogs
107b6(phal chen): bar bya ba'i tshul gyis sgrib pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyong ba'i tshul gyis/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgron ma'i 'khor la
107b7(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis thams cad du mkhyen pa'i chos brjod po'i 'khor lo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang mi 'gal ba
107b8(phal chen): tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dab 'dres par gyur pa'i 'khor lo dang / de dag la sogs pa rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du chos kyi 'khor lo skor bas/ sems can/
108a1(phal chen): / thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa'i rnam pa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ de ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang / sangs
108a2(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bsam gyi mi khyab pa mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las drug pa'o//
108a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang rgyal ba'i gnas su gshegs kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad//
108a4(phal chen): mi'i rgyal po'i gnas dang lha'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / klu'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i gnas dang / dri za'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / lha ma yin gyi
108a5(phal chen): rgyal po'i gnas dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i gnas dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / lto phye chen po'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / srin po'i rgyal po'i gnas
108a6(phal chen): dang / sha za'i rgyal po'i gnas dag tu gshegs kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ 'di lta ste grong khyer gyi sgor byon
108a7(phal chen): nas g.yo ba dang / 'od zer snang ba dang / long ba rnams mig mthong ba dang / 'on pa rnams sgra thos par 'gyur ba dang / smyon pa rnams dran pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
108a8(phal chen): gos med pa rnams gos thob par 'gyur ba dang / sdug bsngal ba rnams bde ba thob pa dang / rol mo'i cha byad mi rdung ma bkrol bar/ sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa dang / rgyan ste/
108b1(phal chen): na 'dug pa dang / gnas nas ma phog pa dang / ma skyod ma grol bar spyod cing / dkrol ba'i sgra 'byung ba dang / bya sna tshogs mang po'i sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba dang /
108b2(phal chen): lta na gtang mi bral zhing / mi mthun pa med pa'i sku mthong bas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// /
108b3(phal chen): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po bstan pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de yongs su gzigs pa dang /
108b4(phal chen): rnam par gzigs pa dang / kyang ba dang rkums pas kyang sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// gshegs pa dang slar bzhud pa dang / bzhed pa dang /
108b5(phal chen): 'chag pa dang / gzhugs pa dang / gzigs pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// chos ston pa dang mi gsung bar bzhugs pas kyang /
108b6(phal chen): sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul gyis sang
108b7(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten gyi khams yul sems can bsam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams spyod pa thams cad rgyud zhing 'byung
108b8(phal chen): kha dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen pos shin tu bstan pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa/ sngon 'grogs 'grogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang gnas pa'i sems
109a1(phal chen): #can rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ sku gzugs ltan mi gos
109a2(phal chen): ba'o zhes bya bar bzhol ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams skye bar bkon no zhes bya bar yid ches par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
109a3(phal chen): thos ni bsod nams kyi chos dkar po'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o zhes sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yid la byed pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad rnam par dag pa ni/ de bzhin
109a4(phal chen): gshegs pa skye ba yin no zhes bya bar khong du chud par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan sngags pa ni mtha' yas pa'o// zhes bya bar yang dag par lta ba dang / ma
109a5(phal chen): byon pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yang dag par sgrub pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mos pa'i tshul thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
109a6(phal chen): rnams rnyes par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yon tan mtha' yas pa'o// zhes khong du chud par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can
109a7(phal chen): thams cad la mngon du gyur par rtogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can gyi rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnasu gyur par sems dpa' dang /
109a8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhing thams cad na snang bar khong du chud par dang / de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'byung bas 'jig rten thams cad na/ sangs rgyas
109b1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// dad par bya ba dang phyag 'tshal ba dang / thal mo sbar bar byas pa rjes su stod pa
109b2(phal chen): dang / spyan drangs dang / mchod pa dang / mngon par mthong ba dang / 'dzum pa byas pa dang / sangs rgyas la dga' ba'i sems kyis mos par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
