109b3(phal chen): sgo nas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par gyur pas kyang sangs rgyas
109b4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod par byas pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad
109b5(phal chen): rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las 'dzad do/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog dang dbyibs kyi rnams pa tshad med pa bstan pas kyang / sangs rgyas
109b6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs thos par bya bas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
109b7(phal chen): 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rnam pa bye
109b8(phal chen): kha khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mthu dang 'dul ba ji lta ba'i tshul la mi mngal
109'a1(phal chen): pa/ bar 'byung ngo // de ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las 'jig rten thams cad kyi sems can gyi sems dang / spyod pa dang bsam pa la gnas pa/
109'a2(phal chen): dge ba rgya che ba la tshad med bdag phyir mi ldog pa'i yul dang / snying rje chen po'i rab tu bkul ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las
109'a3(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / shugs kyis 'jig rten thams cad du 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'phrin las bdun pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
109'a4(phal chen): 'das rnams ni dgon pa la bzhugs sam/ zhi bar bzhugs som/ dben par bzhugs sam/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa la bzhugs sam/ ting nge 'dzin chen po'i
109'a5(phal chen): gnas la bzhugs sam/ gcig pu bgyes par bzhugs sam/ skra mi snang bar bzhugs sam/ ye shes zab mo'i gnas la bzhugs sam/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi
109'a6(phal chen): stobs tshad med pa la bzhugs sam/ sku'i yongs su spyod pa mi mthong bar bzhugs kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gzhan gyi/
109'a7(phal chen): mi tshig pa'i ye shes dang / smon lam gyi tshul gyis mos pa bzhin du 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgyun mi chad par 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas lha yongs su tshol bas kyang /
109'a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi chad do// sangs rgyas klu yongs su tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do// sangs rgyas gnod sbyin yongasu tshol ba dang /
109'a9(phal chen): sangs rgyas mi 'am ci yong su tshol ba dang / sa rgyas kye chen stong su tshol 'dan
109'b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas srin po yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas mi dang mi ma yin pa yongs su tshol dang / sangs rgyas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
109'b2(phal chen): yongs su tshol bas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do// chos ston pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do// sangs rgyas gcig brjod pas kyang
109'b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do// sangs rgyas thams cad brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi'i 'chad do// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang /
109'b4(phal chen): smon lam thams cad gcig tu brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par phye ste spyod pa tha dad pa brjod pas kyang sangs
109'b5(phal chen): rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do// 'jig rten gyi yul sangs rgyas kyi yul du brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do// yul ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi
109'b6(phal chen): yul du rjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi chad do// nyin mtshan dang yul du yin man dang / zla dang lo grangs par bzhugs pa dang / yongs su bzhugs pa nas
109'b7(phal chen): de bzhin du/ skal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du bzhugs pa dang / yongasu bzhugs pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la
109'b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas 'phrin las brgyad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i ban
110a1(phal chen): bal#la 'byung gnas lta bu sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa kun la rnam par sbyong pa lta bu/ sangs rgyas lta bu sangs rgyas rnams la dad
110a2(phal chen): ba lta bu sems khong du chud pa bya ba la shin tu mos pa lta bu/ dbang po rnams la sgrub pa lta bu/ sems can skye dgu lte bu/ thams cad la 'dul ba lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad
110a3(phal chen): la mos pa lta bu/ byang chub sems dpa' lta bu/ thams cad la 'byung ba lta bu/ byang chub tu bzhugs pa rnams la skul ba lta bu/ bzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams la ye she
110a4(phal chen): snang ba lta bu dag ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten mi rtag par ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad par brjod pa dang / 'phrin las
110a5(phal chen): mdzad pa'i mthar thugs par bstan pa dang / chos kyi rgyud nyams pa med pa'i dngos por brjod pa dang / srid pa'i tshul rtsa nas tshad par brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad
110a6(phal chen): skyo bar bya bar snyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i sems can su mthun par bya ba dang / sku tshe'i mtha' lta bur sems can rnams kyi shes par bya ba dang / sems
110a7(phal chen): can rnams kyi 'jig rten thams cad du dga' bar ldan pa bya ba dang / sems can rnams la ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud brnyes par gyis shig par bstan pa
110a8(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'khor lo skor ba/ bstan du mi rung ba khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'jig rten rnams kyi brtsol ba skyod pa dang / sangs rgyas la dmig
110b1(phal chen): par brtson pa'i sems la mgod pa dang / yul du dran pa rnams par dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i rnam par rtog pa skyed pa dang / skyo ba'i dbang po phyir ldog
110b2(phal chen): cing yongs su dag par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas la mos bskyed pa dang / skyo bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams la byin gyi rlabs par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas la dmig pa'i
110b3(phal chen): rkyen 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du phyin pa dgongs pa mdzad do// sku thams cad bsheg ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi sems can rnams yongs su
110b4(phal chen): gzungs par mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten rnam par 'khrugs pa dang / dregs shing myos pa'i sems can rnams sdom pa la dgod pa mdzad cing / yongs su mya ngan las
110b5(phal chen): mda' ba ston pas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las dgu pa'o// de bzhin gshe
110b6(phal chen): pa rnams mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe/ 'jig rten thams cad na sems can rnam smre sngags 'don cing du ba dang / mya ngan byed pa dang / 'chi ma 'byin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs
110b7(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas zhe'am/ thugs rje chen po zhe'am/ ded dpon chen po zhe'am/ phan par bzhed pa thubs rtse ba can zhe 'am/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis sems
110b8(phal chen): can thams cad kyi skyabasu gyur pa/ mgon du gyur pa/ rten du gyur pa bla na med pa bsod nams kyi zhing nub par gyur to zhe'am/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'byung bar bka'
111a1(phal chen): bag / zhes rnams pa de lta bur sme sngags 'dron cing / mya ngan byed pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba rjes su dran pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
111a2(phal chen): yid la byed pa de dang de dag gi sgor sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las tshad med pa rgyun mi 'chad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/
111a3(phal chen): sems can rnams dad pas mchod pa bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams lpags pa'i bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams yongasu smin par
111a4(phal chen): bya ba'i drang / sems can rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams gdung ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams kyi bsod nams tshogs
111a5(phal chen): yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pas dmig par bya ba'i dbang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten
111a6(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pas/ phyogs dang yul sna tshogs su sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsags par bya ba'i dbang gis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa
111a7(phal chen): dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sku gdung dang ring srel byin gyis rlobs ste/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto bya na/
111a8(phal chen): bo dang / mi'i gnas thams cad du 'dul ba dang / mos pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du sku gdung dang ring sril byin gyis rlob bo// rang gi sgra rnam par phye ste/ sku gsung dang / ring srel tshad
111b1(phal chen): med pa grangs med pa dpab tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa byin gyis rlob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten kyis sangs
111b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi sku gdung 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par bye ba'i de yul dang / phyogs kyi klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'amachi
111b3(phal chen): dang lto phye chen po'i gnas dang / mi'i gnas dang / srin po'i gnas dag du sku gdung dang ring srel la mchod pa byed par 'gyur bas/ sku gdung gi ring srel dang / dbu dang phyag sen
111b4(phal chen): dang mchod rten dang / sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i mchod rten la 'gro ba thams cad nges par sangs rgyas dran par gyur te/ chos la rab tu rten par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun la dad pa
111b5(phal chen): rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// yul dang phyogs kyi gnas de dang de dag tu'ang rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas mchod pa la brtson pa'i bsam pas sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar 'gyuraro//
111b6(phal chen): bsod nams byed par 'gyur ro// mtho ris de dang de yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// rigs dang rgyud kyi bdag nyid che ba rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ long spyod chen po dang 'khor
111b7(phal chen): rnam par dag par rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// lha dang ma'i phun sum tshogs pa nyamasu myongs par 'gyur ro// log par ltung ba med pa'i lam yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
111b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'byung ba don yod pa rab tu sgrub par 'gyur ro// chos dkar po la yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// khams gsum las 'byung ba'i lam yongasu sbyo
112a1(phal chen): bal ma'agyur ro// theg pa gang la dad pa'i smon lam gyis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag la drin du gzo b.rab tu
112a2(phal chen): thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rten pa dang / skyabs pa dang / mgon brtsal ba dang / dpungs gnyen rtsal ba'i sems skyed par 'gyur te/ de
112a3(phal chen): ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab par spongs pa/ bsod nams zad mi shes pa'i yon tan gyi
112a4(phal chen): gnas dag ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten du byung na/ de ltar sems can rnams kyi dge bo'i rtsa ba mang po rab tu gsags pas/ bsod nams kyi
112a5(phal chen): tshogs rab tu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas
112a6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgya chen po tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams so// de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs ma rtog par lha dang
112a7(phal chen): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi chang gdungs par minus so// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang ltar byung ba'i dran thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad tu 'dug par nus
112a8(phal chen): pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnyi su med par spyod cing / dngos po rnam pa gnyi su med pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug gis
112b1(phal chen): chos rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lung bstan pa thams cad ston pa la gnyi su med par spyod do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
112b2(phal chen): 'das ni sems can sangs rgyas kyi rjes su dran pa la brtson pa rnams kyi sems dang / bsam pa brjod med pa 'jam klas pa rnams lo gnyi su med par spod do/ sang+yas
112b3(phal chen): kyi chos thams cad kyi don ma lus par sangs rgyas pas/ gnyis su med pa'i sku rnam par dmig par mdzad/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de
112b4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rang bzhin gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o// 'byung ba dang byang ba'i mtha' gnyi su med pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang
112b5(phal chen): phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba gnyisu med par thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gnyi su med pas/ dus gsum gyi sangs
112b6(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gcig par rab tu mkhyen cing / sten pa thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o// sangs rgyas gcig dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung
112b7(phal chen): gnyi su med par thug su chud pa mnga' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su chud pa dang / 'dul ba mdzad pa'i rnam par dmigs pa gnyi su med
112b8(phal chen): bar thug su chud pa mnga' ba'i// 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi chos gnyi su med par thub su chud pa mnga' ba'o// 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung /
113a1(phal chen): #ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig ste/ gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o//
113a2(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnyi su med par spyod cing dngos po gnyi su med pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug gi chos so// kye rgyal ba'i
113a3(phal chen): sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa chos thams cad la rab tu bzhugs pa rnamaso// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste
113a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings gnas ye shes thugasu chud pa la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs rje chen po mi
113a5(phal chen): mnyam pa la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du 'byung ba la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
113a6(phal chen): 'dul ba'i sems can yongasu mi gtong ba la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dngos po med pa la gnas pa'i chos nyid la bzhugs pa'o//
113a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skal pa mnyam pa tha mi dad cing don yod pa la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
113a8(phal chen): rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i thugs la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad mnyam pa med par bzhol ba la bzhugs pa'o// sangs
113b1(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chags pa med pa'i thugs kyis rnam par spyod pa la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid
113b2(phal chen): la 'jug pas grub pa med pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid la bzhugs pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs
113b3(phal chen): pa bzhugs pa/ chos thams cad la bzhugs pa rnams so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos thams cad ma lus par mngon pa
113b4(phal chen): mkhyen pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'das pa bgrang ba mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / ma 'ong ba bgrangs pa
113b5(phal chen): mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / da ltar 'byung ba mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / tshig gi lam mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /
113b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi rgyud mtha' dag mngon par mkhyen pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa dang / shes pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
113b7(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po dang / rnam pa sna tshog su rnam par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la/ bsam pa tshad med pa yongasu mi gtang bas
113b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'bar bar bya ba dang / long su rdzogs par bya ba dang / mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad 'tshang brgya ba'i mkhyen pa mnga' da
114a1(phal chen): bal/ #thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa
114a2(phal chen): dang chos kyi dbyings kyi bzhi mig 'phrul gyi rnam pa lta bur dbye ba thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po do dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
114a3(phal chen): kyi chos de dag ma lus par mngon par mkhyen pa'o// shin tu rgyas pa chen po spangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las// bam po drug bcu drug pa'o//
114a4(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi stobs chen po stobs dam pa/ stobs tshad
114a5(phal chen): med pa/ stobs bdag nyid che ba/ stobs thub pa med pa/ stobs mi nyams pa/ stobs snying po dang ldan pa/ stobs mi shig pa/ stobs 'jig rten thams cad bsam gyi
114a6(phal chen): mi khyab pa/ stobs sems can thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan stobs po che/ dpa' bo chen po stobs rnam te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
114a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sku ni pha rol tu gnon pa thams cad kyi bshig mi chod pa'o// 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad kyi sku che'i dbang po nyams par mi nus so// 'jig rten gyi khams tham
114a8(phal chen): cad kyi skal ba'i mi'i gdung bas tshigs par mi nus pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig par rtogs pa'i chu'i phung por 'grogs par mi 'gyur ro// bdud thams cad
114b1(phal chen): dang bdud kyi sde thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyi dpungs dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang
114b2(phal chen): mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi dpung dang / sha za dang srin po thams cad kyi dbungs dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi dpung gis rgal bar dka' ba'o// rdo rjer
114b3(phal chen): rab kyi ri tsam gyi char pa dang / khor yug gi ri chen po 'am/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i ri tsam gyi rdo rje'i char bab kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
114b4(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ba spu gcig kyang 'bul bar mi 'gyur g.yo bar mi 'gyur te/ bag tsha ba'i shas mi mnga'o// bzhugs sam bzhengs sam/ bzhud
114b5(phal chen): dam gzims kyang rung ste/ spyod lam 'gyur ba med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bzhugs pa'i yul de dang de'i 'khor dag tu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa bgyis na kun tu 'bab
114b6(phal chen): par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhom 'bring rnams la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs pa'i sems can rnams la yang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing mi
114b7(phal chen): g.yon/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi
114b8(phal chen): chos dang po'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgyes na/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ri rab dang bcas pa/
115a1(phal chen): bal#/ 'khor yug dang 'khor yug chen po'i ri dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho dang ri dang nag 'tshal thib po dang / sems can gnas tha dad pa de lta
115a2(phal chen): bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu bcud de/ phyi ma'i mtha'i skal ba'i mur thugs par bzhag kyang / de bzhin gshegs
115a3(phal chen): ba'i byin gyi rlabs ma rtog par sems can rnams kyis shes par mi nus so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pa spu'i bu ga gcig gis gzung ste/
115a4(phal chen): phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug pas bsdam shing gshegs sam bzhugs sam bzhengs ma/ gzim kyang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs skad gcig gcig
115a5(phal chen): gis tsam yang skyo ba mi mnga'o// chad cing dub par mi 'gyur ro// mthu dang stobs la yongasu nyams par 'gyur ba mi mnga'o// spyod lam rnam par 'gyur ba mi mnga'o//
115a6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dzin kyang skyo ba med do// dub pa med do// gnod pa med do//
115a7(phal chen): med par mi 'gyur ro// mi g.yo mi 'byung mi 'jig go/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa tham
115a8(phal chen): cad snams kyang de'i rgyus thugs skad cig tsam du yang / mi bde ba'i sku nyams mi 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che'i stobs sangs rgyas
115b1(phal chen): kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshar gyi chos gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gshegs thabs gcig tu bzhud pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
115b2(phal chen): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su mda' zhing thugs sked pa gcig gis skal pa tha dad pa'i rim pa sangs rgyas kyi
115b3(phal chen): zhing brjod med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba/ snyed 'byung bar mdzad do// de ltar gshegs pas bskal 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gshegs
115b4(phal chen): shing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa'i bskal par bzhud de/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
115b5(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du 'khor kun tu rgya che zhing yangs pa'i khor yug chen po'i rdo rje'i ri dang // sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rnam par rjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa
115b6(phal chen): skyes pa snyed kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang de la skyes pa de sred pa spu'i khung bu gcig tu rjud de// ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu ji lta ba bzhin tu sku'i ba spu'i khang bu ga thams cad
115b7(phal chen): rjud de/ ba spu'i khung bu yang sems can thams cad sked gyur la/ de dag thams cad rnams te/ de snyed kyi ba spu'i khung bur tshul de bzhin du gshams te/ thug skyed pa
115b8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyud zhing bshegs sam/ phyogs kyi tha thams cad du rgyan mong gshegs sam/ rnam kha'i dbyings thams cad rgyud /
116a1(phal chen): pal#/ zhing gshegs sam/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud bgrang ba sngon gyi mthar rtogs pa nas gzung ste/ phyi mi'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thugs
116a2(phal chen): par de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa thams cad zad par gyur kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhud pa la brtson pa ni nyams par mi 'gyur ro// sku nyams chung bar mi 'gyuro//
116a3(phal chen): thugs rnam par 'khrugs par mi 'gyur ro// ting nge 'a nyams par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongasu nyams par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
116a4(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi thu bo che chen po stobs/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul rgyal mtshan gyi chos gsum pa'o// bzhan yang sangs rgyas rnams ni bsod snyom gcig bzhes nas
116a5(phal chen): bskal pa brjod du med par dkyil mo dkrungs gcig bcas pas nyin mtshan gyi rgyud du sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur rtogs pa/ skal pa 'das par bzhugs kyang /
116a6(phal chen): sku mi g.yo zhing bde ba'i dam pa la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par spyod kyang / sems can 'ga' tsam du yang sangs rgyas kyi phrin
116a7(phal chen): rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su dkod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can cig gi lus kyang
116a8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed tsam du tshe de lta bur gyur la/ sems can gcig gi lus kyi tshad ji tsam gyi lusu sems
116b1(phal chen): can thams cad kyang gyur la/ sems can de dag re re'i gzugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ljid ci tsa ba yod pa de nam du gyur te/ sems can gcig gi ji ltar sgrib
116b2(phal chen): bzhin du/ sems can thams cad re re'i lcid kyang de tsam du gyur te/ sems can de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag sor gyi rtse mo gcig la/ phyi ma'i bskal pa'i mur thug pa'i snam ste/
116b3(phal chen): phyag sor gyi rtse mo gcig gi ji ltar rnam pa de bzhin du phyag sor thams cad kyi rtse mo la 'ang de tsam re re snams kyang de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sku rnyil ba'ang thugs dub bar mi 'gyur
116b4(phal chen): te/ thugs skyed pa'i cha shas shin tu phra ba gcig tsam du yang sdug bsngal mi bde ba skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa dang / na mkha'i dbyings
116b5(phal chen): la 'jug pa dang / phyogs kyi dra ba'i rnam pa la 'jug pa re re dang / de lta bu la 'jug pa na mkha'i khams ma lus pa'i dbyings kyis klas pa/ chos kyi dbyings mthas gtugs
116b6(phal chen): ba/ skra rtse mo'i cha shas kyi bzhal ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa thams cad re re zhing yang / skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi bzhal te/ na mkha'i dbyings kyis kun tu khyab
116b7(phal chen): ba thams cad ma lus pa'i sgra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad kyis na mkha'i dbyings la 'jug pa thams cad bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam 'di'i tshul dang /
116b8(phal chen): dkyil mo dkrung gcig tu bzhugs pa'i spyod pas sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa zad par mdzad de/ bzhan yang bskal pa mnga' bar mdzad cing
117a1(phal chen): babaskal pa la rab tu 'jug ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i
117a2(phal chen): rgyal mtshan gyi chos bzhi pa'o// bzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni sku gcig la dbu sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
117a3(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs te/ dbu re re la yang ljags sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed byin byi rlabs nas/ de dag re res kyang dbyangs kyi
117a4(phal chen): yan lag dang sgra skad kyi gsung sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed re re brjod de/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa'i sems can gyi kha
117a5(phal chen): thams cad go bar mdzad cing / dbyangs kyi yan lag dang sgra skad kyi gsung re res kyang / mdo sde sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
117a6(phal chen): bshod la/ mdo sde re re la yang chos bstan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du bde pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gzhol bar mdzad de/ chos bstan pa
117a7(phal chen): thams cad las cig las kyang chos kyi tshig dang yi ge/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shi na tu phra ba snyed brjod par 'gyur la/ chos bstan pa gcig las ji lta ba de bzhin
117a8(phal chen): du/ chos bstan pa thams cad las kyang de snyed kyi tshig dang yige brjod de/ de ltar brjod pas bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
117b1(phal chen): skyed rab tu bstan la/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed zad par gyur kyang / dadung gzhan yang bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi
117b2(phal chen): zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du rgyud zhing / rab tu ston pa'i tshul gyi rnam grangs 'dis/ bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul
117b3(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed du rab tu bstan la/ rnam grangs 'di 'dra bas bskal ba 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed zad la sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi
117b4(phal chen): spyod pa snyed kyi bskal pa 'das par gyur te/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa zad cing 'das par byas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa chos thams cad snang
117b5(phal chen): ba'i 'khor bskor ba dang / chos thams cad rab tu shes par bstan cing / lung stan pa dang / the tshom thams cad rab tu spyod pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / chos
117b6(phal chen): thams cad snang bar byed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad brjod du med pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
117b7(phal chen): ye shes nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i brgyan dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad maM lus par ye shes kyi sgron ma chen pos rgyan pa'i chos kyi
117b8(phal chen): 'khor lo bskor ba dang / tha dad par yang dag par mkhyen pa dang / mi 'jigs pa chen pos brgyan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba rgyun mi 'chad de/ sangs rgyas kyi skra cig gi
118a1(phal chen): #byin gyi rlabs kyis ji ltar de bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin chen po dpa thams cad la/ dpe med pa rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ de bzhin
118a2(phal chen): du chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi na mkha'i kyi mthas rtags pa dang / skra'i rtse mo cha shas kyi gzhal ba/ ma lus pa thams cad chags pa med par rnam par phye bas/
118a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa de snyed de snyed du thugs kyi skad cig re re la/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa bskal pa
118a4(phal chen): sprul par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re'ang de snyed kyi dbu mnga' bar gyur la/ bzhung de bzhin du sku re
118a5(phal chen): la yang de snyed de snyed kyi ljags mnga' bar gyur te/ ljags ri re kyang de snyed de snyed kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra skad kyi gsung chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa'i sems can gyi
118a6(phal chen): khams sems go bar mdzad pa 'byung la/ dbyangs kyi yan dang sgra skad kyi gsung de dag re res kyang de snyed de snyed kyi mdo sde bshad par 'gyur la/ mdo sde de dag re res la yang
118a7(phal chen): de skrod de snyed kyi chos bstan pa rab tu bzhog par mdzad de/ chos ston pa de dag re res las kyang de skyed de snyed kyi chos kyi tshig dang yi ge brjod par 'gyur la/ chos kyi tshig dang
118a8(phal chen): yi ge de dag re res kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dbyangs kyi rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad go bar mdzad kyang / de bzhin gshes
118b1(phal chen): pa'i dbyangs la dub pa mi mnga' ste/ nyams par mi 'gyur la thogs pa mi mnga' zhing dma' bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor yang bskal pa phyi ma'i
118b2(phal chen): mtha'i mur thug pa'i bar du rgyun ma chad par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi
118b3(phal chen): chos mnga' ba'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa/ rdo rje chen po ltar shin tu brtan par grub pa mnga' ba dag ste/ de
118b4(phal chen): dge byang chub kyi shing drung du byon na/ bdud sdig to can gyi sems can thams cad snyed kyi bdud kyi bde gzugs sna tshogs can shin tu mi sdug pa/ 'jigs 'jigs ltar
118b5(phal chen): 'dug pa rab tu snang ba'i gzugs can 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can/ rab tu skyi g.ya' ba skyed pa'i gzugs can/ bdud shin tu mi sdugs
118b6(phal chen): pa'i gzugs 'chang ba/ rab chog por 'jigs pa/ 'jig pa chen po rnyed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad gsod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad phung bar byed pa/ de lta bu sha stag gi
118b7(phal chen): byang chub kyi shing drung dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / na mkha'i mthar thug pa gang bar gzigs kyang byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
118b8(phal chen): rnams la snyengs pa mi mnga'o// bag tsha ba mi mnga'o// ba spu gcig kyang g.yo ba med do// thugs kyi cha shas shin tu phra ba 'ga' tsam gyis kyang de ltar rnam pa tha dad pa'i
119a1(phal chen): ba#gzugs la mtshan ma rnam pa tha dad pa 'dzin pa mi mnga' ste/ shin tu brtan no// g.yo ba med do// mi skul to// 'gyur ba med do// rnam par
119a2(phal chen): rtog pa med do// shin tu zhi ba'o// snyengs pa dang bag tsha ba thams cad dang shin tu bral lo// sdug pa dang khong khro shin tu spangaso// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa rgyun mi chad de/
119a3(phal chen): byams pa chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'o// thugs rje chen po'i gnas kyi dbang po shin tu dben pa'o// bag tsha ba mi mnga' ba'i thug dang ldan pa'o// thugs shin tu brten
119a4(phal chen): zhing nyams pa mi mnga' ba'o// tshus zil gyi gnon la pas zil gyi mi gnon pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ bdud thams cad dang bdud kyi ris su rtogs pa'i lha tham
119a5(phal chen): cad/ bdud kyi sde thams cad shin tu zil gyis gnon to// shin tu sgra 'gong ngo do// de ltar zil gyi gnan te spa 'gong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la skabs tshol lo//
119a6(phal chen): de dag la'ang bcom ldan 'das de dag tshe 'phrul chen po gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdul ba mdzad pa nye bar sgrub ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
119a7(phal chen): las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos dgu pa'o//
119a8(phal chen): gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung thogs pa med pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa de dang de dag thams cad du/ sems can rnams 'dul ba'i
119b1(phal chen): don gyi rnam par dmigs par kun tu khyab par 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung de ni ri rnams la thogs pa med do// ri rabs la thogs pa med do// rin po che'i ril
119b2(phal chen): thogs pa med do// khor yug dang khor yug chen po la thogs med do// lha'i khyim la thogs pa med do// klu'i khyim la thogs pa med do// gnod sbyin gyi khyim la thog
119b3(phal chen): ba med do// dri za'i khyim la thogs pa med do// lha ma yin gyi khyim la thogs pa med do// namakha' lding gi khyim la thogs pa med do// mi 'am ci'i khyim la thogs
119b4(phal chen): pa med do// lto phye chen po'i khyim la thogs pa med do// mi dang mi ma yin pa'i khyims la thogs pa med do// gal te rgyal la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa
119b5(phal chen): sgra chen po 'jig rten rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgras 'jig rten gyi khams tham cad gang ste/ ca co 'dres par gyur kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung ni/ 'dul
119b6(phal chen): pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna ba'i rnam par dmigs la sgribs pa med pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'ba' zhig de dag gi rna ba'i rnam par dmigs pa la/
119b7(phal chen): lhang nge lham me lhun ne ste go bar mdzad pa'i tshig dang / yi ge rnams kyang klag par 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po stobs
119b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos bdun pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs ni chags pa mi mnga' ba ste/ bskal pa bye ba khrab
120a1(phal chen): @#khyim pastong brjod med pa'i yang brjod med par yongs sgyud ba'o// 'dus pa dang mthon pa dang // dbyung ba sangs rgyas tha
120a2(phal chen): cad dang rgyun gcig tu gyur ba'o// rnyog pa med cing rnam par dang ste shin tu gsal ba'o// bdag gi zhes bya ba mi mnga' ba'o// chos thams cadril mi gnas pa'o//
120a3(phal chen): nang na mi gnas pa ma yin no// phyi rol na gnas pa ma yin pa'o// ma skyes pa'o// dmigs pa thams cad kyi dben pa'o// zhi zhing gnas med pa'o// rtsom pa med
120a4(phal chen): ba'o// 'du shes sna tshogs thams cad la mi gnas pa'o// dngos po'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'gags pa'o// rang bzhin gyi 'od dang zhing gsal ba'o// yongs su
120a5(phal chen): dag pa'o// dmigs pa dang / yid la bya ba thams cad dang ma 'dres pa'o// chos thams cad nyon mongs pa med pa'i yul dang ldan pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha'
120a6(phal chen): 'dod chags dang bral bas dag pa'o// chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pa'i mthar thug pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kun nas mi zad pa dang ldan pa'o// 'du shes kyi rnam pa
120a7(phal chen): thams cad kyi tshad med pa dang bral ba'o// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi brjod pa thams cad 'gags pa'o// tshig gi lam gyi brjod du med pa'i mthar thug pa'i
120a8(phal chen): yul lo// mi zad pa dang chags pa med pa'i kyi mthar thug pa'o// ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'o// stobs bcu'i brgyan du gyur pa'o// thams cad kyis rnam par dag pa'o//
120b1(phal chen): thabs mkhas pas 'byung ba'o// chos sna tshogs dang / chos du ma dang / chos thams cad shin tu ston pa dang mi 'galo/ dus gsum du tha dad pa med pa'o// chos kyi
120b2(phal chen): dbyings thams cad du chos bzhi med pa thams cad kyi mnga'i pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa'o// chos thams cad la mnga' ba'i 'byung gnas dang mdzod du gyur pa'o// chos kyi tshul
120b3(phal chen): thams cad la dgongs pa khyad par du rmongs pa med pa'o// zhing gi rgyud du rtogs pa thams cad dang / phyogs kyi dra ba dang / rgyud 'byam klas pa mo lus pa thams cad la
120b4(phal chen): mi gnas pa brtan zhing mi g.yo la nyams pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu gzigs pa/ chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa/ zag pa thams cad yongs su
120b5(phal chen): zad pa/ thugs rnam par grol zhing zag pa mi mnga' ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol bas shin tu rnam par grol ba/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mi zad pas klas pa chags pa
120b6(phal chen): med par rnam par spyod pa rtag tu ma nyams par bzhag pa/ dus gsum thams cad sgrib pa med par 'byung ba/ sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi sems dang spyod
120b7(phal chen): pa thams cad ma lus par thugs skad cig gis rab tu mkhyen pa te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa
120b8(phal chen): rgyal mtshan gyi chos brgyad pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sgra ni sku minga' ba ste/ rang bzhin gcig tu gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams
121a1(phal chen): 5kyi yul tshad med pa'i sku'o// mtha' dang dbus med par yongs su grub pa'i sku'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyi zad par mi nus pa'i sku'o//
121a2(phal chen): khams gsum pas gos pa med pa'i sku'o// rten pa'i skus rnam par dmigs pa'o// lhag pa'i bsam pa dang rjes su dran pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sku'i rang bzhin
121a3(phal chen): yang dag par ston pa'o// bden pa med pa dang brdzun med pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid kyis yong su dag pa'o// ches kyi sku bzhud pa dang / byon pa med pa'i sku'o//
121a4(phal chen): 'dus ma byas pas 'jig pa med pa'i sku'o// mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid gcig pa'i chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin no// yul na mi gnas pa dang phyogs na mi gnas pa'i
121a5(phal chen): sku'o// ma lus pa thams cad kyi lus kyi sku'o// sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu chung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no// lus thams
121a6(phal chen): cad yongs su bzhol bar sku sna tshogs su rnam par dmigs pa mdzad kyang chos kyi sku'i tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ba'o// ye shes kun tu snang ba'i snying po can no// sku yongs
121a7(phal chen): kyi mdzod du gyur pa'o// chos kyi dbyings rnam pa tha dad pa med pa shin tu sten pa'i sku'o// khams ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pas kun tu khyab pa'i sku'i rang
121a8(phal chen): bzhin no// mi g.yo mi dgongs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'o// yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin pa'i tshul dang tshul ma yin pa'i rab tu brjod pa'i sku'o// sems can gyi/
121b1(phal chen): mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i sku'o// 'gags pa yang ma yin pa ma 'gags pa ma yin pas 'dul ba ston pa'i sku'o// yon tan rin po che thams cad
121b2(phal chen): yang dag par 'byung bas shin tu 'phags pa'i sku'o// chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid du yang dag par sgrubs pa'i sku'o// rang bzhin gyi rab tu zhi zhing
121b3(phal chen): sgrubs pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i sku'o// thogs pa mi mnga' bas chos thams cad thugasu chud pa'i sku'o// thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i chos kyi dbyings rnam par
121b4(phal chen): dag cing / 'jig rten thams cad du shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sku'o// phyir mi ldogs cing sgribs pa mi mnga' ba la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pas ye shes thams cad
121b5(phal chen): kyi rjes su 'brang zhing yang dag par gzhol bas thugs su chud pa'i sku ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod
121b6(phal chen): pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos dgu pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes mnyam pa med pa dang mnyam pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
121b7(phal chen): kyi thugs su chud pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi byung ba'o// mngon par 'grub pa'i spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub se
121b8(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pas rnam par dag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'o// tha dad pa med pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
122a1(phal chen): 2#byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi 'byung ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i spyod pa'i tshul thams cad thug su/
122a2(phal chen): chud pa'o// smon lam dang spyod pa chen pos yongasu mi dog pa'o// spyod pa thams cad mi mnyam pa med pas yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'o// spyod pa'i stobs la thub par
122a3(phal chen): dka' ba'i spyod pa thams cad kyi mngon par 'byung ba'o// spyod pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa legs par spyad pas rgyud dma' ba med pa'o//
122a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshad med pa spyad pa'o// ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul mtha' yas pa'o// lam thams cad kyis rab tu brjod pa ma yin pa'o// lam kyi yul
122a5(phal chen): med pa'o// lam thams cad la rab tu bzhags pa'o// ye shes dam pa'i stobs kyis tshul mkhyen pa bag tshwa mi mnga' ba'i chos kyi char 'bebs pa'i 'khor lo dang ldan pa'o//
122a6(phal chen): dge ba dris pa dang ma bris pa la rjesu 'thun pa'i chos kyi tshul ston pa mkhyen pa'o// mnyam pa med pa dang ma nyams pa la shin tu dag pa'o// sku dang gsung dang thugs gi yang dag
122a7(phal chen): bar spyod pa rnams las 'phrin las gsum yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgom pas brnyed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pas rnyed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
122a8(phal chen): pa'i rigs thams cad skyed pa'i don du sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mdzad pa thams cad rab tu 'byung ba'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi bstan pa tshad pa'i gnas rtsa ba med pa
122b1(phal chen): dang ldan pa'o// mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis mthar thug par mi 'gyur ba'o// 'jig rten gyi sems can gyis spyad cing shes pa thams cad kyi bsam gyis mi khyad po/
122b2(phal chen): chos thams cad ma lus par mkhyen cing gzigs pas sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'o// dus gsum yongs pa thams cad kyis tshul shin tu phra ba mtha'
122b3(phal chen): dang dbus med pa ma lus par mkhyen pa'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don mkhyen po'i phyir/ phra ba'i ye shes thugs su chud pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus
122b4(phal chen): pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten thams cad du sbyong ba'o// sangs rgyas
122b5(phal chen): kyi ska bgrangs pa thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes kyi yi ge med pa'i chos thugs sud pa'o// yi ge thams cad sna tshogs par phye ba dang / yi ge thams cad
122b6(phal chen): slo so shing brjod pa mkhyen pa thugs su chud pa'o// kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyis dge ba'i chos spyad pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'o// dam bcas pa'i tshul
122b7(phal chen): bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi lus dang skye mched ji lta ba thugs skad cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad khong du chud par ston pa mkhyen pa'o//
122b8(phal chen): chos thams cad kyi don chos thams cad yongs su btang zhing rim gror bya bas thugasu chud pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par yul du gyur pa'o//
123a1(phal chen): ga #/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad yul du byung ba'o// dus gsum thams cad la thugs skad cig gi chags pa med par mkhyen cing thugs
123a2(phal chen): su chud pa'i yul dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma lus par yul du gyur pa'o// 'jig pa med
123a3(phal chen): par 'dul ba thams cad yul du gyur pa'o// thams cad rje su song zhing rnam par dag pa'i yul thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas pa'o// sa 'tshams med cing thug pa med
123a4(phal chen): pa'i mngon par shes pa rnam par sangs rgyas pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / yid dang rnam par shes pa rnam pa dus gsum du brjod pa ma lus pa thams cad skad
123a5(phal chen): cig gi mkhyen cing thugasu chud pa'o// sems can gyi rnam pa thams cad las mtshams ma bcad pa'o// 'jig rten gyi kham kyi rnam pa thams cad la lhag ma ma lus pa ste/
123a6(phal chen): de dag thams cad la mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i rnam pa thams cad la tshad med pa'o shes bya'i rnam pa thams cad la lhag ma ma lus pa ste/
123a7(phal chen): de dag thams cad lhag ma med par mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ ye shes kyi ye shes sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pas 'byung ba thams cad thugasu chud pa dang /
123a8(phal chen): mkhyen pa thams cad rgyun chad pa med de/ de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i skus mtha' dang dbus med par spyod pa yin/
123b1(phal chen): chags pa med par thugs kyi spyod pa dang mtha' dbus med par spyod pa yin/ thugs rje chen po'i sbyor bas thams cad du rtag tu rgyun mi mchad par chos bstan pa la spyod pas
123b2(phal chen): mtha' dang dbus par spyod pa yin te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi
123b3(phal chen): chos bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos rnams
123b4(phal chen): 'das pa dang / ma 'ong ba da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu mi nus pa
123b5(phal chen): dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog pa mi mnga' ba rnams te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dga'
123b6(phal chen): ldan gyi tshe ji srid par bzhugs pas 'pho ba la thogs pa mi mnga'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zla ba bcus lham pa bstan pa la thogs pa mi mnga'o// sangs
123b7(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mngon par 'byung bar bgyes pa'i thugs kyis mngon par 'byung ba la thogs pa mi mnga'o// sangs rgyas kyi chas thams cad mngan sangs rgyas
123b8(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi shing drungs du bzhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la thogs pa mi mnga'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
124a1(phal chen): / rnams ni thugs skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs
124a2(phal chen): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa la thogs pa mi mnga'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dus bzhin du 'dul ba rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
124a3(phal chen): ba la thogs pa mi mnga'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar skyed pa'i tshul bzhin du/ dus la bab par bshad cing lung bstan pa la thogs
124a4(phal chen): pa mi mnga'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dus la bab pa'i tshul bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad pa la thogs pa mi mnga'o// sangs rgyas
124a5(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' yongs su grub pa rnams lung bstan pa la thogs pa mi mnga'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skad
124a6(phal chen): cigacig tu/ sems can thams cad kyi dri ba yongs su dris pa/ skad cig gcig gis lung bskur ba la thogs pa mi mnga'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/
124a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thogs mi mnga'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong mthag
124a8(phal chen): tu myur du 'byung ba'i chos rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du ngan song dang bral bar 'gyur ro//
124b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du bsod nams yongs su rdzogs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
124b2(phal chen): rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams
124b3(phal chen): myur du mtho ris su skye ba yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du yid gnyis dang ner nur
124b4(phal chen): yang dgra par gsal bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi myur du/ byang chub kyi sems skyed nas phyir mi ldob pa
124b5(phal chen): thob par 'gyur te/ sems can mos pa yangs pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi 'dul ba las byang chub kyi sems skyed pa'i sems can kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rje
124b6(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu skyon med par ma 'das pa/ dmig pa'i lta ba can gyis/ sems can rnams
124b7(phal chen): myur du skyon med pa 'da' bo'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las
124b8(phal chen): 'das pa'i dbang po rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems myur du sgrib pa thams cad byang ba thob par 'gyur to//
125a1(phal chen): ba#/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du snang ba thob cing mi 'jigs pa zhum pa med pa'i slob pa rab tu brtsom
125a2(phal chen): ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma te 'byung ba'i chos rnamaso// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di/
125a3(phal chen): dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rjes su dran pa rnam par dag pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi sbyor bas kyang byang chub sems dpa'
125a4(phal chen): rnams kyis rjesu dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spyod pa rnam par dag pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su dran par bya ba yin/
125a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjesu dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
125a6(phal chen): ni smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjesu dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang dag par bsgrubs pas kyang //
125a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi mthar sangs rgyas kyi tshangs par spyad pa spyod pas kyang byang chub sems
125a8(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi rje su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'tshang brgya pa'i sgo nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjesu dran par bya ba yin
125b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs kyi sku tshad med pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/
125b2(phal chen): ni sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa tshad med mu med pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kyi rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
125b3(phal chen): rnams ni stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su dran par bya ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
125b4(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi rjes su dran pa rnam par dag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa ste/
125b5(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems sna tshogs dang / sems du ma dang spyod pa dang / g.yo ba'i rgyud thad
125b6(phal chen): ma lus pa thugs gcig gis thugs su chud pa dang / dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi lam dang / las kun nas blang ba sna tshogs cha mcho dbu rnam pa tha dad pas
125b7(phal chen): mngon par 'gro zhing / nye bar rdzogs pa mang du nyung dang rnam par smin pa tha dad pa ma lus pa thugs gcig gis/ thug su chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems
125b8(phal chen): sems can gyi rigs sna tshogs dang / sems can gyi rabs du ma'i sems can ma lus pa thams cad 'dul ba'i dus ji bzhin du/ yongasu bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul dang / rjes
126a1(phal chen): bal@#su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi byin rlabs yang dag par bstan pa ma lus par thug su chud pa dang / chos
126a2(phal chen): kyi dbyings thams cad dang / phyogs kyi dra ba'i rgyud thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad kyi/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi mtshan ma gzungs te/
126a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas bstan pa dang / skye ba dang / rnam par dbye ba ma lus par thugasu chud pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang /
126a4(phal chen): mos pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa skad gcig tu/ sangs rgyas bstan pa dang / rnam par dmig par bya ba dang / byin gyis brlab
126a5(phal chen): pa ma lus par thugs su chud pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can pha rol gyi bsam pa la sangs rgyas kyi byin brlabs yang dag par bstan pa ma lus
126a6(phal chen): ba thugasu chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can rnams 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar len pa med pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar gdam ngag dang /
126a7(phal chen): rjesu bstun pas de bzhin gshegs pas 'byung bar bstan pas ma lus par thugs su chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi thams cad du
126a8(phal chen): 'gro ba'i lam ma lus par thugs kyi skad cig gis thugs su chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas rje su dran pa phyogs thams cad du/
126b1(phal chen): gtang ba'i tshul ma lus par thugs kyi skad cig gcig gis thugs su chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi mos pa dang / sems can gyi tshad
126b2(phal chen): ji lta ba bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi tshad ji lta ba bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi sku kha dog mu med pa/ dbyibs mtha' yas pa bstan pa ma lus par thugs kyi skad cig gcig
126b3(phal chen): gis thugs su chud pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad mkhyen
126b4(phal chen): pa nyid kyi rnam par spyod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi
126b5(phal chen): tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad la/ rtags tu mnyam par bzhag kyang /
126b6(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyis sems can rnams la'ang skad cig gcig tu chos ston pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings
126b7(phal chen): ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can thams cad la mnyam par bzhag kyang / skad cig gcig gis sems can gyi khams sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa rnams kyang bdag
126b8(phal chen): med pa'i mtha' la gnas par yongs su sten to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi dus gsum la ma tham par bzhag kyang
127a1(phal chen): bal#thugs kyi skad cig gcig bi rwa shas la'ang mnyam par bzhag cing rnam par spyod do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings
127a2(phal chen): ma lus pa thams cad kyi phyogs 'byab klas pa'i dra ba thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyud dang / rnam pa thams cad la mnyam par bzhag kyang / mi zad pa'i zhing gi mtha' la
127a3(phal chen): yang bzhugs shing rnam par spyod do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku mu med pa la mnyam par bzhag
127a4(phal chen): kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par dmig par yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbying
127a5(phal chen): ma lus pa thams cad sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis yongs su rgyas par rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang / sems can thams cad kyi sems 'byung ba'i mdzod sna tshogs la yang
127a6(phal chen): mos pa dang / yid la byid pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par spyod do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin la rtab tu
127a7(phal chen): mnyam par bzhag kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i mur thugs pa la bzhugs pa yang yongasu mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings
127a8(phal chen): ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyi rten pa la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang thugs skad cig gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba brjod pa yang rab tu ston to// sangs rgyas
127b1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa 'jam klas pa la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang / thugs skad
127b2(phal chen): cig gcig gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas mu med pa ston pa rnam par bgod pa'i tshul mu med pas sangs rgyas bstan pa rgyun mi bcod do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
127b3(phal chen): rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du sgribs pa med par rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang thugs skad gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang rtogs par thugs
127b4(phal chen): su chud cing / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa mu med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog rnyes par bzhugs te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
127b5(phal chen): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
127b6(phal chen): rnams kyi rnam par thar pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na rdul shin du phra ba cig la sangs rgyas skye ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongasu bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang /
127b7(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi 'khor lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod med bskor ba yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la sems can
127b8(phal chen): yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar brjod du med pa'i yang brjed med pa yongasu bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin phra ba gcig la zhing brjod du med pa'i yang
128a1(phal chen): palabarjod du med pa yongasu bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
128a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i zhing gi rgyud yongasu
128a3(phal chen): bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'das dang ba byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul
128a4(phal chen): pa yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i
128a5(phal chen): rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad yongasu bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa
128a6(phal chen): ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa'o// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba
128a7(phal chen): las sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyi mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u ste sum bcu dgu pa'o// bam po drug bcu rtsa bdun pa'o//
128a8(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos mtshan rgya mtsho brjod pa'i don du byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
128b1(phal chen): dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbul mi chen po'i mtshan/ chos kyi brgyan rin po che sna tshogs sum bcu rtsa gnyis mnga' bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu de ni 'khor kun nas/
128b2(phal chen): 'od zer gyi dra ba shin tu 'phro ba'i sprin rab tu 'byung zhing rgyas par 'gengs pa ste/ de la mi chen po'i mtshan rin po che'i dang po'i dbu'i dbu 'tshams na/ rin po che sna tshogs thad
128b3(phal chen): kyi rgyal po las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba skye ba bas/ dpal gyi yongs su rgyas shing yan lag dang nying lag thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin rnam par
128b4(phal chen): skye ba yongs su 'khyil ba'i klong gi dbyibs gis phyogs thams cad kyi rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbu la 'phro ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor klog gi phred
128b5(phal chen): ba lta bur byung bas/ phyogs 'tshams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa snying po byang chub tu bzhugs pa ston cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi na mkha'i sprin du bdal bas/
128b6(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyi bzhi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs mdzod sgra g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'i dbyibs las gser gyi kha dog bzang por 'od zer
128b7(phal chen): 'bar ba 'jig rten gyi khams su 'byung ba'i 'od kyis/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gsal ba'i 'od kyis
128b8(phal chen): sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la rin po che'i 'od kyi klongs g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dzad/
129a1(phal chen): du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi sgo nas snang bas 'jig rten gyi rgya mtsho khams thams cad du
129a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas dpag byang chub sems dpa'i mchog rnam par snang bas/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa'i sbyin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin /
129a3(phal chen): pa'i mtshan gser ying du 'ong ba'i smin ma tshogs kyi pazhini gshegs pa'i khyimachog gi mthu byung bar btu'abar bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od mer
129a4(phal chen): rnam par byung bar byas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang gyi sbyin ces bye ba mnga' bdang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbul de bzhin pa she shes pa'i
129a5(phal chen): mtshan rin po che bai dUra'i 'od zer dang / me tog gi mdog gachos kyi dbyings thams cad snang brnam par 'phrul ba'i sprin nor bu rin po che'i mtshan nyid lta bu'i dbu ma rin po ches
129a6(phal chen): tshigs snang ba'i mtshan nyid kyis 'od chags pas/ phyogs thams cad rnam par snang bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi bka' thub dang dpal gyi ye shes las rnam
129a7(phal chen): ba de lta bur 'byung ba'i rin po che'i 'od pa rab tu skye ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbul de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang / rin po che'i 'o ce
129a8(phal chen): g.yas phyobs su 'khyil zhing 'gro bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rin po che'i bcod pan gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par brgyas pas/ 'jig
129b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad du rin po che'i 'od tshad med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par ston pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang /
129b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che rnam par 'phrul pas rin po che rgya mtshos skye ba'i 'od dang / 'od zer gyi dri ma med pa rab tu 'phros pas/ byang
129b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i chos ston pa rgya mtsho rnam par snang bar 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pas
129b4(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kun tu de bzhin gshes pa'i gsung gi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la rin po che'i rgyal po sems kyi rgyal po dang /
129b5(phal chen): in dra ni la'i 'od skye ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bas 'jig rten gyi khas dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'od 'phro ba/ sgron ma'i sprin
129b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho rab tu sgrogs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad dung ro 'byin cing / sangs rgyas kyi stobs yongs su dag
129b7(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'byin pa'i sprin shin tu yangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba mnga' ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i rgyal po
129b8(phal chen): bai dUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer du 'byung ba'i dra ba mngon par 'phags pa las chos kyi lus dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thad dang /
130a1(phal chen): b.laphyogs rgya mtshor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yang dag par ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi stobs chos kyi dbyings la mngon du gyur pa rab tu ston par
130a2(phal chen): bzhugs pa/ sems can thams cad la yongs su ston pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa tshad med mu med par yang dag par 'phags shing yongasu dag la dri mo med pa yongs su
130a3(phal chen): gnan te/ rin po che'i thams cad kyi 'od kun tu snang ba'i rang bzhin rab tu skye ba'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor gyi sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'jig
130a4(phal chen): rten gyi khams tshad med pa na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan rin po che las 'od rab tu skye bas zhing thams cad kun nas g.yogs cing sgrib pa med do// chos kyi
130a5(phal chen): dbyings thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi gsungs rin po che'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba rab tu kye bas/ chos kyi rgya mtsho chen po rab tu sbar ba las byang chub sems dpa'i
130a6(phal chen): spyod pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / snang ba can gyi sprin langs pa'i 'od ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che bai dUr+ya dang / in tra ni la dang / rdo rje mang
130a7(phal chen): po las nor bu rin po che rnam par gton te/ rab tu bkram pa'i kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od rnam par dag pa/ rin po che bai dUr+ya'i 'od kun tu 'byung ba las/ sgra skad rgya mtsho dzad kyis
130a8(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas kyi snang ba rnam par ston pa'i rgya mtsho'i ye shes sangs rgyas sprul pa'i 'od kun tu 'byed pa'i sprin rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' nga dang / sangs rgyas
130b1(phal chen): kyi dbul/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i 'od g.yas phyogs su 'gro ba'i me tog/ rin po che'i lhabs skyabs kyis brgyan pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thang
130b2(phal chen): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po// byang chub kyi brgyan gyi sprin mngon par mthon pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos rnam par dag pa ste/
130b3(phal chen): bskal pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin
130b4(phal chen): po che'i sems kyi rgyal po'i 'od zer dam pa rgya mtshos brgyan pa'i chos rgyan du ma mtshan rnam par bkod pa las/ 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod/ byang chub sems dpa'i
130b5(phal chen): sprin la snang ba shin tu 'byung zhing ye shes kyi sku dang / chos kyi skus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpas yongasu khyab pa'i sprin dang /
130b6(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyi sprin gyi 'od ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rdo rje'i bzhi me tog dang ldan pa'i bai dUr+ya'i kun tu snang
130b7(phal chen): bas chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur te rnam par snang bas chos kyi dbying rgya mtsho yongs su rgyas par 'gengs shing / 'jig rten gyi khams su rin po che thams cad
130b8(phal chen): kyi pad mo'i 'od kyi brgyan thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings thams cadadu khebs par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bzhis rnam par 'phrul pa dang / nga re chos kyi dbyings thams/
131a1(phal chen): b.lacad du rgyas pa'i mtshan rgya mtshos thams cad brgyan pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi
131a2(phal chen): dbyings rgya mtsho'i bzhi gang chen mtsho thams cad kyi brgyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i brgyan tshad med pa thugs ni gcig gi yang dag par ston cing / chos kyi dbyings dang /
131a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gengs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i spyod pa rnam par gzigs pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang /
131a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan pad mo'i bzhi dang / brgyan gyi me tog ri rab rgya mtsho'i 'od zer rin po che'i bzhi/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa las
131a5(phal chen): byung ba dang / rnam par ma ning mdzad kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i 'od kun tu snang sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal
131a6(phal chen): rin po che dri ma med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis seng ge'i khri dang / brgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs smin khong sel cing rin
131a7(phal chen): po che'i 'od 'gro ba'i bzhi rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis tshul gyi rgya mtsho thams cad du spong ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
131a8(phal chen): cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbul de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bai dUr+ya rin po che'i me tog dang / gser gyi pad mo las chos
131b1(phal chen): kyi 'od zer gyi sprin dang / rin po che'i rgyal po sgron ma lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od rnam par dag pas snang ba'i brgyan bstan pas/ chos kyi dbyings
131b2(phal chen): thams cad du dmigs shing rnam par kye bas tha mi dad cing sangs rgyas kyi dbu'i rin po che'i sprin dang / rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i 'od zer lhag po'i sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings la 'jug
131b3(phal chen): cing chos rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phrul pas/ snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'khor lo'i rtsi bas stong pa rin po che'i 'od
131b4(phal chen): zer sna tshogs tshad med pa dang ldan zhing / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi phyogs bcu thams cad du shes rab kyi nyi ma shin tu gsal ba dang /
131b5(phal chen): ye shes kyi 'od chos rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung rnam par dag pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs/
131b6(phal chen): pa'i mtshan rin po che'i 'phreng ba rnam par bkye bA dang / rin po che'i bai dUr+ya'i 'od du 'phro ba'i sangs rgyas kyis 'od seng ge'i rnam par snang ba'i mthu dang ldan pas/ chos kyi
131b7(phal chen): dbyings thams cad rnam par gnon pa'i mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rdul gcig las/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snye yang dag par 'phro bas/
131b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yang dag par ston cing de'i dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes ston pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyis mtshan dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin snang ba
132a1(phal chen): zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan kho na thugs su chud pa'i mtshan nyid rin
132a2(phal chen): po che'i brgyan rnam par dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi snying po tshad med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du snang ba'i
132a3(phal chen): 'od la 'jug pa zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che bai dUr+ya'i me tog dang / seng ge'i zla ba 'od zer rnam par
132a4(phal chen): snang ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal po 'od zer rgyab kun tu sgom par dpal gyi sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings dang / na mkha' khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer snang bas/ zhing dang
132a5(phal chen): 'jig rten mang por de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i 'od rnam par snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan
132a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi snang ba rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'gro ba'i sgron ma/ chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi kun tu rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi sprin phyogs bcur
132a7(phal chen): kye ba kun tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbul de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i na bu gyis/ byang chub sems
132a8(phal chen): dpa' thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la byang chub tu bzhugs te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du skad cig re re la byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dag par stod
132b1(phal chen): cing / brgyan brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin
132b2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che rgya mtsho dang / spos yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyis/ 'od zer rin po che'i dra ba rab tu 'phel bas/ sems kyi khams las rgya mtsho tha~Md
132b3(phal chen): sgrogs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thad sgrogs pa'i dbyangs kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de bzhi
132b4(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sman yongs su dag pas/ zhing thams cad kyi brgyan rab tu snang bas rnam par bkod pa'i phyir chos rgya mtsho'i sgra bsam gyi mi khyab par sangs rgyas nas
132b5(phal chen): 'das pa dang / mi 'ong ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi bzhi sna tshogs kun tu snang ba/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa mang po kun tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba med
132b6(phal chen): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sgrib pa mi mnga' ba/ phyogs bcu'i
132b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad dang / sems can rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i tshul mang po'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad du
132b8(phal chen): skrangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprin kun tu mched pa dang / rin po che'i sprin gyi sgron ma'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
133a1(phal chen): palamatshan ye shes kun tu yang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / chos rgya mtsho'i lam
133a2(phal chen): tshad med pa dang / zhing gi dkyil 'khor dang byang chub sems dpa'i sngo ba sems can gyi rgyud thams cad kyi bsam pa ji bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyis bzhugs pa dang /
133a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang / spyod pa'i nga ros sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bzhi kun nas mthar thugs cing thams cad mngon par mkhyen pas/
133a4(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyis bzhi kun tu thugs par 'byung ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi dbyings dang na mkha
133a5(phal chen): dbyings thams cad du/ rin po che snang ba'i sprin yid du 'ong ba'i snying po byang chub kyi gzugs snyan yongasu ston pa mngon par 'phags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin
133a6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sku yang dag par ston pa'i sprin kun tu kye bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du sprin gyi 'od du gnas pa zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
133a7(phal chen): dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gtsug tor kun tu snang ba tshad med pa ston pas/ byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin
133a8(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / gzi brjid chen pos chos kyi dbyings kyi bzhi kun tu snang bar rin po che'i rgyal po ltar 'od kun nas 'byung ba yongasu grub ste/ chos kyi
133b1(phal chen): dbyings thams cad 'od zer gyi sprin dang / 'od kyi rgyan mchog thams cad snang bar 'byung zhing / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
133b2(phal chen): shin tu 'phel ba'i mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par gnon pa'i sprin gyi phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dra ba dang / na mkha' thams cad rgyas par khyab pa'i byang chub kyi sems ri
133b3(phal chen): po che'i 'od zer gyi sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gtsug tor dbu'i tsug na mtho ba/ rims kyi mngon par
133b4(phal chen): 'phags shing 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser dang / rin po che'i mtshon gyi kha dog bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'od dang ldan par gyur pa/ gser gyi thig le dri ma med pa'i mig 'phrul
133b5(phal chen): gyis kun nas shin tu brgyan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs kyi skad cig re re la yongs su ston pa'i sprin gyi
133b6(phal chen): kun tu rgyas par khyab cing / zhing gi dkyil 'khor snang bar gyur pas/ zhing gi dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i gnas su gyur pa brgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa
133b7(phal chen): kun tu snang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug gtor mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi brgyan du gyur cing // chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi brgyan du gyur pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya ba
133b8(phal chen): mnga' ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas kyi mdzod spu la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyi 'od rab tu snang ba/ rin po che thad du mdog ldan
134a1(phal chen): bsnang ba/ nyi ma dang bzla ba ltar snang zhing shin tu rnam par dag pas phyogs bcur 'od zer ba rgya mtsho rab tu 'gyed pa kun nas rin po che'i
134a2(phal chen): 'od zer 'byung ba 'od kun tu snang ba/ dpal kun tu rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu 'bar ba'i sgron ma dri ma med pa'i me tog shin tu brgyas shing / rin po che'i sprin chen po shin
134a3(phal chen): tu 'gyed pa/ phyogs kyi 'khor lathams cad du rnam par snang zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi sgra chos kyi dbyings thams cad du shin tu
134a4(phal chen): 'phags pa'i mar me rab tu snang bas/ rin po che'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas shing chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan
134a5(phal chen): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che sna tshogs sems can gyi khams su chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyan rnam par dag pas grub pa/ 'od 'phro ba'i sprin rin po
134a6(phal chen): dngul gyi mdog kun tu ston pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i shong la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che sna tshobs kyis
134a7(phal chen): yongs su dag pas/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od dang mdog dang kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur ba de bzhin/ thugasu chud pa'i rin po che'i me tog gis sprin gyis kun tu rgyas shing
134a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyitshesangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sprin
134b1(phal chen): ces bya ba mnga'o// sangs rgyas kyi ljags yangs pa la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ljags yangs pa'i sprin gyis kun tu khyab pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su rdzogs
134b2(phal chen): ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su grub pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal po'i bzhi la 'od 'phro bas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par snang bar mdzad pa'i ngang tshul can/
134b3(phal chen): 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can gyi gzugs snyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings thams cad/ shin tu ston pa'i
134b4(phal chen): gsung dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi ljags pa'i sgo rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang mdog gis rab tu brgyan pa/ 'od zer rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rab
134b5(phal chen): tu snang ba/ gzhad mo 'dzum phyogs bcur rab tu kye zhing 'gro ba thams cad shin tu dang ste/ rin po che'i rgyal po 'od 'phro bas rab tu brgyan par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
134b6(phal chen): sna tshogs rnam par dag pa rab tu brjod cing shin tu rgya che ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du chos kyi nga ro 'byin pa/ bskal pa tshad med par sangs rgyas kyi gsung
134b7(phal chen): sgra 'byin pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa thams cad du nga ro yang ba 'byin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dbyangs shin tu skyugs cing / snang ba yang dag par ston pa
134b8(phal chen): dbyangs kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags kyi 'og gi drung na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che sna tshogs thams cad ltar snang zhing / mdzod spu
135a1(phal chen): @#/ yongs su 'khyil ba'i dbyings lta bur rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin lta bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor phyogs
135a2(phal chen): bcu nas gtang ba'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi sbu ba can ljags kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyis rdul gyi mtshan nyid
135a3(phal chen): med pa'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsung rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyangs sgrogs pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags kyi
135a4(phal chen): rtse mo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che gser gyi 'od 'phro bas/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i dbyings thams cad du snang zhing yid du 'ong ba'i rin po che'i rgyal po'i
135a5(phal chen): dbyangs kyi yan lag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sgrogs cing / gsung snyan pa'i ro myongs pas sems can go bar mdzad cing / skal ba bsam gyis mi khyab
135a6(phal chen): bar mnyam du yod par dbyangs kyi yan lag gi sgra yang dag par ston pa'i sprin/ sems can thams cad la yid du 'ong ba'i chos su snang bas chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag
135a7(phal chen): ba'i smin ces bya ba mnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags kyi rtse mo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan zhing tshad med pa yongasu dag pa na bzhugs pa'i gsung rin
135a8(phal chen): che'i rgyal bas kun nas rgyan cing / sna tshogs su gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi rlongs du sngags pa rab tu 'jug pa rnams par phye ba bzhin dang bzhin du/ byed
135b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams la yang dag par ston pa'i sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi bzhi dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kun nas/
135b2(phal chen): g.yogs par sangs rgyas kyi gsung la byang chub sems dpa' 'dzud zhing thams cad du rin po che'i rgyal po sgo kun ston pa'i chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i sprin ces bya
