161b9(phal chen): dus kyi skad cig sems can bskal pa mi mthun zhes// shes spyod mi mnyams ma yin dang // shes pas de dag thams cad khong du chud// yangs dang yangs min mkhas pas na/
162a1(phal chen): pal#'jig rten zab mo rnams la rab tu 'jug pa byed// lus la zhing rnams de shes te/ zhing la'ang de bzhin gcig min lus 'jud do// phyogs rnams
162a2(phal chen): bcu po thams cad du// phyogs rnams kun la 'jug cing skad cig du pa dang // 'jig rten khams rnams 'byam klas la// tshad med gzi brjid ldan pa rab tu 'jug/ gang yang zhing
162a3(phal chen): rnam mtha' yas shing // dpung med gzungs par byas shing dus kyi dbyings su 'dzud// zhing gi rgyud la mkhas pa rnams// shes dang ldan pas ye shes rab tu 'byung / bzang po'i
162a4(phal chen): yon tan ldan pa rnams// phyogs dang 'jig rten khams kyi rgyu du sbyar bas dag/ ji snyed yod pa der 'jug te// brjod du med pa de dag rab tu shes// zhing dang zhing gis sa
162a5(phal chen): rnams kyis// brjod du med pa'i zhing rnams kun kyang rab tu mthong // de dag tshul yang rab tu shes// las rnams gang gi spang ba'ang khong du chud// gang yang zhing rnams du ma dag/
162a6(phal chen): las rnams khrag khrig kun gyi kun nas nyon mongs par// 'gro ba kun gyi sgrub byas pa// de dag thams cad rgyud kyang ci 'dra shos// brjod du med pa yang ba'i rnams// zhing gcig
162a7(phal chen): bstan pas de dag yongs su shes par gyur/ de 'dra'i zhing la 'jug pa dang // gang la grangs med de dag kun la 'jug/ 'jig rten khams na cig la yang // 'jig rten khams rnam
162a8(phal chen): thams cad yang dag 'dzud par byed// 'jig rten gcig tu dgongs mi 'gyur/ 'jig rten khams rnams de bzhin 'dre mi 'gyur/ spyi'u tshugs rnams dang gong ma rnams// bla dang 'og
162b1(phal chen): gis rnams yongs su gzungs byas te// 'gro ba'i rnam par ming thog pa// 'jig rten kun la 'jug cing rab tu shes/ snrel bzhir rgyu ba'i rgyud rnams dang / zhing rnams mtha' yas mtha'
162b2(phal chen): dpung yod ma yin// sna tshogs yang pa rab tu shes// rnam pa cig shes rnam pa tha dad shes// zhing gi grangs rnams rab tu shes// ye shes chag med mtha' ldan kun gyi grangs rnams
162b3(phal chen): kyang bzang po'i theg pa spyod pa yis// rgyal sras kun tu bzang rnams rab tu shes/ 'jig rten thams cad sprul pa dang // sems can rnam 'phrul de bzhin zhing sbrul dang /
162b4(phal chen): chos rnam sprul pa'i tshul shes pa// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i pha rol phyin pa rnams// 'jig rten phra zhing zab pa dang // yangs shing sna tshogs yang pas chom cho dgu rnams/ las
162b5(phal chen): sna tshogs tha dad rnam gsags pa// las kyi rnam smin gnas pa'i sems can rnams// rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa yi// chos dbyings 'jug par bya ba la shin tu skabs yi//
162b6(phal chen): rgyal sras mtha' dang dbus med pa// phyogs bcu thams cad ma lus 'gengs par byed// 'jig rten khams rnams de dag gi/ ming ni skal ba rnyed kyi mthar thugs cing / zad par
162b7(phal chen): brjod par mi nus cing te/ ming bshad gal te sangs rgyas gsung na gsung // 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyi yang / mtshan rnams mtshan nyid mi mthun rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan/
162b8(phal chen): mtshan rnams gcig nas gcig brgyad mthar thug med/ 'on kyang dma' ba'i sems med par// mkhas pa rnams ni dus gsum bde gshegs sangs rgyas phyir/ chos kyi dbyings la
163a1(phal chen): @#'byung ba ste// sangs rgyas ye shes sa la rab tu bzhugs// dran pas chag med dgra ba ste// chags med yid dang ldan zhing blo gros mtha'
163a2(phal chen): yas pas// ye shes blo gros mchog ldan pa// chos dbyings bshad la pha rol phyin pa thob/ gang gi 'jig rten khams kyi rnams// yangs dang phra ba rnam pa sna tshogs
163a3(phal chen): shes gyur cing // der ni 'das pa'i dus rnams la/ sems cig skyes pas rab tu 'jug pa byed// mi'i seng ge de dag tu// sangs rgyas spyod pa sna tshogs rnam pas chags
163a4(phal chen): ba chags pa med// byang chub mchogs tu sangs rgyas shing / rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston pa mdzad// de bzhin ma 'ongs dus rnams kyis// rjes su gang byon de ni skal
163a5(phal chen): pa ci 'dra dang // de la mi'i seng ge gang // skye bar gyur pa de dag kun kyang shes// smon lam skrod pa ci 'dra dang // spyod yul gang rnams sgoms pa gang gis 'grub 'gyur cing /
163a6(phal chen): sgrub pa'i rnams pa ci 'dra bas// bskal pa gang la byang chub 'tshang rgya dang // de dag 'khor kyang khong du chud// sku tshe'i tshad dang sems can 'dul ba ci 'dra dang // chos kyi skye
163a7(phal chen): mo gang zhig gis// 'gro 'a chos kyi 'khor lo skor bshes/ de ltar kun tu bzang po yi// ye shes mchog gi sgrub pa'i sa gnas shing // de dag thams cad rab tu shes/
163a8(phal chen): de ni 'gro gtso kun gyi 'byung gnas yin// da ltar byung ba gzungs byas shing // 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad 'dab chags ma lus papa/ 'jig rten khams la
163b1(phal chen): rab tu 'jug/ de bzhin chos kyi dbyings rnams rab tu shes// de ni mi'i tso bo rnams// dgra las rgyal zhing thams cad gzigs pa ci snyed pa// mi thub rgol ba dang 'o rnams/
163b2(phal chen): chos kyi mnga' la pha rol phyin pa rnyes// de dag 'khor kyang rab tu shes// sems can 'dal dang zhing rnams rnam par dag pa dang // rgyal ba'i rnam par 'brul pa rnams//
163b3(phal chen): sems pas skal ba yang ba zad par byed/ skyes bu mchog rnams 'dul mdzad cing // 'jig rten mchog tu phyin pa'i byin rlabs dam pa la/ mi zad mdzod kyi
163b4(phal chen): shes yangs pas/ ye shes tshul la mkhas pa rab tu 'jug/ chags med mig gi lta ba dang // chags med snang ba mngon par sgrub byed cing // chags pa med pa'i
163b5(phal chen): lus langs dang // yangs pa'i lces kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed// dam pa'i chos la chags med de/ bsam pa kun tu rnams yang rnam par dag dang ldan/ ye shes
163b6(phal chen): 'byung gnas bdag nyid che// dus gsum sems rnams ma lus des khyab bo// sprul pa'i pha rol phyin thob zhing / zhing rnams sprul pa'i slab par byas la srab pa rnams
163b7(phal chen): sems can sbrul la mkhas pa dge/ sprul pa sprul pas 'jig rten 'dul ba byed/ 'du shes rnam pa du ma ste/ des ni 'jig rten sna tshogs ma lus rnam par bris// de dag
163b8(phal chen): thams cad rab tu shes// sangs rgyas ye shes tshul la rab tu 'jug/ 'khor rnams brjod du med pa dag/ sangs rgyas sku rnams re re dag la yod pa rnams// kun la 'jug
164a1(phal chen): phal#cing mthong ba byed// sems can rnam par 'dul ba'i mtha' yang med// ye shes zab mo mthong bas na// ye shes nyi ma shin tu gsal// bar shar
164a2(phal chen): gyur pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i spyod pa la// 'jig rten 'byam kun tu 'jug par byed// ji lta'i tshul du bzhugs gyur cing / 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad rnam par bkod 'dra bar/
164a3(phal chen): sems can tshul bzhin rab tu bzhugs// khams gsum thams cad mig yor tshul 'dra shes// 'on kyang rtog dang rnam rtog med// 'jig rten mtha' dang dbus med kun la rtog mi
164a4(phal chen): byed// rtog dang rtog med mkhas pa de/ rtog dang shes pas rnam par rtog pa med// skal pa brjod du med pa rnams// sems skyed cig gi yang dag 'du// ba 'dzud byed cing /
164a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di mthong nas// skad gcig sems kyi thams cad shes// brjod du med pa'i zhing rnams thams cad kyang // sems can gcig gi thams cad yongasu 'du bar
164a6(phal chen): byed// skal ba brjod med zad byed kyang / skra tse'i cha shas cig las g.yo ba med// skal ba brjod du med pa dag/ nyim cig dang yud tsam gcig tu 'dzud byed cing / ring dang drus
164a7(phal chen): gzhol ba med// skad cigacig la 'jug pa'i pha rol byin// sems kyi rnam pa 'jig rten rnam pa sems can kun gyi sems yin te// rnam pa gnyis kyi grang su zhugs// de dag mi
164a8(phal chen): gnyis rtog pa med// sgyu ma'i rnam pas 'jig rten te// sems can zhing dang sangs rgyas chos kyang de bzhin no// 'on kyang 'jig rten mgon po rnams/ chos dbyings kun lagacig tu sgoms/
164b1(phal chen): lus rnams brjod du med pa yis// phyogs bcu thams cad rgyas par bkang zhing yongs su ston// 'on kyang lus la bzhol ba med// chos nyid rten pa gnas nyid rab tu shes/ 'on kyang
164b2(phal chen): mi'i seng ge rnams// gnyis la gnas pa'i shes pa 'jung ba ma yin te// mi gnyis pa la gnas pa med// gnyis dang gnyis med chos rnams rab tu shes// ji ltar mig sgyurab
164b3(phal chen): ri ba dang // smig yor sgra snyan de bzhin smi lam 'dra ba dang // rmi lam rnam par sprul pa dang // 'gro ba thams cad ma lus rab tu shes// de ltar spyod yul mnyam nyid pas/
164b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs kyi rjes su 'byung ba yin// kun tu bzang po'i ye shes dang // chos kyi dbyings la shin tu 'dal ba yin// snying rje chen po mtha' yas kyang / sems can
164b5(phal chen): med dang mnyam par zhing rnams thams cad sgom// sngon nas nyon mongs nyams med pa// bsam pa dag pa 'jig rten kun tu 'gro// mi zad mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa yi// rgya che
164b6(phal chen): shin tu yangs pa'i sa la rab tu zhugs/ gsung ba'i sang ga thams cad kyis// tshul gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rjes su dran// 'jig rten rab tu spros pa la// smon lam tshang
164b7(phal chen): med rab tu gdab pa byas na// de dag spyod pa yongs su dag/ 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad rgyas par khyab// sangs rgyas rnams dang rgyal sras dang // de bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyi
164b8(phal chen): chos rnams thams cad dang // 'jig rten rnams dang 'jig rten chos// chags med tha dad med par rab tu shes// chos kyi sku'i snying po can// de'i lus la 'jig rten thams cad gzung byas
165a1(phal chen): bal#zhing // 'jig rten de'i lus yin yang // 'jig rten kun gyi de la dgongs pa med// de ltar dang ba'i chu gsal la// gzugs snyan yongasu snang yangs der
165a2(phal chen): song 'phos pa med// de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad kyi// rjes su lus 'gro der song 'phos pa med// de ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyis// gos pa med cing 'jig rten yong su dag pas
165a3(phal chen): na// lus ni namakha' 'dra ba ste// de'i las rnams gang yang skye ba med// mi zad pa'i lus shes pas// de ni nams yang skyes shing 'gag pa med ste// rtag dang mi rtags ma yin
165a4(phal chen): par/ 'jig rten kun la'ang rnam pa dmig par byed// lta ba'i rnam par rab tu 'gags// sten pa yang dag lta ba ston par byed// bdag gi med cing gnas pa med/ len pa med
165a5(phal chen): cing chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam// ji ltar sgyu mkhas mkhas pa bzhin/ sna tshogs mtshan nyid rnam pa tha dad gzugs 'phrul byed/ 'on kyang de la 'gro ba med/ gang du'ang de bzhin
165a6(phal chen): 'gro ba mi dmigs so// sgyu ma tshad med ma yin te/ sgyu ma'i tshad kyi dmig par bya ba ma yin no// tshad med tshad dang ldan pa yang / tshogs kyi dbus su ston pa rab tu byed/ de bzhin
165a7(phal chen): rtogs pa'i blo ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams las byung // sems ni tshad yod ma yin te/ tshad med pa la'ang gnas pa de dag min/ 'du shes rnam pa cig min
165a8(phal chen): te// de dag tshad med pa dang tshad dang ldan pa ston// lam gyi rgyud dang 'brel pa med/ tshad med rnams la'ang gnas pa de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas chos rnams zab pa te// shin tu yangs
165b1(phal chen): pas zab cing de bzhin zab// zab mo sna tshogs rgyud rnams dang / mtha' yas zab pa rnams kyang rab tu shes/ ye shes zab mo rmongs pa med/ rgyud la dri ma med pas bsam
165b2(phal chen): pa rnam par dag/ byin gyi rlobs la mkhas pas na/ srog chags bye ba shin tu dga' bar byed// dge bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams// rab tu brjod dang dge dang mi dge ni
165b3(phal chen): par ston/ gnas la mngon par ma chags pas/ chos kyi dbyings rnams kun tu rang du rgyu/ sems can med thar phyin gyur pa// 'jig rten tham cad ma lus de dag khong du chud/
165b4(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad ma lus par/ rnam par sangs rgyas mya ngan gar mi mngal/ chos rnams bgrang ba'i tshul la mkhas/ sems can bgrangs tshul shes kyang grangs la rab
165b5(phal chen): tu skyes pa med/ chos kyi sprin chen char 'bebs shing // 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad snang bar byed// sangs rgyas byang chub ma lus la/ sems skyed cig gi de
165b6(phal chen): dag rab tu 'jug/ de dag phyir zlog med pa ste// sems can kun gyi khams las phyir mi ldog/ sangs rgyas sku ni thob gyur kyang // chos rnams 'di dag lus yod ma yin rab
165b7(phal chen): tu shes// lus rnams kun gyi tshul la mkhas// lus kyi rnam bye 'jig rten rab tu shes// sems can kun tu rgyu ba dang // skal ba rnams dang zhing la pha rol phyin pa thob/
165b8(phal chen): phyogs ni rgya mtsho gang chen mtshor/ ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshul la mkhas pas zhugs// lus rnams thams cad re re las/ sems can kun gyi lus rnams sna tshogs ci snyed pa/
166a1(phal chen): phalasangs rgyas ku ni mtha' yas pa// ye shes shin tu yang bde sten no// skad cig cig gi dus tshul la// mi'i gtso mang 'byung ba rab tu
166a2(phal chen): shes// skal pa mang po brjod du med/ mi'i seng ge bgrangs pas zad mi 'gyur/ de dag mya ngan 'da' ba yang / skad cig gcig la tshad med shin tu yang ba 'byung // ring srel
166a3(phal chen): rnam phye mang po yang // ye shes dri med phra bas ston pa byed/ de bzhin ma 'ongs dus kyi yangs/ mi'i seng ge mtha' yas smon lam 'debs pa rnams/ byang chub dri med sem
166a4(phal chen): skyed pa// ye shes yangs shing shin tu phra bas shes// bzang po'i spyod la gnas bcas shing // de bzhin dus gsum gshegs pa'i sems can gtso bo rnams// ji sbed
166a5(phal chen): skyes par gyur pa rnams// de dag thams cad ma lus rab tu shes/ de ltar rab tu shes pas na// mtha' dang dbus med spyod pa'i sa dang de bzhin du// ye shes 'byung gnas
166a6(phal chen): blo gros la// ye shes 'khor lo'i spyod pas phyir mi ldog/ ye shes phra mo rab yangs pa// stob bcu rnams kyi spyod yul mchog la de dag bzhugs/ bzang po rtogs pa'i
166a7(phal chen): blo can rnams/ phyir mi ldog la 'jug pa brjod byan/ sangs rgyas rgyal ba thams cad kyi// yangs dag rgyal bar bye la de dag zhugs pas na// spyod las phyir ldog med
166a8(phal chen): bde// byang chub dam bzhi par 'tshang sang rgya/ de 'dra'i sems rgyud cig la yang / mtha' dang dbus med sems rnams yang dgi mdzad/ shin tu yong pa tshad med las/
166b1(phal chen): 'du shes de dag de la yang dag sgrubs/ nyon mongs med dang nyon mongs dang / slob dang mi slob sems kyang de bzhin rab tu shes// sems rgyud de dag re re 'dra/ sems can
166b2(phal chen): rjod du med pa mngon sangs rgyas// cig la'ang gnyis su med pa zhes// de dag yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba'ang med pa ste// so so'i 'du shes rnam pa la/ sems can de dag
166b3(phal chen): skyes par 'gyur ba yin/ 'di na 'dug par mthong gyur kyang / sems can gzhan dang gzhan sems ldan pa rnams/ bzhan gyi zhing phyin 'du shes kyang // 'jig rten sna tshogs
166b4(phal chen): rnams la rab tu skye/ 'di 'dri'i tshul la 'jug pa la// sprod pa mchog gi rjes su zhugs par gyur pa rnams/ kun tu bzang po'i ming thob ste/ 'jig rten mgon po kun gyi
166b5(phal chen): rjes su skyes/ sems can bye ba la la ni/ ngan song grangs kyi ming thog mtho ris 'du shes 'gyur/ la la ni mtho ris sa rnams kyis// rnam pa kun la ngan song 'du shes 'gyur
166b6(phal chen): 'jig rten mi mtshungs skal pa stobs// rnam pa tha dad las kyi sa las rab tu skyes// 'du shes rnam pa mtha' yas te/ cig min yangs la 'jig rten rab tu 'jug/
166b7(phal chen): 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyis// 'du shes skal pa mi mnyam rab tu shes// mig 'phrul sgyu ma'i tshul gyis ni// skad cig cig gi sems kyi rab tu bzhol/
166b8(phal chen): de bzhin dbang po rnams la ste// mig gi skye mched brna ba'i skye mched dang / lce dang lus dang yid la yang // 'jig rten rnam pa tha dad 'du shes 'jug/ mig rnams re re'i yul
167a1(phal chen): la yang / mtha' dang dbus med mig rnams rab tu 'dzud par byed// rnam pa tha dad du ma ste// tshad med kun la'ang zhen par gyur pa med//
167a2(phal chen): 'on kyang phan tshun cig gi gcig/ bdo zhing gnod par gyur pa de dag kun na med// bdag dang so so'i las kyi rnams// ji ltar gsags pa'i tshul bzhin nyamasu myongs// bzang zhes
167a3(phal chen): bya ba de dag kun// tshad med stobs dang ye shes sa'i shes rab kyis// 'byam klas mig rnams thams cad la// rab tu bzhugs pa shin tu rtogs pa yin// de bzhin 'jig rten thams
167a4(phal chen): cad kyang / thams cad ma lus rnam pa thams cad 'jig tshul tu// thams cad cig tu shes gyur kyang // brgya chen spyod pa mya ngan mi mda'o// sangs rgyas shin tu bstan pa dang // sems
167a5(phal chen): can rten dang de bzhin zhing rnams bstan pa dang // bstan pa sna tshogs rnam pa kun kyang shes// la la 'di las 'das gyur kyang // bzhan dang bzhan rnams ma 'ongs dus la gnas ma yin//
167a6(phal chen): 'on kyang ma 'ongs dus kyi rnams// la las da ltar byung ba rab du shes// de 'dra'i tshul can cig min pa'i// 'jig rten mtshan nyid tha dad thams cad rab tu shes// thams cad mkhyen pa
167a7(phal chen): tshul gyis// sangs rgyas ye shes kun tu mtha' yang las// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu
167a8(phal chen): gnyis pa'o// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba dum bu bzhi pa// / bam po bdun bcu pa'o//
167b1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen pos rnam par rgyas pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang // sku gcig pas mnyam pa nyid mnyes
167b2(phal chen): pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa/ chags pa med pa'i spyod yul mngon par mkhyen pa/ ye shes kyi rang bzhin chos sku mnga' ba// mtshan nyid yongs
167b3(phal chen): nas med pa'i chos la rten pa// chos kyi dbyings mi gnyis pa'i spyod yul gyis yang dag par spyod pa/ mtha' dang dbus med cing mtshungs pa'i mngon par mkhyen tshangs rgya brnyas pa/
167b4(phal chen): rnam par thar pa'i sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul la shin tu brgyas pa/ chos kyi sku na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa mnga' ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis pho brang khang pa
167b5(phal chen): rtsegs pa'i bzhal med khang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po can 'od kun nas 'byung ba/ rgya chen po dang ldan pa/ 'od dngas zhing gsal ba rnam par snang ba'i snying
167b6(phal chen): bo can/ sangs rgyas skye ba chos kyi dbyings mtha' dbus med pa'i gnas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus las byung ba'i bzhi 'od zer gyi rnam par brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus rang
167b7(phal chen): bzhin du gnas pas rab tu sgrub pa chos chen po bzhir gyur pa// chos kyi dbyings kun tu rgyas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa//
167b8(phal chen): ye shes kyi yul yang dag pa'i mtha'i spyod yul chags pa med pa rnam par gsal ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po chen bzang po'i pad mo chen po rab rang gi smon lam
168a1(phal chen): bal / gyi 'byung ba'i dbus kyi snying po la 'khod pa// kun kyang tshe cig gis thogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams bzhan dang bzhan nas byin pa ye shes chen po rnam par bya
168a2(phal chen): ba'i spyod yul la bzhol ba// chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i bzhi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa/ na mkha'i dbyings bzhi med cing mtha' dbus med pa/ rnam par spyod pa/ chos thad
168a3(phal chen): 'byung ba/ med cing mngon par grub med pa sngon du byas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus las ma g.yos/ su thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu thob po// 'jig rten gyi kham
168a4(phal chen): thams cad du kun gyi brjod pa de bzhini gshegs pa'i ye shes las mngon du byung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub mngon sum du gyur pa'i ye shes snang ba thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs
168a5(phal chen): ba'i spyod yul rgyun ma chad pa ye shes kyi rang bzhin chos kyi lus gcig tha mi dad pas/ gzugs kyi lus mtha' yas pa'i sgo kun tu sten pa/ chos kyi mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa shin
168a6(phal chen): tu shes pa/ sems can gyi kham su rnam par spyad pa las phyir mi ldog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid thob pas sprul pa mngon par
168a7(phal chen): sgrubs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / sngon lhan cig tu skyes shing dge ba'i rtsa ba gsags pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
168a8(phal chen): kun tu bzang po dang / kun tu grags pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rigs su 'byung ba'i dpal dang / rdo rje dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rnam par grol ba'i sgrib pa med
168b1(phal chen): pa'i zla ba dang // nyi ma'i 'od zer dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par 'phrul pa'i blo dang / 'od dri ma med pa'i dpal gzi brjid 'od zer gyi rgyal po dang / blo gas
168b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i mchog 'dzin cing blo rnam par rtse ba gsal bas mngon par shes pa'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs bcu mi 'jig pa'i seng ge nga ro chen pos rnam pa
168b3(phal chen): rtse bas mngon par shes pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
168b4(phal chen): dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa mang po'i 'od zer
168b5(phal chen): dang ldan pa byung ste/ des 'jig 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par snang bar byas 'jig rten g.yas phyogs su lan bcu bskor te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa bstan
168b6(phal chen): nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bkul ba byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu skyong nas/ ngan song gA rgyud thams cad kyi skye
168b7(phal chen): ba dang / shi 'pho rab tu zhi bar byas te/ bdud kyi khyim thams cad zil gyi mnan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bas rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i gdan bstan
168b8(phal chen): par bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bkod pa 'byam klas pa rab tu bstan nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi 'byam klas pa na mkha'i mthas stegs pa 'byam klas pa thad
169a1(phal chen): pha#ma lus par sangs rgyas par byas nas phyir 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la g.yas phyogs nas bskur te/
169a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyi spyi bor nub po// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad ngo mtshar tsher 'dzin cing dga' ba thob par
169a3(phal chen): gyur te/ 'od zer gyi dra bas snang ba 'di lta bu byung nas/ chos chen po brjod par ni 'gyur du nges so// snyam nas rtogs pa'i bro yang thob par gyur to// 'od zer de dag gis byang chub sem
169a4(phal chen): dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung ba'i dpal gyi lus la phog par gyur ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig su
169a5(phal chen): 'byung ba'i dpal pad mo stan las langs te/ bla gos phag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pad mo'i snying po de la pus me g.yas pa'i lha nga gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bder
169a6(phal chen): thal mos btud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ rnam dag blo mnga' yon tan mkhyen pas
169a7(phal chen): 'phags// spyod yul chags pa med pas las pha rol phyin// dus gsum mnyam pa'i chos nyid mnyam ston pa/ khyod la bdag ni sti stang rim 'gro bgyid/ mtshan nyid med pa'i
169a8(phal chen): spyod yul pha rol phyin/ mtshan gyi shin tu brgyan pa'i skra ston mdzad// dri med 'od zer stong dang ldan pa 'gyed/ bdud kyi bde rnams ma lus rab tu 'joms// phyogs bcu kun na gang rnams
169b1(phal chen): ci mchis pali/ zhing rnams thams cad ma lus rab baspyod kyang / thugs rje ldan pas su lang 'jig mi mdzad/ khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul mthu ni de 'dra'i tshul/ na mkha'i dbyings la banyam
169b2(phal chen): pa nyid du bzhugs/ de bzhin chos dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyang skyes// sems can stong phrag bye ba 'grol bar mdzad/ sems can kun gyi sdig pa rab tu sbyong // sa skal stong rtul
169b3(phal chen): shugs dam pa spyod/ byang chub mchog gi lam ni yang dag sgrubs// chag pa med pa'i ye shes spyod yul rnyes/ sangs rgyas kun dang rang bzhin gcig tu gyur/ rnam 'dren khyod kyi 'di
169b4(phal chen): nas 'od skye ba/ 'jig rten thams cad ma lus kun skyod nas// cho 'phrul mtha' dag yang dag ldan pa bgyis/ bdag gi lus 'dir de dag ma lus bzhugs/ nga la bdag gi bre gros
169b5(phal chen): lhas skyes te/ chos rje khyed la bdag zhu dus la bag/ shin tu nges pa'i chos la rab slabs pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang 'dus 'gyur snyams// tshogs 'di dag pa
169b6(phal chen): 'dus pas rnam par dag/ 'jig rten slob dpon mgon pos sngags pa yi// de 'dra'i mthu chen dpa' bo'i 'di dag phyin// de don 'jig rten slob dpon drang srong khyod/ ye shes
169b7(phal chen): stobs dang brtson 'grus mtha' yas byung // byang chub sems dpa' de dag snang bar mdzod/ chos rab bdag gi gang zhus de yang shong // drang srong chen po'i spyod yul 'di stan cing /
169b8(phal chen): gang dag ma nor rjod pa nus gang lagaso// skyes bu khyu mchog rnams kyi sras gang legs/ 'jig rten mgon po'i gtso bo khyod kyis bshad du gsol/ tshig su bcad pa de dag gsol/
170a1(phal chen): ma thag tu/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas mi snying ba'i mthar byin pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa dang ldan/
170a2(phal chen): ba byung ste/ des 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus snang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten g.yas phyogs su lan bcu bskor te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam
170a3(phal chen): bar 'phrul pa bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya steng mang po la bkul ba byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu spyod nas/
170a4(phal chen): ngan song gi rgyud thams cad kyi skye ba dang // shi 'pho ba rab tu zhi bar byas te/ bdud kyi khyim thams cad zil gyi mnan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'chang
170a5(phal chen): brgya pas/ rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i gdan bstan pa byas ste/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dkod pa/ 'byam klas pa rab tu bstan nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi
170a6(phal chen): dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs par 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par rgyas par khyab par byas nas phyir 'ong nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams
170a7(phal chen): cad la g.yas phyogs nas bskor nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i kha'i sgor nub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer des byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la rag par
170a8(phal chen): gyur ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i lus kyi seng ge'i khri sngon ci 'dra ba de las byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi seng ge'i khri rgya phrag stong 'byur
170b1(phal chen): du bzang zhing khyad par du 'phags par 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri gdan ma rtog par byang chub sems dpa' bzhan gyi lus kyi seng ge'i khri las byang chub sems dpa'
170b2(phal chen): kun tu bzang po'i lus kyi seng ge'i khri rgya phrag stong gyur du bzang zhing khyad par du 'phags par snang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
170b3(phal chen): 'byung ba'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smra so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pas cho 'phrul chen po 'jig rten
170b4(phal chen): thams cad kyi khong du chud par dka' ba/ byang chub sems rnams rab tu dga' bar gyur pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di lta bu bstan na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de dag gi sngon gyi mtshan mar
170b5(phal chen): 'gyur de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung
170b6(phal chen): ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sra sra de ni bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di 'dra ba dag kyang
170b7(phal chen): mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa dgongs pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ston par mdzad do// de nas
170b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung ba'i dpal gyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ming thos par
171a1(phal chen): b.lagyur ma thag tu de'i tshe sa chen po g.yos par 'gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung ba'i
171a2(phal chen): dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras slob par mdzod cig/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
171a3(phal chen): dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ skye ba 'byung ba/ khong du chud par bya/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'khor 'dus
171a4(phal chen): ba 'di ni shin tu dag pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kun nas 'dus pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sris 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngon spyad pa
171a5(phal chen): shin tu sbyangs pa dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / shin tu 'phags pas/ brgyan chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa mchog thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul dang /
171a6(phal chen): spyod pa dang / tshul la rab tu gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rjes su song ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pa las mnyams pa/ snying rje chen pos 'gro ba thams cad la rnam por lta ba byang
171a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rol pa'i spyod yul can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rang gi rgyud du len pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos
171a8(phal chen): kyi dpal gyi byin rlabs pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa yon tan dang legs pa tshad med pa mang po dang ldan pa/ sha stag 'ong zhing 'dus pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod sangs rgyas byed
171b1(phal chen): khrag khrig rgya stong mang po snyen bkur ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyong ba'i mchog tu phyin pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo thams cad kyis rnam par rol pa
171b2(phal chen): mngon par mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i gnas su chud pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la the tshoms du yongs su chad pa/ de bzhin gsheg
171b3(phal chen): ba thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mos pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam yang dag par
171b4(phal chen): ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rigs dang rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan pa la pha rol tu phyin pa'i
171b5(phal chen): mchog thob pa de dag la sogs pa yon tan mang po tshad med pa'i khyad par gyi mthar thug pa yin gyi/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
171b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba stan pa la/ skra yang dag par snyan pa dang / gsungs rab tu brjod pa dang / thug pa'i mthu dang / yul gyi gnas dang / spyod yul bstan pa dang /
171b7(phal chen): mngon par byang chub pa'i gnas dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das chen po bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong zhing
171b8(phal chen): thos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba 'brang ba stan pa la legs par spobs pa mdzod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin
172a1(phal chen): #gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung ba'i dpal gyis don 'di nyid yang dag bzlas brjod pa'i byor/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
172a2(phal chen): kun tu bzang po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ chags med blo gros shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas blos/ ye shes mtha' yas yul la mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur/ rgyal ba'i spyod yul
172a3(phal chen): tshad med legs par yang bshod cig/ de thos sangs rgyas sras rnams thams cad rab tu dgal/ rgyal ba mchog rnams 'byung ba ji ltar byang chub sems/ khong du chud bya ji ltar de
172a4(phal chen): dag yang dag lta/ de bzhin thugs ci 'dra skra dang dbyangs ci 'dra// skyes bu khyu mchog rnams kyi yul dang spyod pa ci/ de bzhin gshegs dang byang chub ji ltar rnam 'tshang rgya//
172a5(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo rgyal bas ji ltar skor// bde gshegs mya ngan 'das par yang dag nyid kyang gsung / sangs rgyas sras po mtha' yas 'di dag dga' bar mdzod/ gang gi bde
172a6(phal chen): gshegs chos rgyal chen po mthong gyur cing / gang rnams 'grogs shing dge yang skyed byed pa/ de dag bsod nams 'phel ba'ang ma nor brjod par mdzod/ bde gshegs mthong
172a7(phal chen): ni cir 'gyur de dang 'gogs cir 'gyur/ bde gshegs mya ngan 'das dang 'on tam bzhugs kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams gang gi thos par 'gyur/ yon tan 'byung
172a8(phal chen): gnas rnams la gang rnams dad pa skyed/ de dag don kyang ji 'gyur 'khor 'dir bstan par mdzod/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad thal sbyar zhing / bde bar gshegs dang
172b1(phal chen): khyod dang bdag la kun la stod/ sems can dag la khyod kyi lung yang bston/ yon tan rgya mtshoche lnga rnams kyi spyod yul bstan/ de dag don du chos rab ldan pa'i gsung mchog rnams/
172b2(phal chen): mkha' 'dra khyod kyi skye bo rnams kyi the tshoms bcad/ dpe dang rgyur ldan chags gis de bzhin gshegs rigs ston// thos nas sems can khrag khrig byang chub mchog sems skyed//
172b3(phal chen): ji ltar zhing rnams thams cad ma lus rgyas bkang zhing // rgyal ba sku'i yan lag sna tshogs ston/ ji ltar khrag khrig chos dang ldan pa'i gsung rab brjod/ sangs rgyas byang chub dpo dang
172b4(phal chen): rgyu la rten par mdzod// gang zhib phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams khrag khrig thams cad kun/ bskal pa mang po bye ba mtha' yas 'grangs song yang // de ring rgyal sras 'dir tshogs
172b5(phal chen): 'di 'dra'i 'khor 'dra ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthong bar shin tu bkal/ de bas rgyal sras rang bzhin dag pa bshad par mdzod/ de bzhin gshe gshegs pa rnams kyi
172b6(phal chen): rigs yang yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad thal sbyar te/ yang ba'i chos kyi skom zhing chos la don gnyer nas/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub
172b7(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu 'byung ba la dmigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i
172b8(phal chen): tshogs thams cad la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung bstan pa tshad med pa'i chos kyi
173a1(phal chen): ##/ 'byung ba 'di ni bsam gyis pi khyab pa'i gnas te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
173a2(phal chen): kyi skye ba 'byung ba ni rgyu cig ma yin pa dang / rkyen cig ma yin pas yang dag par 'grub po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag chos bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa chos rnam pa tha dad
173a3(phal chen): pa brgya stong grangs med pa yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul yang dag par bsgrub pa'i rgyud/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sngon 'gro
173a4(phal chen): ba thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i sems dang / byang chub sems tshad med pa bskyed pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / bsam dang lhag pa'i bsam pa sngon shin tu sbyangs shing / yang dag
173a5(phal chen): par bsgrub pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po tshad med pa'i sems can yongs su skyabs pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / smod pa dang smon lam tshad med pa yang dag
173a6(phal chen): bar bsgrub pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po ma ngoms pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / sangs rgyas mchod cing rim 'gro bya ba dang / sems can thams cad
173a7(phal chen): su smin par bya ba'i brgyan tshad med pa yang dag sgrubs pa dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi lam rnam par dag cing tshad med pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / yon tan rnam par dag pa'i
173a8(phal chen): rnam pa tshad med pa yang dag par sgrubs pa dang / lam gyi yan lag rnam par dgod pa tshad med pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i chos tshad med pa khongs su chud
173b1(phal chen): par mthar byin par bya ba yang dag par sgrub pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag chos bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa/ chos rnam pa tha dad pa brgya stong tshad med pa grangs med pa yongasu
173b2(phal chen): rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul yang dag par sgrubs pa'i rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/ stong gsum gyi steng
173b3(phal chen): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba ni/ rgyu gcig gis 'byung ba ma yin/ rkyen cig gis 'byung ba ma yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jim
173b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams ni/ rgyu tshad med pa dang / rkyen chad med pa dang / sgrub pa tshad med pa yongs su 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar sprin po'i cher dus las mi mda' bar rab tu 'bab
173b5(phal chen): bas kyang rgyu byas la/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin rgyun mi chad par ldang bas kyang rgyu byas na/ yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro// bzhi po de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
173b6(phal chen): rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni/ yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ldang ngo // rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su skems pa zhes bya ba'i chu'i phung po yongs su skam
173b7(phal chen): pa'i phyir ldang ngo // rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su bzhog pa zhes bya ba ni/ bzhal med khang thams cad yongs su dgod pa'i phyir ldang ngo // rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dgo
173b8(phal chen): bar dgod pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rtogs pa thams cad kyi rkyen du skyes pa'i las dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge
174a1(phal chen): la#ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang / shugs kyi gnas kyis rnam pa'i brgyan rnam par bye ba/ shin tu rnam par phye bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
174a2(phal chen): khams rnam par dbye ba'i phyir ldang ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos nyid rab tu
174a3(phal chen): thob pa'i phyir yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang 'byung ba de la 'byung bar gyur pa gang yang med do// 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang med pa ma yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin
174a4(phal chen): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang rgyu cig ma yin pa dang / rkyen cig ma yin pas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin
174a5(phal chen): gshegs pa dgra bcom lnga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgya tshad med pa dang / rnam pa tshad med pa dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa tshad med pa las 'byung
174a6(phal chen): ste/ 'di ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du/ chos kyi sprin gyis char chen po bab pas kyang / rgyur byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
174a7(phal chen): kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhi rgyun mi mchad par ldang bas kyang rgyu byas na/ yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
174a8(phal chen): kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po dran pas yang dag par gzungs kyis chud mi za ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi sprin chen po'i char yang dag par gzung
174b1(phal chen): ba'i phyir ldang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po lhag mthong dang / zhi gnas kyi sgrub pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni nyon mong ba thams cad yongasu bskam pa'i
174b2(phal chen): phyir ldang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlungs gi dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa/ zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongasu bsngo ba'i
174b3(phal chen): phyir ldang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlung bri dkyil 'khor chen po// sprul pa'i brgyan rnam par bkod pa 'byed cing / rnam par 'god pa zhes bya ba yod de/
174b4(phal chen): de ni sems can sngon yongs su smin par byas pa rnams kyi rkyen du 'byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa'i stobs dang
174b5(phal chen): shugs kyi phyir ldang ngo // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa'i rnam pa tshad med pa dang yang dag par sgrub pa tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
174b6(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams chos nyid rab tu thob pa'i phyir/ 'byung bar 'gyur te de la 'byung bar byed pa 'am/ skye bar byed pa gang yang med de 'byung ba'ang med pa ma yin no//
174b7(phal chen): de ltar rgyal ba'i sras dag dpa'i sgo dang pos/ khong du brjod par bya ba 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
174b8(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/ bzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yong su 'byung bar 'gyur
175a1(phal chen): ba'i na cig tu sta gcig tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba'i sprin blo'i cher 'bab ste/ de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i yongs sgrubs pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor ba rtogs
175a2(phal chen): pa ra sa'i phyogs bzhin gyis bzung ba 'am bzod par mi nus so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
175a3(phal chen): 'byung ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag nyid kyi stob dang shugs
175a4(phal chen): kyi sgrubs pa'i sems kyi rgyud ma rtogs par/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa mnga'o ba can nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzung ba 'am/ gzod par mi nuso//
175a5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo gnyis pa 'dis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
175a6(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi/ skye ba 'byung bar khong du chud par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ sprin chen po'i char de dag 'bab pa'i tshe/ gang nas kyang /
175a7(phal chen): 'ong ba med pa/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med pa ste/ sems can rnams kyi tshogs chen pos char rab tu 'bab pa yang yod do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
175a8(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ chos kyi sprin chen po'i chir mngon par 'bab pa yang gang nas kyang 'ongs pa med pa la/ gang du yang 'gro ba med de/ byang chub sems dpa'
175b1(phal chen): rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang / shugs chen pos char mngon par 'bab pa yang yod do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo gsum pa 'dis kyang / byang chub/
175b2(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi/ skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o// kye rgyal
175b3(phal chen): ba'i sras dag bzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sprin po'i cher mngon par 'bab pa de dag ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po brtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi shes pa 'am/
175b4(phal chen): bgrang bar sla ba ma yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khasu rtogs pa'i sems can rnams ni/ sprin chen po'i cher de la sems dpas mgo
175b5(phal chen): rmongs par 'gyur ro// sprin po'i char de la ltas nas/ mig 'khrugs par 'gyur ro// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i dbang phyug chen po ni ma gtogs te/ de ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa
175b6(phal chen): ba yongasu sbyangs pa'i khyad par gyi de la chung ngu na/ char pa'i thig pa cig kyang ma rigs par mi 'babs po// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yang
175b7(phal chen): dag par 'byung ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa yang / sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/
175b8(phal chen): shes pa 'am bsam par mi nus te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi cher la sems dpas mgo rmongs par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad kyis dbang phyug byang chub sem
176a1(phal chen): 2/ #dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni ma rtogs te/ blo shin tu sbyang ba'i mthu dang / shugs kyi de dag la ni chung ngun tshigs dang / yi ge mga' rnam
176a2(phal chen): yang ma mi rigs par sems can bzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la mi 'bab po// kye rgyal ba'i sras khong du chud par bya ba bzhi pa 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
176a3(phal chen): pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung bar khong du chud par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bzhan yang 'di lta
176a4(phal chen): ste dper na/ sprin chen po'i char de dag 'bab pa'i nang na rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod do// de ni mi'i phung po de rab tu zhi bar byed do// 'byung bar
176a5(phal chen): byed pa zhes bya ba'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa yod de/ de las chu'i phung po de dag 'byung ngo // yongasu bcod pa zhes bya ba'i sprin po'i char 'bab pa yod do// de ni chu'i phung po de dag yongasu
176a6(phal chen): gcod// yongs su sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni nor bu rin po che mang po yongasu 'grub par byed do// rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i sprin chen po'i
176a7(phal chen): char 'bab pa yod do// de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rnam par 'byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'byung ba la'ang rab tu
176a8(phal chen): zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'bar ba thams cad rab tu zhi
176b1(phal chen): bar byed do// 'byung ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de nas ni sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par 'byung bar
176b2(phal chen): byed do/ de yongasu gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin blo'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongasu bcod// yongasu
176b3(phal chen): sgrubs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rin po che yongasu grub par byed de/ rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba chos kyi sprin chen
176b4(phal chen): po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni sems can gyi sems dang / bsam pa rnam par 'byed pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo lnga pa 'dis kyang / byang chub sem
176b5(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/
176b6(phal chen): sprin blo yang ro cig la/ chu'i phung po yang rnam par mi rtogs mod kyi/ de ltar rnam pa bye ba tshad med par tha dad pa'i char rnam pa bye ba 'bab bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du/
176b7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i char sprin ro gcig pa las/ de ltar tshad med cing rnam pa tha dad pa'i chos kyi char sna tshogs 'bab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang yongs su
176b8(phal chen): 'byung ngo // chos rnam par phye ba tshad med pa yang snang zhing yod do// kye rgyal ba'i sras khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo drug pa 'dis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
177a1(phal chen): #de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bzhan yang 'di lta ste/
177a2(phal chen): dper na/ stong gsuM gyi stong chen po'i yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ thog ma nyid du gzugs la spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bzhal med khang yongs su grub par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og
177a3(phal chen): tu 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bzhal med khang yongasu 'grub par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu mi rnams kyi gnas yongs su 'grung bar 'gyur ro/ de'i 'og du de ma yin pa'i
177a4(phal chen): sems can lhag ma bzhin rnams kyi gnas rnam par bye ba sna tshogs 'grub par 'gyur ro/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'byung ba'i tshe/ yang
177a5(phal chen): thog ma nyid du byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rgyud rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rgyud rnams 'byung ngo // de'i 'og tu nyan thos kyi dge ba'i
177a6(phal chen): ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu de ma yin pa'i sems can bzhan gyi 'dus byas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / shes pa'i rgyud rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
177a7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar dper na char sprin chen po yang rogacig la/ chu'i phung po yang rnam par mi rtog pa las/ sems can gyi dge ba'i ba rnams thadod pas bzhas/
177b1(phal chen): med khang rnam pa tha dad pa yod cing snang ngo // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i char sbyin ro gcig pa las sems can gyi
177b2(phal chen): snod rnams pa tha dad pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pa yod cing snang ngo // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo bdun pa 'dis kyang / byang chub
177b3(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung bar khong du chud par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i
177b4(phal chen): sras dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ chus 'jig pa'i skal pa chen po 'byung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang chen mtsho cig tu gyur pa'i tshe/
177b5(phal chen): chos nyid thos pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba yin no// yon tan rin rin po chen ches brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i pad mo mang po 'byung ste/ de dag gi ni chu'i skal pa thad kun nas khyab so//
177b6(phal chen): de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad 'od kyis rgyas par 'gyings te/ pad me de dag byung ba dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan rnams kyi kyang
177b7(phal chen): bskal pa 'di la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyu ro// zhes bya bar khong du chud do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
178a1(phal chen): pa#khams yongasu 'grub pa'i phyir/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor dag cing 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni gzugs la spyod pa'i lha
178a2(phal chen): rnams kyis/ bzhal med khang yongasu gnas par byas te/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor dag cing dang sa la 'od gsal ba'i brgyan bzang po zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni 'dod pa la spyod
178a3(phal chen): ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i bzhal med khang yongs su 'god do// rlung gi dkyil 'khor cig tu bsdug cing tha mi dad zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni 'khor dang 'khor yug chen po
178a4(phal chen): ri rnams yongs su bzhog par byed do// rlung gi dkyil 'khor khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni ri rab ri'i rgyal po yongs su gzhog par byed do// rlung gi
178a5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor snyan pa zhes bya ba ldang ste/ da ni ri chen po bcu yongs su bzhog par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ seng ldeng can dang / drang song ri dang / bdud las
178a6(phal chen): rgyal dang / bsdus las shin tu rgyal dang / gnya' shing 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang / gtang gzung dang / gtang gzung chen po dang / spos kyi nged can dang / kha ba cano//
178a7(phal chen): rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba ldang te/ de ni sa chen po kun nas gnas par byed do// rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba ldang te/ de nis
178a8(phal chen): bla'i lha dang klu dang / dri za'i khyim kun nas gnas par byed do// rlung gi dkyil 'khor mdzod mi zad pa zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham
178b1(phal chen): su rtogs pa'i brgya mtsho chen po kun nas gnas par byed do// rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
178b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rin po che'i thams cad kun nas gnas par byed do// rlung gi dkyil 'khor rtsa brten pa zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni yid gi shing thams cad kun
178b3(phal chen): nas gnas par byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar sprin chen po'i char ro gcig tu bab pa dang / chu'i phung po rnam par mi rtogs pa las/ chos nyid thob pa dang / sems
178b4(phal chen): can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba tha dad pa khyad par gyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa yod cing sna // rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad par gyur pas/ stong gsum gyi stong
178b5(phal chen): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang yod par snang ngo // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ dge ba'i
178b6(phal chen): tshegs thams cad shin tu skyugs pa/ bla na med pa'i ye shes chen po'i snang ba la mngon du gyur pa rnams 'byung ba'i tshe/ ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po bsam gyi mi khyab pa/
178b7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs brgyan mi bcod pa/ zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par 'gyed pa 'byung ste/ 'od zer des ni de bzhin gshegs
178b8(phal chen): pa dang dbang bkur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems 'di snyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu 'dis yang dag par 'grub par 'gyuraro//
179a1(phal chen): pha lazhes bya bar thugs su chud do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar gyur pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md
179a2(phal chen): kyis rigs 'byung ba'i mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po 'di bzang po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs
179a3(phal chen): rnams kyi ye shes zag pa med cing mi zad pa yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'byung ste/
179a4(phal chen): 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes bsam gyi mi khyab pa/ chos kyi dbyings su bzhol ba yang dag par 'grub par 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
179a5(phal chen): ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs mi bsgrub
179a6(phal chen): pa yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po zil gyi mi non cing / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer
179a7(phal chen): des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs dang / mi snyed pa thams cad zil gyi mi non pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
179a8(phal chen): shes kyi 'od zer chen po thams cad du brjod pa las 'das shing / thams cad du thogs pa med par yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
179b1(phal chen): kyi 'od zer chen po sprul nas/ mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing thos pa dang / de dang 'grogs pa don yod pas/
179b2(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi za ba'i ye shes/ yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su seng ba zhes bya ba
179b3(phal chen): byung te/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams dang / ye shes ma zad pa'i tshogs grogs thams cad nye bar tshol ba/ yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur/
179b4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po 'jug par bka' ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs
179b5(phal chen): rgyun mi spyod cing / ye shes zab mo thugasu chud pa yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po brgyan sna tshogs can zhes bya bar
179b6(phal chen): 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes mtshan dang dpe byed bzang po'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis/ 'gro ba thams cad du dga' bar 'gyur ba yang dag
179b7(phal chen): bar 'grub po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes/
179b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yul la chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa na mkha'i mthas gtug par sku tshe'i tshad rgyun mi chad par yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
180a1(phal chen): bgade ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i cher sprin chen po ro cig pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil
180a2(phal chen): 'khor chen po ro gcig pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos 'di thob pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa dang / dbang po dang brtson 'grus
180a3(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa'i chos nyid thob pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye shes kyi 'od zer rang bzhin gcig pa las/ rnam pa tha dad du gyur pa yod cing snang ngo // /
180a4(phal chen): ye shes kyi 'od zer rnam pa tha dad pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba yang dag par 'grub pa rnam pa tha dad pa yang yod cing snang ngo // kye rgyalo ba'i sras dag de bzhin
180a5(phal chen): gshegs pa yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par bye ba'i ro gcig pa las/ yon tan rnam pa tha dad pa'i brgyan tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung zhing / de bzhin gsheg
180a6(phal chen): pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/ sems can rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du shes par 'gyur ba ltos/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
180a7(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyim rlabs na/ sems can sngan chad de bzhin gshegs pa la/ dge ba'i rtsa bam skyed pas de bzhin gshegs par
180a8(phal chen): ye shes la chung ngu na/ cha shas cig tsam bstan pa yang shes par 'gyur ba'am/ khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i gnas me skabs med do// de ni gnas ma yin no// sku
180b1(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'i khyad par gyi/ sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen pos mthul 'jug cing rtogs pa dang /
180b2(phal chen): khong du chud par byed kyang des de bzhin gshegs pa la rtogs pa mi mnga' ste/ 'byung ba med cing kun nas 'byung ba med la yang dag par 'grub pa med de/ bya ba med cing
180b3(phal chen): da pa 'ang su yang med mod kyi/ yang dag par 'byung ba'i grangasu bgrang ba yang yod do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo brgyad pa 'dis kyang byang chub sems
180b4(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung bar khong du chud par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
180b5(phal chen): bzhin dag 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor chu'i phung po 'dzin pa bzhi ni/ na mkha' la gnas shing ldang ngo // bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rlung gi dkyil
180b6(phal chen): 'khor bstan pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor gnas pa dang / rlung bri dkyil 'khor mi nyams pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor snying dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dag ste/
180b7(phal chen): rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po de bzhi ni rab tu ldang zhing chu'i phung po 'dzin te/ chu'i phung po de la gnas pa'i sa chen po ni mi 'jig rnam par mi 'jig pas/ de'i phyir sa ni ma
180b8(phal chen): gnas so// chu ni rlung la gan so// rlung ni mkha' la gnas so// nam mkha' ni mi gnas pa zhes bya ba ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni tshu
181a1(phal chen): #de lta bur gnas so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil
181a2(phal chen): 'khor chen po shes rab kyi snang ba chags pa med pa la gnas zhing ldang te/ de dag ni bad 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin to// bzhi gang zhe na/
181a3(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po bsdu bas sems can yongs su dag par 'gyur zhes bya ba dang / ye shes kyi rlungs gi dkyil
181a4(phal chen): 'khor chen pos chos rnam par dgod pa la 'gro ba mos par byed pa zhes bya ba dang / ye shes kyi rlungs gi dkyil 'khor chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su srungs
181a5(phal chen): ba zhes bya ba dang / ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'khor ba thams cad zag pa med pa'i dbyingasu khong du chud pa zhes bya ba dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bzhi po de
181a6(phal chen): dag ni shes rab kyi snang ba chags pa bde pa la gnas pa'i ye shes kyi rlungs gi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams te/ de dag ni 'gro ba thams cad byams pa chen pos yongasu sgrub
181a7(phal chen): ba dang / thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba thams cad yongasu bgrol zhing gzung ba'i phyir ldang te/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/
181a8(phal chen): 'gro ba mang po rnam par phye ba 'byam klas pa'i nang na/ thabs mkhas pa la gnas pa'i byams pa chen pos sems can thams cad nye bar mtho ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
181b1(phal chen): dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i tshul de lta bur 'grub cing de ltar gnas ma yin te/ shes rab kyi snang ba chags pa med pa ni mi gnas pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khong
181b2(phal chen): du chud par bya ba'i sgo dgu pa 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
181b3(phal chen): skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ grub pa ni tshad med pa
181b4(phal chen): sems can rnams yongasu spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pas nye bar mtsho ba yin te/ 'di ltar chu la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang gnas kyi nye bar mtsho ba yin te/ sems
181b5(phal chen): can sa'i steng na 'khod pa rnams kyang sa'i steng na yod pa'i rnam pa tshad med pas nye bar mtsho ba yin/ gzhal med khang na gnas pa rnams kyang bzhal med khang gis nye bar
181b6(phal chen): mtsho ba yin/ nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams kyang bar snang gnas kyi nye bar mtsho ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs par yang dag par 'grub pa yang rnam pa chad
181b7(phal chen): med pas/ 'gro ba thams cad nye bar mtsho ba yin te/ 'di ltar mthong bar dga' ba dang / dad cing mos par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyang sangs rgyas mthong bas nye bar mtho
181b8(phal chen): ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi stobs kyi 'thul gnas pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi nye bar 'tshe ba yin/ bsam tan dang tshad med pa la gnas pa rnams kyang
182a1(phal chen): bal ga bya// 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mngon par shes pa'i nye bar mtsho ba yin/ chos kyi sgo snang ba la mA nas pa rnams kyang rgya chud mi za
182a2(phal chen): bas nye bar mtsho ba yin/ snang ba med pa la gnas pa rnams kyang chos 'byam klas pa chud mi za bas mtsho ba yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par grub
182a3(phal chen): pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad nye bar mtsho ba yin zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khong du chud par bya ba'i rnam pa 'dis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
182a4(phal chen): chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub
182a5(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung bstan pa ni de lta bur shes par bya ste/ spyod pa yongs su sgrubs pa tshad med pas na chad med par
182a6(phal chen): shes par bya'o// phyogs bcu thams cad rgyas par 'byed pas na shin tu yangs par shes par bya'o// skye ba dang 'jig pa'i gnas dang bral bas na/ len pa
182a7(phal chen): med cing 'dor ba med par shes par bya'o// sems can dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral bas na/ rgyu ba med cing rgyu ba dang bla la ba shes par bya'o//
182a8(phal chen): na mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu yin pas na/ lus med par shes par bya'o// sems can thams cad la bdag med pas na mnyam par shes par bya'o// sems can thang
182b1(phal chen): la zil mi shes pa'i zhing du gyur bas na/ mi zad par shes par bya'o// phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thugs par rgyun mi chad pas na/ phyir mi ldog pa shes par bya'o// de
182b2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la snyen po med pas na/ mi 'phrogs pa shes par bya'o// 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pas na/ mi gnyis
182b3(phal chen): bar shes par bya'o// sngon yongasu min par byas pa'i sems can gyi bsam pa'i khyad par yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas na/ 'gro ba thams cad nye bar mtsho bar shes
182b4(phal chen): bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa rnam par byang ba rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu
182b5(phal chen): bzang pos don 'di nyid yang rtags par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smra so// 'jig rten kun las 'das shing stobs bcu mnga' gyur te// mi mnyam snyam
182b6(phal chen): dang skam shing bar snang mkha' mnyam pa'i// mgon po rnam kyi spyod yul mtshungs med mtha' yas nyon// de dag 'jig rten kun na yon tan mtshungs pa med// steng
182b7(phal chen): bcu yon tan tshad med mnga' ba thams cad kyis// mthul sems dang yid kyi tshul gyi ma bis ma ste// skyes bu seng ge rnams ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis// smre
182b8(phal chen): re re skal pa bye ba mi spob so// phyogs bcu kun na zhing rnams ji snyed yod pa kun// skyes bu la las bshog ste rdul phran sgrang nus kyang // de ni stobs bcu mnga' ba'i//
183a1(phal chen): phalaspu cig yon tan yang // skal pa khrag khrig rgyas kyang tshad gzung mi nuso// skyes bu la la na mkha'i dbyings la 'jal byed cing /
183a2(phal chen): de ltar la las brtsis mgo gzung ste bgrangs byas kyang // bzhal bar mi nus mtha' yas skyed par mi rung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod yul chad kyang med/
183a3(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi rigs rgyud ji snyed dang // de dag du sa gsum spyod pa sems can mga' zhig gis// sems kyi skad cig yud kyi shes kyang 'gro snyed kyi/ skal
183a4(phal chen): bas thams cad zil ga ni ni rang bzhin shes mi nus// ji ltar chos kyi dbyings ni kun tu mtha' yas shing // kun yin thams cad ma yin mi snang gzung du med// de
183a5(phal chen): bzhin stobs bcu mnga' ba'i spyod yul tshud med de// thams cad yin yang kun min chos dbyings rang bzhin yin/ de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs ste// kun
183a6(phal chen): nas 'byung ba med cing nam ya do nub pa med// de bzhin 'jig rten kun 'das de dag spyod yul de// de bzhin nyid dang tshul mtshungs 'phel dang 'grib pa spangs// yang dag
183a7(phal chen): mtha' na mtha' med mtha' la gnas pa ste// dus gsum kun dang rnam pa kun dang rnam par bral// de bzhin mgon po phan mdzad kun gyi spyod yul de// dus gsum rgyas
183a8(phal chen): mdzad rnam pa kun tu chags mi mngal/ rang bzhin byas pa med pas rnam par 'gyur ba med// rang bzhin namakha' dri med nyon mongs med pa ste// de bzhin rgyal ba rnams//
183b1(phal chen): kyi rang bzhin kun tu dga'// rang bzhin 'gyur dang bral shing yod dang med pa yin// sgra dang tshigs la rnam par grol yang rnam pa thams cad med// 'gro dang 'od dang rnam rtogs
183b2(phal chen): med pas mya ngan 'das// de bzhin stobs bcu mnga' ba'i spyod yul rang bzhin med// tshig gi rang bzhin kun gyis brjod par mi nuso// de ltar chos kun rang bzhin zhi ba
183b3(phal chen): mkhyen gyur pa// ji ltar na mkha'i rlung dang bya rjes 'dra ba ste// sngon chad smon lam mdzad pas gzugs kyi skur yang snang // stobs bcu mnga' ba rnam kyi cho 'phrul ci 'dra
183b4(phal chen): ltos/ rgyal ba'i spyod yul 'di la 'jug par su 'dod pa// de ni na mkha' 'dra bar bsam pa yongasu sbyongs// rtogs dang rnam par rtogs dang 'du shes 'dzin pa ste/
183b5(phal chen): namakha' lta bu'i yid kyis de la 'jug par bgyis// de bas bde gshegs sras rnams mgon po'i spod pa rnams// bdag gi dpe tsam chung shas bshad gyis mnyan par
183b6(phal chen): gyis// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i yon tan mtha' byin mi nus kyang // shes tsam shes par bya ba'i don du cung zad brjod// de dag sku'i phrin las ji lta 'byung ba dang //
183b7(phal chen): mgon po rnams kyi gsung dang thugs kyi spyod yul dang // stobs bcu rnams kyi yul dang 'khor lo bskor ba dang // mya ngan 'das dang dege rtsa thams cad bshad kyis nyon/
183b8(phal chen): 'jig rten 'di dag ma lus skye zhing 'byung po'i tshe// de la rgyu'i rnam grangs gcig ces grangs med kyi// rgyu dang tshul gyis rnam pa khrag khrig brgya mang gis/ 'jig rten stong
184a1(phal chen): la#/ gsum kun nas gnas pa'i grangasu 'gro/ de bzhin skyes bu'i mchog rnams skye bar 'gyur ba'i tshe// de dag yon tan 'di snyed yin zhes babrangs
184a2(phal chen): ba med// rdul dang rdul phran bgrang nus sems cad kun bsam nus// stobs bo cu mnga' ba rnams kyi 'byung ba rnams la min// ji ltar sprin dang dus kyi char la rten
184a3(phal chen): byas shing // char chen 'beb byed rlung rnams bzhi po de bzhin te// dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub sems dpa'i mthus// 'jig rten stong gsum kun nas grangasu 'gro/ de
184a4(phal chen): bzhin stobs bcu rnams kyi chos sprin rgyur byas shing // bsam pa rnam dag byed pa'i ye shes rlung ldang te/ sngon gyi dge ba rkyen skyes rigs par yongs bsngo bas/ stobs
184a5(phal chen): bcu mgon po rnams ni 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur// steng gi mkha' dbyings las sprin char blugs pa// stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten kun nas 'jig gyur tshe// mkha'
184a6(phal chen): dbyings rgya chen dag pa'i rlung lang mo rtog par// sa phyogs bzhan gyis gzod cing gzung bar mi nus so// de bzhin stobs bcu mnga' bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshe//
184a7(phal chen): phyogs bcu kun gyi chos dbyings yongs su rgyas bkang zhing / chos tshul char chen bab gyur lha las lhags pa'i sems// rnam par dag pa mi rtogs bzhan gyis 'dzin
184a8(phal chen): mi nus// na mkha'i dbyings las sprin chen char pa 'bab gyur pa// de la 'gro dang 'ong ba gang yang yod pa min// de la byed pa med de tshor ba po yang med/ de dag chos nyid
184b1(phal chen): thob 'byung rnam pa bzhan gyi min// de bzhin stobs bcu mnga' ba'i sprin chen char 'bab pa// de dag 'pho dang 'ong ba yod pa ma yin pa yang // byang chub sems dpa'i mthu
184b2(phal chen): dang legs par spang ba'i rgyus// byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi rang bzhin sbyin kyang 'byung // sbyin gyi char skye char thig yongs su bgrangs nus pa'i// sems can de 'dra
184b3(phal chen): gsum 'di na yod pa min// stong gsum dbang po'i dbang phyug de ni ma rtogs te// dbang sgyur de ni sngon gyi smon lam 'bras bu dbang // de bzhin gshegs pa char chen
184b4(phal chen): 'bab pa ma lus par// sems can kun gyis bgrangs bsam bzhal bar sla ba min// 'jig rten kun na 'gro ba'i mchog gyur dbang phyug rnams// de dag sprin chen
184b5(phal chen): char 'khyen rin chen lag bkod lta// rab tu zhi byed 'byung ba 'byung bar byed// bzhan yang yongasu spyod pa ni longasu spyod// sgrub pa de bzhin bzhan te de ni rin chen sgrub/
184b6(phal chen): rnam par 'byed pa stong gsum thams cad rnam par 'byed// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ni sgra zhi nyon mongs kun zhir byed// 'byung ba dge stong rgya bgrangs kun nas 'byung bar
184b7(phal chen): byed// yongasu sbed pa lta ba'i rnam pa yongs spyod de// rgyal po'i rin chen sgrub cing bsam pa rnam par 'byed// bar snang mkha' las char 'bab ji ltar ro cig kyang /
184b8(phal chen): gnas kyi khyed kyi yongasu 'gyur ba sna tshogs mang // 'on kyang chu la rtogs med rnam par rtogs pa med// tha dad rnam pa bgrang ba de dag chos nyid tshul// de bzhin chos kyang /
185a1(phal chen): #cig min tha dad ma yin te// ro ci zhi zhing rtog med rnam par rtog med de// 'on kyang sangs rgyas chos bgrangs mu med 'byung bar 'gyur/
185a2(phal chen): de ni rdul bral rnams kyi chos nyid tshul yin no// ji ltar thog ma gzugs khams bzhal med khang pa 'byung // de nas 'dod 'khams bzhal med khang rnams rnam par
185a3(phal chen): 'god// de nas steng ma'i gnas rnams rnam dkod de/ de nas klu dang dri za 'gro ba kun gyi gnas// de bzhin stobs bcu mang ba de dag 'byung ba'i che// thogs mar byang
185a4(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i skrod pa mu med 'byung // de nas zhi dga' rang rgyal theg la gnas pa rnams// de nas dbang du gyur pa'i 'gro kun gyi// ji ltar dpa mo sangs rgyas skye ba'i
185a5(phal chen): ltas gyur pa// sngon chad sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha rnams dgar gyur zhing // chu las rten cing 'od gsal ba zhal med khang yang 'byung // rlung langs 'jig rten ri so ris
185a6(phal chen): cha char 'god par byed// sangs rgyas sngon gyi dge ba'i 'od gsal ltas yin te// des ni sangs rgyas rgyal sras kun gyi thugs chud 'gyur// ye shes yongs dag dkyil
185a7(phal chen): 'khor mkha' ltar rnam dag pa'i// stobs bcu tha dad ji snyed sangs rgyas chos 'byung mkhyen// rlung gis chu phung ma lus kun gyi gnas yin te// de phyir sa steng gnas
185a8(phal chen): rnams 'jig par mi 'gyur ro// sa yang shing dang gal ba sman gyi gnas yin te// mkha' la gnasu bya ba gang yang med pa yin// mgon po rnams kyang shes rab ye shes
185b1(phal chen): bzhi la bzhugs// ye shes thugs 'byams thabs kyi yongs su gzung // rgyal ba'i chos rnams ji snyed de dag thabs su 'dus// rdul med shes rab de ni gnas/
185b2(phal chen): med lus kyang med// 'jig rten 'byung gnas tshad med mang po kun kyang mtsho// sa la gnas dang chu la gnas pa thams cad dang / na mkha'i lha rdzas bzhal med khang la
185b3(phal chen): gnas pa dang // rkang gnyis rkang bzhi sems can thams cad nye bar mtsho// de bzhin skyes mchog dbang po chos kyi rgyal skyes pa// 'gro ba ma lus thams cad nye bar
185b4(phal chen): bar 'tsho ba yin// 'thong zhing thos par gyur dang mchod pas de bzhin te// nyon mongs stsol bas sems can thams cad nye bar mtsho// 'byung ba mthar thugs med pas
185b5(phal chen): 'jig rten mge rmongs 'gyur// 'on kyang 'gro la phan don sems can shes bya'i phyir// mi mkhas 'gro bstan phyir ye shes stan don du// rgyal ba rnams kyi don rab dpe med
185b6(phal chen): dpes brjod do// / bam po bdun bcu don gcig pa'o// // de skad ces smras
185b7(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu 'byung ba'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po
185b8(phal chen): la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
186a1(phal chen): phanarnams kyi sku ltar yod do// ji lta bur khong du chud par bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang
186a2(phal chen): pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung ba'i dpal la 'di ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa'i
186a3(phal chen): sku ltar yod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshad med pa'i rjesu 'gro bas khong du chud par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
186a4(phal chen): pa'i sku ltar yod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig gam/ rnam pa gcig gam/ sku gcig gam/ zhing gcig gam/ sems can gcig gi khong du chud par bya ba ma
186a5(phal chen): yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ltar yod pa ni/ thams cad rjesu song bar byang chub sems dpa' khong du chud par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta
186a6(phal chen): ste dper na/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rjesu song ba dang / 'dod pa dang / gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i gnas thams cad du khyab pa yin yang /
186a7(phal chen): gang du'ang song ba med cing rjes su song ba med par shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni mkha' la gzugs med pa'i phyir ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa'i
186a8(phal chen): sku yang thams cad kyi rdzasu song ba ste/ sems can thams cad dang / chos thams cad dang / zhing thams cad kun tu khyab par shes par bya'o// 'on kyang gang yang gshegs
186b1(phal chen): ba med cing rjes su bzhud pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ deni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la lus med pa'i phyir te/ sems can gyi rnam pa dmig par yod pa'i phyir/ skra bstan pa
186b2(phal chen): yang yod do// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang po 'dis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ltar yod par shes
186b3(phal chen): par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bzhin yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ na mkha' la gzugs med de/ yang shing ba rgya che ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi bya ba snang zhing yod
186b4(phal chen): par 'gyur te/ na mkha' la rtog pa med do// spros pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ye shes kyi sku snang ba la rten cing / sems can
186b5(phal chen): thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams yod cing snang bar gyur kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rnam par rtogs pa
186b6(phal chen): mi mnga' ste/ sprosra pa mi mnga'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni thog ma nas spros pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa'i phyir ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang
186b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo gnyis pa 'dis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ltar yod par shes par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
186b8(phal chen): bzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dzam bu gling du nyi ma shar ba ni/ 'od kyi tshad med par khyab pas/ sems can rnams tshad med pa'i rnam pas nye bar mtsho ste/ 'di ltar ril dang
187a1(phal chen): phalacing tsa dang nag 'tshal skye bar byed pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ mun pa'i mun nag yongs su gsal cing snang bar byed pas kyang nye
187a2(phal chen): bar mtsho ba yin/ sa la bab cing 'dam rdzab yongasu skoms pas kyang nye bar mtsho ba yin/ le tog la bab cing yongs su smin par byed pas kyang nye bar mtsho ba yin//
187a3(phal chen): nag 'tshal dang / gel ba dang / sman la bab cing skye ba dang / rnam par 'phel bar byed pas kyang nye bar mtsho ba yin/ na mkha' la bab kyang / bar snang la spod
187a4(phal chen): pa'i sems can rnams nye bar mtsho ba yin/ pad mo'i nag tshal la bab kyang kha dbye shing rgyas par byed pas nye bar mtsho ba yin/ grong dang grong khyer dang /
187a5(phal chen): ljongs dang / pho brang 'khor dang / rgyal po'i gnas la bab kyang / gzugs sna tshogs gsal bar ston pas nye bar mtsho ba yin/ tshul ba ba ni chu la gnas
187a6(phal chen): pa'i sems can yongs su longs spyod pas kyang / nye bar mtsho ba yin/ las rnam pa sna tshogs la bab kyang / dgos pa tsam pa yongasu grub par byed pas
187a7(phal chen): nye bar mtsho ba yin/ de ci'i phyir na na/ de ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer tshad med pas kyi ba'i phyir/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ltar
187a8(phal chen): yod pa'i nyi ma'i yang rnam pa tshad med pas sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ 'di ltar dge ba'i las yongasu skyed cing / sdig pa'i las rnam par ldog
187b1(phal chen): pas kyang nye bar mtsho ba yin/ shes rab kyi 'od snang ba mdzad cing / gti mug gi mun pa rnam par gsel bas kyang nye bar mtsho ba yin/ 'gro ba thams cad
187b2(phal chen): yongasu skyabs cing / byams pa chen po dang ldan pas kyang / nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ 'gro ba thams cad yongasu 'grel cing thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas kyang nye
187b3(phal chen): 'tsho ba yin/ dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag 'phel bar mdzad cing / chos kyi lo tog la bab pas kyang nye bar mtsho ba yin/ sems kyi rnyogs pa
187b4(phal chen): yongasu sel bas dad pa skyed pas kyang nye bar mtsho ba yin/ rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par chud mi za bas 'thong ba don yod pas kyang nye bar mtsho ba yin/ skye ba dang /
187b5(phal chen): 'pho na yang dag par ston cing / gzugs snang bar mdzad pas kyang nye bar mtsho ba yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par chud mi zon cing / khong khro ba mi mnga' bos kyang ce
187b6(phal chen): bar mtsho ba yin/ slob ma'i yon tan pad mo kha phye ba zhing rgyas par mdzad de/ sems can rnams la ye shes kyi 'od zer tshad med pa/ rab tu stong pas kyang nye
187b7(phal chen): bar mtsho ba yin/ sprad pa brtsam pa yongs su grub par mdzad cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spro ba skyed pas nye bar mtsho ba yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin ga
187b8(phal chen): ba'i nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ khong du chud par
188a1(phal chen): bal@#ba'i sgo gsum pa 'dis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra ltar yod par shes par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/
188a2(phal chen): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de nyid 'dzam bu gling du 'tshang ba'i tshe/ thog ma nyid du ri'i rgyal po chen po 'od lta ste/ ri rab ri'i rgyal po la snang bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu de ma yin pa'i ri
188a3(phal chen): chen po bzhan la snang bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu ri nag po dag la yang snang bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu sa phyogs then po rnams su snang bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu 'dzam bu gling
188a4(phal chen): 'dis phyogs dma' ba dag kyang snang bar byed do// 'on kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di la thog ma nyid du 'od zer kye'o// zhe 'am 'dir ni thog mar snang bar bya'o// zhes bya ba'i
188a5(phal chen): rnam par rtogs med de/ spros pa med kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od mnyam du rtong zhing 'char ba ni med pa yin te/ sa mthon dman gyi khyad par gyi mtho mtho la sngar 'char ro// /
188a6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang / chos kyi/
188a7(phal chen): dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i ri su 'char bar 'gyur ba'i tshe/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par thog pa med pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer snang ba 'gyed de/ de yongasu skye ba'i tshe thog
188a8(phal chen): ma nyid du lhag pa'i bsam pa ri'i rgyal po chen po lta bu dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la/ chos kyi snang ba chen po yang dag par ston pa'i tshul du char bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og
188b1(phal chen): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par zhugs pa rnams la 'char bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu dge ba'i rtsa ba nges pa dang ba'i sems can rnams la bsam pa'i gnod ji lta ba
188b2(phal chen): bzhin du/ ye shes kyi snang ba chen po yang dag par sten pa'i tshul gyis 'char bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu chung ngu na log par nges pa'i sems can thams cad la'ang de bzhin
188b3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po 'char bar 'gyur ro// de ltar shar nas kyang sems can rnams la shin tu phan par 'gyur te/ ma 'ong ba'i rgyu yang yongasu smin
