241b2(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa byas na/
241b3(phal chen): de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad zhi zhing 'phags pa'i bde ba thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyi yid ches pa dang / khong du chud par byas na/
241b4(phal chen): sems can la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngam/ thos kyang las kyi sgribs pas kun nas kyang 'khor ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la ma dad pa zhig byas nas/ de dag gis
241b5(phal chen): mthong ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des ni/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du yod do zhes smra so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / thos pa dang / de dag dang 'grogs pa'i dge
241b6(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba skye ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad mngon du bya zhing yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyur khong
241b7(phal chen): du chud par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang dpe rnam par 'god pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad shes par mi rung ste/ cis kyang dper na bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i
241b8(phal chen): byir zhen/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems kyi las thams cad la shin tu 'das pas bsam gyi mo khyab pa ste/ 'od kyang sems can rnams kyi bsams pa long su tshim par/
242a1(phal chen): phalabya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dpes ston pa mngon par snang ba mdzad kyi/ de ltar blang ba'i phyir ni ma yin no//
242a2(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras chos kyi rnam grangs rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gnas shes bya'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyi shes par dka' ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin gsheg
242a3(phal chen): pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// ye shes kyi mthu chen po brjod pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ston pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par sgrub
242a4(phal chen): pa zhes bya'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi mi 'phrog pa zhes bya'o// shin tu nges par de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gi rjes su song ba zhes bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi khams mi lus
242a5(phal chen): pa thams cad rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brten pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba'i bar du skye/ kye rgyal ba'i sras chos kyi rnam grang rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ni theg pa chen
242a6(phal chen): po la yang dag par zhagos pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i theg pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma rtogs par bzhan gyis don du de bzhin gshegs pa ston
242a7(phal chen): pa ma mdzad do// chos kyi rnam grangs 'a rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma rtog pa sems can bzhan lags tu byin par mi 'gyur ro/ kye rgyal ba'i
242a8(phal chen): sras 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che gang gis 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por brjod pa rin po che gang yang rung ste/ rin po che de dag 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po
242b1(phal chen): de'i bu mthu 'og gzhon nu btsun mo dam pa las 'byung ba/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa ma rtogs par sems can bzhan gyi lag tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
242b2(phal chen): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa de lta bu med na ni 'khor los rgyur ba'i rgya lo dus byas nas/ zhag bdun lon pa dang / nor bu rin po che de dag
242b3(phal chen): lam du lus par nub par 'gyur te mi 'khod do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du mdo sde rin po che rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sras su mthu bo che de bzhin gshegs
242b4(phal chen): ba'i rigasu phyung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ rnam ma rtogs par sems can gzhan gyis lag tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras skyes bu dam pa de
242b5(phal chen): lta bu dag med du zin na/ ring po me togs par mdo sde rnam pa 'di lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba chen po chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul rgyun mi mchod par byed pa
242b6(phal chen): rnams kyang thams cad du nub par 'gyur te mi 'khod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la ni chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag nyan pa'i mthu yang med na bzung ba 'am
242b7(phal chen): bcang ba 'am/ klag pa'am blta ba 'am/ bri ba lta ji smos te/ de ni gnas ma yin no// gzhan du chos kyi rnam grang rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ni skyes bu dam pa de dag nyid kyi lag tu phyin pa 'am
242b8(phal chen): glegs bam du byas pa'am yid la yod par 'gyuraro/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu dag thos ni bsam pa
243a1(phal chen): pa ga/ thag pas rim gro dang bkur sti dang rjes su byas te spyi bor blang bar bya'o// rab tu dga' bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gnas 'di
243a2(phal chen): la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dkon pa ma yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sem
243a3(phal chen): dpa' chen pos bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs chos yang dag par bsgrub pa la mngon par
243a4(phal chen): brtson pa byas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid bsam gyi mi khyab pa 'di ma thos sam/ thos nas kyang yang yid mi chis shing dad pa med de/ mi 'jug khong du chud par mi byed na/ byang chub
243a5(phal chen): sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid la yang dag par 'byung ba ma yin no// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu byung bar bshad par mi
243a6(phal chen): 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes che ba nyid bsam gyi mi khyab pa tshad med pa chags pa med pa sgribs pa
243a7(phal chen): med pa 'di thos nas yid ches shing dad de 'jug pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs pa'i rigs su byung ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs
243a8(phal chen): pa'i yul gyis rje su song ba yin/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid du grub pa yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la rab tu gnas pa yin//
243b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad dang shin tu bral ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la shin tu byung ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos nyid rtog par khong du chud pa yin/
243b2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang rnam par rol pa the tshom med pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang rang byang gi chos nyid la gnas pas kyang de bzhin
243b3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i yul chags pa med pa la 'jug pa yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpas chos 'di dag thos pas blo thams cad kyi rje su song ba dang / sems kyi bsam pa'i
243b4(phal chen): stobs dang / shugs tshad med pa'i rjesu song ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas 'jug pa dang / rnam par rtog pa yongasu spangs pa dang / yid la byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon
243b5(phal chen): du gyur pa dang / dran pa'i dbang po na mkha'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par bsgom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i blo gros kyi las chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pas rnam par
243b6(phal chen): dpyad pa dang rang 'byung gi ye shes 'byam klas pa yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas mngon par shes par bya ba dang / sems skyed pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi dri thams cad dang bral
243b7(phal chen): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / bsam pa la 'jug pa 'byam klas pa/ phyogs kyi dri ma thams cad du rgyas par 'grengs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes
243b8(phal chen): 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud cig tshul cig tu gyur bar chos 'di rnams la 'jug pa med par khong du chud pa'i tshul gyis 'jug par bya ba ste/ des ni
244a1(phal chen): chos gang yang gcig tu dmigs pas yid la bya bar mi bya'i rgyal ba'i sras chos cig la chos thams cad tshad med pa'i tshul du yid la bya'o//
244a2(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sem dpa' ni las gron chu dang rang 'byung gi ye shes dang mnga' sbyar ba thob par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
244a3(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos don de yang brtag par bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshog su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// rgyal ba de dag mthos mthong mchod pa byas pas kyang /
244a4(phal chen): tshad med pa'i bsod nams phung po 'phel bar 'gyur// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad spang gyur du// 'dus byas 'di nang par ma dor ni zad mi 'gyur/
244a5(phal chen): skyes bu la las rdo rje zos gyur de la ni// zhu bar mi 'gyur gdon mi za bar phyir 'byung 'gyur/ de bzhin stobs bcu rnams la mchod bya sra bsod nams kyi// ye shes rdo rje/
244a6(phal chen): maung ma lus bcom par 'gyur// rtsa skam bung pa ri bo'i mchog tsam yod gyur kyang // ma bdag yung 'bru tsam gyi de ni tshig gyur ste// de bzhin gshegs chod pa chung tshad ci
244a7(phal chen): byas kyang // nyon mongs thams cad tshig med mya ngan las 'das 'gyur// ri bo kha ba can la mthong legs sman yod de// mthong zhing dregs pas nad rnams zhi bar byed//
244a8(phal chen): de bzhin stobs bcu rnams ni mthong ngam thos kyang rung // yon tan kun ldan sangs rgyas ye shes 'thob par 'gyur// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i
244b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa dang lhas chen po bco brgyad du g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so//
244b2(phal chen): kun tu g.yo so// 'gul to// rab tu 'gul te/ kun tu 'gul to// ldeg go/ rab tu ldeg go/ kun tu ldeg go// che ma che ma rab tu chem che mo// kun tu chemache mo// 'ur
244b3(phal chen): 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro// shig shig rab tu shig shig/ kun tu shig shig go/ 'di lta ste sher phyogs dma' bar gyur na/ nub phyogs mtho bar gyur to//
244b4(phal chen): nub phyogs dma' bar gyur na/ shar phyogs mtho bar gyur to// lho phyogs ma 'a bar gyur na/ byang phyogs mtho bar gyur to// byang phyogs mnga' bar gyur na/ lho phyogs mtho bar
244b5(phal chen): 'gyur to// dbus dma' bar gyur na/ mtha' mtho bar gyur to// mtha' dma' bar gyur na dbus mtho bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus lha rdzas las 'das pa'i/
244b6(phal chen): me tog gi sprin dang / na bza'i sprin dang / gdugs kyi sprin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang / ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i spos kyi sprin byi char/
244b7(phal chen): mngon par 'bab po// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i phreng ba dang / byug pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyur mngon par bab bo//
244b8(phal chen): sems can rnams rnam par 'dul bar 'gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi byini rlabs dang /
245a1(phal chen): la/ chos nyid rab tu thob pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mnyam pa med pa las mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku
245a2(phal chen): thob pa las gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang / dus las ji lta bar 'bab pa bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bya dang / sngon mngon par sgrub pa chud ma zos pa dang / byang chub sem
245a3(phal chen): dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang mthu dang shin tu yangs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' gyur ba yang bar pa'i mthus/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
245a4(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med
245a5(phal chen): phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs shing byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan chen po rab tu bstan pa dang / 'od zer gyi dri ba chen po rab tu 'gyed
245a6(phal chen): ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad skyod pa dang / bdud kyi khyims thad rab tu 'jig pa dang / ngan song gsum gyi yul thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / de bzhin gshags
245a7(phal chen): ba che ba nyid rab tu brjod pa dang / chos yang dog par 'gro ba rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i legs pa brjod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du chos kyi char tshad med pa
245a8(phal chen): 'bab pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / lus rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa rab tu bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprin chen po rang rang gi rgyud kyi tshad med pas
245b1(phal chen): yang dag par bzung ba ched cing 'ongs par gyur to// de dag kyang sangs rgyas byin gyis rlabs 'di skad du brjod/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid mi
245b2(phal chen): 'phrogs shing bsam gyi mi khyab pa 'di brjod pa legs so leg so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kyang thams cad kun tu zhes bya bar mi mthun pa shas stag ste/ de bzhin gshegs
245b3(phal chen): ba'i mtshan kun tu grangs pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba dag gis drung nas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming kun tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba dag nas 'dir phyin te thams cad du yang sangs
245b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rab tu thob pas chos gton pa 'di nyid 'byung bar 'gyur te// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar bdag cag kyang dbang du 'gyur ba sha stag/
245b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi 'khor 'di phyin te/ ji ltar bdag cag 'khor 'dis phyin pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas
245b6(phal chen): tugs pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / mthus byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du
245b7(phal chen): med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phyin par 'gyur te/ thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' mi 'phrog pa'i chos 'di nyid tshig 'di dag nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid dang / nges
245b8(phal chen): tshig mngon par sgrub pa 'di nyid don 'di nyid brjod des/ lhag chad med pa brjod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i rtsa rdzas/
246a1(phal chen): pa#/ las 'das pa'i nor bu rin po che'i 'od chen po dang ldan pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par yongasu dag pas
246a2(phal chen): mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo//
246a3(phal chen): gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub thugasu chud pa'i chos kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar gyur pa de bzhin du 'jig
246a4(phal chen): rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad da'ang phyogs bcu'i rgyas par thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya
246a5(phal chen): stongs brjod du med pa brgyad bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol dag nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i brgyad bcu'i
246a6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mtshan kun tu bzang por mthun pa sha stag gis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la zhal mngon par bstan te/ 'di skad ces gsung so// rigs kyi bu khyod
246a7(phal chen): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul mang po sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / chos nyid rjes bsnyags su bstan pa legaso leg so// kye rgyal ba'i sras
246a8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa brgya bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad kyang mtshan mthun pa sha stag chos bstan pa 'di shin tu
246b1(phal chen): stan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stongs gis rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par shes pa rab tu thob
246b2(phal chen): par 'gyur te/ de dag kyang nged kyis thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu tshe gcig gi thos par lung bstan to// sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong
246b3(phal chen): gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag kyang ma 'ong ba'i dus na bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul
246b4(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag tu 'gyur bar nged kyis lung bstan
246b5(phal chen): to// chos bstan pa 'di yang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma thos pa'i chos thos par bya ba'i phyir nged kyis byin gyis brlab so// gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
246b6(phal chen): 'dir sems can rnams kyis ji ltar shes par gyur cing dul bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med bsam gyi mi
246b7(phal chen): khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa 'tshams med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' gtug
246b8(phal chen): pa/ thams cad ma lus pa dag tu yang tshogs thams cad rnam par bltas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs brjod cing / sangs rgyas kyis che ba nyid smos pa dang / de bzhin gsheg
247a1(phal chen): pa'i chos nyid mi 'phrogs pa yongasu brjod pa dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med cings yangs pa'i don yod par brjod pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog
247a2(phal chen): thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba smos pa dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa rab tu brtag pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad la dus ji lta ba 'bab pa bzhin
247a3(phal chen): du chos brtan pa rnam pa 'god pa yongs su mi btang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis chos snang ba mtha' dang dbus med pa yang dag par bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
247a4(phal chen): pa'i 'phral pa dang / byin gyi rlabs rnam par 'god pa chen po rab tu btan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rang bzhin cig pa'i lus mi 'khrug pa bya ba byed cing / sngon gyi
247a5(phal chen): spyod pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis mngon par bsgrub ste/ rang gi rgyud kyi mthus yang dag par blangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// /
247a6(phal chen): dpe rnams ji snyed 'jig rten kun na gang yod pa// de dag thams cad sangs rgyas gcod lam 'di dang bral// 'on kyang 'gro la pan phyir sems can btan pa'i phyir// dpe med rnams
247a7(phal chen): la don gyi tshul gyis dpe yang blad// bde gshegs bsang ba'i 'di dag tha mal dmas mi thos// bskal pargya phrag stong du de'i sgra dkon no// gang rnams brtson 'grus blo ldan shin
247a8(phal chen): tu dul gyur pa// de grangs skyes bus sangs rgyas bsang ba 'di 'dra 'thos// gang gis 'di thos gyur nas rab tu dga' 'tshar ba// des ni sngon chad sangs rgyas brgya stong bskur cing mchod/
247b1(phal chen): bde gshegs rnam kyi byin rlabs rgyal bas yongs su bzung // lha dang mis bstod mkhas pas 'gro bya ba yin// 'di ni bde gshegs 'jig rten 'das pa kun gyi sko/ rgyal ba'i
247b2(phal chen): sems can sgrol ba kun kyang 'di las 'byung // 'di ni skar po'i lam 'da' kun gyis mtha' yas rigs// de phyir bag yod gyis te 'di ni gzung bar bgyis// de bzhin gsheg
247b3(phal chen): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
247b4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu byung ba'i dpal yid dga' ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za
247b5(phal chen): dang rgya sbyin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyis mgon po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / btsang ma'i gnas dang 'khor du bcas pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems
247b6(phal chen): dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos bshad pa mngon par dga'o// // shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas
247b7(phal chen): phal po che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung ba btan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o// / bam po bdun bcu rtsa lnga pa'o//
247b8(phal chen): / bcom ldan 'das shin tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i thugs mnga' ba mi gnyis pa la yang dag par spyod pa/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la rab
248a1(phal chen): phal@#tu brten pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid bsnyed pa sgrib pa med pa thugs su chud par rtogs pa/ phyir mi ldog pa chos dang ldan pa/
248a2(phal chen): spyod yul la phrogs pa med pa/ dus gsum rnam par 'god pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mnyam pa nyid du byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du shin tu khyab pa skra mnga' ba/
248a3(phal chen): chos thams cad la the tsom mi mnga' ba'i ye shes can spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ chos kyi ye shes la nem nur mi mnga' ba rnam par mi rtog pa'i sku dang ldan pa/
248a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yang dag par gnod pa'i ye shes can sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa mi gnyis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs pa rnyed pa/ de bzhin ga shegs pa'i
248a5(phal chen): rnam par thar pa tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin pa sangs rgyas kyi sa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ na mkha'i dbyings
248a6(phal chen): mthas gtugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas rnam par spyod cing / yul ma ga ta'i chos kyi dgon pa'i snying po byang chub la pho brang 'od kun nas 'byung ba na bden seng ge'i khri bad
248a7(phal chen): mo'i snying po can la zhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
248a8(phal chen): thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu tshe gcig gis thogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams bzhan dang bzhan nas 'dus pa kun kyang byang chub sems dpa'/
248b1(phal chen): ye shes kyi tshul thams cad rab tu thob pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rnam par 'dul ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i
248b2(phal chen): chos la rab tu dgong par mkhas pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad dpyad pa'i tshul gyi ye shes 'byam klas pa la zhugs pa dgra ste/ 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i
248b3(phal chen): sa dang spyod yul dang / ye shes la spyod cing rtog pa/ spros pa thams cad yongs su chad pa/ spyod pa nye bar gzung ba/ rgyun mi mchad pas sems can thams cad yang dag par bzung
248b4(phal chen): ba la mkhas pa/ chos kyi tshul la 'jug par bya ba mtha' dang dpung med pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi las rnam par smin pa chud mi za zhing mi dmigs par brtag cing
248b5(phal chen): dpyad pa la shin tu mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba dang / dbang po dang brtsom pa dang / sbyor ba mthon dman brtag cing dpyad pa la rab tu mkhas pa 'das
248b6(phal chen): pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor skad cig gcig gi de ma thag tu rab tu thob pa la rnam par spyod pa sems kyi skad cig re re la mngon
248b7(phal chen): par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang dag par ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa dang / mi bral bar byang chub du rnam par 'tshang ba sems can cig gi sems kyi dmig pa la
248b8(phal chen): zhags pas/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems kyi dmigs pa la mkhas par khong du chud pa/ rang byung gi ye shes dngas mngon du gyur pa las mi mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa
248'a1(phal chen): la#lus dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa thob kyang rgyun mi chad pa'i spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pa/ byang chub sems dpas mngon par bya ba'i mthu
248'a2(phal chen): rgyun mi chad pa/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul la zhugs pa/ sems can cig gi don du skal ba mu med par spyod pa yongs su 'dzin par byang chub kyis rlabs la mkhas pa
248'a3(phal chen): skal pa grangs med par 'byung zhing / mthong bar dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rin po che shin tu bzang po chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi 'gro ba thams cad
248'a4(phal chen): rnam par 'dul ba'i dbyings la 'jug par mkhas pa/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i yang dag par bzung ba'i phyir
248'a5(phal chen): sngon gyis spyod pa'i mthu'i khyad par dang / smon lam phun sum tshogs pa dag ste/ de dag dang de ma yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yon tan sngags shing yongasu brjod kyang skal
248'a6(phal chen): ba mu med par mi zad mi thugs pa/ legs pa shin tu brjod pa rab tu thob pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sam+ba dpa'
248'a7(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po kun tu dmigs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu 'phrul dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu shes rab dang / byang chub sems
248'a8(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems
248'b1(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu blo dang / byang chub sems
248'b2(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shags chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs chen po 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par 'phrul pa
248'b3(phal chen): chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par 'phrul pa chen po mdzes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi rnam par mnon pa dang /
248'b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par sbyangs pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par sgyings pa chen po'i stobs dang / byang chub sems
248'b5(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po glang po che'i dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glang po che'i spos kyi glang po dang / AH sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba chen po dang /
248'b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
248'b7(phal chen): rin chen zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba kun tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems
248'b8(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang ba'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par grags pa'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
249a1(phal chen): 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba yongs su brgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
249a2(phal chen): chen po tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa'i dbang po 'brug gis dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa
249a3(phal chen): grum pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings rab tu sgrogs pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyis
249a4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jom pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnga'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
249a5(phal chen): kun tu go bar byed pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi rtogs rnam par mi rtogs pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
249a6(phal chen): bzhi rab tu sgrogs pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yan lag thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi zil gyi gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
249a7(phal chen): dpa' chen po kin taM kun nas snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan
249a8(phal chen): gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i snying po dang / byang chub sems
249b1(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla bI snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang /
249b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsang ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
249b3(phal chen): chen po pad mo'i dpal gyi snying po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul
249b4(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam du ldan pa/ smon lam dang lhags pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/ sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad kyi drung du 'gro zhing
249b5(phal chen): gsol ba 'deb pa la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul yang dag par 'dzin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs rgyun mi bcod pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba
249b6(phal chen): cig nas gcig tu lung bstan pa dang mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / ming dang zhing dang 'khor lo'i slongasu spyod pa sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas skye ba
249b7(phal chen): yongs su ston pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rab tu sel ba/
249b8(phal chen): kyis dbyings sgrib pa med pa shin tu zhugs pa/ sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas
249'a1(phal chen): #phal po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhug so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos ting nge 'dzin chen po
249'a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bal po che zhes bya ba de la snyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa na mkha'i mthas tugs
249'a3(phal chen): ba ma lus pa thams cad rnam pa drug du g.yos ste/ g.yo so rab ta g.yos so// kun tu g.yo so// 'gul to// rab tu 'gul to// kun tu 'gul to// lde go rab tu ldeg go//
249'a4(phal chen): kun tu ldeg go/ chem che ba rab tu che me che me kun tu tshem chem mo// 'ur 'ur rab tu'ur 'ur kun tu'ur 'ur ro/ shig shig rab tu shig shi go/ de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams
249'a5(phal chen): klas pa ma lus pa thams cad rab tu bskyed do// dbyangs kyis mngon par go bar byas nas ti nga nge 'dzin de las langs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
249'a6(phal chen): po kun tu shes rab kyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po 'dus par shes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smra so// kye rgyal ba'i
249'a7(phal chen): sras legs par bstan pa mdzod cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rgyun mthun pa ni gang ngo mtshur gyi 'du shes ni gang / spyod pa ni gang / dge ba'i bshes
249'a8(phal chen): gnyen ni gang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa ni gang / dbugs byin pa thob pa ni gang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba ni gang / tshul khrims ni gang / lus bstan pa ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i
249'b1(phal chen): sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa ni gang / de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa ni gang / sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa ni gang /
249'b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa ni gang / bskal pa la 'jug pa ni gang / dus gsum bstan pa ni gang / dus gsum la 'jug pa ni gang / mi skyo zhing yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i
249'b3(phal chen): sems bskyed pa ni gang / kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes ni gang / gzungs ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bstan pa rjes rtogs par bya ba ni gang / kun tu
249'b4(phal chen): bzang po'i sems bskyed pa ni gang / kun tu bzang po'i skrod pa'i chos ni gang / snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa ni gang / rkyen gang gis byang chub du sems bskyed pa'i byang chub kyi sem
249'b5(phal chen): kyi rkyen ni gang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gus pa'i sems ni gang / yongs su dag pa ni gang / pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang / shes pa khong du chud par bya ba ni gang / rab tu rtogs
249'b6(phal chen): pa ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi shugs ni gang / mnyam pa nyid ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul gyi lam ni gang / chos brtan pa ni gang /
249'b7(phal chen): yongasu bzung ba ni gang / spobs pa ni gang / mi gnas pa ni gang / sems mnyam pa nyid ni gang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'
249'b8(phal chen): rnams kyi sprul pa ni gang / byin gyi rlabs ni gang / dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu thob pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa ni gang / gnas su bya ba ni gang / brtan bskyed pa'o//
250a1(phal chen): phal#kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa brtan pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnam de bzhin
250a2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i yis chen po brtan zhing bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dgo/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rgyas kyi chos thaMd la nem nur thaMd gcod pa'i
250a3(phal chen): sems bskyed pa the tshom med cing yid gnyis med la som nyid med pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sem skyed/ sems can thams cad sbyin pas
250a4(phal chen): yongasu bsdu bar bya'o// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / bum pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' dang / btang snyom kyis yongasu bsdu bar bya'o//
250a5(phal chen): snyam yang de la de de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med yid gnyis med/ the tshom med/ de ni gnas ma yi no// 'di ni ne ma nar thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa dang po'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
250a6(phal chen): bzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad bla na med pa'i mnyes por bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad
250a7(phal chen): mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba'i sems bskyed pas mnyes par bya'o snyam yang de la de ni de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med yid gnyis med the tshom med/ de ni gnas ma yino// 'di nim nar thaMd gcod
250a8(phal chen): pa'i sems skyed pa gnyis pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'di ltar sems bskye de/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'od zer sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i rgyan gyi yongasu rgyas
250b1(phal chen): the tshom me
250b2(phal chen): bar dgango snyam yang de la de de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i ne mnar med yid gnyis med/ de ni gnas ma yi no// 'di ni ni mnar thams cad gcod pa'i sems skyed pa gsum pa'o// kye rgyal
250b3(phal chen): ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sem bskyed/ ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa mur thug par mi skyo ba'i rgyud kyi sems can tshad med pa yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can gyi kham
250b4(phal chen): grangs med pa bsam gyi mo khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa tshad med pa gzhal du med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa mu med pa/ sa 'tsham med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa grangs dang bgrang ba
250b5(phal chen): las 'das chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad bla na med pa yongasu smin par bya ba dang / bla na med pa rnam par 'dul bas yongs su smin
250b6(phal chen): pa dang / rnam par 'dul bar bya'o snyam yang de la de ltar mi 'gyur ba snyam pa'i nem nur med pa yid gnyis med pa/ de ni gnas ma yin no// 'di ni the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i sem
250b7(phal chen): skyed pa bzhi pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed des/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ smon lam thad yongasu rdzogs par bya'o//
250b8(phal chen): zhes nas de la nem nur med cing yid gnyis med pa dang / the tshom med par gnas yin te/ 'di non ma nur thad gcod pa'i sems skyed pa lnga po'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bzhan yang byang chub sem dpa'
250b9(phal chen): 'di snyam ste/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i / sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad snang bar 'gyur bas chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur bar 'gyur snyam yang de la de ltar mi 'gyur
250'a1(phal chen): pal@sems bskyed pa bstan pa ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems skyed pa ni gang / bsam gyi mi khyab pa ni gang / dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa ni gang /
250'a2(phal chen): yis rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi snyoms par 'jug pa ni gang / ril por ni gang / rnam par thar pa ni gang / mngon par shes pa ni gang /
250'a3(phal chen): rig pa ni gang / rnam par grol ba ni gang / skyed mos tshal ni gang / gzhal med khang ni gang / dga' ba ni gang / rgyan ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sem skyed pa mi 'gul
250'a4(phal chen): ba ni gang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu mi gtong ba la gnas pa ni gang / yis kyi rnam par lta ba ni gang / chos shin tu brtan pa ni gang / yongasu dag pa ni gang / phyag rgya ni gang / ye shes snang ba ni gang / byang
250'a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i gnas mtshungs pa med pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub du zhum med pa'i sems bskyed pa ni gang / lhag pa'i bsam pa ri bo lta bu ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems rnam kyi bla
250'a6(phal chen): na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub du ye shes kyi 'jug pa rgya mtsho lta bu ni gang / byang chub sems dpo'i rnam par spyod pa nin po che lta bu ni/ gang / theg pa chen po go cha rdo rje'i lta bu'i sem bskyed pa ni gang /
250'a7(phal chen): rtsom pa chen po ni gang / brtsam pa chen po mthar phyin par bya ba ni gang / dad pa mi byed pa ni gang / lung bstan pa ni gang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu sngo ni gang / yis khong du chud pa ni gang / sems bskyed pa rgya chen po mtha'
250'a8(phal chen): dang dpung med pa ni gang kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi gter ni gang / sdom pa ni gang / dbang ni gang / rnam par 'brul pa ni gang / sos can la rnam par 'phrul ba ni gang / zhing rna bar 'phrul ba ni gang /
250'b1(phal chen): chos la rnam par 'phrul pa ni gang / lus la rnam par 'phrul pa ni gang / smon lam la rnam par 'phrul pa ni gang / skrod yul rnam par 'phrul pa ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye/
250'b2(phal chen): shes la rnam par 'phrul pa ni gang / mngon par 'phrul pa ni gang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa ni gang / stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa ni gang / rnam par rtse ba ni gang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba ni gang /
250'b3(phal chen): stobs ni gang / mi 'jig pa ni gang / byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos ni gang / lam ni gang / lus ni gang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus ni gang / las ni gang / rang bzhin ni gang /
250'b4(phal chen): ngag ni gang / ngag yongs su dag pa ni gang / yongasu 'dzin pa ni ba gang gis shin tu bzung zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gis ni ngag gi las gang zhig 'grub par
250'b5(phal chen): 'gyur/ sems ni gang / sems bskyed pa ni gang / sems kyis rgyas par dgang ba ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po gang / bsam pa ni gang / lhag pa'i bsam pa ni gang //
250'b6(phal chen): sbyor ba ni gang / mos pa ni gang / 'jig rten gyi kham su mos pa la 'jug pa ni gang / bag chags ni gang / nye bar len pa ni gang / nan tan ni gang kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'grub
250'b7(phal chen): po ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las 'grol ba'i lam ni gang / skyon medang pa ni gang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos nges pa thob pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam ni gang / skyes bu dam pa'i
250'b8(phal chen): ming thob pa ni gang / lam ni gang / lam chad med pa ni gang / lam gyi chos ni gang / lam sgom pa ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' das kyilam gyi byin ni gang / rkang pa ni gang log pa ni gang /
251a1(phal chen): #/ lto ni gang / snying ni gang / snying po ni gang / go na ni dang / mtshon ma ni gang / mgo ni gang / mig ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rna ba ni gang /
251a2(phal chen): lce ni gang / lus ni gang / yid rnam par rgyu ba ni gang / 'gro ba ni gang / gnas ni gang / bstan la 'dug pa ni gang / lam ni gang / rnam par spyod pa ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'
251a3(phal chen): rnams kyi spyod yul ni gang / lta ba ni gang / rnam par lta ba ni gang / rnam par sgying ba ni gang / seng ge'i nga ro ni gang / sbyin pa yongasu dag pa ni gang / tshul skyongs su dag pa ni gang / bzod pa yongasu
251a4(phal chen): dag pa ni gong / brtson 'grus yongasu dag pa ni gang / bsam tan yongs su dag pa ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni shes rab yongasu dag pa ni gang / byams pa yongs su
251a5(phal chen): dag pa ni gang / snying rjes yongs su dag pa ni gang / dga' ba yongasu dag pa ni gang / gtang snyoms yongasu dag pa ni gang / don ni gang / chos ni gang / bsod nams kyi tshogs ni gang /
251a6(phal chen): ye shes kyi tshogs ni gang / rig pa skye ba ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos yongs su tshol ba ni gang / chos rab tu brjod pa ni gang / chos kyi nan tan ni gang /
251a7(phal chen): bdud ni gang / bdud kyi las ni gang / bdud kyi las zlog pa ni gang / sangs rgyas mthong bar bya ba ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las ni gang / nga rgyal gyi las ni gang / ye shes kyi las ni
251a8(phal chen): gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlab pa ni gang / chos kyi byin gyi rlabs ni gang / dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las
251b1(phal chen): ni gang / 'chi 'pho ston pa ni gang / mngal na gnas par ston pa ni gang / shin tu phra ba'i rgyud ston pa ni gang / cher skye ba ni gang / gad mo cher 'god pa ni gang gom pas rnam par non pa ni gang
251b2(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzhon nu 'is kun tu ston pa ni gang / brdzun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa ni gang / mngon par 'byung ba ni gang / dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba ni gang
251b3(phal chen): snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba ni gang / snying po byang chub la 'dra ba ni gang / snying po byang chub la 'dug pa ni gang / snying po byang chub la 'dug pa rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad byung ba'i chos ni gang / bdud
251b4(phal chen): 'dul ba ni gang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni gang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba ni gang chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bkor ba'i chos dkar po'i
251b5(phal chen): rnam pa ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yongasu mya ngan mda' ba chen po ni gang / de skad ces smras pa dang /
251b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu shes rab la dmigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag thams cad
251b7(phal chen): la smras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chung mi za bar bya
251b8(phal chen): ba'i phyir/ byang chub kyi sem/ kyi rgyud mthun pa dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes snyen gyi rgyu mthun pa dang / shin tu chags pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang / nan tan du bya
252a1(phal chen): #ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang / 'byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / byang chub brten pa'i phyir smon lam gyi rgyu mthun pa dang / rgya chen
252a2(phal chen): pa yang dag par bstsags pa'i phyir spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang / tshul cig tu bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang rgyu mthun pa'o// sems rab tu dad pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mchod pa
252a3(phal chen): ba rgyu mthun pa dang / pha lta bur brjod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rgyu mthun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa ste/ de dag
252a4(phal chen): la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
252a5(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mi dge ba'i 'du shes dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la byang chub kyi sa bon du 'du shes pa dang /
252a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad la byang chub kyi snod du 'du shes pa dang / smon lam thams cad la smon lam med par 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad la 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang / spyod pa thams
252a7(phal chen): cad la spyod pa med par 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'du shes pa dang / tshig du spyod pa thams cad la ngag gi lam med par 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams
252a8(phal chen): cad la phyir 'du shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gnyi su med par 'du shes pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dmas kyi ngo mtshar gyi du shes pa rnye
252b1(phal chen): dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnam 'du shes rnam par bzlog pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni// byang chub sems dpa'
252b2(phal chen): rnams kyi sbed pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du spyod pa dang / chos thams cad yongasu btsal ba'i don du skrod pa dang / bslab pa thams cad
252b3(phal chen): nan tan du bye ba'i spyod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad brtsegs pa'i don du spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig tu bya ba'i don du spyod pa dang / ye shes rab tu shes par bya ba'i don du spyod pa dang /
252b4(phal chen): bsgom pa yongasu bsgom pa'i don du spyod pa dang / zhing rgyan pa'i don du spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig dge bla shes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i don du spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la
252b5(phal chen): mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i don du spyod pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnas de bzhin gshegs
252b6(phal chen): pa'i ye shes chen po'i spyod pa'i blo na med pa yongasu rdzogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sem dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ bcu gang zhe na/
252b7(phal chen): 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems la rab tu gzhog pa'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba'i bshes gnyen dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug par byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang / chos thaMd ston pa'i
252b8(phal chen): bshes gnyen dang / sems can thaMd yongs su smin par bya ba'i la gzhol ba'i bshes gnyen dang / slob pa la rnam par gdon mi za bar byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang / 'gro ba thaMd nas gyen du bskyed pa'i
253a1(phal chen): phal#bshes gnyen dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas shing mi skyo bar byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gzhog pa'i bshes gnyen
253a2(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug cing bab par byed pa'i bshes gnyen / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen//
253a3(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad yongasu smin par bya'o snyams ste/
253a4(phal chen): brtson 'grus brtsoms pa dang / chos thams cad la gzung bar bya'o snyam ste/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongasu sbyang bar bya'o snyam ste/ brtson
253a5(phal chen): 'grus brtsoms pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i srab pa thams cad shes par bya'o snyam ste/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyes byas zad par bya'o//
253a6(phal chen): snyam ste/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad do snyam ste/ brtson 'bras
253a7(phal chen): brtsom pa dang / bdud thams cad las rgyal bar bya'o snyam ste/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / sems can thams cad 'khrug pa med par bya'o snyam ste/ brtson 'grus brtsom
253a8(phal chen): pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par bya'o snyam snyam te/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya'o snyam ste/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa'o//
253b1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsom pa pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus
253b2(phal chen): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs phyin pa 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/
253b3(phal chen): 'di ltar bdag ni byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa yin gyis/ da rung gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems la 'god do// zhes de dbugs phyin pa rab tu thob bo// bdag gi 'jig rten gyi brtsod pa
253b4(phal chen): thams cad kyi/ rtsod pa med pa la gzhol ba yin gyi da rung gzhan yang rtsod pa med par dga' ba rab tu dgod par bya'o// zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo// bdag ni byis pa'i chos las 'phags
253b5(phal chen): da rung pha rol kyang byis pa'i chos las gyen du bskyed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos la dgod par bya'o// zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo// bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba btsal ba la brtson pa yin gyis/
253b6(phal chen): da rung gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa ba tshol bar brtson po la rab tu dgod par bya'o// zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo// bdag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin gyis da rung gzhan yang pha rol
253b7(phal chen): byin pa'i lam du 'jug pa la dgod par bya'o// zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi rigasu skye ba yin gyis da rung gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi rig su skyes pa la rab tu dgod par
253b8(phal chen): bya'o dbugs phyin pa thob bo// bdag ni dngos po med pa'i chos kyi tshul la bzhugs pa yin gyi da rung gzhan yang dngos po med pa'i chos kyi tshul la dgod par bya'o// zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob po//
256a1(phal chen): phalabadag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi spong ba la brtson pa yin gis da rung gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mi spong bar brtson pa la dgod
256a2(phal chen): bar bya'o zhes dbugs byin pa 'thob po// bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub kyi smon laM yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur gyis/ da rung gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub du
256a3(phal chen): smon lam yongasu rdzogs par byed pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod mi zad par zhugs pa yin gyis/ da rung
256a4(phal chen): gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes mdzad mi zad par 'jug pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
256a5(phal chen): rnams kyi dbugs phyin pa dang / thob pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po dbugs phyin pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go//
256a6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pas kyang sems can gyi
256a7(phal chen): khams yong su smin par byed do// gzugs kyis kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do// chos ston pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do// bskal pa gnyan
256a8(phal chen): bas kyang sems can gyi khams yong su smin par byed do// gnas med pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas kyang sems can gyi khams yon
256b1(phal chen): su smin par byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'bar ba yang dag par bstan pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongasu smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi che ba nyid brjod pas kyang sems can gyi/
256b2(phal chen): khams yongs su smin par byed do// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do// thabs mkhas pa'i sbyor ba dang tshul gyi 'jig rten du smad pa sna
256b3(phal chen): tshogs kyis kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su yongs su smin par byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongasu smin par bya ba ste/ de dag gis
256b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed pa dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar byang
256b5(phal chen): chub sems mi mnyam pa'i tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rab tu 'god pa'i tshul khrims dang / byang chub sems dpa'i slab bya thams cad la nan tan du bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims
256b6(phal chen): dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba'i tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku thams cad las phyin phyogs su blta ba'i
256b7(phal chen): tshul khrims dang / chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa'i mngon par zhen pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / dbang po sdom pa'i tshul khrim so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems
256b8(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyis tshul khrims te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rgya chen po pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go//
257a1(phal chen): @#/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lung bstan pa ste/ lung bstan pa de dag gis lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
257a2(phal chen): ni/ bdag cag lung btan pa zhes bya bar shes so// bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar snying thag pa nas byang chub kyi sems phun sum tshogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang bzhin brgyud las lung
257a3(phal chen): ston pa thob po// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mi skye ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa'o// bskal pa thams cad du zhe na non pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o//
257a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nan tan du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lung bstan pa'o// de bzhini gsheg pa thams cad kyis bka' la cig tu chad par mos shing yid ches pa
257a5(phal chen): mngon par dad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par stsogs shing grib pa ni byang chub dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// sems can
257a6(phal chen): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu 'god par rtson pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lung bstan pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu med pa'i byung
257a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la ston par 'du shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung ston pa'o// sngon gyi byang chub sems kyi sman la
257a8(phal chen): rjes su bsrung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa ste/ lung bstan pa de dag gis lung bstan pa'i
257b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag cag lung stan to// zhes bya bar shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang
257b2(phal chen): zhe na 'di ltar mngon gyi smon lam la 'jug pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / yang dag par sgrub pa la 'jug pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa dang // smon lam rnam pa
257b3(phal chen): tha dad pa la 'jug pa dang / mos pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa dang / zhing gis rgyan la 'jug pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa dang / skye ba stan pa la 'jug pa'o//
257b4(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa ste/ 'jug pa de dag gis ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ong ba dang / da ltar byung
257b5(phal chen): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'jug pa dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar
257b6(phal chen): mu med pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i dbyangs kyi
257b7(phal chen): dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i sems cad 'dul ba la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i sku sna tshogs la 'jug pa dang /
257b8(phal chen): mu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i stobs dang mi 'jig pa la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni
258a1(phal chen): palabyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa ste/ 'jug pa de dag gis ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de
258a2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la
258a3(phal chen): 'jug pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / bsam pa la 'jug pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / sprod pa la rab tu 'ju
258a4(phal chen): go/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyis mngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis phyi'i mtha'i skrod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can tham
258a5(phal chen): cad kyi da ltar byung ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang nga sems can
258a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i skrod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mos pa sna tshogs kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa dang /
258a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang bag la nyal ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dus dang dus ma yin par yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
258a8(phal chen): rnam par 'dul ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa ste/ de dag gis byang chub
258b1(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
258b2(phal chen): la 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la kun nas nyon mongs par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / 'jig
258b3(phal chen): rten gyi khams la chung ngur 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la chen por 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la rdul shin tu phra mor chud par 'jug pa dang / 'jig
258b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams rnams la rab tu phra bar 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la yangs par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la 'byung bar 'jug pa dang / 'jig
258b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams rnams la sangs rgyas dang bcas par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la sangs rgyas med par 'jug pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub
258b6(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa ste/ de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go//
258b7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bskal pa la 'jug pa ste/ de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskal pa thams cad la rab tu 'jug go//
258b8(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'das pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang / ma 'ong ba'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang / grangs yod pa'i bskal pa la 'jug
259a1(phal chen): phal pa dang / grangs med pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang / grangs yod pa dang grangs med pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang / grangs med pa grangs yod pa'i
259a2(phal chen): bskal pa la 'jug pa dang / bskal pa thams cad la bskal pa gcig tu 'jug pa dang / bskal pa ma yin pa la bskal par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa thams cad skad cig gcig
259a3(phal chen): gis 'jug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po do dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bskal pa la 'jug pa rnams te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskal pa la
259a4(phal chen): 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum bstan pa te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus gsum
259a5(phal chen): shin tu ston to// bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus la 'das par snyan pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma 'ong bar bstan pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la da ltar byung bar bstan pa dang /
259a6(phal chen): ma 'ong ba'i dus la 'das par snyan pa dang / ma 'ong ba'i dus la da ltar byung bar snyan pa dang / ma 'ong ba'i dus la mi zad par snyan pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la 'das par snyan pa/
259a7(phal chen): dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma 'ong bar ston pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la dus gsum skad cig du bstan pa'o//
259a8(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum bstan pa ste/ de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams das gsum ston par 'gyur ba dag go/
259b1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsuM la 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar brda' la 'jug pa dang / tshig gi lam la 'jug
259b2(phal chen): pa dang / mngon par brjod pa la 'jug pa dang / gdags pa la 'jug pa dang / 'du shes la 'jug pa dang / legs par bsngags pa la 'jug pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa dang /
259b3(phal chen): mi zad pa la 'jug pa dang / zhi ba la 'jug pa dang / dben pa la 'jug pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsuM la 'jug pa ste/
259b4(phal chen): de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus gsum la 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum pa la 'jug pa
259b5(phal chen): ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus gsum la 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' skye zhing yongasu sgyid lug pa
259b6(phal chen): med pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya bas mi skye zhing yongasu sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems skyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes
259b7(phal chen): gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur bas mi skye zhing yongasu sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems skyed pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po
259b8(phal chen): yongasu mi skyo ba med pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar
260a1(phal chen): sems can kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang / dbang po kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang / las dang rnam par smin pa kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang / skye ba kun tu dbye
260a2(phal chen): ba'i ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang / chos kyi dbyings kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang / chos kun tu dbye ba'i
260a3(phal chen): ye shes dang / dus gsum kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang / tshig gi rgyud thams cad la ngag gi lam kun tu dbye ba'i ye sheso// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems
260a4(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes te/ de dag gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhini gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po kun tu 'byed pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur
260a5(phal chen): bdag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos thams cad mi brjed par 'dzin pa'i phyir thos pa'i gzungs dang /
260a6(phal chen): chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'byed pa'i phyir chos khong du chud pa'i gzungs pa dang / chos kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa'i gzung
260a7(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa'i phyir chos kyi snang ba rab tu 'thob pa'i gzungs dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las chos mngon
260a8(phal chen): du thos pa yongs su mi zad pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi gzungs dang / sgra skad dang tha snyed bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa'i phyir dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang /
260b1(phal chen): 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bsab gyi khyab pa shin tu ston pa'i phyir dus gsum gyi gzungs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' dang dpung med pa
260b2(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad shin tu ston pa'i phyir rnam pa sna tshogs su spobs pa'i gzungs dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba brjod du med pa thams cad du rna ba'i dbang po khyab par byed pa'i
260b3(phal chen): phyir thogs pa med pa'i rna ba mngon par bsgrubs pa'i gzungs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi bsnyengs pa la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
260b4(phal chen): cad kyi gzung so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs te/ de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis brtson par bya ba
260b5(phal chen): dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas bstan pa rjes su rtogs par bya ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar mngon par byang chub pa'i sangs
260b6(phal chen): rgyas dang / smon lam gyi sangs rgyas dang / lam rnam par smin pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi sangs rgyas dang / sprul pa'i sangs rgyas dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sangs
260b7(phal chen): rgyas dang / sems kyi sangs rgyas dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sangs rgyas dang / rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas dang / bsam pa ji lta ba'i sangs rgyas so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/
260b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas bstan pa rjes su rtogs par bya ba rnam so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i sem
261a1(phal chen): pagabaskyed pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems bskyed pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'o// sems bskyed pa de ni 'gro
261a2(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyis len pa'i phyir snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'o// sems bskyed pa de ni ci bdog pa thams cad yongs su btong ba'i phyir gtang ba
261a3(phal chen): thams cad yongs su btang ba mngon du 'gro'o// sems skyed pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon por mos pa thams cad mkhyen ye shes yid la byed pa sngon du 'gro'o//
261a4(phal chen): sems skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i srab pa thams cad yonan tan du byed pas yon tan gyi rgyan pa'o// sems skyed pa de ni skye ba'ached thams cad du nyams par mi 'gyur bas rdo rje/
261a5(phal chen): bu'o// sems skyed pa ni chos dkar po thams cad yang dag par bzhol bas rgya mtsho lta bu ste/ sems skyed pa de ni gzhan gyi sngon du spyod pa dang / ngan du smos pa'i ngag dang / tshig bzod
261a6(phal chen): ba'i ri chen po dbang po dam pa lta bu'o// sems skyed pa de ni sems can thams cad la dbugs phyin po chen po bdud pa'i phyir bde bar byed do// sems skyed pa de ni chos thams cad
261a7(phal chen): rab tu dbye ba mkhas pas mi dmigs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rtogs par khong du chud par bya'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
261a8(phal chen): kyis kun tu bzang po'i skyed pa ste/ de dag gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams myur du kun tu bzang ba'i ye shes khong du chud pas mkhas pa thos par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal
261b1(phal chen): ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos ston te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar ma 'ongs pa'i skal pa thams cad du gnas pa'i smon
261b2(phal chen): lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i cho so// ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim 'gror bya ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so// sems
261b3(phal chen): can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la mgod pa ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so// dge ba'i chos pa thams cad yang par brtsegs pa'i smon lam
261b4(phal chen): ni kun tu bzang po'i sbed pa'i chos so// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa
261b5(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i skrod pa'i choso// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so//
261b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skyed pa bzung ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so// chos thams cad yongasu tsal zhing rab tu dbye ba la mkhas par bya ba'i smon lam
261b7(phal chen): ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod
261b8(phal chen): ba'i chos so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos ste/ de dag gis smon cing mngon par brtson par byas na/ byang chub
262a1(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams myur du mngon par kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang spyod pa yongasu rdzogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go//
262a2(phal chen): / bam po bdun bcu rtsa drug pa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
262a3(phal chen): kyi snying rje chen po thob pa ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can gyis khams la rnam par lta'o// bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can
262a4(phal chen): gyi khams mgon med pa rnam la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu 'thob pa dang / sems can gyi khams theg pa med pa la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu 'thob pa dang /
262a5(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba dbul ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu 'thob pa dang / 'dod chags kyis bcings pas glags pa'i sems can gyi khams
262a6(phal chen): rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu 'thob pa dang / srid pa'i gang sa chen mtshor rab tu gzhol bar gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu 'thob pa
262a7(phal chen): dang / yun ring po nas na ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / dge ba'i chos la mos pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i
262a8(phal chen): snying rje chen po rab tu 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las shin tu 'khyams par gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu 'thob bo// kye rgyal
262b1(phal chen): kha'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po rab tu 'thob pa ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu rgyun mi mchad par sems can gyi
262b2(phal chen): khams lta ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rkyen gang gis byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen
262b3(phal chen): rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rnam par 'dul bar bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen no// sems can thams
262b4(phal chen): cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par zlog pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems rkyen to// sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad kyis stod pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to// /
262b5(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa brtsal ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to// sems can thams can la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi
262b6(phal chen): sems kyi rkyen to// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi rkyen to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi
262b7(phal chen): sems kyi rkyen to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gzugs dang / mtshan dang dpe byed bzang po yongs su bstan pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to// sangs rgyas tham
262b8(phal chen): cad kyi ye shes la 'jug cing khong du chud par byed pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to// sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang / mi snyengs pa thams cad yongasu ston pa'i rkyen ni byed
263a1(phal chen): @#chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rkyen te/ rkyen de dag gis byang chub kyi sems yang dag pa
263a2(phal chen): skye bar 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed pa des kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
263a3(phal chen): mngon par 'tshang brgya par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la ni rim gro dang bkar ti dang bsnyen bkur bya'o// de dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la rim gro dang bkar sti dang bsnyen
263a4(phal chen): bkar byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la sems bskrad pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar rim gro bya ba'i sems dang / dga' bar bya ba'i sems dang /
263a5(phal chen): ji skad bsgom pa'i bzhin ta nan tan bya ba'i sems dang / yid mi 'byung ba'i sems dang ji snyams yang mi byed pa'i sems dang / gcig tu nges pa'i sems dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la thams cad
263a6(phal chen): la rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i sems dang / smon lam cig dang ba'i sems dang / ston pa'i sems dang / sprod pa mtshungs par yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i sems te/ kye rgyal ba'i sra
263a7(phal chen): bcu po de dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la sems bsnyad pa rnam so// de sems bskrad pa bcu po 'di dag sked pa'i tshe/ yongasu dag pa bcu rab tu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhen
263a8(phal chen): 'di ltar chud ma za ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dgo pa dang / sems can ji tsam ji lta bur 'dul ba bzhin du btan pa'i phyir gzugs yongasu dag pa dang / sgra skad dang tha snyad bsam/
263b1(phal chen): byi mi khyab pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyi mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir spobs pa yongasasu
263b2(phal chen): dag pa dang / mi shes pa thams cad dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ye shes yongasu dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir skye ba yongasasu dag pa dang /
263b3(phal chen): mngon par pa snyams par sprad pa'i sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / sgrib pa'i las thams cad spang bas rnam par zlog pa'i phyir rnam
263b4(phal chen): par smin pa yongasu dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang tshul cig tu bya ba'i phyir smon lam yongs su dag pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i theg pas 'byung ba'i phyir spyod pa yongasu
263b5(phal chen): dag pa ste/ yongs su dag pa bcu po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur ro// // kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
263b6(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'dog pa thams cad yongs su btang ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims yongasu srung ba'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
263b7(phal chen): pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs kyi bsam pa mi 'khrugs par sangs rgyas kyi stobs la sbyar ba'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mos pa thams cad las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir/
263b8(phal chen): brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dran pa gcig tu byas pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i/
264a1(phal chen): @#/ phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis stobs la 'jug pa'i phyir ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam yongasu rdzogs
264a2(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa yongasasu bstan pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad yang dag par bzhol
264a3(phal chen): bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sem dpa'
264a4(phal chen): rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni shes rab kyis
264a5(phal chen): khong du chud par bya ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rnam pa tha dad pa shes pa khong du chud par byas pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi khams thams
264a6(phal chen): cad kyi rigs bsam gyi mi khyab la 'jug pa'i shes rab khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos thams cad la gcig pa dang / tha dad par yang dag par gzhol bar bya bar shes pa khong du chud
264a7(phal chen): par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings 'byam klas pa thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i shes par bya ba dang / na mkha'i dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyis klas pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya/
264a8(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams lA ma 'ong ba dus kyis 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das pa'i dus kyi 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud
264b1(phal chen): par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyod pa dang /
264b2(phal chen): smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya bas gcig tu rtogs par 'byur ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar
264b3(phal chen): byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyod pa cig gis byung ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes pa khong du chud pa
264b4(phal chen): byas ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos snang ba thams cad la dbang sgyur ba 'thob pa dang / bsams pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa thob pa
264b5(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mtshan nyid cig tu mos pas sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
264b6(phal chen): bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rab tu rtogs pa te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos thams cad la tshul cig tu rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad la tshul dang tha dad par
264b7(phal chen): rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid cig tu rtogs pa dang / sems can gyi sems dang bsam pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i ye shes rtogs pa dang / sems can
264b8(phal chen): thams cad kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa dang bag chags kyi spyod pa rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /
265a1(phal chen): / ngag la nyal pa'i spyod rtogs pa dgA sems can rnams cad kyi ge ba dang mi nga spyo pa pa sa spyog pa / zung pam
265a2(phal chen): spyod pa dang / smon lam dang / rnam par che ba dang / 'phrul ba dang / byin gyi rlabs pa thams cad rtogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus zhum pa'i mngon par sangs rgyas
265a3(phal chen): pa'i byin gyi rlabs rtogs pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rtogs pa'o// de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad
265a4(phal chen): kyi tshul mkhas pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi shugs dang / bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos
265a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pa'i stobs kyis shugs dang / chos thams cad la sprul pa lta bu'i stobs kyi shugs dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i stobs kyi shugs dang
265a6(phal chen): chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'jug pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / chos thams cad mngon par chags pa med pa'i stobs kyi shushags dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
265a7(phal chen): cad la shin tu mos pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la shin tu gus pa'i bsam pa mi tong ba'i stobs kyi shugs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
265a8(phal chen): kyi ye shes kyi rgyal po chen po mnyes par byed pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la zab par yid ches pas mi spongs pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang /
265b1(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sems las mi ldog par mkhas pa'i stobs kyi shag so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi shag
265b2(phal chen): ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang
