265b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mnyam pa nyid des/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs
265b4(phal chen): rgyas kyis zhing thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang lhag pa'i bsam pa thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'
265b5(phal chen): thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / smon lam thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / spyod pa thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang /
265b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad la mnyam pa nyid do// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'
265b7(phal chen): rnams sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa bla na med pa 'byur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi tshul
265b8(phal chen): gyis lam rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ming rtsa mo// chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni mig yor lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni btan pa
266a1(phal chen): #/ rtsam mo// chos thams cad la ni las dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni mi zad pa'i sbyor ba'o// chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha'o// chos thams/
266a2(phal chen): cad ni mtshan ma med pa'o// chos thams cad ni don dam pa'o/ chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbying so// chos kye rgyal po'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sangs
266a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi lam ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul mkhas pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba
266a4(phal chen): sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos btan pa te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar zab mo'i chos bstan pa dang / yangs pa'i chos bstan pa dang / sna tshogs
266a5(phal chen): kyi chos bstan pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brjod pa mang po'i chos bstan pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
266a6(phal chen): mngon pa bsgrub pa'i chos bstan pa dang / dus gsum dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpas bya ba'i chos bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon
266a7(phal chen): tan dang legs par rab tu brjod pa'i chos bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sgrub pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tham
266a8(phal chen): cad la dmigs pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos bstan pa stong / de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems
266b1(phal chen): dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos bstan pa chen po bla na med pa ston par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
266b2(phal chen): yongasu bzung ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nas kyi tshogs rnams yongs su bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i
266b3(phal chen): chos bstan pa rnams yongasu bzung ba dang / dpe' dang mthun par bstan pa thams cad yongs su bzung ba dang / chos kyi tshul dang / sgo thams cad yongs su bzung ba
266b4(phal chen): dang / bzungs thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo rnams yongs su bzung ba dang / the tsom thams cad yongs su gcod pa rnams yongasu bzung ba dang / byang chub sems
266b5(phal chen): dpa'i bsgrub pa thams cad yongs su bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bstan pa'i sgo rnams yongasu bzung ba dang /
266b6(phal chen): chos snang ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnams par sprul pa dang / rnam par rol pa dang / byin gyi rlabs rnams yongs su
266b7(phal chen): bzung ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bzung ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin
266b8(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po yongasu bzung ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi slob pa ste/
267a1(phal chen): 'al@#bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos thams cad la rnam par ma brtags pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la mngon par 'du byed
267a2(phal chen): ba med pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la stongs pa nyid du snang ba'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la mun
267a3(phal chen): pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams
267a4(phal chen): cad la tshig gi bye brag mkhas pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la de kho na nyid bstan pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la de kho na nyid bstan pa'i spobs pa dang / sems
267a5(phal chen): can gi sems dang spyod pa thams cad la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par byed pa'i spobs pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
267a6(phal chen): spobs pa dang / de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spobs pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal
267a7(phal chen): ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongasu smin par byed cing 'dul ba'i ye shes kyi dbang
267a8(phal chen): dang / chos thams cad snang ba rab tu 'thob pa'i dbang dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la spyod pa'i dbang dang / ye shes chen po'i dbang dang / mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims
267b1(phal chen): kyi dbang dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub tu bsngo ba'i dbang dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa thams cad las phyir mi ldog ye shes kyi dbang dang / bdud thams/
267b2(phal chen): cad shin tu 'pham par bya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang dang / gang du 'ga' bar 'gro ba'i byang chub kyi sems skyed pa'i ye shes kyi dbang dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub
267b3(phal chen): nam 'dod pa na mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang ngo // kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang ste/ de dag la gan
267b4(phal chen): shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i dbang bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub
267b5(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi mi gnas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad mi gnas pa dang /
267b6(phal chen): chos thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / bya ba thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / skye ba'i skye mched thams cad la mi
267b7(phal chen): gnas pa dang / smon lam thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / spyod pa thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /
267b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad la mi gnas pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi gnas pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub
268a1(phal chen): la@#sems dpa' rnams sems yang bar bsgyur ba yongs su dag cing bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
268a2(phal chen): bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems mnyam pa nyid de/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar bsod nams thams cad sngags pa la snyam pa nyid dang / chos
268a3(phal chen): la 'jug pa'i snyam pa nyid dang / smon lam rnams pa tha dad pas phyung ba thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyis rigs thams cad la sems
268a4(phal chen): snyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyis las rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa thams cad la sems snyam pa nyid dang / chos la 'jug pa'i skam pa nyid dang / thams cad lnga
268a5(phal chen): sems snyam pa nyid dang / zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par dag pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi mos pa la 'jug pa dang thams
268a6(phal chen): cad la sems snyam pa nyid dang / spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyis stobs dang mi snyengs pa la 'jug pa
268a7(phal chen): thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba la sems mnyam pa nyid do// kye rgyal ba'i
268a8(phal chen): sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems snyam pa nyid des/ de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs
268b1(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid rgya che zhing bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ye shes mngon par sgrub pa ste bcu
268b2(phal chen): gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs
268b3(phal chen): khong du chud par bya ba la shugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / phyogs kyi dra ba rnam par dbye ba thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la zhags pa'i ye shes
268b4(phal chen): mngon par sgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams spri tshugs su rgyu ba dang / snrel bzhis rgyu ba dang / thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon
268b5(phal chen): par sgrub pa dang / thams cad cig pa dang tha dad pa 'byam klas pa rnam par 'god pa la mkhas pa khong dri bar bya ba la zhags pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa dang /
268b6(phal chen): lus kyi rgyud thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la 'jug par zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa dang / 'du shes kyi phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi rnam pa'i
268b7(phal chen): 'du shes dang / rloms sems khong du par bya ba zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa dang / chos kyi rgyud thams cad la 'byung ba cig gis mthar thug par 'jug
268b8(phal chen): par khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gyi
269a1(phal chen): la/ gnabs 'ang tud par cas laklags pa'i legs pa ngan par bsgrub pa dang / 'grob pasas pa sa gsus du 'dus pa'i sa
269a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi rigs thams cad rgyun mi chad par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
269a3(phal chen): ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa ste/ de dag gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' chos gang la yang mgo rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di
269a4(phal chen): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sprul pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can sprul pa dang / lus sprul pa dang / zhing sprul pa dang / mchod pa sprul
269a5(phal chen): pa dang / dbyangs sprul pa dang spyod pa smon lam sprul pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba sprul pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang
269a6(phal chen): chub pa la sprul pa dang / chos bstan pa sprul pa dang / byin gyi rlabs sprul pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sprul
269a7(phal chen): ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad sprul pa yongasu rdzogs pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
269a8(phal chen): bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byin gyi brlabs te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs dang / chos kyi byin gyi brlab dang
269b1(phal chen): sems can gyi byin gyi brlabs dang / las kyi byin gyi brlabs dang / spyod pa'i byin gyi brlabs dang / smon lam gyi byin gyis brlabs dang / spyod yul gyi byin gyi brlabs
269b2(phal chen): dang / dus kyi byin gyi brlabs dang / dge ba'i byin gyi brlabs dang / ye shes kyi byin gyi brlabs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa de dag ni byang chub
269b3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi byin gyi brlabs dang / de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i byin gyi brlabs bla na med pa
269b4(phal chen): 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shin tu dbugs 'byin pa rab tu rnyed pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na kye rgyal
269b5(phal chen): ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ ma 'ong ba'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa gang ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad mnyes
269b6(phal chen): par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu thob po// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang sangs
269b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi tshul dang 'dra ba'i rim gro bla na med pa bya'o// mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bla na med pa bya'o// zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo// bdag gis
269b8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mchod nas kyang gdam ngag de yang bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang
270a1(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sar 'byung bar gyur pa dang / 'byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu gdams ngag dang / man ngag bstan pa mdzad
270a2(phal chen): kyis gdams ngag dang man ngag de yang bdag gis bsam pa thag pas rim gror byas te mnyen la yang dag par nan tan bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob
270a3(phal chen): po/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag bskal pa brjod du med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs
270a4(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob po// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan
270a5(phal chen): yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhags pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste mtsho ba med pa'i 'jig/
270a6(phal chen): pa'am grags pa med pa'i 'jig pa'am/ 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'am/ ngan song gi 'jigs pa 'am/ 'khor tu bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa yang rung ste/ de snyed kyi 'jig par 'gyur
270a7(phal chen): ba de dag thams cad ni rnam par zlog par gyur/ ring du byas par 'gyur/ rnam par bcil bar 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed ma thag ta cis kyang mi 'jigs par gyur to// mi sdang
270a8(phal chen): bar gyur to// skyi g.ya' ba med par gyur te// cis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// de bas na brtan zhing rnam par gnon la zil gyis mnon pas bdud dam mu stegs can dang / bas kyi rgol
270b1(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi mi thub par gyur to zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems skyed de/
270b2(phal chen): bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi khams thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bya'o// rab tu dgod par bya'o//
270b3(phal chen): de dag byang chub thob par gyur nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la dad pa chen po dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas tshe'i tshad kyi
270b4(phal chen): mthar thug gi bar du/ sangs rgyas la 'os pa'i rim gros mchod pa dang / bkar sti bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongasu mya ngan 'das nas kyang skra gzugs la mchod pa'i las
270b5(phal chen): kyi phyir mchod rten tshad med pa mang po bya'o// de dag gi bstan pa yongasu bsrungs par bya'o// de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su bzung bla na med pas yongasu bsrung bar bya'o//
270b6(phal chen): zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bla na med pa'i
270b7(phal chen): mdzes pas rgyan par bya/ sdud par bya/ klub par bya/ yongs su spang bar bya/ mnyam par bya/ bsgyur bar bya/ byin gyis brlabs par bya/ skrod par bya/ snang bar bya/ rdzu 'phrul
270b8(phal chen): dang rnam par 'phrul pas dgang bar bya'o// zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob po// kye rgyal po'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems skyed de/ sems can
271a1(phal chen): bal#thams cad kyi the tshom gcod par bya/ nem nur gcad pa bya'o// bsam pa yongasu sbyang bar bya'o// sems khong du chud par bya'o// nyon mongs pa rnam par
271a2(phal chen): zlog par bya'o// ngan song gi sgo gcad par bya'o// bde ba'i lam gyi sgo dbye bar bya'o// mun pa rnam par bsal bar bya'o// 'od kyi snang bar bya'o// bdud thams dang dud kyi las rnams
271a3(phal chen): rab tu gdul bar bya'o// bla na med pa'i bde ba chen po 'thob bo// 'gro ba thams cad du yang dag par bstan par bya'o// rab tu bskyed par bya'o// zhes dbugs phyin pa thob po// kye
271a4(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sam skyed pa de dag gis sangs rgyas mthong ba ni don yod pa ste/ ji tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
271a5(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blta bar 'dod pa de tsam na mthong bar 'gyur gyis bdag gis sangs rgyas mthong ba ni rgyud chad par mi 'gyur 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du
271a6(phal chen): gyur pa ni chang par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin lta bur bskal pa thams cad du skye zhing mtho
271a7(phal chen): bar dka' ba rnams las chos snyan pa yang rgyun mi mchad par 'gyur te/ de ltar bdag gis bsam pa yongasu dag pas sems skyed na/ g.yo thams cad yongs su spangs pa/ drang
271a8(phal chen): ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa'i rgyu'i rnam par med pas sems kyis skad cig re re la sangs rgyas mthong ba'i byin gyis brlabs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub
271a9(phal chen): zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rad tA thob bo//
271b1(phal chen): char chen po mngon par 'bas pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa chen po rnams par dag par bya ba'i phyir seng ge nga ro tshon pos rnam par dbel pa'i smon lam
271b2(phal chen): sems dpa' 'di ltar sems skyed des/ gang gis tshe bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang brgya ba ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam/
271b3(phal chen): par 'phrul pas brgyas par 'gang ngo // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon sangs rgyas nas kyang 'gro ba thams cad ra rer sangs rgyas skye ba yongasu bstan par bya'o//
271b4(phal chen): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi rnga chen po brdungs par bya'o// chos kyis sprin gyis chen po chos kyis dbyingasu gnas pa'i skal par
271b5(phal chen): chos ston par bya'o// 'on kyang snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gis lus la dub pa med par 'gyur ro// ngag dag sems la dub pa med par 'gyur ro// zhes dbugs phyin pa
271b6(phal chen): chen po rab tu thob po// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu thob pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams
271b7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen por mngon par 'tshang brgya ba bla na med pa thob par 'gyur bdag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos zab
271b8(phal chen): mo la 'jug pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'das pa'i dus la 'jug pa dri ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa dang po'o// 'jig rten gyi kham
271b9(phal chen): grangs pa de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus la 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi ches zab mo la 'jug pa gnyis pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'brangs pa dang /
272a1(phal chen): phala'ajig rten gyi khams yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su brtan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su dag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su shes pa rnams gang
272a2(phal chen): ji snyed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dus da ltar byung ba'i dus la 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa gsum pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sna tshog
272a3(phal chen): su 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bzhi pa'o// sems can gyi las dang rnam par smin pa sna tshogs thams cad la 'jug pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la
272a4(phal chen): 'jug pa lnga pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs la 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems
272a5(phal chen): dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa rnams kyi mtshams sbyor ba shes pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems
272a6(phal chen): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud par shes pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i
272a7(phal chen): sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos dbyings kyis klas shing na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab
272a8(phal chen): tu she so// 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu shes// chos bstan pa rab tu shes so// sems can 'dul ba rab tu shes so// de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun gyis yang rab shes te/
272b1(phal chen): 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu sheso// nyan thos kyi chos rab tu sheso//
272b2(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i chos rab tu sheso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rab tu shi so// chos de dag la'ang rnam par mi rtog pas rab tu zhugs
272b3(phal chen): nas rnam par tha dad pa ston te/ chos de dag kyang bzung ba med pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi dbyings su mdzad do// chos rnams rnam par rtog tu med par yang shes la chos de dag ji ltar de bzhin du
272b4(phal chen): rab tu ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bcu pa ste/
272b5(phal chen): de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes chen po bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sem
272b6(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi gnas pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyis spyad pa sprad do// bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa dang / rim 'gro
272b7(phal chen): bya ba la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'
272b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i smad pa spyod do/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dga' bar bya ba la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// dge ba'i rtsa ba/
273a1(phal chen): rab tu chags pa la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya ba la gnas shing byang chub
273a2(phal chen): sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sprad pa spyod do// 'gro ba thams cad yongasu mi btang ba la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// pha rol tu phyin
273a3(phal chen): pa thams cad la 'jug pa la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sprad pa spyod // byang chub sems pa'i smon lam thams cad yongasu rdzogs por bya ba la gnas shing
273a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// byang chub kyi sems tshad med pa la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mang
273a5(phal chen): par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya pa la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i skud pa sprod do// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas su bya ba
273a6(phal chen): rnams te/ gnas de dag na gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems pa'i spyod pa spyod do// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskye
273a7(phal chen): brtan pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sgrib pa'i las thams cad rnam par zlog pa'i phyir sems brtan pa skyed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa rnams
273a8(phal chen): kyi bstan pa yongasu bzung ba'i phyir sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang / bdud thams cad rab tu pham par bya ba'i phyir sems bstan pa bskyed pa dang / lus dang srog thams cad la mi lta ba'i phyir se
273b1(phal chen): brtan pa bskyed pa dang / mu stegs can dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos bzhin du tshar gcad pa'i phyir sems rten pa bskyed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongasu tshim par bya ba'i phyir
273b2(phal chen): sems brtan pa skyed pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir sems brtan pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
273b3(phal chen): dang nga na mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po thams cad yongasu gdul ba'i phyir sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang / chos zab mo rnam par sgom pa dang / nyan thos dang /
273b4(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir sems brtan pa skyed pa dang / bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas mi skyo ba'i rgyud du bya
273b5(phal chen): ba'i phyir sems brtan pa bskyed pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa brtan pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems
273b6(phal chen): dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab chen po brtan zhing bla na med pa thob par 'gyur bdag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas
273b7(phal chen): kyi chos thams cad la nam nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa the tshom med cing yid gnyis med la som gnyis med pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub
273b8(phal chen): sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can thams cad sbyin pas yongasu bsu bar bya'o// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang
274a1(phal chen): la#byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis yongs su bsdu bar bya'o snyam yang de la de de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med yid
274a2(phal chen): gnyis med/ the tshom med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no// 'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa dang po'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di
274a3(phal chen): ltar sems bskyed de ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang ji snyed du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad bla na med pa'i mnyes par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bstan bkur
274a4(phal chen): ba'i sems bskyod pas mnyes par bya'o snyam yang de yang de la de ni de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med yid gnyis med/ the tshom med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no// 'di nem nur
274a5(phal chen): thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa gnyis pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'od zer sna
274a6(phal chen): tshogs kyi dra ba'i rkyen gyi yongasu rgyas par dgod ngo snyam yang de la de de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med yid gnyis med the tshom med de/ 'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems
274a7(phal chen): bskyed pa gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa mur thugs par mi skyo ba'i rgyud kyi sems can tshad med pa
274a8(phal chen): yongasu smin par bya'i phyir sems can gyi khams grangs med pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/ tshad med pa gzhal du med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtsham
274b1(phal chen): med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod med pa grangs dang bgrang ba las 'das pa chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad bla na med pa yongasu smin par
274b2(phal chen): bya ba dang / bla na med pa rnam par 'dul bas yongs su smin pa dang / rnam par 'dul bar bya'o snyam yang de la de ltar mi 'gyur ba snyam pa'i nem nur med pa yid gnyis med pa/ de ni gnas
274b3(phal chen): ma yin no// 'di ni the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa bzhi pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'i
274b4(phal chen): sprad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ smon lam thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// zhes nas de la na ma nur med cing yid gnyis med pa dang / the tshom med pa dang / 'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod
274b5(phal chen): po'i sems bskyed pa lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam ste/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spad pa sprod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyis chos thams
274b6(phal chen): cad snang bar 'gyur bas chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur bar 'gyu ro snyam yang de la de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nar med yid gnyis med/ the tshom med de de ni gnas ma yin no// 'di ni
274b7(phal chen): nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi khong du chud par bya ba'i
274b8(phal chen): phyir chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi cho su mos par bya'o snyam yang de la de de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med/ yid gnyis med/ the tshom med/ de ni gnas ma yin no// 'di ni nim
275a1(phal chen): phal#nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i chos thams cad
275a2(phal chen): chags pa thams cad mi dmigs par tu shes shing de la nem nur mod yid gnyis med/ the tshom med pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs
275a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi bar du yang dag pa nyid la gnas pa 'di ni nim nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems skyed pa brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad/
275a4(phal chen): 'du shes kyi phyin ci log rab tu spangs pa dang / blang ba med cing dor ba med pa'i tshul gyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos shes te/ de la gzhan gyi drin mi 'jog cing nem nur med
275a5(phal chen): des yid gnyis med la the tshom med pa yin te/ 'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems skyed pa dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di
275a6(phal chen): snyam du sems ste/ 'du shes kyi phyin ci log thams cad rab tu spangs pa'i sems skad cig gcig gis ye shes cig dang gnyi su mi dmigs pa/ bgrang ba thams cad dang
275a7(phal chen): bral ba la 'dus ma byas thams cad la shin tu bzhol ba brjod pa thams cad rab tu spangs pa/ spyod yul thams cad mthar phyin pas sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mngon par
275a8(phal chen): rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par bya'o snyam yang de la de de ltar mi 'gyur ba'i nem nur med yid gnyis mod the rtsom med des/ de ni gnas ma yin no// 'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i
275b1(phal chen): sems skyed pa bcu pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ngas rgyas kyis chos thams cad gcod pa'i sems skyed pa the rtsom med cing yid/
275b2(phal chen): gnyis med la som nyid med pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad la nem nur med pa blo na med pa 'thob par 'gyur
275b3(phal chen): bdag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid de/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la bsam gyi mi
275b4(phal chen): khyab pa yin/ smon lam thams cad la bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'jug pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spad pa spyod
275b5(phal chen): pa'i tshe/ byang chub du sems skyed pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad chud mi za zhing rtog pa med pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub
275b6(phal chen): sems dpa' zab mo'i chos thams cad la'ang rab tu 'jug la/ smon lam thams cad yongasu rdzogs kyi bar du yongasu mya ngan las kyang mi 'da' ba 'di ni bsam gyi mi khyab pa lnga pa'o//
275b7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sbrid pa spyod pa'i tshe/ mngal du 'gro ba dang skyo ba dang sgom pa bdun du 'gro ba dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na gnas pa dang / mngon
275b8(phal chen): dbyang chub sems dpal par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba dang / snying po byang chub du 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
276a1(phal chen): @#/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs thams cad yongasu ston cing snying rje chen po dang / 'gro ba thams
276a2(phal chen): cad yongs su skyob pa'i smon lam gyis bar gyi yongs su rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni bsam gyi mi khyab pa drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbying
276a3(phal chen): kyi klas par sems bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / byin gyi rlabs rnams kyang yang dag par ston la sems can yongasu smin par bya ba yang rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni
276a4(phal chen): bsam gyi mi khyab pa bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma yod par 'jug pa/ mtshan ma yod pa la mtsham
276a5(phal chen): ma med par 'jug/ rtog pa med pa la rtog pa yod par ston/ rtog pa yod pa la rtog pa med par ston/ dngos po med pa la dngos pa yod par 'jug/ dngos po yod pa la dngos po med par
276a6(phal chen): 'jug/ mngon par 'du byed pa la mngon par 'du bya ba med par ston/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mngon par 'du bya ba yod par ston/ chos thams cad brjod du med pa la brjod du song
276a7(phal chen): par shes/ chos thams cad brjod du yod par la brjod du med par shes te/ 'di ni bsam gyi mi khyab pa brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi
276a8(phal chen): sems dang mnyam par shes la/ sems dang byang chub mnyam par shes te/ 'gro ba thams cad kyang sems dang / byang chub du shes mos kyi/ de'i sems phyin ci log du byur ba med/
276b1(phal chen): lta ba phyin ci log du 'byur ba med de/ 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems kyi skad cig re re zhing 'gog pa la snyom par 'jug
276b2(phal chen): kyang yang dag pa'i mngon du mi byed/ zag pa zad pa yin yang dge ba'i rtsa ba gzag pa zad par mi byed/ chos thams cad zag pa med par yang shes/ zag pa zad par yang shes//
276b3(phal chen): zag pa 'gag par yang shes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'jig rten gyi chos su 'jug ste/ 'jig rten gyi chos la sangs rgyas kyis chosu 'jug kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'jig rten gyi
276b4(phal chen): chos la rnam par mi rtog/ 'jig rten gyi chos kyi chos la rnam par mi rtog/ chos thams cad bzung ba med pa'i tshul du chos kyi dbying su'ang 'dzud la/ chos thams cad 'gyur ba med pa'i
276b5(phal chen): tshul gyis gnyis su med par shes pa 'di ni bsam gyi mi khyab pa bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gyi mi khyab pa rnams ste/
276b6(phal chen): de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsam gyi mi khyab pa bla na med pa tho bar 'gyur ba dag go// /
276b7(phal chen): bam po bdun bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub
276b8(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi dgongs steb shad pa la mkhas pa ste/ bcu gang zhen 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyis chos rnam grangs thams cad dgong ste bshad pa la mkhas pa dang / skye ba'i
277a1(phal chen): 2#mched thams cad dgongs ste bshad pa la mkhas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par
277a2(phal chen): sangs rgyab thams cad la dgong ste bshad pa la mkhas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis las kyis rnam par smin par 'jug pa de thams cad la dgong ste bshad pa mkhas pa dang /
277a3(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par spang ba dang rnam par ldang ba la dgong ste bshad pa mkhas pa dang / chos thams cad chags pa med pa'i sgo'i mthar phyin pa la
277a4(phal chen): sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyi dgong ste bshad pa la mkhas pa ste/ 'di ni dgong ste bshad pa la mkhas pa drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i dbyings
277a5(phal chen): kyi phyogs re re dang 'jig rten gyi khams 'grub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa rgyun mi chad cing mtsham med pa shes pa 'di dgong ste bshad pa mkhas pa bdun pa'o// kye
277a6(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings thams cad du phra ba dang yangs pa'i 'jug pas yongs su 'jug pa thams cad bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
277a7(phal chen): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skye ba nas bzung ste yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i bar du bzung ba rgyun 'chad pa med pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad sa
277a8(phal chen): rgyas kyis yongasu gang bar 'jug bcing sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad shin tu rnam par phye bar mthong ba 'di ni dgong ste bshang pa la mkhas brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub
277b1(phal chen): rdzog par bya ba yongs
277b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'gro ba thams cad mi 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis mya ngan las 'das par shes kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du smon lam phyir ldog par mi/
277b3(phal chen): byed pa'i di ni dgong ste bshad pa la mkhas pa dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sgras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad gzhan gyi mi 'jog par mang bshes la dge ba'i
277b4(phal chen): gshes bstan la bsten pa yang ring dumi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba yang rgyun ma bcod/ dge ba'i bshes snyan dang rgyud kyi tshul cig tu gyung ba'i dge ba'i rtsab dang
277b5(phal chen): dag par sdus cing skyed pa dang / spyong ba dang / brten par byed pa dang / rnam par gcig tu byed pa dang / rgyud kyi tshul cig tu byed pa dang / gcig tu 'byung bar byed pa dang / yongs grug
277b6(phal chen): pa dang gcig tu 'byed pa 'di ni dgong ste bshad pa la mkhas pa bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgong ste bshad pa la mkhas pa
277b7(phal chen): rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgong ste bshad pa la mkhas pa blan med 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/
277b8(phal chen): rgyal ba'i mas bcu po 'didigan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi me shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa ste/ bcu gang nan 'di ltar ning thams cad dus shes rnam par dbyegams ldan
277b9(phal chen): pa dang / sems can gyi skye ba mched la 'jug par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la 'jug par ye shes rnam par dbyen
278a1(phal chen): bltal mkhas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su shes par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi
278a2(phal chen): las dang rnam par smin pa mngon par 'du byed pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / nyan thos kyi skrod pa thams cad la 'jug par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la
278a3(phal chen): mkhas pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa thams cad la 'jug par ye shes rnam par dbya ba la mkhas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la 'jug par ye shes
278a4(phal chen): rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chos thams cad la 'jug pa ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad la 'jug
278a5(phal chen): par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa ste/ de dag la gnas
278a6(phal chen): shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad du ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po
278a7(phal chen): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgom par 'jug pa ni/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad shes pa snyom par 'jug pa dang / sems can thams
278a8(phal chen): cad kyi lus la snyom par 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad la snyom par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba thams cad la snyom par 'jug pa dang / bskal par gnas par mkhas
278b1(phal chen): kha thams cad la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bsams kyi mi khyab pa'i lus kyi rgyud kyis ting nge 'dzin rnam par ldang ba mkhas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la thams cad kyi sku la sgom
278b2(phal chen): par 'jug pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad khong du chud par bya ba dang snyom par 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi mkhas pa la snyom par 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ting nge/
278b3(phal chen): 'dzin la sems kyi skad cig gi ye shes kyi 'jug pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sems skad cig gis ye shes kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yang dag par blang ba la gnas
278b4(phal chen): shing rgyun mi gcod pa'i smon lam chen po'i ye shes mkhas pa snyom par 'jug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snyom par 'jug pa ste/ de dag
278b5(phal chen): la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad du snyom par 'jug pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag
278b6(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ril po rnams ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar ril gyi sems can dang / ril gyis zhing dang / ril gyis mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i 'gro ba dang / ril
278b7(phal chen): kyis bskal pa'i me dang / ril gyis sangs rgyas dang / ril gyis sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa dang / ril gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / ril gyis
278b8(phal chen): chos thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs su bstan pa dang / ril gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
279a1(phal chen): la@#rnams de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po'i ril po'i blan med pa thog
279a2(phal chen): bar 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par thar pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
279a3(phal chen): lus kyi rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du kha dog sna tshogs yongasu btan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams
279a4(phal chen): cad la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu rnam par thar pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad byin gyi rlabs pa'i rnam par mthar pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham
279a5(phal chen): thams cad du lus kyi rgyas 'gengs pa'i rnam par mthar pa dang / bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du phyin par bshes par bya ba'i rnam par mthar pa dang / 'jig rten
279a6(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad du sems skad cig gis 'gro ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu sangs rgyas thams cad skye ba yongasu btan pa'i rnam par tha ba dang /
279a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus cig tu shes par bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par sprul pa dang / rnam par rog
279a8(phal chen): ba dang / mi bral ba yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par mthar pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par thar pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang
279b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par thar pas rnam par rol pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang /
279b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon gyi gnas rje su dran pas mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas shing / shes pa'i mngon par
279b3(phal chen): shes pa dang / lha'i rna ba sgrib pa med pa mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyis sems dang //
279b4(phal chen): sprod pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa yongasu shes pa mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i mig thogs pa med pas rnam par lta ba mngon par
279b5(phal chen): bau sgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i byin gyi sems can rnams kyi bsam pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa ji lta ba
279b6(phal chen): bzhin du mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par lus yongs su bstan pa mngon par sgrub pa la
279b7(phal chen): mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par sems kyi skad cig gis 'gro ba mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i
279b8(phal chen): mngon par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyi mi khyab pa brgyan par byin gyi rlabs pa 'di la mkhas pa dang shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / lus kyi rgyud
280a1(phal chen): b.labarjod du med par sprul pa yongs su bstan pa mngon par bsgrub la mkhas shing shing shes par mngon par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
280a2(phal chen): brjod du med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyaso// zhes bya bar sems can gyi bsam pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa ji lta ba bzhin tu yongasu
280a3(phal chen): bstan pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing
280a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po sgrub pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'bru
280a5(phal chen): pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ sems can thams cad yongasu ston pa'i nan tan byed par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rig pa
280a6(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi las dang / rnam par smin pa mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dmigs pas dben
280a7(phal chen): zhing byed pa med pa la spros pa med pa'i sems rab tu zhi ba mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas shing shis pa'i rig pa dang / dmigs pa thams cad la zhugs pas sems cig la yang tha dad /
280a8(phal chen): du mi dmigs shing chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pas rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyi rig pa dang / dbyangs bsam gyi mi khyab pa byin gyis rlabs pas 'jig rten gyi ngam su med par go bar bya
280b1(phal chen): ba mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig pa dang / gnas thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa mngon par grub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig pa dang / skye ba la mkhas
280b2(phal chen): ba dang / mi skye ba la mkhas pa mngon par sgrub pa shes pa'i rig pa dang / 'du shes dang tshor ba'i yul thams cad rnam par bzlog pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i
280b3(phal chen): rig pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba med cing rnam par dgongs pa cig tu gyur pa/
280b4(phal chen): dang / rnam par 'god pa med pa'i tshul gyis rig pa bya ba sna tshogs tha dad pa rab tu 'du shes ste/ tshad med pa'i bskal par chos ston cing / chos kyi dbyingasu gnas pa'i tshul gyi bla na med
280b5(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'byung ba 'di ni ye shes kyi rig brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad mngon par sgra
280b6(phal chen): par 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul dang / ske ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ra ba ta shes/ rgya rab ta shes/ rkyen rab tu shes/ dngos po rab ta shes/ dmigs pa rab tu shes/ 'du byed ra/
280b7(phal chen): tu shes/ skye ba rab tu shes/ 'gog pa rab tu shes/ de kho na bstan pa rab tu shes/ gti mug dang ldan pa 'gyur ba rab tu shes/ gti mug dang bral ba rab tu shes/ phyin ci log
280b8(phal chen): rab tu shes/ phyin ci log med pa rab tu shes/ kun nas nyon mongs pa rab tu shes/ rnam par sbyang ba rab tu shes/ 'khor ba rab tu shes/ mya ngan las 'das pa rab tu shes/ dmig
281a1(phal chen): b.lapa rab tu shes/ dmigs pa med pa rab tu shes/ mngon par chags pa rab tu shes/ mngon par chags pa med pa rab tu shes/ gnas rab tu shes/
281a2(phal chen): gyen tu skyod pa rab tu shes/ zhugs pa ra ba ta shes par sgrub pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam
281a3(phal chen): kyi rnam par grol ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar nyon mongs pa las rnam par grol ba dang / nye bar len pa las rnam par grol ba dang / phung po dang khams dang skye mched las rnam
281a4(phal chen): par grol ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'da' ba'i rnam par grol ba dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa thob pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / 'gro ba'i
281a5(phal chen): zhing thams cad nas sems can gyi khams chos las gyen du skrod pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par sgrub pa mtha' dang dpung med pa'i rnam par grol
281a6(phal chen): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la gyen du skyod des/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / dus gsum thams cad skad cig gcig gi
281a7(phal chen): shes pa'i rnam par grol ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dgra ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par grol ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnam
281a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi phrin las bla na med pa sems can rnams kyi thob par byed pa dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyed mos tshal te/ bcu ga /
281b1(phal chen): zhe na 'di ltar yongs su skyo ba med pas 'khor ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / mi dga' ba med pas sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / spyod pa chen po spyod cing
281b2(phal chen): rab tu 'dzin pas bskal pa thams cad du zhe non po'i skyed mos tshal dang / rang gi khyim ltar dga' bas 'jig rten gyi khams yongasu dag pa'i skyed mos tshal dang / bdud kyi yul
281b3(phal chen): mngon par 'dul bas bdud kyi khyim thams cad kyis skyed mos tshal dang / tshul bzhin du rtogs pas ji skad du thos pa'i chos rtogs par gzhog pa'i skyed mos tshal dang /
281b4(phal chen): bdag gis pa'i yul la sbed pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / bsdu ba'i dngos bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi skyed mos tshal dang / chos bzhin yid
281b5(phal chen): la mi byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / mdor na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi
281b6(phal chen): skyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po gzhan gyi rnam par 'dul ba dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mi gtong bas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul
281b7(phal chen): po dang / rnam par rtse ba dang / byin te rlabs yongs su bstan pa'i skyed mos tshal dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos kyi lus kyi rgyas par 'gengs shing na mkha'i dbyi
281b8(phal chen): dang mnyam pa nyid tu rtogs par sems skad cig thams cad la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad du bstan skyed mos tshalo// kye rgyal
282a1(phal chen): la/ ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyed mos tshal ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongasu skyo ba med pa'i
282a2(phal chen): spod pa chen po bla na med pas dga' ba rab tu thob dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhal med khang ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar nyam
282a3(phal chen): po med pa byang chub kyi sems kyis gzhal med khang dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can gyi khams yongasu smin par byed pas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsod
282a4(phal chen): nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi gzhal med dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi sems can gi khams yongasu smin par byed pas tshangs pa'i gnas nas shi la bsam gtan
282a5(phal chen): 'cha' ba'i gzhal med khang dang nyon mongs pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi mi dgos pas gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gnas su ska ba'i lha'i gzhal med khang dang / sems kyi mi
282a6(phal chen): khom pa thob pa las rnam par bzlog pas gzugs med me'i lha'i rgyud kyis gzhal med khang dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad las gyed du spyod pas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
282a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams su bsam ste skye ba 'dzin pa'i gzhal med khang dang / sngon lhan cig spyong spyod pa'i sems can yongasu smin par byed pas la blas dang bu dang bu mo dang /
282a8(phal chen): chung ma ston pa'i gzhal med khang dang / sems can dbang phyug la chags pa rnam par blog pos gling bzhi dang / 'dzam bu gling dang / rgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
282b1(phal chen): / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dbang phyug la dbang byed pa'i gzhal med khang dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par mthar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyom par 'jug pas
282b2(phal chen): shin tu rnam par rtse ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la gnas pa'i dbang phyug la dbang sgyur bas rnam par rtse ba'i mngon par shes pa'i gzhal med
282b3(phal chen): khang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rgyan la gnas pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyal srid dang / dbang phyug bla na med pa las sangs rgyas thams cad
282b4(phal chen): kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang sgyur ba yang dag par blang zhing chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i rgyal srid bzung ba'i gzhal med khang ngo // kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag
282b5(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzhal med khang ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'gro ba thams cad du chos kyi dbang bskur bas rnam par
282b6(phal chen): 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar
282b7(phal chen): 'khrug pa med pas dran pa'i dga' ba dang / rab tu rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pas blo gros kyi dga' ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas mngon gsum
282b8(phal chen): du chos thos pa yongasu zad par mi 'gyur bas rtogs pa'i dga' ba dang / phyogs bcu med par khyab pas blo'i dga' ba dang / sems can gyi las ske mtha' yas pa kun
283a1(phal chen): @#/ tu gton pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i dga' ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis sgo gcig gi ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba 'jug pas
283a2(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba dang / thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa snyam pa med pa dang kun tu 'dzin cing sems can gzhan gyi rgyud gyis thob par byed pas bzung kyi dga' ba dang / tshig
283a3(phal chen): cig dang yi ge gcig gi skal pa brjod du med par gzhan dang gzhan du smra zhing nges pa'i tshig rgyun mi mchad par rab tu ston pas spobs pa'i dga' ba dang / sems can tham
283a4(phal chen): cad kyi lus la mtha' yas pa'i sgo rgyud du mngon par byang chub ston pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i dga' ba dang / bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun
283a5(phal chen): bar chos gcod par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dga' ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ba dang / de dag la gnas
283a6(phal chen): shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyas pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
283a7(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi brgyan te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar thub pa med pas stobs kyi rgyan dang / zil gyi mi non pas mi 'jigs pa'i rgyan dang / don brjod du med pa'i yangs
283a8(phal chen): brjod pa'i sgo brgyun mi mchad pas don gyi rgyan dang / chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi shin tu rtags pa'i chos rab tu ston pa la sgo rmongs pa bde bas chos kyis rgyan dang /
283b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bya ba'i smon lam las phyir mi ldog pas smon lam kyis rgyan dang / kun tu bzang po'i theg pas 'byung bas spyod pa'i rgyun dang / zhing thams
283b2(phal chen): cad zhing gcig tu byin gyi rlab pas zhing gi brgyan dang / zhing thams cad chos kyi sprin chen po'i char rgyas par rab tu 'bebs pos dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi brgyan dang / bska
283b3(phal chen): pa grangs med pa thams cad du spyod pa'i rgyun mi spyod pas byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan dang / sems can cig gis lus sems can ji snyed kyis lus ston cing / sems can gyi khong du chud
283b4(phal chen): bar byed pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa'i mthu las phyir mi ldog pas sprul pas sprul pa'i rgyan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byed
283b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rgyan ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis rgyan bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go//
283b6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems skyed pa mi bskul ba te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar btang ba thams cad yongasu sten zhing sbyin par byed
283b7(phal chen): pas sems skyed pa mi sbrel ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod cing nges par rtogs par bzhag pa la sems skyed pa mi sgul ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod
283b8(phal chen): cing rim 'gro bya ba'i yid la bya ba mnga' bas sems skyed pa mi skal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi 'khrugs pas sems skyed pa mi sgul ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad
284a1(phal chen): #/ yongasu mi stong pas sems skyed pa mi sgul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba rgyun mi mchod pas sems skyed pa mi
284a2(phal chen): skul ba dang / bskal pa 'gro ba thams cad dang snyam par brjod du med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas zhum par mi 'gyur/ sgyid lug par mi 'gyur zhing
284a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las phyir mi ldog sems skyed pas mi sgul ba dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pas ting tshugs pa dang /
284a4(phal chen): rtog pa med cing dag pa dang / rnam par dag sa dri ma med pa 'od dang ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad la snyen bkur ba la brtson pa/ phyir mi ldog pa mi zad pa/ mi 'phrogs pa/
284a5(phal chen): dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / mos pa chen pos 'byung ba dang ldan pas sems skyed pa mi skul ba dang / thams cad mkhyen par sbyor zhing 'byung bar lam la shin tu
284a6(phal chen): grub pas sems skad pa mi skul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / gdam ngag dang / man ngag dang / skabs po thams cad bzung zhing snyan pa yongasu
284a7(phal chen): mi spongs zhing mos por bya ba la sems skyed pa la mi sgul ba dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa mi sgul ba skye
284a8(phal chen): de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mi skal cing bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di
284b1(phal chen): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su mi stong pa la gnas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sangs rgyas dzad kyi byang chub sems/
284b2(phal chen): dpa' ljon par stan rdzogs par 'tshang brgya pa yongasu mi stong pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / rnam par 'dul ba yongasu mi gtong ba dang /
284b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdung bsob pa yongs su mi stong pa dang / dge ba'i bshes snyen thams cad la bstan pa yongasu ma stong pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
284b4(phal chen): cad du de bzhin gshegs pa snyen skur pa yongasu mi gtong ba dang / yon tan thams cad yongasu stsal ba'i phyir theg pa chen po yongasu mi gtong ba dang / sangs rgyas
284b5(phal chen): 'byung ba thams cad du tshangs par sbed pa spong shing / tshul khrims bsrung ba yongasu mi gtong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba dang /
284b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsungs yongasu btsal zhing yang dag par bzung ba la mkhas pa yongasu mi gtong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spod pa dang
284b7(phal chen): smon lam thams cad yang dag par sgrub pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrubs pa yongasu mi gtong ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byeng chu
284b8(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su mi gtong ba la gnas pa ste/ de dag la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad yongasu mi
285a1(phal chen): bal/ #gtong ba bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi rnam par lta
285a2(phal chen): ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba btan pas mkhas pa ye shes kyi rnam par lta ba dang / dus gsum gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la ye shes
285a3(phal chen): kyi rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad la ye shes kyis rnam par lta ba dang / chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi sgo la ye shes
285a4(phal chen): kyi rnam par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs ye shes kyi rnam par lta ba dang / gzugs kyi sgo thams cad la ye shes gyis rnam par lta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi
285a5(phal chen): khams thams cad du chos bstan pa ye shes kyi rnam par lta ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'jug pa la ye shes rnam par lta ba dang / phyogs bcu thams cad bsam gyi mi
285a6(phal chen): khyab pa la ye shes kyi rnam par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ye shes snang dbang chags pa med pa la ye shes kyi rnam par lta'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag
285a7(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes rnam par lta ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen pos rnam par gzigs pa
285a8(phal chen): la bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos shin tu btan pa ste// bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos thams cad
285b1(phal chen): mtha'
285b2(phal chen): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bstan pa dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur btan pa dang / chos thams cad nyon mongs pa med par btan pa dang / chos thams cad dang dbus med
285b3(phal chen): par bstan pa dang / chos thams cad gnas med par gtan pa dang / chos thams cad rdo rje lta bur btan pa dang / chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs par bstan pa dang /
285b4(phal chen): chos thams cad tu zhi bar snyan pa dang / chos thams cad 'byung ba'i lam du bstan pa dang / chos thams cad don gcig pa'i rang bzhin yongasu ma grub par bstan pa'o// kye
285b5(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos shin tu btan pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad shin tu bstan pa mkhas
285b6(phal chen): ba thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongasu dag pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu dag pa
285b7(phal chen): dang / the rtsom dang yid gnyis rnam par mthor ba yongs su dag pa dang / lta ba yongasasu dag pa dang / spyod yul yongasu dag pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos pa yongs
285b8(phal chen): dag pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i yongasasu dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rnam par spyod
285b9(phal chen): pa yongasu dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par dam bcas pa thams cad yang dag par dang / bsod nams brgya che ba'i mtshan gyi mi chen mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis
286a1(phal chen): la#/ dang ldan zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis mthar thug pa'i dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su
286a2(phal chen): dag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongasu dag pa te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos
286a3(phal chen): thams cad yongasu dag pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag rgya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal
286a4(phal chen): ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal shes kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu brtsal bsgyid lug par byed par 'gyur
286a5(phal chen): ba med cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs par 'gyur ba med la mi 'jigs mi sgeg skrag par mi byed/ smon lam las mi ldog cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
286a6(phal chen): sems skyed pa rgyud mi bcad cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu stsal ba la mthar thugs pa med pa 'di la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya dang
286a7(phal chen): po'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rang gi kun nas nyon mongs pas shin tu 'khrug par 'gyur ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' mi snyan par brjod cing ngan
286a8(phal chen): du zer la mi tshul ba dang / rna ba pa'i ngag 'byin cing sdig du byed pa dang / rdo dang dbyug pa dang / mtshon chas sdig cing 'debs kyang / de'i rgyud byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
286b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyis chos mtha' yongasu rtsal ba la skyo bar mi 'gyur ste/ bzod pa dang / mos pa mang bas spyod cing chos skyon med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i
286b2(phal chen): bzod pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya gnyis pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi
286b3(phal chen): chos zab mo thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa stan pa'i tshe/ khong nas shes pa 'jug cing mos pa dang / yid ches pa dang / dga' ba dang / mngon par dad par 'gyur ba
286b4(phal chen): 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gyur pa'i phyag rgya gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rang gi shes pas bdag shes par
286b5(phal chen): byed cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems skyed pa lhag pa'i bsam pas byung bas sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon
286b6(phal chen): par 'tshang brgya par bya'o// dga' ba dang mos pa dang / spro ba chen pos byung ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / mos pa chen po'i rgyud rnam par 'bel ba'i brtson 'grus chen pos
286b7(phal chen): 'gro ba lnga'i rgyud du 'khor zhing nyon mongs pa'i sems rab tu 'grol bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems du 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'o//
286b8(phal chen): kyi rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes su med pa la 'jug kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes las mtshams kyis brog pa mi byed cing
287a1(phal chen): bal ru / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kun tu mtha' yas pa thos shing / tshad 'dzin pa med cing /
287a2(phal chen): yi ge rnam par 'god pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes las tshams su dpogs par mi byed pa 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du 'gyur
287a3(phal chen): pa'i phyag rgya lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu shin tu mos pa yin te/ mos pa gzhan gyi mi
287a4(phal chen): thub pa dang / mos pa bzab pa dang / mos pa yangs pa dang / mos pa che ba dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pas zil gyi mi non pa dang / mos pa med pa dang / mos
287a5(phal chen): pa bstan pa dang / mos pa las mi tshugs pa'i mos pa dang ldan zhing / de la bdud thams cad dang bdud kyi rigs kyi lha thams cad dang / mu stegs zhan dang / phas kyi rgol ba
287a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi mos pa de las bzlog par mi nus shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems skyed pa las phyir bzlog par ma nus te/ de lta ba'i mos pa chen po la gnas pa'i byang
287a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i bos pa dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di ni phyag rgya drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang
287a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' mi zlog shing lus dang srog la mi lta bar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phyogs shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems skyed pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bya
287b1(phal chen): chub snang bas byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sprod pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su mi gtong la dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstan pa las phyir mi ldog pa 'di ni/
287b2(phal chen): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la gnas pa'i rigs
287b3(phal chen): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal bas nye bar rton pa byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yang rab gzhog go// ji ltar na byang chub las phyir mi ldog
287b4(phal chen): par 'gyur zhes te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sems kyi kyang rab tu 'dzin te/ 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya brgyad pa'o// /
287b5(phal chen): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems la gnas shing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa la brtson pa yin te/
287b6(phal chen): sems can thams cad la yang snying rje chen po sked cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par chos ston te/ 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par
287b7(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub du 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
287b8(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rgyud kyi tshul cig tu gyur cing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa la shin tu rtson pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa
288a1(phal chen): ba la/ ye shes kyi ye shes kyi lam byung ba la gnas pa yin te/ 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gyur pa'i phyag rgya bcu pa'o//
288a2(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag rgya ste/ phyag rgya de dag dang ldan zhing byang chub sems dpa' rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
288a3(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang brgya zhing chos kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya bla na med pa thob par 'gyur bdag gi/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
288a4(phal chen): rnams kyis ye shes snang ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi
288a5(phal chen): snang bar 'gyur ba'i ye shes snang ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad lta ba dang ye shes snang ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi shi pho ba dang / skye ba skye mched la ye shes
288a6(phal chen): snang ba dang / mdo sde'i chos kyis rnam grangs thams cad ye shes snang ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pas byang chub sems bskyed cing dge
288a7(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brtsegs pa la ye shes snang ba dang / sems can thams cad 'dul ba la ye shes snang ba dang / sems can thams cad yongasu smon par bya ba/
288a8(phal chen): dang / 'dul bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'god pa la ye shes snang ba dang / chos kyi tshul 'byam klas shing bsam gyi mi khyab pa bstan pa la ye shes snang ba dang /
288b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs pa la mkhas pa ye shes snang ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba la ye shes snang ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de/
288b2(phal chen): drag ni ye shes snang ba te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes snang ba thob par 'gyur ba dag go/
288b3(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i gnas sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / rang
288b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad dang / mtshungs pa med pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i mtha'i gnas kyis gnas
288b5(phal chen): kyang smon lam thams cad yongasu mi rdzogs kyi bar du mngon tu byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas mtshungs pa med pa dang po'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang
288b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed par byed pa yang chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis klas par sems skyed pas skyed pa byed la/ chos gang la yang mngon
288b7(phal chen): par chags pa med pa 'di na byang chub sems dpa'i gnas tshungs pa med pa gnyis pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yong byang chubo sems dpa'i sprul pa lta bu'i byang chub
288b8(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa chos thams cad rab tu zhi bas spod kyang sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad la mgo rmongs pa yang med pa 'di ni byang chub sem dpa'i gnas tshungs pa
289a1(phal chen): la / med pa gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i yid la bya bas bskal pa brjod
289a2(phal chen): med pas smon lam chen po yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i smod pa spyod kyang yongs su sko ba mi skyed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas mtshung
289a3(phal chen): ba med pa bzhi pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pas chos thams cad la mi gnas par spyod kyang /
289a4(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen par 'byung bar chos yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas mtshungs pa medo pa lnga pa'o// /
289a5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa thams cad bskal pa ma yin par shes la/ bskal pa'i grangs kyang rab tu ston te de yang dag pa de kho na bzhin
289a6(phal chen): du 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas mtshungs pa med pa drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med
289a7(phal chen): par yang shes la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir mngon par 'du bya ba'i spros pa yang rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni chub sems dpa'i gnas mtshungs pa med
289a8(phal chen): pa bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khams sum thams cad sems tsam du 'jug ste/ dus gsum ying sems du shes la sems de yang
289b1(phal chen): mtha' dang dbus med par khong du chud pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas mtshungs pa med pa brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
289b2(phal chen): can gcig gi don du yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa rab tu gzhag pa'i phyir bskal pa brjod du med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'i spyod pa la sems can gcig gi don du
289b3(phal chen): ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don du yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la dgod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i skud pa spyod kyang des su spyod pas yongasu mi spyod pa yin te/
289b4(phal chen): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas mtshungs pa med pa dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yongasu rdzogs pa la/ sems can thams
289b5(phal chen): cad kyi don du 'gyur bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par 'tshang ma rgya zhing ci srid du 'khor ba de srid du sems can gyi don gyi phyir zhing tshad med par byung
289b6(phal chen): bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu rab tu dgod par 'gyur ro snyam pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas mtshungs pa med pa bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag
289b7(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas mtshungs pa med pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la ye shes chen po mtshungs pa med pa
289b8(phal chen): gnas pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go//
290a1(phal chen): pal/ bam po bdun bcu brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang /
290a2(phal chen): chud tu zhum pa med pa'i sems skyed pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar bdud dang bdud kyi rigs kyis lha thams cad rab tu 'pham
290a3(phal chen): par byi'o snyam ste/ zhum pa med po'i sems skyed pa dang / mu stegs can gzhan dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun par tshar gcod do snyams ste/ zhum pa med
290a4(phal chen): pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / legs par bshad par sems can gyi khams thams cad tshim par bya'o snyam ste/ zhum pa med pa'i sems skyed pa dang / chos kyi dbyings
290a5(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs par bya bas pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// zhum pa med pa'i sems skyed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi
290a6(phal chen): bsod nams kyi phung po yongasu dag pa bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// yang dag par bsdu bar bya'o snyam ste/ zhum pa med pa'i sems bskyod pa dang / gter chen po bla na med pa
290a7(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rdzogs par dka' ba yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam ste/ zhum pa med pa'i sems
290a8(phal chen): skyed pa dang / gter chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rdzogs par bka' ba yongasu rdzogs par bya'o snyam ste
290b1(phal chen): zhum pa med pa'i sems skyed pa dang / sems can gi khams thams cad bla na med pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bla na med pa'i 'dul bas yong su smin par bya'o// 'dul
290b2(phal chen): bar bya'o snyam ste/ zhum po med pa'i sems skyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kha dog du ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / brgya stong du ma las 'das pa'i
290b3(phal chen): kha dog du mos pas bsgyur la/ byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam ste/ zham pa med pa'i sems srid pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub
290b4(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'di ltar sems skyed de/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'i smad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ gang la la zhig gis lus la dmigs te/ lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rna ba dang /
290b5(phal chen): sna dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang / glang po dang rta dang / rgyal srid dang / g.yog 'khor thams cad slong ba zhig bya na/
290b6(phal chen): de la bdag gis thams cad yongasasu btang bar bya ste/ sems can thams cad la yongasasu skyo ba dang ldan pa'i sems gcig kyang mi skyed do// sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
290b7(phal chen): bde ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa la re ba med cing snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang / byam pa chen po mthar gtugs pa'i sems bskyed pas lus thams cad kyang yongasu gtong snyam ste/
290b8(phal chen): zhum pa med pa'i sems skyed pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sangs rgyas
291a1(phal chen): bal#/ kyi chos thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang / zhing thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang / dus thams cad dang / na mkha'i khams/
291a2(phal chen): thams cad dang sprod par gtags pa'i khams thams cad dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams zhi ba gang ji snyed pa thams cad dang / chos dad pa de dag thams cad sems
291a3(phal chen): skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis shes par bya/ rtogs par bya mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya blta bar bya/ khong du chud par bya/ bsgom par bya
291a4(phal chen): rnam par bsgom par bya/ mngon par shes par bya/ yengs shes par bya/ rab tu spangs par bya/ mngon du bya ste/ de dag thams cad la ma rtags rnam par ma gtags/
291a5(phal chen): sna tshogs su ma byas/ rnam pa tha dad ma byas/ ched du bskyod par ma byas/ dmigs par ma byas/ sgom par mu byas/ rnam par sgom par ma byas/ gcig tu ma byas/
291a6(phal chen): gnyis su ma byas pa'i ye shes mi gnyis pa gnyis po thams cad rab tu shes pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i ye shes tshan nyid thams cad rab tu shes pa dang / rtogs pa
291a7(phal chen): med pa'i ye shes rtogs pa thams cad rab tu shes pa dang / sna tshogasu gyur pa med pa'i ye shes sna tshogs thams cad rab tu shes pa dang / rnam pa tha dad par gyur pa med pa'i
291a8(phal chen): ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad rab tu shes pa dang / 'jig rten tu gyur pa med pa'i ye shes 'jig thams cad rab tu shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khamasu phyin pa
291b1(phal chen): med pa'i ye shes 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu shes pa dang / dus su gyur pa'i med pa'i ye shes dus thams cad rab tu shes pa dang / sems can gi sar gyur pa med pa'i ye
291b2(phal chen): shes sems can gis khams thams cad rab tu shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i ye shes mngon par chags pa'i spyod yul gyi mthar thug pa
291b3(phal chen): dang / gnas med pa la bzhol ba'i ye shes gnas thams cad rab tu shes pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ye shes kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu shes pa dang /
291b4(phal chen): mi zad pa'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes zad pa thams cad rab tu shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i ye shes 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus yongasu ston pa dang /
291b5(phal chen): brjod pa dang tshig dang sgra dang dbyangs dang bral ba'i ye shes sgra dbyangs brjod du med pa rab tu brjod pa dang / rang bzhin gcig pa ye shes rang bzhin med pa rab tu rtogs pa dang / spyod yul
291b6(phal chen): gcig pa la zhags pa'i ye shes spyod yul tha dad pa yongs su ston pas brjod pa chen po'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir brjod du med pa'i chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs
291b7(phal chen): par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis chen po mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// cho 'phrul chen po dang rnam
291b8(phal chen): par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul yang 'gro ba thams cad du snyan par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni zhum pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag la byang chub sem dpa'
