318a5(phal chen): phyir ye shes kyi stobs dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyis stobs dang / phyi mi'i mthi' mur thug par rgyun chad pa med par bya ba'i
318a6(phal chen): phyir spyod pa'i stobs dang / theg pa thams cad kyi 'byung bar kun tu bstan pa dang / theg pa chen po las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir theg pa'i stobs dang / sgra'i sbubs gcig
318a7(phal chen): tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad dang 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa thams cad kun tu bstan pa'i phyir rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / sems bskyed pa thams cad la
318a8(phal chen): bya chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mi 'bral ba'i phyir byang chub kyi stobs dang / chos kyi tshig gcig brjod pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po ma lus pa
318b1(phal chen): lhag ma med pa mtha' dag rtog par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i stobs te// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs te/ de dag la/
318b2(phal chen): gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang stobs bcu dang / ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ba thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
318b3(phal chen): bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi 'jigs pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sgra thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzungs
318b4(phal chen): rab tu thob pa yin te/ de 'di snyam du shar phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs nas ston pa la la zhig bdag gi gan du byon te/ 'gro ba chen po brgya
318b5(phal chen): stong rab tu bshad par gyur na/ bdag gis de gzungs par mi nas snyam du mi sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya'ang rjes su mi mthong ngo // rgyu 'ang rjes su mi mthong bas
318b6(phal chen): mi 'jigs pa chen po'i dam pa thob cing brten la zham pa med pa'i yid kyis 'gro ba thams cad la ji 'dod pa de dris shig ces skabs 'byed pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa dang po'o//
318b7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yi ge dang brjod pa dang / sgra dang skad thams cad kyi mtshams sbyar bar rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas
318b8(phal chen): dbang bskur ba'i spobs pa thogs pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa yin te/ de dag 'di snyam du shar phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs nas
319a1(phal chen): la la zhig 'ongs te bdag la chos kyi the tshom chen po zhig dris par gyur na/ bdag gi lan mi lon snyam du mi sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyu'ang rjes
319a2(phal chen): su mi mthong ngo // rgyu'ang mi mthong bas me 'jigs pa chen po'i dam pa thob cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi dri ba yongs su dri ba ci yod pa bstan pa dang / 'jigs shing sgra ldang ba med
319a3(phal chen): par byos la gang 'dod pa de dag dris shig ces skabs 'byed pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa gnyis pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni stong pa'i chos khong du chu
319a4(phal chen): par rtogs pa yin te/ bdag dang bdag gi dang byed pa po dang byed du 'jug pa dang / tshor ba po dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / phung po dang / khams dang /
319a5(phal chen): skye mched du lta ba dang bral te/ sems na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i rjes su song ba de dag 'di snyam du bdag la la zhig gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gnos par bya ba 'am
319a6(phal chen): gcig tu mi 'gyur ram/ snyam du sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dpas mtshan ma yang rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skye bu dam pa ni bdag tu 'dzin
319a7(phal chen): pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir te/ mtshan ma'ang rjes su mi mthong bas mi 'jigs pa chen po'i dam pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngon du
319a8(phal chen): 'gro ba la rab tu bstan pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin du brlabs te/
319b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi snang bas nye bar bstan cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam dang spyod pa dang / tshul la rab tu gnas pa spyod lam rnam par mi rtags shing ji lta ba bzhin du gnas
319b2(phal chen): pas de dag 'di snyam du bdag gi spyod lam la la la zhig gis brgyal bar mi 'gyur ram de snyam du mi sems te/ byang chub sems dpas mtshan ma yang rjes su mi mthong ngo // mtshan ma
319b3(phal chen): yang rjes su mi mthong bas mi 'jig pa chen po'i dam pa thob cing 'khor gyi nang du phyin nas chos ston pa 'di ni mi 'jig pa bzhi pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'
319b4(phal chen): rnams ni lus dang ngag yid shin tu dge cing yongs su dag pa dang / gtsang ba dang gtsang sbra dang nges pa dang ldan zhing ngan par spyod pa dang / ngan du byed pa dang / ngan du smra ba dang /
319b5(phal chen): bral ba yin te/ de dag ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las la la la zhig gis brgal bar mi 'gyuraro ram snyam du mi sems te/ byang chub sems
319b6(phal chen): dpas mtshan ma yang rjes su mi mthong ngo // mtshan ma yang rjes su mi mthong ngo // mtshan ma yang rjes su mi mthong bas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing mi 'jigs pa chen po'i
319b7(phal chen): dam pa thob pas sems can gzhan chos la sbyor ba byed pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lag na rdo rje rtag tu byin bzhin 'brengs
319b8(phal chen): bas yongs su bsrung ba chen po thob cing / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin gyis rtag tu rim gror bya ba yin/ rgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jig rten gyi
320a1(phal chen): pal/ mgon po rnams kyis/ rtag tu phyag bya ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rtag tu dgongs pa yin te/ de dag 'di snyam du bdag cad la bdu
320a2(phal chen): dam bdud kyi rigs su rtogs pa'i lha 'am/ mu stegs can dang mu stegs spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu ba dag gam/ sems can dmigs pa la mngon par zhen pa la la zhig 'ongs
320a3(phal chen): shing bar chad par mi 'gyur ram zhes bya bar sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dpas mtshan yang rjes su mi mthong ngo // mtshan yang rjes su mi mthong bas 'jigs pa dang
320a4(phal chen): bral zhing mi 'jigs pa'i dam pa chen po thob pas dga' zhing yid bde ba dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa'i las thams cad la nan tan du byed pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa drug pa'o//
320a5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi sngags pa'i dran pa rab tu 'thob cing / dran pa'i dbang po mchog dang ldan pas yongs su rmongs pa med pa yin te/
320a6(phal chen): de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gis chos kyi tshig dang yi ge byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung ba la la zhig yongs su ma zin pa dang / chud
320a7(phal chen): za bar 'gyur zhing num par 'gyur ba med dam zhes bya bar sems dpa' med de/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma yang rjes su mi mthong ngo // mtshan ma yang rjes su mi mthong
320a8(phal chen): bas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing mi 'jigs pa chen po'i dam pa thob pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag pa gzung ba'i phyir nan tan du byed pa 'di ni mi 'chi/
320b1(phal chen): pa bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thabs dang shes rab dang / ye shes khong du chud par rtogs shing byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin
320b2(phal chen): pa mchog thob pas rgyun mi ma chad par sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed cing de dag sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu smon lam dang bsam pa chen po rab tu btang ste/ sems
320b3(phal chen): can rnams la snying rje'i chen po bskyed nas ched du bsam te/ 'jig rten gyi gnas 'dod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa can du skye ba bzung zhing 'dod pa'i dga'
320b4(phal chen): ba la rtse ba dang 'khor gyi longs spyod chen pos sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du bdag gis yongs su bzung ba byed kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag sems can gyi 'du 'dzi'
320b5(phal chen): gos par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang /
320b6(phal chen): spobs pa'i bar chad dam gcig tu mi 'gyur mar zhes sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis rgyu yang rjes su mi mthong ngo // kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/
320b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' lam la rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pa'i phyir chos thams cad la dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa dag ste/ de dag gis
320b8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi rnam par 'khrugs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lam la rnam par 'khrugs par 'gyur ba rjes su mi mthong ngo // rjes su mi mthong bas 'jig pa dang bral
321a1(phal chen): pa la/ #zhing mi 'jigs pa chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pas 'jig rten gyi khams gnas thams cad kyi skye ba'i skye mched du skye ba bzung bar smon lam
321a2(phal chen): rab tu 'debs te/ 'di ni mi 'jigs pa brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mnyam shing byang chub sems dpa'
321a3(phal chen): lam gnas pas theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa dag ste// de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi stobs dang shugs la gnas shing nyan thos dang rang sangs
321a4(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi cho ga dang / spyod lam yongs su ston kyang de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am gcig gis 'byung bar mi 'gyur ram snyam
321a5(phal chen): du sems dpa' med de/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyu yang rjes su mi mthong ngo // rgyu yang rjes su mi mthong bas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing mi 'jigs pa chen po'i pha rol tu
321a6(phal chen): phyin pa dam pa thob pas theg pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du ston cing / theg pa chen po'i mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa dgu pa'o//
321a7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdus pas dkar ba'i chos yongs su bsdus pa yin/ mngon par shes pa dang / bsam pa
321a8(phal chen): thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin/ rgyun chad pa med pas sangs rgyas byang chub la bstan pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin/
321b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul mngon par dbang bskur yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir spyod pa nye bar blang ba de yang rgyun mi mchad nga// ngadag 'di/
321b2(phal chen): snyam du bdag cag gi sems can yang yongs su smin par ma gyur la bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung bar ston par mi nus pa 'am/ gcig tu mi 'gyur
321b3(phal chen): ram zhe sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dpas rgyu yang rjes su mi mthong ngo // rgyu yang rjes su mithong bas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing mi 'jigs pa chen po'i pha rol tu
321b4(phal chen): phyin pa thob pas sems can yongs su smin pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su ston te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rgyun mi gcod la/ byang
321b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i smon lam chen po skye ba yang rgyan mi gcod cing byang chub sems dpas yongs su smin par bya ba yang rgyun mi gcod de 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bcu pa'o// kye rgyal
321b6(phal chen): ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi mi 'jigs pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi 'jigs pa chen po bla na med pa 'thob pa
321b7(phal chen): 'gyur ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa las kyang phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub dpa' rnams kyi byang chub
321b8(phal chen): sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma bstan par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing gta
322a1(phal chen): #pa yongs su gtong la 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin/ tshul khrims yongasu dag la tshul khrims ngan pa thams cad rab tu bstsags pa yin/ bzon/
322a2(phal chen): pa phun sum tshogs pa la bsam pa mi sgral ba yin/ brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan la/ dus thams cad du phyir mi ldog pa yin/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i ye shes
322a3(phal chen): dang ldan la/ 'khrugs pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin/ shes rab kyis shin tu byung zhing sdig pa'i lta ba dang bral ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar ma bstan
322a4(phal chen): par pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i chos te/ de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam dang mthun pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma
322a5(phal chen): 'dres pa'i chos dang po'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi khams yongs su bsdud cing 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin pa yongs su
322a6(phal chen): gtong ba'i ngang tshul can bzhin 'dzum pa snyan par smra ba/ tshig 'jam pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems mngon par dga' ba don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin la rab tu sbyor
322a7(phal chen): ga sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi don khong du chud par byed pa/ mi mnyam pa'i sems med pa/ sems can thams cad la snyoms par don du sems pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
322a8(phal chen): de ltar ma bstan par sems can gyi khams yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir nan tan du byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa ste/ de ltar bsdu ba'i dngos pa'i lam
322b1(phal chen): dang mthun pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa gnyis pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas shing rnam/
322b2(phal chen): par smin pa la re bla med par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rjes su song bar yongs su bsngo zhing 'jig rten gyis snyom par 'jug pa thams cad la zhe brdang bar med pas de/
322b3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la rab tu gnas shing / sems can gyi don du yongs su bsngo ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar ma snyan par dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad brtsams
322b4(phal chen): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes de ltar tshol zhing sems can gyi don yongs su tshol ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems
322b5(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa thob pas sems can
322b6(phal chen): thams cad rjes su 'brang zhing 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi lam la yongs su skyo ba med pa'i yid dang ldan te/ 'phags pa'i yul la mngon du ltas la nyan thos dang rang
322b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung ba las phyir mi phyogs ste/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin pa la mngon par brtson zhing bdag gi bde ba la chags pa med de/
322b8(phal chen): bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par ldang ba la mkhas pas rang gis dbang du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin
323a1(phal chen): / thob cing / 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa'i sems dang ldan te/ 'khor ba la bza' shing gi rab lta bu'i 'du shes chen po thob pa dang /
323a2(phal chen): bdud kyi khyim thams cad na gnas pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su ston cing kye mched thams cad du gzugs brnyan
323a3(phal chen): byang bar 'gyur la/ zhags pa thub pa'i rab tu byang ba thams cad kyi lta ba dang bral te 'jig rten pa'i rang bzo dang / sngags dang / gtsug lag dang / yi ge dang / shod thabs
323a4(phal chen): dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / rang gi rtsed mo dang / 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su ston cing / bud med kyi cho ga dang / mtshan ma dang / cha lugs dang / sgyu
323a5(phal chen): rtsa la thams cad kyi tshul la la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mnyam pa dang / dpyad pa dang / dri ba dang / rtag pa shin tu bstan pa'i pha
323a6(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa sems can thams cad kyi ngor blta ba dang ldan pa
323a7(phal chen): dang / rang rgyal ba thams cad kyi cho ga dang / spyod lam yongs su stobs pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'tshang rgya ba skad cig tu
323a8(phal chen): ston pa spyod pa'i rgyun yongs su mi gcod pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob kyang bstan pa med pa 'di ni byang chub sems
323b1(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i chos te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos ma 'dres pa bzhi pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
323b2(phal chen): zung dang snrel bzhi la mkhas cing ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pas/ 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas kyang
323b3(phal chen): 'khor bi'i sgo yongs su ston pa sems can med pa'i mtha'i spyod yul dang ldan yang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba ma gtang ba dang / shin tu dul ba dang /
323b4(phal chen): zhi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'bar ba sems can la yongs su ston pa/ chos kyi ye shes gcig tu sdug pa'i lus dang ldan yang sems can gyi sgo
323b5(phal chen): mtha' yas pa yongs su ston pa/ bsam gtan chen po bsam gtan 'chal yang 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad kyi rtse zhing longs spyod par sems can rnam par ston pas
323b6(phal chen): gcig tu dga' bar dga' zhing mos pa khams gsum pa thams cad las phyir ltas kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i bsam pa ma btang ba rtag tu chos kyi
323b7(phal chen): dga' bas dga' zhing mos kyang lha'i bu mo rgya phrag stong gi sgra rab tu phyung ba dang / rtse mtshan ma dang / dpe byad bzang po dang dge ba'i mchog rgya phrag stong gis rgyan pa'i lus pa
323b8(phal chen): ldan yang dbul ba thams cad kyi tshul yongs su ston pa rtag tu kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las dge ba spyad kyang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
324a1(phal chen): bal/ 'jig rten du skye ba yang yongs su ston pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes
324a2(phal chen): kyi lus las gyen du ma g.yos pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes mu med pa dang ldan pas de'i phyir dag nyan thos dang rang sangs
324a3(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi kyang khong du chud par dka' na/ sems can byis pa gzhan gyi lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o// kye rgyal
324a4(phal chen): ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus dang ngag yid ye shes sngon du 'gro ba dang ldan pa ste/ las shin tu dag par spyod cing srog gcod pa dang bral ba nas sdig pa'i
324a5(phal chen): lta ba'i bar dang bral ba byas pa phun sum tshogs shing yang dag pa'i lta ba la zhags pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro
324a6(phal chen): kha dang ldan pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa drag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems
324a7(phal chen): dpa' rnams ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong zhing sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyi len par mkhas
324a8(phal chen): pas sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal gyis sems can gyi don du yongs su skyo ba med pa'i sems dang ldan
324b1(phal chen): zhing sems can gyi khams thams cad dgrol ba la zhugs pa 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad kyi rtse zhing yongs su longs spyod pa la chags pa med pa'i yid dang ldan pas rtag/
324b2(phal chen): tu sems can rnams sdug bsngal gyi phung po las dgrol ba las ston par brtson pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar snying rje chen po'i stobs yongs su mi gtong ba 'di ni byang
324b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro
324b4(phal chen): ba thams cad du 'ongs zhing mthong na dga' ba ste/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad kyi phyag bya ba 'gro ba thams cad mthong bar smon pa/
324b5(phal chen): sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sngon nas las kyi mtha'
324b6(phal chen): kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan zhing / yongs su dag pa'i las kyi tshul gyi spyod pas de'i phyir de dag mthong bas 'gro ba thams cad mi ngoms pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar 'gro/
324b7(phal chen): ba thams cad mthong bar dga' ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal
324b8(phal chen): ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gtan pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i go cha shin tu bgos pas de dag ji ltar nyon
325a1(phal chen): la/ #/ mongs shing byis pa'i skye bo 'du 'dzi dang ji ltar brten tam nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi nang du ji ltar byin kyang rung ste/ thams cad mkhyen
325a2(phal chen): pa'i sems rin po che bzang po 'od dang ldan pa de 'jigs par mi byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ni 'di lta ste dper na rin po che chen po brgyan bzang po zhes bya ba chu dang bar
325a3(phal chen): byed pa ni pad ma'i rdzing bu ji ltar rnyog kyang rung ste nang du bcug na/ nor bu rin po che'i 'od gsal zhing bzang ba de nyid rnam par mi spongs ste/ chu de thams cad kyang rnyog pa
325a4(phal chen): med pa rab tu dang bar byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang byis pa'i skye ba'i 'du 'dzis ji ltar bstan kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che
325a5(phal chen): 'od gsal zhing snang ba/ bzang po de chud zos par mi byed de sems can de dag nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa de las zlog cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che 'od gsal zhing snang
325a6(phal chen): ba de nyid la rab tu 'god do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar nyon mongs par gyur kyang rung / byis pa'i skye bo'i 'du 'dzi dang ji ltar bstan tam/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
325a7(phal chen): tshogs kyi nang du ji ltar phyin kyang rung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che de nyid 'jigs par mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub
325a8(phal chen): sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang gi yul gyi ye shes kyi chos la dbang sgyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dab pa thob pa ste/
325b1(phal chen): rang byung ye shes kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur zhing go 'phang skyon med pa la gnas kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gnas pa ring du mi spong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa la rim/
325b2(phal chen): 'gro bya ba'i rgyun mi gcod de/ de ltar tshul phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad du dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstan pa las phyir mi ldog cing de bzhin gshegs pa la/
325b3(phal chen): rim 'gror bya ba rgyan mi gcod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
325b4(phal chen): bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ma 'dres pa bla
325b5(phal chen): na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams
325b6(phal chen): thams cad yongs su spang ba'i las dang / sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur ba'i las dang / byang chub sems dpa'i grogs thams cad dang dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig tu
325b7(phal chen): bya ba'i las dang / sems can gyi khams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i las dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mthi'i mur thugs par yongs su gsung ba'i
325b8(phal chen): las dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro yang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas mi g.yo ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi las dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer dgye ril
326a1(phal chen): / 'ad kyilas dang / pad pa'i snying pa la byang chub sems pa gzugs 'a'ar ba yangs su brdzun pa'i 'a bar kyi las dang / mya ngan las 'das /
326a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa bzung bas dkon ma chog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi mchad pa'i las dang / 'jig rten thams cad du rgyu zhing chos bstan pa dang /
326a3(phal chen): sems can gdul ba yang dag par bsgrub pa'i sprul pa'i las dang / nam 'dod pa dang nam sems bskyed pa na smon lam yongs su rdzogs pas sems can la yang dag par
326a4(phal chen): ston pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi las so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems rnams de bzhin
326a5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i 'phrin las rgya chen po bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di
326a6(phal chen): ltar 'gro ba thams cad byung ba med pas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni 'ongs pa med pa'o// 'gro ba thams cad du mi dmigs pa med pas byang chub sems dpa' lus ni 'ongs
326a7(phal chen): ba'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyis dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni bden pa ma yin pa'o// 'jig rten gyi bden par rnam par dmigs pa ji lta ba
326a8(phal chen): bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni rdzun pa ma yin pa'o// phyi ma'i mthi'i mur thug pa rgyun mi mchad pas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni rgyun mi zad pa'o// bdud thams cad
326b1(phal chen): kyi mi shig pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus ni brtan pa'o// bdud kyi rgol ba thams cad mi sgul bas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni sra ba'o// bsod nams rgya ba'i
326b2(phal chen): mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par dag par snang bas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni mtshan bzang po dang ldan pa'o// chos kyis mtshan nyid med pa'i mthar thug pas byang chub sems
326b3(phal chen): dpa'i las ni mtshan nyid med pa'o// 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skra dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas byang chub sem
326b4(phal chen): dpa'i lus ni kun tu thob pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus te de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs
326b5(phal chen): pa'i skra mi zad pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lus te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rten
326b6(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus kyis las dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad du sgo yongs su ston pa'i lus kyi las dang / kye ba thos
326b7(phal chen): cad du gnas pa'i lus kyis las dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i lus kyi
326b8(phal chen): las dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lag pa gcig gis kun tu khebs par byed pa'i lus kyi las dang / 'khor gug dang rdo rje'i ri thams cad lag pa gcig gis
327a1(phal chen): nyug mi'i lus kyi las dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rang gi lus 'jig pa dang / 'byung ba yongs su ston pa'i lus kyi las dang /
327a2(phal chen): sems can gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis yongs su 'dzin pa'i lus kyi las dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad lus med par khong du chud pas zhing yongs
327a3(phal chen): su dag pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa kun tu bston pa'i laso// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang
327a4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos 'gro ba kun gyis rnam par rig par bya ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang
327a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang bzhin ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar nan tan dang ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong bas
327a6(phal chen): bsdu ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyi len gyi len kyang yongs su mi sko bas snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin dang //
327a7(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyebs pas byam pa chen po'i rang bzhin dang / 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas bsod nams kyi rang bzhin dang / sangs rgyas thams cad
327a8(phal chen): kyi sku dang gcig tu 'dres pas ye shes kyi rang bzhin dang skye ba'i skye mched thams cad las 'das pas chos kyi rang bzhin dang / thams cad du sgo yongs su ston pas
327b1(phal chen): thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phral pa thams cad yongs su bston pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rang bzhin dang / nam 'dod pa'i dus su mngon par/
327b2(phal chen): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas byang chub kyi rang bzhin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang bzhin te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems
327b3(phal chen): dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
327b4(phal chen): rnams kyi dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can thams cad bde bar byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni 'jam pa'o// sems can thams cad
327b5(phal chen): kyi sems sim par byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni snyan pa'o// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du go bar byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
327b6(phal chen): ngag ni mi brdzun pa'o// rmi lam na yang log par mi smra bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o// brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /
327b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi mgron po thams cad zil gyis gnon pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni rgya chen po'i chos kyi rang bzhin ston pas byang chub sems dpa' rnam
327b8(phal chen): kyi ngag ni zab mo'i dbyangs su sgrogs pa'o// chos bstan pa thams cad mi zad pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni snying po dang ldan pa'o// sgra ji lta
328a1(phal chen): / ba bzhin du khong du chud pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni shin tu gsal ba'o// dus dang las dang rnam par smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du
328a2(phal chen): yongs su ston pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni rnam pa tha dad pa'o// bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par spyod pa la 'jug par byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni 'gro
328a3(phal chen): ba thams cad la 'go ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsu
328a4(phal chen): bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i ngag de la yang las rnam par dag pa bcus yongasu sbyang ba yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin
328a5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i gsung la mos pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig sngon ma thos pa la mngon par mos pa yong su dag pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad du yid du mi 'ong ba'i
328a6(phal chen): tshig yongs su spang ba'i yongs su dag pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' ngag gi nyes pa bzhi dang bral bas yongs su dag pa dang / dga' ba dang / mos pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par
328a7(phal chen): bstod pas yongs su dag pa dang / sgra chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'os pa yang dag po ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang legs pa brjod pas yongs su dag
328a8(phal chen): pa dang / bsam pa phag pas sems can gzhan la chos kyi sbyin pas bsdud pas yong su dag pa dang / klu dbyangs dang rol ma'i drung ba dang / dkrol ba'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
328b1(phal chen): la mngon par bstod pas yong su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las mngon gsum du chos thos nas rang gi lus 'bul bas yongasu dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
328b2(phal chen): chos smra ba thams cad las chos thos nas/ rim gro bya ba'i phyir bdag 'bul zhing snying thag pa nas yongasu dag pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ngag ni las rnam par
328b3(phal chen): dag pa bcu po de dag gis shin tu sbyangs par 'byung ngo // kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag de ltar yongs sbyangs pa de yang yongs su sbyangs pa de yang yongs su
328b4(phal chen): 'dzin pa bcus yongs su bzung bar 'byung ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lha'i dbang po la sogs pa lha thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'byung ba yin/ klu'i dbang po dang /
328b5(phal chen): gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / na mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang / tshangs
328b6(phal chen): pi'i dbang po la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'byung ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang po la sogs pa chos smra ba
328b7(phal chen): thams cad kyi yongs su bzung bar 'byung ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni yongasu 'dzin pa bcu pa dag gis shin tu bzung bar 'byung ngo // kye rgyal
328b8(phal chen): ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i' ngag de ltar shin tu 'brung bar 'byung ba de yang dgas pa bcu yongs su grub par byed de bcu gang shes 'di ltar sems can gyi khams yang na
329a1(phal chen): par dga' bar byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams sug par byed do// dbang po'o khams la 'jug par byed do// mos pa'i khams rnam par dag par byed do// zhon/
329a2(phal chen): mongs pa'i khams sel bar byed do// bag chags kyi khams spong bar byed do// bsam pa'i khams sbyangs par byed do// lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khams rnam par 'phel bar byed do//
329a3(phal chen): chos kyi khams rgyas par byed do// mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams yang dag par rtogs par byed de/ dgos pa bcu po de dag yongasu bsgrub bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag
329a4(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'dzin cing ston pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni sa
329a5(phal chen): lta bu'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rgya chen po rgya mtsho mtha' dbus med pa la zhugs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni rgya mtsho lta bu'o// 'jig rten las 'dra
329a6(phal chen): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu thob pa la 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dgod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni ri bo chen po lta bu'o// kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing bsam/
329a7(phal chen): bdag dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni nor bu rin po che lta bu'o// chos thams cad la rab tu rnabs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni rdo rje lta bu'o//
329a8(phal chen): bdud dang mu stegs can gzhan dang pas kyi rgol pa thams cad kyis mi skul bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ri'i rgyal po rdo rje'i 'khor yug shin tu brtan zhing mi bshig pa lta bu'o/
329b1(phal chen): rdo rje rten gyi chos thams cad kyi mi gos pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni pad mo lta bu'o// bskal pa thams cad du 'byung ba dang mthong bar dka' bas byang chub
329b2(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni med tog u dum pa ra lta bu'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi ma rigs pa'i mun pa mun nag dang / rab rib kyi rgyug pa sel ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
329b3(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems ni nyi ma lta bu'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi brjod du med pa'i phyir byang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni bar snang lta bu'o// kye rgyal ba'i
329b4(phal chen): sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rgya chen po yongs su dag pa tha
329b5(phal chen): na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad rab du
329b6(phal chen): dgrol bar bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa brtsal bar bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do// bag chags
329b7(phal chen): kyi mtshams 'brel pa thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do// chos thams cad la the tshom med pa thob par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do//
329b8(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rab tu zhi bar bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do// ngan song dang mi khom pa thams cad bcad par bya'o zhes byang chub sems
330a1(phal chen): dpa' bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa'i brlab pa thams cad la nan tan
330a2(phal chen): du bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do// sgra'i sbubs su bcug pa thams cad kyang ma lus par 'gro ba thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub tu 'tshang brgya pa bstan par bya'o/
330a3(phal chen): zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do// 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po rab tu rtogs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grags par bya'o chos kyi rnga bla na
330a4(phal chen): med pa brdung bar bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed ste/ de dag la gnas shing chub sems
330a5(phal chen): dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rgya chen po 'phrin las bla na med pa brtsom par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rgyas par
330a6(phal chen): dgang ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems shin tu yangs pa dang ldan pas na mkha'i dbyings thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / mtha' dang dbus med par khong du chud pas chos kyi dbyings
330a7(phal chen): thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / ska cig gcig tu 'dzud pas dus gsum thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / gshegs pa dang / skye ba dang / 'byung ba dang / rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
330a8(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po mngon sum du shes pas sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad du rgyas par dgang ba dang / bag chags dang dbang po na mkha' lta
330b1(phal chen): bur khong du chud pas sems can gyi khams thams cad par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyis rgyas par dgang ba
330b2(phal chen): dang / sgyu mi'i dra ba rnam pa tha dad pa lta bur khong du chud pas mtha' dang dbus med par rgyas par dgang ba dang / rang bzhin mi dmigs pas mi skye bar rgyas par dgang ba dang / rang gi sems
330b3(phal chen): dang gzhan gyi sems la thogs pa med pas bag chags pa med pa rgyas par dgang ba dang / sems bskyed pa thams cad la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub yongs su ston pas dbang gis rgyas
330b4(phal chen): par dgang ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis rgyas par bgang ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas
330b5(phal chen): kyi chos thams cad kyis rgyas par dgang ba mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rgyan bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang
330b6(phal chen): po ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar dad pa phyir ldog pa med pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni dga' bar byed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
330b7(phal chen): cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni mngon par mos pa'o// bya ba thams cad la thogs pa med pas byang chub sems rnams kyi dbang ba ni
330b8(phal chen): phyir mi ldog pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul khong du
331a1(phal chen): du chud pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang ba ni shin tu za ba'o// sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa yongs su grub par byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
331a2(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni rgyun mi 'tshod pa'o// chos thams cad la rab turno pa'i byer byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni rdo rje lwa bu'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
331a3(phal chen): yul la snang ba thob pa'i 'phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni rdo rje'i 'od 'tho ba ltar snang bar byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgyu dang lus gcig tu byur bar byang
331a4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni tha dad pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni chags pa med pa'i mthar phyin dang//
331a5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po rgya chen po yongs su
331a6(phal chen): rdzogs pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams
331a7(phal chen): kyi bsam pa 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid la bya ba dang / ma 'dres pa
331a8(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rjes su song ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su 'byung
331b1(phal chen): ba'i lam dang mthun pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa bdud dang mu stegs can gzhan dang mu stegs spyod pa'i rgol ba thams cad kyi mi 'phrog pa dang / byang chub sems
331b2(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dag pas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
331b3(phal chen): bsam pa ji skad du thos pa yongs su mi gtong bas shin tu zin par yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa skye ba'i skye mched kyis ma gos pas yongasu
331b4(phal chen): nyams pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ye shes phra ba zhugs pa'i phyir zab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
331b5(phal chen): cad shin tu brtson pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i
331b6(phal chen): dgongs pa bla na med pa yongs su rdzogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di/
331b7(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa la phyir mi ldog par dbang gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag
331b8(phal chen): pa'i bsam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i tshul brtan pa la nem nur med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa smon lam dang /
332a1(phal chen): spyod pa chen po'i rgyun yong su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad la 'dug par bya ba la phul du/
332a2(phal chen): byin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas mngon gsum du gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bas
332a3(phal chen): pa chos sna tshogs kyi tshul rab tu zhugs pas rgya che ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bai rnams pa thams cad mthar phyin par byed par gtso bor gyur pa dang / byang chub sems
332a4(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan thams cad la dbang sgyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bas
332a5(phal chen): pa mngon gyi smon lam gyis yongs su bzung bas shin tu ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang gdul ba
332a6(phal chen): la rgyun mi chad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas tha~Md
332a7(phal chen): kyi lhag pa'i dgongs pa bla na med pa yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// bam pa rgyad bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
332a8(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar rnam par smin pa la re ba med par bdog pa thams cad yongs su btong bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i sbyor ba dang /
332b1(phal chen): gzhan la brnyas pa med pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyang ba'i yon tan dang / sdom pa dang rtul zhugs dang / dka' thub thams cad du yid dam
332b2(phal chen): bcas pa la nan tan byed pa'i sbyar ba dang / bdag dang pha rol gyi 'du shes med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnod sems kyi tha ba dang bshe ba thams cad rna ba la bzod cing
332b3(phal chen): sems can gyi ngan du byas pa thams cad bzod pa'i sbyor ba dang / lus dang ngag dang sems yang dag par bskul bas brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
332b4(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa thams cad las phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang / 'dod pa'i 'khrug pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i g.yog 'khor yongasu mi spong bas byang chub
332b5(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba dang /
332b6(phal chen): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi nan tan gyi sbyor ba dang / sems can mod pa la zhugs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams
332b7(phal chen): kyi byams pa chen po'i sbyor ba dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rang gi lus kyi len pa'i snying rje chen
332b8(phal chen): po las phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyar ba dang / chags pa med par khong du chud pas 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stong
333a1(phal chen): bcu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i sbyor ba dang / sems can gzhan gyi rgyud du phyin par byas pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi
333a2(phal chen): ldog pa'i sbyor ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
333a3(phal chen): chen po'i sbyor ba bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar bsgrub par dka' ba'i/
333a4(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyor bas rlabs po che'i mos pa dang / rgyan sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pas sna tshogs kyi mos pa dang / yid zhum pa med pas rgya chen po'i mos pa dang / chos zab mo'i
333a5(phal chen): tshul la bzhugs pas zhi bar byed pa'i mos pa dang / sems rgya chen bskyed pas yang ba'i mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyi mthu dang shugs su ldan pas/ rang gis skabs phye
333a6(phal chen): ba'i mos pa dang / bdud kyi las thams cad rab tu 'joms pas mi 'phrogs pa'i mos pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa gcig tu nges pas shin tu gdon mi za ba'i mos pa dang /
333a7(phal chen): ci 'dod pa'i cho 'phrul yongs su ston pa mngon du gyur pa'i mos pa dang / stobs dang mi ldan pa med pa'i phyir dus gang du 'dod par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas/
333a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyang lung snyan pa yang dag par nod pa'i mos pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa te/ de dag la gnas shing byang
333b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi
333b2(phal chen): khams su mos pa la 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khams gcig tu mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu 'jig
333b3(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad du mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad pad+mo'i bden la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su khyab par mos
333b4(phal chen): pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad namakha'i rang bzhin du yang dag par mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis brgyan
333b5(phal chen): par mos pa la 'dug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi rgyas par gang bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de/
333b6(phal chen): sbubs su gcig tu dgos par mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sems gcig gi lus kyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rte/
333b7(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi byang chub kyis yongs su rgyas par gang bar mos la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sgra'i dbyangs gcig gi
333b8(phal chen): sgo bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sgra skad rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug pas tshim par bya bar mos pa la 'jug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang
334a1(phal chen): rngubamams dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gi khams su mos pa la 'jun pa/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sas
334a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing la mos pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi khams su mos pa la 'jug ste/
334a3(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad rang bzhin gyis lus med par mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyis khams thams cad sems can gcig gi sa lus
334a4(phal chen): kyi rgyud du 'du bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i khong du 'dus par mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams
334a5(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad du sems can cig gi lus yongs su zhugs par gyur par mos pa la 'jug pa dang /
334a6(phal chen): sems can gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon pa
334a7(phal chen): dang / ci 'dod pa dang / gang mos pa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / cha byad du mngon par blta bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad nyan thos dang rang
334a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyis gzugs dang kha dog dang / cha byad du yongs su brtan par mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyis yongs su
334b1(phal chen): dran par byin gyis brlabs pa yang su bstan par mas pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang / mtshan dang / dpe byed pa la
334b2(phal chen): po dang / gzugs kyi sku sna tshogs kyi spyod lam dang / tshul dang spyod pa yongasasu bstan cing gzhan gyis rig par bya bar mas pa la 'jug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub
334b3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgyes pa dang khyu mchog gis
334b4(phal chen): mthu phyung ba bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bag chags te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar byang chub sems kyi
334b5(phal chen): bag chags dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i bag chags dang / sangs rgyas lta ba'i bag chags dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongasu dag par
334b6(phal chen): skye ba'i bag chags dang / sprod pa'i bag chags dang / smon lam gyi bag chags dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i bag chags dang / chos mnyam pa nyid nges pas rtogs pa'i bag chags dang /
334b7(phal chen): spyod pa tha dad pa'i bag chags so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bag chags te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyon mongs pa'i
334b8(phal chen): bag chags ma lus par spangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen pos bag chags thugs su chud pa bla na med pa thob par gyur pa dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa 'di dag
335a1(phal chen): / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nye bar len pa ste/ nye bar len pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa'o// bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar yongs su smin
335a2(phal chen): pa'i mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir sems can gyi khams nye bar len pa dang / lhag pa med par yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar len pa dang / byang chub sems dpa
335a3(phal chen): spyod pas nyes par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa nye bar len pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag par sdu ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar
335a4(phal chen): len pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po nye bar blangs te rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po nye bar len pa dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa
335a5(phal chen): bde ba la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir byams chen po nye bar len pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar len pa dang / sgo thams cad yongs
335a6(phal chen): bstan pa'i phyir thabs mkhas pa nye bar len pa dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phyir byang chub nye bar len pa dang / mdor na thams cad mngon sum du shes pas mngon par bya
335a7(phal chen): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad nye bar len pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nye bar len pa ste/ nye bar len pa de dag
335a8(phal chen): gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi gcod cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye bar len pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni
335b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nan tan te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i nan tan dang / bslabs pa'i nan tan dang / ye shes kyi nan tan dang / don gyi nan tan dang /
335b2(phal chen): chos kyi nan tan dang / mngon par bsgrub pa'i nan tan dang / yang dag par bstan pa'i nan tan dang / spyod pa'i mi skyo ba'i nan tan dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya
335b3(phal chen): nan tan dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i nan tan no// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nan tan te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'
335b4(phal chen): rnams chos thams cad kyi nan tan bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po d+ma dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'grub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar dag
335b5(phal chen): bi'i bshes gnyen la byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dka' la mngon par yid ches pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub
335b6(phal chen): pa'o// dam pa'i chos la mi spong ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o// tshad med pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas su dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bsngo ba mi zad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
335b7(phal chen): rnams 'grub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul sa 'tshams med par yid ches pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul la 'jug pa ni sangs
335b8(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi yul las mi g.yo ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o// bdud kyi yul las chen du spags pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
336a1(phal chen): @rnams 'grub pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul rjes su dran pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yul la/
336a2(phal chen): mngon par mos pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi grub pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems
336a3(phal chen): dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po 'grub pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas
336a4(phal chen): kyi chos las gol ba'i lam te// de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' yongasu spangs par bya ba dag go/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi tshwa/
336a5(phal chen): las gol ba'i lam mo// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jig pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i spyod pas skyo ba ni sangs rgyas
336a6(phal chen): kyi chos gol ba'i lam mo// 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pas yangasu skyo ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo// mnyam par gzhags pa la gnas su byed pa ni
336a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo// dge ba'i rtsa ba la chags shing zhen pa ni sangs rgyas kyis chos las gol ba'i lam mo// dam pa'i chos spangs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
336a8(phal chen): las gol ba'i lam mo// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las dpar pas 'byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyasu 'dod pa ni sangs
336b1(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo// byang chub sems dpa' la zhe sdang zhing khong khro ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub
336b2(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam rnams te/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spang bar bya'o// de dag yongasu spangs nas de'i 'og tu byang
336b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa nyid du 'da' bar 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyon med
336b4(phal chen): pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mngon par bsgrub pa la/ sems can thams cad la 'ang rnam par lta ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang yang
336b5(phal chen): bral la/ lta ba'i cing bas glags pa thams cad kyang rab tu 'grel pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad kyang yid la mi byed la/ mtshan ma la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can thams cad
336b6(phal chen): kyang mi 'dor ba dang / khams gsum pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams las kyang rnam par bzlon
336b7(phal chen): la sems can rnams dang phrad cing 'grogs pa dang / chos lus kyang 'dod chags dang bral la sems can thams cad la yang snying rje chen pos byams pa dang / dngos po thams
336b8(phal chen): cad kyis kyang dben la 'khor thams cad kyang yongs su stan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams las kyang gyen du 'phags pa la skye zhing shi pho ba'i spyod pa yang mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
337a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyi kyang ma gos la 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad la'ang thog pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang mngon du gyur la spyod pa dang /
337a2(phal chen): smon lam chen po'i nyi ma yang rgyun mi gcod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyon med pa la 'phags pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'gro ba
337a3(phal chen): thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang ma 'dres pa te/ skyon med pa de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'
337a4(phal chen): chos nges pa rnams thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i chos nges pa thob pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta
337a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig su skyes pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi yul las gnas pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i las la zhugs pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa yin/
337a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rgyud byung ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung las skyes pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs la gnas pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub du rjes su song ba yin/
337a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad dang sku dang rang bzhin cig yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par spyod pa dang mi gnyis pa yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa de dag ni byang chub sems
337a8(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i chas nges pa 'thob pa ste/ de dag ni skyon med pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thob pa dag go/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu ba
337b1(phal chen): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chas la 'byung ba'i lam ste/ bcu gang nan 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang rgyud kyi nul gcig tu gyur pa dang / dge pa'i rtsa ba kun nas
337b2(phal chen): du mas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / tshul 'thun zhing smon lam chen po la dbugs byin pa thob pa ni
337b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo// sems rgya chen pos rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i go 'byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo// las ji ltar byas pa chud mi za bas
337b4(phal chen): bskal pa grangs su thams cad du mi skye ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo// phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa thams cad du yongs su 'dzin pas 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med
337b5(phal chen): pa'i gnas med par bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo// sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun
337b6(phal chen): mi gcod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo// snying rje chen po bskyed de sems tshad med par byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo// na mkha'i dbyings thaMd sems
337b7(phal chen): bskyed pa gcig gis rgyas par dgang bar spyod pa dang smon lam chen pa'i khyad par la 'jug pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo// sngon byar bsgrub pa chud mi za bas nga bzhin
337b8(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo// 'gro ba thams cad la byang chub kyi sems yongs su ston cing byang chub sems skyed pa na/
338a1(phal chen): #/ kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad nye bar ston pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam ma// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sas
338a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi las 'byung ba'i lam te/ de dag gi byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams skyes bu dam pa'i ming bcu 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub
338a3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi skyes bu dam pa'i ming thob te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar byang chub kyi ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/ thog pa chen po la rab
338a4(phal chen): tu gnas pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba yin/ chos dam pa mngon par rtogs pas sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/ cho ga gi chos mngon par 'tshang rgya bas mchog gi sa
338a5(phal chen): dpa' zhes bya ba yin/ ye shes kyi khyad par rab dang ldan pas rab kyi sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/ phul du brtson 'grus brtsams pas phul gyi sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/ gong/
338a6(phal chen): na med pa'i chos yang dag par ston pas bla na med pa'i sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/ stobs bcu'i ye shes yangs pa dang ldan pas stobs kyi sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/ 'gre
338a7(phal chen): ba thams cad dpe med pas mi mnyam mi 'dra ba'i sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/ nams 'dod pa'i sems kyi skad cig la byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas bsam gyi
338a8(phal chen): mi khyab pa'i sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyes bu dam pa'i ming 'thob pa rnams so//
338b1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar gcig pu grogs med par byang chub kyi sems mi stong pas byang chub
338b2(phal chen): rnams kyi las gcig la rten pa dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi mngon par bsgrubs byang chub sems rnams kyi lam yan lag gnyis pa dang stong pa nyid kyi sbyor ba dang / mtshan
338b3(phal chen): ma med pa'i mtha'i rtse mor phyin pa dang / smon pa med pa'i phyir khams gsum dang / mi 'dres pas byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam gsum dang / nyes pa bshegs pa'i tshul dang bsod
338b4(phal chen): nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab pa'i rim gro rgyun mi gcod pa dang / yongs su ston pa la mkhas pas shin tu bsngo ba'i phyir byang
338b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i lam spyod pa bzhis mos pa dang / dang pa'i rtsa ba tshugs te/ shin tu bstan pa dang / brtson 'grus chen po las mi ldog pa dang / dran pa rtse gcig dang /
338b6(phal chen): 'dzin gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa dang / rab tu rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi spyod yul la mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam dbang po lngas rnam par spel ba dang / 'di
338b7(phal chen): lta ste lha'i mig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi shi 'pho dang skye ba thams cad yongs su mthong ba'i rang
338b8(phal chen): bzhin dang ldan pa dang lha'i rna bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos ston pa nyan cing dran par bya ba dang / yongs su bzung bar bya bas sems can pha rol gyi dbang
339a1(phal chen): @/ la yangs dag par phyin par byed pa dang / bdag gi sems chags pa med pas pha rol gyi sems shes pas mthong ba la dbang bskur
339a2(phal chen): ngamangon par bsgrubs pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pas bskal pa grangs med pa thams cad rjes su dran zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'bel bar byed pa dang
339a3(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos bsgrubs pas sems can ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du tshe 'bral sna tshogs yongs su ston cing sems can thams cad la chos brjod pa
339a4(phal chen): dang / zag pa zad pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mthong zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub pa rgyun mi gcod pas byang chub sems dpa'
339a5(phal chen): rnams kyi lam mngon par shes pa drug gis rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'di lta ste sems can gyi gtso bo mtha' yas thams cad skra'i rtse mo cig la bzhugs par mthong ste/ yang
339a6(phal chen): dag par yongs su bzung zhing sems can gzhan gyi bsam pas rnam par rig par bya ba la 'jug pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi
339a7(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas ma g.yos pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mngon du zhal nas chos brtan pa skrag pa mi zad pas
339a8(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po ji lta ba bzhin tu rnam par rig par bya ba la 'jug pas chos rjes su dran pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
339b1(phal chen): dpa'i tshogs mthong ba dang / mi 'bral zhing 'gro ba thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i lus yongs su ston pas dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'/
339b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba la yang dag par gzhol zhing gtong ba chen pos rnam par spel ba yid la byed pas gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dang
339b3(phal chen): mi 'bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'gro ba thams cad la stobs pas tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / dga' ldan gyi pho brang gi mchog na byang chub sems dpa'i tshe gcig
339b4(phal chen): gis thogs pa bzhugs pa rjes su dran pas lha rjes su dran pa dang / thabs kyi ye shes chen pos 'gro ba thams cad yongasu smin par byas pa dang / gdul rgyun mi 'chad
339b5(phal chen): pa la zhugs te sems can rjes su dran pa'i phyir dge 'dun rjes su dran pas byang chub sems dpa' rjes su dran pa bdun gyi mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'di lta ste log par lta
339b6(phal chen): ba thams cad yongs su spangs pas yang dag pa'i lta ba'i lam du byung ba dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang yongs su rtog pa dang bral bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
339b7(phal chen): mthun zhing don yod la yid la bya ba med pas byung ba dang / ngag gi nyes pa bzhi dang bral bas 'phags pa dang / mthun zhing yang dag pa'i ngag rab tu brjod pa dang / lus kyi
339b8(phal chen): las thams cad sems can nye bar 'tshe bas 'gro ba thams cad thogs pa med par yongs su smin par byed cing 'dul bas mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la/
340a1(phal chen): rab tu gnas shing spungs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa byang chub kyi lam dang ldan pa'i spyod lam dang spyod pa dang tshul la rab tu gnas shing thams
340a2(phal chen): cad du kha na ma tho ba med pas yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub kyis kun nas gdungs pa dang / yongs su
340a3(phal chen): gdungs pa yang dag par ston cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rang bzhin rdzogs pa med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / sgra thams cad 'dzin cing
340a4(phal chen): dran pa 'jig rten gyi rnam par 'khrugs pa thams cad kyi bar du mi chod pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i ti nge 'dzi
340a5(phal chen): thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad dang ldan
340a6(phal chen): zhing byang chub dang mthun par gyur pa dang / 'di lta ste 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / ngag gi las thams cad kyis ma bsgrib pas chos ston pa'i tshul dang
340a7(phal chen): ldan pas rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa bstsags pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i yes la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i bsam pa yongs su mi gtong zhing dgra
340a8(phal chen): bzed zer dang bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bas dga' ba'i yid bde ba yang rgyun mi mchad cing 'jig rten pa'i bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / bral/
340b1(phal chen): ngas 'phags pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang / 'thun pa dang / mi gso ba'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par zhugs par mngon par bsgrag
340b2(phal chen): pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams su skyes pa las ma g.yos par 'du shes pa dang / tshor ba thams cad 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas mngon par bsgrub
340b3(phal chen): shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub pa rgyun mi gcod pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mthar kyi spyod cing / snyoms par 'jug pa dgus mngon par bsgrubs pa dang
340b4(phal chen): 'di lta ste gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang / rgyu dang
340b5(phal chen): rnam par smin pa yongs su len pa shin tu rtogs pa dang / dbang po ji lta ba bzhin tu chos ston cing go bar byed pas sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi dbang po rab dang tha ma shes
340b6(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyi shin tu brtags pa dang / khams tha dad pa dang / khams du ma la mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang rab dang / 'bring la mos pa rab tu rtogs pa'i chos kyi tshul la zhugs
340b7(phal chen): pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang / zhing dang / dus dang / bskal pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang gzugs kyi rgyas par dgang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul yod
340b8(phal chen): su brtan pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrubs pa yongs su mi gtong ba dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jugs pa dang /
341a1(phal chen): kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba thams cad las rnam par ldang ba dus la bab pa dang / dus la ma bab pa rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi tshul
341a2(phal chen): gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa la rab tu gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang / shi 'pho ba dang / las kyi rgyud dang / 'pho bar
341a3(phal chen): dad pa'i gnas la mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang / dus gsum gyi bskal pa grangs pa thams cad skad cig du gzung ba rtogs pa'i ye shes snang bas mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'gro ba thams/
341a4(phal chen): cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags dang / bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba byang ba thob pa'i ye shes kyi mngon par bsgrub pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spod pa bsgrub pa mi gto//
341a5(phal chen): bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rab tu rtogs pa la yang dag par btang ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub
341a6(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi lam te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lam la mkhas pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag
341a7(phal chen): go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni tshad med pa'o// lam gyi tshogs ni tshad med pa'o// lam sgom pa ni tshad med pa'o// lam rgyan pa ni tshad me/
341a8(phal chen): pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de la bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam tshad med pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar na mkha'i dbyings
341b1(phal chen): tshad med pa dang / mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang / mi zad pa'i sems can gyi khams tshad med pa dang / mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
341b2(phal chen): tshad med pa dang / mi zad pa'i bskal pa grangs pa tshad med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi tha snyad mtha' yas shing tshad med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshad
341b3(phal chen): med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dbyangs tshad med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
341b4(phal chen): tshad med pa te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam tshad med pa rnams so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ na mkha'i
341b5(phal chen): dbyings ji rtsam du tshad med pa de tsam du tshad med par byang chub sems dpa' lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o// ji ltar chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par
341b6(phal chen): de ltar mtha' dang dbus med par byang chub sems dpa' lam gyi tshogs yongs su sdu bar bya'o// ji ltar sems can gyi khams mi zad pa ji ltar mi zad par byang chub sems
341b7(phal chen): dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa de ltar mu med par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o//
342a1(phal chen): @ji ltar bskal pa grangs su 'grang zhing brtan pa mi zad pa'o// de ltar 'gro ba thams cad du mi zad par byang chub sems dpa'
342a2(phal chen): lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o ji ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi tha snyad mtha' yas pa de ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi phra sgra dang tha snyad la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par
342a3(phal chen): bsgrub pa mtha' yas par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi ye tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o// ji ltar de bzhi gshegs pa'i sku tshad med pa de ltar 'gro ba dang zhing dang dus
342a4(phal chen): dang sems can dang / bskal pa thams cad du rgyas par 'byings shing tshad med par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o// ji ltar sangs rgyas
342a5(phal chen): kyi gsung gi dbyangs tshad med pa de ltar byang chub sems dpas tshig gi lam cig brjod pas chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par khyab cing sems can gyi khams
342a6(phal chen): thams cad go bar byed pa'i lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi bstan pa'i byang chub
342a7(phal chen): sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o// ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad med par bya te byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bcu
342b1(phal chen): bar bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam gyi tshogs de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye/
342b2(phal chen): shes mtha' dang dbus med par thob par gyur pa dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bsgom pa te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di
342b3(phal chen): ltar lus dang ngag dang sems kyis mi longs pa med pas blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa sgom pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu 'jug pa'i ye shes dang
342b4(phal chen): ldan pas bsnan pa med pa dang / 'bri ba med pa bsgom pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'jug pa med pa sgom pa med pa dang / rnam par bsgom pa med pa bsgom pa dang / mngon par
342b5(phal chen): shes pa thams cad dang bral bas sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / sgra snyan dang / bzugs brnyan dang / smig sgra dang / chu zla lta bur bsgom pa dang / khams
342b6(phal chen): gsum pa'i bsod nams blta bas bsags pa bstsal ba'i phyir stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa bsgom pa dang
342b7(phal chen): chos su gdags pa rnam par dgod pa dang bral ba brjod du med pa dang / smos su med pa dang / bshad du med pa bsgom pa dang / chos thams cad la zhugs pa'i ye shes
343a1(phal chen): mngon gsum dang ldan pas chos kyi dbyings tha dad pa bsgoms pa dang / de kho na nyid dang de bzhin nyid na mkha'i mtha' dang / mnyam pa khong
343a2(phal chen): du chud pas de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma nyams par bsgoms pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa'i stobs rgyun mi mchad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes yangs
343a3(phal chen): bsgoms pa dang / chos thams cad mngon gsum du gyur te the tsom med de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi snyengs pa bzhi dang / tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa
343a4(phal chen): dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtshungs pa med pa sgom pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bsgom pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing
343a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsgom pa la mkhas bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po'i de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam
343a6(phal chen): kyi lam gyi rgyan te/ bcu gang zhe na kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa'i khams nas kyang mi g.yo la gzugs dang gzugs med pa la spyod pa'i
343a7(phal chen): bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi dbang gis mi sngo ba 'di ni lam gyi rgyan dang po'o//
343a8(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi lam mngon sum du gyur ye shes la zhugs kyang lam des 'byung ba yang ma yin pa 'di ni lam gyi
343b1(phal chen): brgyan gnyis pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi lam mngon sum du gyur pa'i ye shes snang ba la mkhas kyang snying rje
343b2(phal chen): chen po'i stobs rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni lam gyi rgyan gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan zhing
343b3(phal chen): g.yog 'khor lha dang mi rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing / lha'i bu mo brgya stong gis rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba'i sgra byung ste/ brjod
343b4(phal chen): pa la spyod kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa
343b5(phal chen): mi 'dor ba 'di ni lam gyi brgyan bzhi pa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi rtse rga la dga' dgod pa sems can dang
343b6(phal chen): 'dres shing 'bur ldog pa med kyang sems kyi skad gcig cig la yang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid mi 'dor ba 'di ni lam gyi rgyan lnga pa'o//
343b7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad dang / madres shing 'jig rten gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna
343b8(phal chen): yang sems can bsgral ba'i phyir pha rol tu mi 'gro ba lam yang mi gtong ba 'di ni lam gyi brgyan drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems
344a1(phal chen): dab mang dag pa ji lta babazhin gyi ye shes snang ba la 'azhugs pa'i lam la gnas kyar lam ngan par thugs pa'i sems/
344a2(phal chen): tsar phyir bzlog pa'i myur lam ma yin pa dang / lam ngan pa yang gnon la lam des 'khor ba 'dzin pa yang ma yin te/ des dag par yang mi sems
344a3(phal chen): dpa' 'di ni lam gyi brgyan bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu tshul khrims legs par bsrungs pa dang ldan zhing de bzhin
344a4(phal chen): gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la rten cing / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi mtha' kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan yang tshul khrims ngan pa dang ldan pa'i
344a5(phal chen): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir so so'i skye bo tha ma la pa'i spyod pa thams cad ston cing / byang chub sems dpa'i lam la brten pas bsod nams
344a6(phal chen): kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin yang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang
344a7(phal chen): mi khom pa dang dbul bar skyes pa'i lam du zhugs pa'i sems can thams cad rnam par ldog pa'i phyir de dag gi lam du skyes pa yang ston la lam de dag la yang dag
344a8(phal chen): par gzhol ba yang ma yin pa 'di ni lam gyi rgyan rgyang pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la
344b1(phal chen): gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la ye shes snang bas rnam par lta bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
344b2(phal chen): kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang lus gcig tu gyur pa// sems can thams cad kyi snying po'i tshul can dgongs pa'i
344b3(phal chen): snang ba khong du chud pa/ theg pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul mngon par mos pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid
344b4(phal chen): du 'ongs pa// sems can gyi khams thams cad kyis ngor blta ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi slob dpon du bya ba yin yang chos yongs su btsal bya ba
344b5(phal chen): rgyun mi gcod cing ngo mtshar gyis yongs su zin par snang bas srid zhu'i lam thams cad la gnas te/ mkhan po dang slob dpon du ston kyang de nyid 'gro ba thams cad
344b6(phal chen): kyi slob dpon du gyur pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni zabs mkhas pa dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa'i
344b7(phal chen): lam la shin tu gnas pa yin pas// de dag ni thabs gang dang gang gis
345a1(phal chen): @#sems can rnams 'dul bar gyur pa de dang de'i thabs sems can rnams la yongs su ston te 'di ni lam gyi brgyan dbu/
