399b1(phal chen): brjod byas kyang // dpe rtsam bya bar mi nus legs par brjod cing btan par mi nus 'on kyang go/ sems can phan pa'i don du sangs rgyas yul rnams bstan par bya bsnyan par byos//
399b2(phal chen): gang zag 'gro ba rnams kyis don phyir dge ba kun 'dzin dkar po 'phel byed kyang // mtho bar mi sems dma' bar sems med mi smin dman chos tshol ngom par yongs mi 'gyur//
399b3(phal chen): 'gro ba kun gnas don gnyer chu klung ye shes mtsho chen shes rab shing dong ste// ston pa'i mkhas pa de dag rnams ni sa ltar 'gro ba thams cad 'tsho ba yin// byams pa rlan yin snying
399b4(phal chen): rje rtsa ba dga' ba sdong po snyan pa ston pa ste// ze ba ye shes dri ni tshul khrims bzang po lo ma me tog yon tan can// sangs rgyas 'od kyi rab tu rgyas byos blo gros ldan pa sems can gang
399b5(phal chen): byed pa// de dang de dag pad mo lta bur 'dus byas ma gos 'gro ba rnams la snang // sa bon sa bzhi bsam pa byams dang snying rje dag pa'i rtsa ba ste// sdong po shes rab thams cad ni yal
399b6(phal chen): ga lcug ma dag ni pha rol phyin pa lnga// bsam gtan shes rab mngon shes me tog rgyas pa kun khyen ye shes 'bras bu te// chos kyi dbyings mchog rdzu 'phrul bya 'khod de dang des ni 'jig
399b7(phal chen): rten gsum po khebs// rims kyi kyar yangs yongasu spel la lus yid bden rnams ni bkang ba ste// dran pa 'drin pa spyod mchog shes rab sgo yin rnam par 'grol ba dge/ stong pa
399b8(phal chen): dung ngam sul dang bug yin byams dang snying rje dag ni mi gnyis te// de dag seng ge lta bur 'gag med sgra byin bdud ste rab tu klag par byed// 'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor
400a1(phal chen): la#/ ba'i 'brog dgon nyon mongs mi khyeb gyur te/ bdud kyi bya ma rtag dang rkun bor bcas pas thig cigati mug mdongs gyur pa// lam ni rab
400a2(phal chen): tor mi khas sems can mthong nas de dpon mkhas pa de dag ni// lam gyi mthar khrid 'jig pa med pa'i grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu 'god// 'gro ba dag ni 'dod
400a3(phal chen): chags zhe sdang mun pa nyon mongs sna tshogs nad tab cing // yun rings nas ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal rab 'bar ba// sems can mthong nas snying rje skyed des nyon
400a4(phal chen): mongs pa'i nad pa kun gso zhing // nad rnams zhi bar byed stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi dam pa dag kyang ston// rgyal po lta bu de dang de dag 'khor rnams 'gar byed 'gro/
400a5(phal chen): la chos kyang ston// sdig pa spongs la dge la sten cing sangs rgyas yon tan rnam kyang tshol cig ces// rkang gnyis dbang po'i chos kyi yul la kun mkhyen ye shes
400a6(phal chen): dpor dbang bskur// rgya chen byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung nas de dag 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i nor// tshul khrims lte ba ting 'dzin mu khyud brgyan pa'i ye shes
400a7(phal chen): 'odod dang shes rab mtshon// ye shes rno ba'i bzhung can nyon mongs byams shing bdud kyi sde rnams dkrug byed pa// chos kyi sgron ma che sbyin mchog rnams de dang de dag
400a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas skor ba'i 'khor lo mchog rnams bskor cing pha rol rgol ba dag dang mu stegs cad 'joms// ye shes chu ni zab cing mi zad shin tu rgya chen chos kyi ro dang
400b1(phal chen): ldan rtsa byang chub yan lag de bzhin bsam gtan rin chen gang ba 'gro kun shes par dka'// thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi mtha' rlabs yas yul rnam dag cing
400b2(phal chen): lhag bsam dge/ de dang de dag ye shes rgya mtsho mtshungs med gtan pas zad pas mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten rab 'phags rtag tu yul gyi mi gos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas 'gyur/
400b3(phal chen): pa/ bsam gtan mngon shes rab 'phel ye shes rtse mo lhag pa'i bsam pa mi skul ba// gang dag de dang nyer phrad shes rab ye shes mchog gi rab tu 'dra bar 'gyur// de dang de dag/
400b4(phal chen): yon tan ring ba shes rab brtan pa 'gro ba kun gyi ltas// lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog ni rdo rje mtshungs shing 'dra ste rtul shugs thams cad btan// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun thams
400b5(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i spyod lam bsam pa mi byed de// bdud dang sems can nyon mongs shing rten rlung ngag gi ni mi skyod rab btan pa// de dang de dag 'jig rten dam pa nyon mongs 'bar ba dag las
400b6(phal chen): bzlog par byed// 'byam pa'i sprin rnams kun 'dus snying rje sdug po rig pa'i blo chen rgyu ldog pa// thub pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gnas bzhi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra sbyin cing rab tu 'grog/
400b7(phal chen): tha dad yang dag shes dang tshul khrims yan lag brgyad ldan chu'i char 'bebs pa// de dang de dag sprin chen nyon mongs zhi byed sems can don phyir mngon par 'phags// shes rab rab
400b8(phal chen): dga' ba dang khrel dag ni 'phos te chos kyi rgyal mtshan dgrengs// ye shes shing rtags yin te thar pa'i sgo bye dran pa'i de dag sgo ba yin// bden pa rnams ni lam chen zhing ste shin tu/
401a1(phal chen): bal#dge ba'i rdzu 'phrul rab brgyan pa// srid pa gsum na bdud sde dag ni mi mthul grong khyer nyid rab tu ston// thams cad mkhyen gyi sems mchog shing la rab
401a2(phal chen): 'dug rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i nang brtan// gshog pa thabs kyi stobs te pha rol gnos bcu byams dang snying rje mi gnyis yin// ston pa ded 'gro ba kun na thub med mkha' lding dbang po//
401a3(phal chen): drag shul 'dra srid pa'i mtsho nas 'ongs nas cing lha min rnams kyang mya ngan 'das pa'i mchog la mgod// tshul khrims dkyil 'khor rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shug ldan shes rab 'od/
401a4(phal chen): zer 'phreng ba 'dzes// 'od snang kun char nyon mongs 'joms shing srid pa'i rgya mtsho ba tu skams par byed// stobs dang dbang po dge ba'i sman 'phel sems can pad mo yongs su
401a5(phal chen): brgyas byed pa// de dang de dag snang ba chos kyis nyi mi'i khyu mchog 'gro ba kun 'byung // chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun gyi kyi ltas nas mdzes pa ste// nyan thos
401a6(phal chen): rang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs mang skar ma dag ni zil gyi gnon// sems kyi rgyud rnams mthong nas srid pa gsum du 'phel dang 'grib pa rnam par bston// de dang deg ye shes zla ba 'gro
401a7(phal chen): la char shing mkhas pa na mkha'i mtha'// chos kyi dbang po 'gro ba kun la dbang byed gzugs dang yon tan dag gi rgyan// ye shes rdo rje 'da' ba thabs ni mig te chos la dbang chen
401a8(phal chen): gyur gnas pa// lus dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kun gyi lta ba'i dbang po ste// chos kyis 'gro ba kun las rgyal ba de dang de dag chos kyi dbang po yin// srid pa gsuM
401b1(phal chen): na 'dod pa'i 'dam dang nyon mongs las rab 'das kun dbang po// byams pa snang dang thugs rje bsam gtan dge dang stang snyoms rnams la mos// srid pa gsum po kun tu tha dad lus
401b2(phal chen): ston chos kyi sgras kyang go byed pa// de dang de dag tshangs pa lta bur rnam dag mos shing lta ba'i rnam dag sel// 'khor las rab tu 'das shing rnam dag yul dang ldan pa bdag po chos kyi
401b3(phal chen): dbang // phyir ldog mi 'gyur blo gros che 'chang gang rnam theg pa dman dang tha dad la// chos kyi dbang po dbang bskur 'jig rten dam pa ye shes phyir mi 'gyur ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i
401b4(phal chen): yon tan dbang phyug grags chen de dang de dag 'jig rten dbang / na kha'i khas dbyings lta bur dngos dang rnam bral smigs pa thams cad rnam bsal ba/ 'gro ba kun tu bya ba nyams len khyu mchog ci la yang gnas
401b5(phal chen): pa med pa ste// 'gro ba kun tu spyod pa dkar zhags mkhas pa de dag rab mi gnas pa/ de dang de dag ye shes dge zhing dag pas shes rab na mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra/ de dang de dag shin tu rgya chen thabs lngan lngar 'gro ba kun gyi
401b6(phal chen): gsos/ chu 'dra de dang de dag byams dang snying rje nyon mongs rnams ni rab tu sel/ de dang de dag ye shes mes ni nyon mongs sreg cing bag chags bcas pa bsal// ston pa de dag mi gnas rlung dang 'dra bar
401b7(phal chen): srid pa gsum na rab tu rgyu// de dang de dag rin chen 'dra ste shin tu kon zhing 'gro ba'i dbul yang sel// de dang de dag rdo rje lta bur srid pa gsum na lta ba kun tu 'joms// de dang
401b8(phal chen): de dag yon tan kun gyi 'phreng ba sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum mdzes byed// ston pa de dag nor bu rin po che mtshungs 'dra ba spyod pa kun gyi phyug tu phyin// de dang de dag me tog lta bur
402a1(phal chen): phalayon tan rab rgyas byang chub yan lag rtse// 'phreng ba lta bur de dang de dag smon lam bcings shing 'jig rten mgon la gnas// de dang de dag tshul
402a2(phal chen): khrims mnyam sna med rnams dag dri ni rab zhim// de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum na chos dang ye shes kyi ni bag chags dag/ gdugs 'dra de dang de dag stobs kyi bla res nyon
402a3(phal chen): mongs rdul las skyobs par byed// ye shes rgyal mtshan sbyang ba'i thugs mnga' de dang de de dag nga rgyal rgyal mtshan skol// de dang de dag spyod pa'i bdan sna tshogs yid 'ongs
402a4(phal chen): ye shes kun tu 'phags// gos 'dra de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul yon tan 'gro ba kun la khebs// theg pa 'dra ba khyu mchog mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum las 'byin// de dang de dag
402a5(phal chen): rab 'dul glang po lta bur yid kyis rtag tu dul la gnas// de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul rtas ni khal cher khyer zhing 'jig rten gsum las 'da'// klu'i dbang po de dang de dag sems
402a6(phal chen): kyi yul du chos char 'bebs// de dag 'gro ba kun la me tog u dum b+ha ra mtshungs 'dra shin tu dkon// dpa' bo lta bur de dang de dag nyon mongs 'jom zhing bdud kyi bsde rnams
402a7(phal chen): 'khrugs// mi ldog 'khor lo lta bu de dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyi rab tu 'dul// de dang de dag sgron ma lta bur mun pa sel cing sems can lam yang ston// de dang de dag chu klung
402a8(phal chen): lta bur yon tan yon tan dad cing lam rgyun rjes su 'gro/ de dang de dag zam pa lta bur ngal ba med par rtag tu 'gro ba sgrol// gru dang gru chen lta bur smon lam rabs bstabs yi
402b1(phal chen): shes gang chen mtsho thob byed// de dang de dag mnyan pa lta bur 'gro ba ye shes thang chen mchog la dgod// de dag skyed mos tshal gyi dga' la rtse zhing 'gro la yang dag spyod pa
402b2(phal chen): ston// de dag chos kyis rnam thar mngon shes me tog ye shes gzhal med khang dag pa// mkhas pa de dang de dag sman ltar nad sel byed cing nyon mongs rab tu sel// sman gyi
402b3(phal chen): rgyas pa'i gangs ri ltar bur de dang de dag ye shes 'byung gnas so// de dag sangs rgyas lta bur ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba nyid log mun pa sel// yang dag sangs rgyas lta
402b4(phal chen): bur bzhan min yid kyi 'gro ba yid kyi de dag stog par byed// de dang de dag rgyal ba ci 'dra de ltar 'ong te mkhas pa de nyid gnas// de dag thams cad mkhyen pa lta bur
402b5(phal chen): ye shes 'byung gnas kun nas sgor yang zhugs// zhi ba skyed pa de dang drug ston pas rab sngags 'gro ba kun la ston// de dang de dag rang gi ye shes yul dang thams cad
402b6(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i spyod yul shis// de dang de dag tshad med dpung dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun na thub pa med// de dag ye shes mi 'jigs blo gros chang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos
402b7(phal chen): kyang shes// gang na gang dag 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs dang ming rnams ji snyed snang yod pa// kun tu gzugs snyoms gzugs kyi rjes su song zhing ming dbyangs rjes su sod
402b8(phal chen): ba yin// gzugs rnams kun las 'das shing ming dang rnam par bral yang bya ba thams cad ston// de dag mtha' ni 'gro ba rnams kyi rnam pa kun tu brjod par nus so//
403a1(phal chen): pal/ @#/ gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan ma thob cing dngos bral dngos po med pa'i chos gnas shing // yod dang med pa'i 'dud pa thams cad dang bral mkhas
403a2(phal chen): pa ye shes mngon sum can// thams cad shes kyang ye shes btan pa ma yin ye shes de la gnas pa min// de dag spyod la 'jug don yi 'ong 'jig rten dga' byed par
403a3(phal chen): bya/ chos kyi tshul ni rgyu ma'i rang bzhin dngos po dben pa lta bur rab stogs nas// mkhas pas sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyi smon lam thabs dang snying rje dag kyang
403a4(phal chen): byed rdza sprul pa'i ye shes sgo dang ldan pas khyu mchog bya ba sna tshog rab ston pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i ma nor yid can rtse gcig mnyam pa legs pas grag/
403a5(phal chen): lus cig la ni mtha' yas lus dang rgya chen lus rnams tha dad rab tu ston// sems med yid med sems kyi yul med 'on kyang 'gro ba kun tu de dag ston// khyu
403a6(phal chen): mchog brjod bya'i phyi rol tu phyin pa de dag dbyangs cig rnam par brjod byed kyang // 'gro ba bdag gi sgra skad ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu brjod// nyon mongs brgyud
403a7(phal chen): 'byung lus dang bral yang sems can rnams kyi lus la dbang sgyur te// brjod du med pa'i tshul gyi zhi ba rtog shing sgra rnams thams cad rab tu ton// de dag sems kyi rang bzhin
403a8(phal chen): zhi zhing 'od gsal na mkha' mtshungs par yang dag shes// 'gro ba kun la bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sgo nas 'jig rten sna tshogs ston// de dag lus rnams gang la yang gnas pa/
403b1(phal chen): med de lus kyang de dag ston pa byed// 'gro ba thams cad kyi ni skye ba dag dang rgyu mthun gnas pa ji snyed pa// thams cad kun tu skye ba'i lus dang ldan yang skye ba dag la gnas pa med//
403b2(phal chen): rang gi lus la mkhas 'dra dngos bral sems can sems la sna tshogs rnam pa ste// mkhas pa kun la dbang sgyur de dag lus ni mtha' yas kun tu ton byed cing // me tog dri dang byug
403b3(phal chen): ba phye ma sil snyan gdug sma dran rgyal mtshan rnams// thams cad mkhyen la mchod pas rkang gnyis rtse bo 'jig rten mchog la mchod byas cing // mkhas pa bsam pa dag pas lus
403b4(phal chen): kyi 'du byed mchod dam pa kun tu ston// mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba zhabs kyi drung 'od rgyal ba thams kyi// 'khor rnams kun nas snang zhing tshungs med de dag zhu ba kun kyang zhu ba byed//
403b5(phal chen): chos kyi dam pa thos nas ting nge 'dzin re res mtha' yas dga' ldan thob gyur cing // blo gros ldan pa de snyed rnams par ldang ba ston pa byed kyang zad myed/ 'gro ba sgyu ma lta bu rtogs
403b6(phal chen): nas shes rab ye shes thabs kyi pha rol phyin// sgyu ma lta bu'i chos dang gzugs dngos mtha' yas dang pa 'gro ba kun la ston// sna tshogs gzugs dang sgra rnams mtha' yas
403b7(phal chen): shin tu rgya chen sems kyang rab tu sten// 'gro ba thams la ni 'du shes 'dra ba 'byug pa ston kyang gnas pa med// 'gro don rjes 'gro de dag la la dag tu thog ma'i sems su 'gro
403b8(phal chen): la ston// la lar 'gro ba kun la byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas brgya chen dag kyang ston// la lar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang she ra ba rnams/
404a1(phal chen): #/ la lar tshangs pa'i lam sdud kha cig tu ni spyod pa'i mchog kyang rab tu ston// mkhas pa rtog med de dag la lar spyod pa rdzogs shing bzod pa thob pa ston/
404a2(phal chen): la lar skye ba cig gi thog par nges shing la lar rgyal bas dbang bkur ba// la lar nyan thos gzugasu gyur cing // la la ngag tu rang rgyal gzugasu 'gyur// bye ba khrag khrig mang po
404a3(phal chen): zhing du mya ngan 'da' yang spyod lam bzlog pa med// de dag la lar lha dbang rgya byin lha dang bcas pas la lar tshangs par 'gyur// de dag la lar lha'i bu mo brgya'i sa skor
404a4(phal chen): la khang cig tu spyod pa ston// la lar dge slong rab tu zhi zhing yid zhi la lar rgyal po dbang phyug 'gyur// la lar chos kyi 'dra bar 'jug pa'i ye shes khyu mchog gzugs kyang
404a5(phal chen): rab tu ston// la lar bud med sgyu rtsal pha rol rab phyin la lar dka' thub can du 'gyur// la lar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen ston cing la lar bsam gtan thub pa med// la lar
404a6(phal chen): mya ngan 'da' dang tshe'i sa dang la lar rgan dang byis par ston// de dag spyod pas bsam na skye bo mos par 'gyur te yid gnyis snyed par 'gyur// la lar lha dang 'grogs shing la lar shi
404a7(phal chen): bo la lar mngal zhugs 'grogs nas ston// la lar mngal zhugs la lar rnam par sangs rgyas la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor// la lar skye ba la lar mya ngan 'das pa la lar
404a8(phal chen): bzo yang rab tu rlob// la lar bud med tshogs kyi dpung gnas la lar ting nge 'dzin la lar mngon par 'byung // la lar khyu mchog byang chub dam par sangs rgyas byang chub shing gi drung na bzhug
404b1(phal chen): la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhing la lar sna tshogs chos rnams yongs su tshol// sangs rgyas gyur cing zhing rnams bye ba brgyar khyab 'gro bar ston byed kyang // byang chub don du spyod pa dag/
404b2(phal chen): gis tshogs rnams las kyang phyir mi ldog ma yin no// bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin pas skal pa bye ba phrag rgya dag/ khyu mchog sems cig nang ston sems cig skal
404b3(phal chen): ba brgyar yang de bzhin ston par byed// 'gro ba thams cad la yang stog dang mi rtog pa'i yul rnams thams cad ston// brtsogs med cing phyogs la gnas med spyod pa de dag
404b4(phal chen): kun kyang rab tu ston// gang phyir rgyal ba nyes rgyal de dag nyi tshe phyogs med kun na bzhugs pas na// 'gro ba kun gyi rgyal ba ji snyed pa dag thams cad rdul cig steng du 'gro/ sangs rgyas
404b5(phal chen): zhing rnams sgrub dang sems can yul dang chos kyi rgyud tshul rnam kyang mthong // de ltar brtson pas bskal pa khrag khrig brtson byed 'on kyang cha shas zad mi 'gyur// de ltar 'gro ba kun
404b6(phal chen): gyi sems can tshul rnams mtha' yas rgya chen rab tu shes// sems can gcig la mtha' yas lus dang rgyu dang bye ba khrag khrig yod pa'i rnams// de dag 'gro ba cig dang ma lus
404b7(phal chen): thams cad dag la rnam pa kun tu ston pa byed pa 'di'i phyogs la pha rol phyin te ma slab rnams ni ston pa byed// dbang po rnon po dang ni 'bring dang gang dag dbang po rtul ba 'ang rab shes nas//
404b8(phal chen): 'gro bar bskal pa yod dang bskal pa med pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo bskor bar byed// dbang po re re la yang dbang po thams cad rnam pa phan tshun gnas pa dang // dbang po'i phra ba'i
405a1(phal chen): @#/ tshul dang gang dag dbang po gtan pa yang dag rab tu shes// de ltar khams dang mos dang bsam pa brjod dang nyon mongs bag chags rnams kyang shes/
405a2(phal chen): sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i sems spyod da ltar byung ba yang de bzhin te// sems can kun gyi spyod pa'i pha rol phyin kyang 'ang dang 'gro ba yod ma yin// ma nor spyod pa shes nas 'gro/
405a3(phal chen): ba kun la chos kyi dam pa ston pa byed// de ltar sems kyi sems spyod sna tshogs kun nas nyon mongs nyon mongs med pa dang // sems cig la ni khong du chud nas byang chub mchog
405a4(phal chen): tu kun mkhyen rnams sangs rgyas sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba rnams phye rang gi shes pas rtogs nas// sems kyi tshul shes sems med rab tu bzhol bas ye shes
405a5(phal chen): mchog la kun kyang 'god// rdzu 'phrul mchog thob ye shes khyu mchog mngon par shes pa kun gyi rab tu 'phags// sems skyed cig gi khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing dang phyogs
405a6(phal chen): rnams thams cad du yang 'gro// de ltar ye shes dbang sgyur 'gro zhing skal pa bye ba khrag khrig zad byed kyang // sgra brgyud shin tu phra ba cig la zhugs par gnas las gar yang
405a7(phal chen): 'gro ba med// 'tsho ba'i don du sgyu mkhan gzugs rnams rna tshogs 'gre ba kun la ston byed kyang // sgyu ma kun bsngal gzugs su mi dmigs gzugs yod ma yin yang mi
405a8(phal chen): dmigs pa med// de ltar mkhas pa ye shes thabs dang shes rab brgya chen sgyu mar zhugs pa rnams// sprul pa phun sum tshogs pas 'jig rten phal chen khyab par byas shing
405b1(phal chen): rab tu ston// nyi ma zla ba mkha' la skya zhing mdzes la shin tu 'phags pa rnams// ma stogs rnams ji snyed dag tu snang yang de ni chu dang 'dres ma yin// de ltar chos nyid dag pa'i dkyil
405b2(phal chen): 'khor mchog pas shin tu 'phags pa rnams// 'gro ba dag pa'i sems kyi yul la snang yang 'gro ba dag dang 'dres ma yin// la la gnyis logs rmi laM dag na bya ba rnam pa sna/
405b3(phal chen): tshogs tha dad byed// lo ni bye ba khrag khrig mang po zad par rmis kyang mtshan mo de ma zad// de ltar chos nyid rang bzhin mtshungs par rjes rtogs bya ba sna tshogs kun ston ste// skad
405b4(phal chen): cig gcig la bskal ba bye ba zad byed de dag ye shes zad mi 'gyur// ra'i dbang po ri su la gnas pa 'jig rten dag dang snyam du thos pa'i sgra// kun nas sgra'i sgra snyan de dang 'dra
405b5(phal chen): bar brjod kyang stogs cing g.yo ba med// de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin shes pas khyu mchog byang chub sems dpal mkhas pa dag/ rtog pa med pa'i sems can sgra rnams ji snyed par
405b6(phal chen): ni chos dang spyod pa ston// dpyid zla dag gis mig gis sgyu ma ji ltar sems can chur ni 'du shes nas// de nas chu snyed mi 'gyur btung du med cing ji bas je sgom rnam spel ba// de
405b7(phal chen): ltar mkhas pa mthar la zhugs pa sems can dag gi nyon mongs g.yo ba rnams// shes pas rtogs nas sems can 'du shes bya med cing zhing bya ba rnam par 'phel// gzugs
405b8(phal chen): ni dbu ba lta bur khyu mchog ston ste tshor ba chu'i chu bur 'dra// 'du shes thams cad smig sgyu lta bu rag las 'dus byas chu skyes shing dang 'dra// sems ni brgyu 'dra sgrub bya bskyed
406a1(phal chen): la@#byed de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs rab tu ston// de ltar phung po dgod pa sten kyang dbang sgyur dag gi de la gnas pa med// skye mched stong pa'i rang bzhin
406a2(phal chen): khrutha/
406a3(phal chen): dbang med 'khor bya ba kun tu sbyin pa byed pa dang // khams ni chos kyi dbyings mtshungs dngos po dag dang bral bar 'gro ba rnams la ston// dam pa'i don tshul zhi ba las ni
406a4(phal chen): bden pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu ston// de ltar de dgu tshul rnam par dgod pa ston par byed kyang bsam pa med// 'ong ba med cing phyogs su 'gro ba med la rgyun
406a5(phal chen): tu gnas pa med pa yi// nyon mongs rgyu las 'byung ba las dang las las sdug bsngal de ltar rnam gsum du// rkyen las rag las 'byung ba rnams dang yod dang med las
406a6(phal chen): rab tu 'das pa'i yang dag don dam bu ma'i lam ni dngos po med la gnas pa rab tu ston// skad cig gcig la dus gsum khong du chud kyang skad cig sna tshogs rnams
406a7(phal chen): kyang ston// 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med khams kyi yul dang bya ba sna tshogs ston par byed// sdom pa gsum kyi spyod dang rab tu ldan zhing thar pa gsum
406a8(phal chen): yang rab tu ston// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du cig la theg pa gsum du rnam par 'god pa de bzhin ston to// gnas dang gnas ma yin par rab tu dbye ba'i chos dang dbang
406a9(phal chen): do pha rol phyin// khams dang mos pa dag pa dang nyon mongs rnam 'byed kun tu 'gro ba thob gyur pa// mig gi yul gyur mngon gyi gnas pa dran zhing nyon mongs zhi bar mkhas
406b1(phal chen): pa dag/ sangs rgyas stobs bcu dag gi ye shes shin tu yang kyang stobs la dmigs pa med// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dpag stong 'gro ba kun tu mngon gsum
406b2(phal chen): chos bshad des// nyon mongs zag pa lhan cig skyes pa mi mda' byang ba'ang bsnyes pa med gyur pa med// 'byung bas thugs su chud pa'i ye shes rgya chen de ni 'gro ba'i don
406b3(phal chen): mdzad pa// 'di gnas la rgyal sras 'jigs pa med cing 'on kyang zhi bar spyod pa med// 'khrul pa mi 'da' lam las g.yo ba pa yang mi mnga' dgongs pa nyams pa'ang mi mda'
406b4(phal chen): ste// mos dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par dbye ba ye shes gang du yang nyams pa med// thams cad mkhyen mdzad sdom pa gsum mdzad dus gsum kun la mngon
406b5(phal chen): gsum mkhyen mnga' ba// 'gro ba kun gyi ma thob byams pa'i chos nyid mi 'phrog 'chags pa med brnyed pa// chos sgo gang dag gi ni spyod pa 'di dag rab tu thob pa smra ba'i mchog/
406b6(phal chen): de dag yon tan mang po don gyi brgyan pa'i phyogs tsam bdag gi brjod par bya// de dag spyod pa skal ba khrag khrig dag tu brjod kyang zad par mi nus te// 'on kyang ji ltar sa las
406b7(phal chen): rdul 'dra ye shes spyod pa phyogs tsam brjod par bya/ sangs rgyas ye shes stobs ldan bsam pa thob pas ngo mtshar 'du shes gnas pa rnams// spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing byams
406b8(phal chen): pa'i rje song brtson 'grus bstan pas rnam gnan cing // tshul khrims ma g.yo dbugs sbyin de dag 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bye// lung btan rab tu thob nas rgyal
407a1(phal chen): la#/ sras rnams kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin thong bar byed// sangs rgyas yon tan dag la zhugs kyang sems can sems dang zhing la sems dpa' byed// bskal
407a2(phal chen): kha'i dus la 'jug pa'i ye shes ldan zhing mkhas pa skyo ba'i 'du shes med// gzugs kyi tshul dang yang dag tha dad stobs rnams thobs cing yang dag don gyi rgal// bstan pa mtshungs
407a3(phal chen): med sems kyi mkhas pa byang chub zhi ba rnam par 'tshang yang brgya// sems kyi spyod pa thams cad bzang po'i yon tan spyod pa'i mchog tu smon pa med// snying rje'i rkyen dang byams pa mchog
407a4(phal chen): sten byang chub dam pa sbyor bar byed dang ldan// brtson pas pha rol phyin rtogs rab tu mkhas shing skyo'i pha rol byin gyur pas// khyu mchog mos dang rab tu rtogs pa'i stobs thob byang chub
407a5(phal chen): dam pa mngon 'tshang brgya// mnyam pa nyid kyi mnyam pa thob cing ye shes tshul gyis chos mchog ston byed pa// yon tan thob byed spobs pa dang ldan de dag chos kyi dbang phyug mchog tu
407a6(phal chen): 'gyur// dbang la gnas kyang gnas pa med pas snyoms pa med pa'i sems kyi 'brug sgra sgrog/ ye shes mchog dang de bzhin sprul pa sgrub cing byang chub zhi bar nye bar 'gro// mkhas
407a7(phal chen): ba de dag bsgral pa 'byam klas byin rlabs shes pas dbugs byin rab tu thob// zab la gnas pas rtan par 'gro na gnas shing nem nur bsal bas mkhas pa'i rnams// 9
407a8(phal chen): shes bsam gyi mi khyab chos kyi dgongs pa mkhas rnams bye ba pha rol byin// snyoms par 'jug par 'jug pa'i ye shes su la zhugs nas thams cad mkhyen pa chang yang rgya/
407b1(phal chen): ye shes rnam thar kun gyi pha rol phyin cing mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsen// rig pa'i snang ba ldan rnams dgrol nyon mongs bral bas 'gro la skyed mos tshal dang 'dra// gang la dkar
407b2(phal chen): nga'i spyod pa gzhal med khang mdzes sna tshogs spyod pa ston pa'o// 'gro ba kun la brgyan rnams du ma rab tu ston kyang sems la g.yo ba med// bsam pa shin tu byas pas bsten par
407b3(phal chen): rab tu shes she pha rol phyin gyur pas// mkhas pa dag gi byang ba'i byang chub phyag rgya snang ba'i ye shes kyis// 'gro ba dag dang mi tshungs zhum med khyu mchog lhag pa'i bsam pa
407b4(phal chen): ri bo 'dra// ye shes rgya mtsho 'dra dang // yon mi zad don du spyod pa chen po spyod/ de dag rin chen 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rje lta bu'i go cha dgos pas gnas// shin tu rgya chen rtsom la rab tu
407b5(phal chen): mkhas shing 'gro ba kun na thub med pa// byang chub mchog tu lung bstan skyon med khong du chud pa'i rgya chen sems la gnas// sangs rgyas gter chog mi zad thobs nas thams
407b6(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'tshang rgya'o// rtag tu kun rdzogs shes pas dbang 'gyur rnam par 'phrul pa rnam la mkhas pas na// zhing rnams kun dang chos kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul
407b7(phal chen): pa'i ye shes rgyud la gnas lus dang smom lam spyod yul ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa la yang de bzhin des// 'gro ba dag la rnam par rtse ba bye ba khrag khrig du ma mang po ston//
407b8(phal chen): mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi rnam par zhi zhing nges par rnam par rtse// khyu mchog de dag sangs rgyas yul la stobs thob 'gro ba kun gyi thub pa med// mkhas 'dzi/
408a1(phal chen): bal#/ med dang bag chags med dang ma 'dres rnams kyi shin tu brgyan// sangs rgyas sras dag las rnams thams cad byed cing shin tu mdzes pa'i lus dang ldan//
408a2(phal chen): de dag lus kyi las kyi dngos po shin tu rgya me dag kyang dag cing dge de yang 'byin pa'i tshe na rgyal bas byin gyi rlabs shing las ni mchog kyang byed/ dam pa de dag sems skyed cig
408a3(phal chen): la sems rgyas byed pa'i sems kyang rab tu ston// rgyal ba'i dbang po thob pa dag tu dbang po'i ting nge 'dzin dbang la rab tu gnas// bsam pa dag cing g.yo rgyu sna tshogs
408a4(phal chen): rnams dang bral te lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon gsum du 'gyur// mos pa'i 'jug pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad 'gro ba dag la rag ston// bag chags thams cad spang nas spyod pa 'dzin/
408a5(phal chen): nan tan bya ba grub pa'i ye shes mkhas pas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshangs yang rgya// bsam pa rnam par spangs nas de dag skyon mdo gnas pa zhi ba mchog kyang thob// mkhas pa 'di las
408a6(phal chen): shin tu spabs pa de dag zing ni yon tan sgo nas grangs// mtha' yas sems kyi yul ldan gnas pa med par lam rnams yod du sgom pa byed// ye shes tshul gnas shing 'gro ba rnams
408a7(phal chen): la lam gyi rgyan rnams shin tu ston// spyod pa lag pa lta bu dga' dang ldan pa lto yin snying po ye shes mchog/ snying ni rdo rje sbu bu'i snying rje'i sgos ye shes 'dag pa'i mtshon ma yin/
408a8(phal chen): shes par dgos ste chos rtogs mig yin byang chub spyod pa yang ni sna pa yin/ tshul khrims bdag gi nyon mongs med la byed ste mun pa'i byed sna yin te// spongs pa lce yin lus ni rig
408b1(phal chen): ba yin te sems ni ye shes dam pa yin// spyod pa rgyu ba yin te byang chub sems snas seng ge'i khri ni 'dug pa yin// tshangs pa'i lam rnam dag ni lam yin song ba chags med
408b2(phal chen): dam pa spyod yul lo// gang gi de dag sna bar 'gyur ba'i snang ba bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes yul// sems can spyod la rnam par lta ba ye shes mchog ste rnam pa sna tshogs
408b3(phal chen): dbyings// sems can dben zhing chags dang bral ba'i sbyin pa snyems pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang // bzod pa'i mi 'khrugs brtson 'grus mi ldog dbang sgyur ba ni bsam
408b4(phal chen): gtan dam pa yin// rgyu ba med cing nam mkha' 'dra ba shes rab byam pa sems can rnam par 'dren pa skyo med snying rje rnam dag chos ni dga' ba nyon mongs gnas las don ni
408b5(phal chen): zhi ba chos kyi yul la nye bar 'gro bas bsod nams 'gro la sngos// ye shes tshogs ni ral gri gnon po lta bu snang ba chen po rig pa ste// 'gro ba rnams la thos pa thon pas mi
408b6(phal chen): ngoms bskal bar 'dren kyang 'jig pa med// nan tan byed la gnas te bdud rnams btul nas 'dad kyi lam yang rab tu spyad// rgyal ba rnams kyi 'phrin las gang yin ye shes
408b7(phal chen): spyod dang lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dzin// nga rgyal las rnams rnam par spangs te rtag tu ye shes kyi yang bya ba med// bdud rnams byin gyi rlabs bcom mkhas pa de dag sangs
408b8(phal chen): rgyas byin gyi rlabs// chos kyi byim brlabs thob blo gros chen po 'chad pa'i lha'i gnas su 'dong // lha rnams byas te phyi phos song nas mchog gi dngal ni shin tu phra bar 'gro/ skye ba
409a1(phal chen): bal/ @#mchog ni nye bar tan nas mchog gi gom pa bdun du 'dor bar byed// mkhas pa de dag sems can kun la bzol dang spyod dang btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ston/ chags
409a2(phal chen): ba med par mngon par 'byung nas byang chub shing drung chos kyi rgyan kyang byed// stong pa'i bstan las 'od zer dra ba yang bkye zhing yang dag skul byed// bdud rnams brtul te byang
409a3(phal chen): chungab go bangs sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// sangs rgyas sa yang rab tu bstan nas 'dren pa de dag tshungs pa med par bzhud// gang gi mkhas pa bskal pa
409a4(phal chen): bar rnam par rtse zhing yang dag 'byung gyur nas// sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma sangs rgyas yon tan rab 'god kyang // rnam pa kun tu sems can mi gnas chos
409a5(phal chen): la ma yin spyod la ma yin pa'i// de dag spyod pa 'di 'dra mtha' yas shin tu brgya chen 'dor btan to// de 'dri'i spyod dang ldan pa'i ye shes khyu mchog rdzu 'phrul dag gi rnam
409a6(phal chen): bar rtse// zhing rnams bye ba stong yang skra tse gcig la bskal khrag khrig brgyar 'dzin des// lag tu khyer te zhing rnams bye bar 'gro yang lus la mngal thug gang yang med
409a7(phal chen): mkhas pa khyer gnas ji lta gnas su 'gro kyang 'gro ba dag la gnod pa med// 'jig rten mkhyed pa'i zhing mkhyen rnam pa ji snyed rnam pa tha dad bstan pa dag/ kun kyang sku
409a8(phal chen): cig pu gar khyu mchog de dag yang dag rab tu ston// mkhas pa spu'i bu gar brgya mtsho'i chu rnams ma lus khong du chud rab ston kyang // 'phel zhing sgrib pa med la 'gro ba dag la
409b1(phal chen): gnod par 'gyur med bya ba de yang ston// 'khor yug khrag khrig shin tu dra ba'i rdul byas lag gi sdus khyer zhing // zhing rnams khrag khrig bye ma snyed du 'dor byed cig tu gnyis kyang
409b2(phal chen): gzhog mi byed// zhing rnams de dag rdul du byas te de bzhin gzhan yang rnam par 'jig de 'dra ba'i// rjes su dpag pa zad par 'gyur kyang 'jug pa de dag mi zad do// 'jig rten
409b3(phal chen): kun gyi nyi ma zla ba skarma gang dag stong rnams ji snyed dang // gang yang nor bu'i 'od dang // gang yang nor bu'i 'od dang me'i 'od dang gang rnams lha dbang 'od// mang po de dag rab tu
409b4(phal chen): 'das pa'i 'od zer khrag khrig pu cig khung nas 'gyed// 'jig rten kun gyi ngan song sdug bsngal zhi bar byed cing chos kyi dam pa ston// 'gro ba ma lus sgra'i rnam pa sna tshogs
409b5(phal chen): skad rnams thams cad ji snyed pa// khyu mchog de dag tshig cig tu brjod pas sgra rnams thams cad tshang bar brjod// srog chags bye ba rnam kyi yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos dag
409b6(phal chen): zhing mgu bar 'gyur// rgyal bas ston pa'i chos kyi rnam pa ji snyed thams cad des las thos par 'gyur// gang dag ji snyed 'das pa'i bskal pa yod pa de dag ma 'ongs pa'i/
409b7(phal chen): bskal par ston// gang yang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba yin snyed de dag 'das par ston// khyu mchog dag ni zhi rnams tshig dang gnas pa rnam pa dad ston pa byed// 'gro ba ji
409b8(phal chen): snyed thams cad mkhyen pa de dag skra rtse cig la rab tu 'god// 'das dang ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu kun zhugs pa'i rgyal ba ji snyed pas// de dag thams rlung gi lus la
410a1(phal chen): @#/ ma nor dbang sgyur rnam par 'phrul ston// sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs la shes pa'i mkhas pa de dag 'gro baji sems// de snyed lus rdul dang thal
410a2(phal chen): bston kyang lus la gnas pa gang yang med// lam rgyud drug pa gang rnams ji snyed yod pa'i 'gro ba kun gyi lus bsdus shing // rgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon
410a3(phal chen): po rnams dang de bzhin lha dang mi rnams dang // gang yang nyan thos rang rgyal rnams la dad cing sangs rgyas sku la mos pa la// sangs rgyas byang chub grub pa'i spyod pa
410a4(phal chen): ngag dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa ston// 'gro ba kun gyi 'du shes bral ba rab dang 'bring dang tha mar 'jug pa rnams// thams cad shes shing byin gyi rlob sangs rgyas
410a5(phal chen): zhing rnam pa kun kyang rab tu ston// 'du shes dra ba rnams sgoms blobs ldan 'jig rten 'du shes rnam la dbang sgyur ba// bya ba dang ni sbyor ba ji snyed pa kun mchog byang
410a6(phal chen): chub spyod pa ston// de dag de dang rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu rgya chen dam pa bzhan yang ston// de dag dag la 'jig rten sa min de dag bya bar ston// ston kya lta ba lhur
410a7(phal chen): len ma yin bzhin yang dgongs du ston pa byed// de dag sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji bzhin yang dag 'jug/ lus ni namakha lta bu dag dang yid la chags med 'jig rten
410a8(phal chen): gsum gyi gtso// tshul khrims spos kyi byug pa rab tu zhi ba gos pa zhing yin yon tan sna tshogs brgyan// chos kyi go 'phangs skyon med thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa yid bzhin
410b1(phal chen): nor bu ste// bde bshegs kun gyi ye shes dbang skur thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal po'i thabs la gnas// pha rol phyin pa rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te glang po mngon par shes pa mchog
410b2(phal chen): ye shes rdzu 'phrul rta ste chags pa med 'gro shes rab nor bu dam pa yin// spyod pa brdzun mo bzang mo bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi po khyi bdag dam pa'o// thabs la shin tu mkhas pa blon
410b3(phal chen): po yin te mkhas pa de dag 'khor los sgyur// stong pa khyim ste 'i 'dzin grong khyer byams dang snying rje go cha'o// shes rab ral gri yin te dran pa bzhu mdzes dbang po rdo ba 'da' yang
410b4(phal chen): 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi brlabs ni 'dug te ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng // de dag bzod pa stobs kyi 'dus kyi dbungs dang sde rnams 'dus pa 'joms// bzungs ni sa
410b5(phal chen): sde byang chub spyod pa chu klung ye shes lu ma shes rab shing // me tog byang chub yan lag ting 'dzin rta ste rdzu 'phrul rgyal mtshan brgyan// stong pa rnam thar brgyad pa'i rdzing bu yin te rnam par
410b6(phal chen): spyod pa bzang po brdzun mo yin// thar pa bdud rtsi bza' ba yin te chos ni btung ba theg pa gsum gyi rtse// de dag spyod pa de 'dra yid 'od khyad par 'phags te de bas gong du mangs// gang
410b7(phal chen): gi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du skyo ba yongs su mi skye bar// ston pa mchod cing rnam dag zhing la brtson pas 'gro ba ye shes mchog la 'god// kha na ma tho kun med ye shes rab
410b8(phal chen): gnas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyas byed// zhing rnams rdul gyi 'brur bregs re re nas kyang dgrang zhing rtsi bar nus 'gyur la// bar snang mkha' chen 'di yang skra'i gzhal med zad
411a1(phal chen): sna ma sal las
411a2(phal chen): bskas pa ra brjod zang par mi nus so// gang zhig yon tan nam dag 'dis da tha' par non cing srong du gzhan yod dang // gang 'is sdug 'asngaphrul rnams la 'gro ba ma
411a3(phal chen): byas bde la dgod pa 'dod pa dang // gang zhig bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsungs thugs dang du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag/ des ni lta bur gtan pa'i sems su gyis te yon slab
411a4(phal chen): khar byos// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas bal po che zhes bya ba las// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
411a5(phal chen): bam po brgyad bcu gya dru pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod pa'i rje ti'i tshal skyabs med pa la zas sbyin pa'i kun dga'
411a6(phal chen): ra ba'i nang // pho brang rtsigs pa brgya chen po can nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
411a7(phal chen): chen po shes pa dam pa'i ye shes dang // rten pa dam pa'i ye shes dang // chags med dam pa'i ye shes dang // me tog dam pa'i ye shes dang // nyi ma dam pa'i ye shes dang /
411a8(phal chen): zla ba dam pa'i ye shes dang // dri med dam pa'i ye shes dang // rdo rje dam pa'i ye shes dang // rdul med dam pa'i ye shes dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba dam
411b1(phal chen): ba'i ye shes dang byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / ri rab rgyal mtshan dang / rin chen rgyal mtshan dang / chags med rgyal mtshan dang / me tog rgyal mtshan dang /
411b2(phal chen): dri med rgyal mtshan dang / nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdul med rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub
411b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i rin chen gzi brjid dang / blo gros chen po'i gzi brjid dang / ye shes rdo rje'i bzi brjid dang / dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid dang / chos kyi nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang /
411b4(phal chen): bsod nams ri bo'i brjid dang / ye shes snang ba'i gzi brjid dang / kun nas 'od dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / kun nas 'od zer dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems
411b5(phal chen): dpa' phyogs bcu snang bas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gzi brjid dang // byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po// na mkha'i snying po dang / pad mo'i snying po dang / rin po che'i snying
411b6(phal chen): kho dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / yon tan rnam dag snying po dang / chos rgya mtsho'i snying po dang / rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang / gtsug gi snying po dang / byang chub sems
411b7(phal chen): dpa' pad mo'i dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i mig dang / rnam par dag pa'i mig dang / dri ma med pa'i mig dang / chags pa med pa'i mig dang /
411b8(phal chen): kun nas lta ba'i mig dang / shin tu rnam par lta ba'i mig dang / ud pa la'i mig dang / rdo rje'i mig dang / rin po che'i mig dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i spyod pa dang /
412a1(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i gros spyod du ldan dang / byang chub dam pa'i bcod pan dang / phyogs rnam par snang ba'i gcod dpan dang / sangs rgyas
412a2(phal chen): thams cad yang dag par byung ba'i snying po'i gcod pan dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i spyod dpan dang // kun nas rnam par snang ba'i spyod pan
412a3(phal chen): dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i khri 'dzin pa'i gcod dben dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings na mkha'i kun nas snang ba'i spyod dpan dang /
412a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbang po rtsu ga yud dang / klu'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa snang ba'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub dam
412a5(phal chen): pa'i gtsug phud dang / smon lam brgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrogs pa'i rin chen rgyal po'i gtsug phud/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab
412a6(phal chen): tu dbye ba'i nor bu rin po che 'brug sgra'i gtsug phud dang / na mkha'i dbyings thams cad tha mi dang ba'i rnam par dmigs pa'i rin chen rgyal pos rgyan pa'i gtsug phud dang / de bzhin
412a7(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rgyal mtshan rin po che'i dra ba nas yog pa'i gtsug phud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo//
412a8(phal chen): 'grog pa'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi ming thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen po'i 'od dang /
412b1(phal chen): ba'i brjid rje med pa' yon dang/ ran ba tsha'i 'od dang/ dus dang rnal 'al 'ad dang / zhi ba'i 'od dang / chos kyi 'od dang / zhi ba 'ad dang / khyi ma'i 'od dang / rnam pa
412b2(phal chen): 'phrul ba'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / mngon
412b3(phal chen): par shes pa'i dpal dang / 'od kyi dpal dang / me tog dpal dang / rin po che'i dpag dang / byang chub kyi dpa' dang / tshangs pa'i dpal dang / byang chub sems
412b4(phal chen): dpa' kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang / byang chub tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang / sa sgra'i dbyangs dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i dbyangs dang / ri dbang rgyal
412b5(phal chen): bo'i thabs pa'i dbyangs dang // chos kyi dbyangs kun tu rgyas pa'i dbyangs dang / chos rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bsgrogs pa'i dbyangs dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams
412b6(phal chen): cad rab tu 'dul ba'i dbyangs dang // snying rje chen po'i tshul gyis srin rab tu sgrogs pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar
412b7(phal chen): bya bas dbugs 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'phags pa/ khyad par gyi 'phags pa dang / ye shes kyi 'phags pa dang / bsod nams ri
412b8(phal chen): bos 'phags padang / yon tan gyi 'phags pa dang / grags pas 'phags pa dang / kun snang bas la lags pa dang / byams pa chen pos 'phags padrang / na
413a1(phal chen): @#rgya mtshos 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi gdungs gi 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od/
413a2(phal chen): kyi dpal dang / kun 'phags pa'i dpal dang / rnam par snang ba'i dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal dpa' dang / namakha'i dpal dang / rin po che'i
413a3(phal chen): dpal dang / dpal gyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i dbang po'i dpal dang / chos kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / 'gro ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshangs
413a4(phal chen): pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshogs dbang po'i rgyal po dang / lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / zhi ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / mi g.yo ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /
413a5(phal chen): khyu mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / sa'i sbyangs kyi sgra dang / rgya mtsho'i
413a6(phal chen): 'brug gi sgra dang / sprin kyi dbyangs kyi sgra dang / chos kyi snang ba'i sgra dang / na mkha'i dbyings kyi sgra dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu sgrog pa'i sgra dang / sngon gyi
413a7(phal chen): smon lam yongasu skul ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' sdud kyis dkyil 'khor bcom med par byed pa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i blo dang / ye shes
413a8(phal chen): ri bo'i blo dang / na mkha'i blo dang / dri ma med pa'i blo dang / chags pa med pa'i blo dang / rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo dang / dus gsum snang ba'i blo dang / yangs pa'i blo dang /
413b1(phal chen): kun snang ba'i blo dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su song blo dang / de dag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tsam te/ kun kyang byang chub sems dgra
413b2(phal chen): kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi 'byung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gyengs pa'i chags pa med pa'i spyod yul can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
413b3(phal chen): cad kyi drung du 'ongs pas lus mtha' yas pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i yongasu btan pa/ rnam par dmigs par bya ba la
413b4(phal chen): bsgrib pa med pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par tshang brgya pa'i tshe// nye bar 'dong ba rgyun mi bcod pas tshad med par phyin
413b5(phal chen): brje chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pas snang ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas rnam par dag pas bskal ba mtha'
413b6(phal chen): yas par shin tu ston pas mi zad pa/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongasu ston pas/ na mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pa yul
413b7(phal chen): rnam par dag cing mi gnas pa sem can gyi khams sems can med pa dang / srog med pa yongs su shes pas rab rib med pa chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra
413b8(phal chen): bas rgyas par 'gyengs pas na mkha' dang mnyam pa sha tig dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa lnga brgya ste/ thams cad kyang bden pa'i
414a1(phal chen): tshul gyi rang bzhin mngon par khong du chud pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon gsum du gyur pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin la bzhugs pa/ srid pa'i
414a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho las gyen du 'phags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs su 'gyur ba'i spyod yul can/ kun nas sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / bcings pa rnam par
414a3(phal chen): zlog pa/ chags pa med pa'i gnas la rten pa/ na mkha' ltar zhi ba la rnam par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas la the tshom dang / nem nur dang / yid gnyis yongs su chad pa/
414a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes brgya mtsho la mos pa'i lam du zhugs pa sha rtag dang 'jig rten gyi dbang po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang //
414a5(phal chen): bde ba'i don du zhugs pa bsol ba ma stabs par dge ba'i bshes sbyin du gyur pa/ sems can gzhan bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las
414a6(phal chen): 'phags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la zhugs pa// sems can thams cad yongs su stong pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stem
414a7(phal chen): ba'i spyod yul byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su srung ba la bzhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par bzung ba'i smon lam gyi yang dag
414a8(phal chen): skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdungs kyi rgyud du 'byung ba mngon du gyur pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go// de nas
414b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dang / nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de dag dang / 'jig rte gyi dbang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa de dag
414b2(phal chen): 'di snyam du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang
414b3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bsnyengs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam
414b4(phal chen): bar spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs bri
414b5(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon gyi legs par spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
414b6(phal chen): dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi skyabs dang // dad pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang / rgya chen po la mos pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa dang / byang chub sems
414b7(phal chen): dba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / bsam pa thag pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing yang dag par zhugs pa ma rtog par lha dang bcas
414b8(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'jug pa 'am khong du chud pa 'am/ yid ches pa 'am/ yongs su shes pa'am/ rnam par rtog pa'am/ bzung ba 'am/ rnam par spyad pa 'am
415a1(phal chen): @#rnam par sgom pa 'am/ rnam par dbye ba 'am/ rnam par grol ba 'am/ rab tu brjod pa 'am/ sems can pha rol gyi rgyud du byin par
415a2(phal chen): mi nus na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang / sems can bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / mos pa sna
415a3(phal chen): tshogs dang / shes pa sna tshogs kyi tshig dang / brdal sna tshogs su gyur pa/ dbang sgyur ba'i gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa dang / dbang po sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa/ bsam/
415a4(phal chen): ba dang sbyor ba rnam pa gzhan dang sems dang bsam pa'i yul gzhan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ chos ston pa gzhan dang gzhan la
415a5(phal chen): mos pa dag la sngon thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa lta 'ang yang dag par btan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon bsgrub pa lta 'ang yang dag par btan grangs
415a6(phal chen): sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor yongasu dag pa lta 'ang yang dag par gtan grangs/ sngon gyis byang chub sems dpa' yongs su gtan pa'i rnam par
415a7(phal chen): 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par gtan snang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bsdu
415a8(phal chen): bgrangs/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i tshul mngon par sgrub pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba lta'ang yang dag par stan dgrang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i
415b1(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa la lta'ang yang dag par stan grangs/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par sgrub pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa
415b2(phal chen): lta 'ang yang dag par stan grangs/ byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa'i rgya mtsho lta 'ang yang dag par stan grangs/ mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgos rnam par
415b3(phal chen): 'phrul pa lta 'ang yang dag par stan grangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi lta'ang yang dag par
415b4(phal chen): bstan grangs de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par 'phral ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan grangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems
415b5(phal chen): can gyi khams 'dul ba'i thabs kyi sgo lta 'ang yang dag par stan grangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi grong khyer la mnga' mdzad pa lta 'ang yang dag
415b6(phal chen): bar stan grangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi lam snang bar mdzad pa lta 'ang yang dag par stan grangs/ de bzhin bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams
415b7(phal chen): cad kyi snang bar mdzad pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan bgrangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gshegs shing rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad
415b8(phal chen): pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan dgrangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyis yon gzhes pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan dgrangs/ de bzhin gshegs
416a1(phal chen): 2@#pa sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams dang / yon ston pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grangs/ de bzhin ga
416a2(phal chen): pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyis tshul la sangs rgyas kyis gzugs snyan dmigs pa mdzad pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan dgras/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems
416a3(phal chen): can thams cad la rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par stan grangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la yongasu btan pa dang /
416a4(phal chen): rjes su brtan pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta 'ang yang dag par stan grangs/ de bzhin gshegs bI sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul
416a5(phal chen): bsam gyi mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan grangs snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems
416a6(phal chen): kyi yongs su stog pa thugs kyi mkhyen nas/ seng ge'i rnam par dbyings pa zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha' dang skam pas dpe med pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par sna
416a7(phal chen): ba'i brgyan dang ldan pa thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin can/ thugs rje chen po mngon du 'gro ba thugs rje chen po'i chos can la snyam par gzhag bcom ldan 'das de ltar snyam par
416a8(phal chen): gzhags ma thag tu/ pho brang rtsegs pa brgya chen po can yangs mtha' dang dbus med par yangs shing rdo rje thub pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi sa gzhi rab tu brgyan pa dang / nor bu
416b1(phal chen): bo che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dra ba kun tu dgrams pa rin po che du ma'i me tog silams chal bar gang ba nor bu rin po che dam pas mdzes par bkram pa dang / bai dur+ya'i kangs
416b2(phal chen): mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rnam par snang bas brgyan shin rnam par bye ba dang / rin po che bzang po mang po dang ldan pa nor bu rin po ches 'dzam bu chu klung
416b3(phal chen): gi phung pos shin brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad la sgo gang dang / rta babs dang / pu shu dang / skar khung byas shing khri 'phangs grangs med pa rnam par dag pas brgyan
416b4(phal chen): ba dang / 'jig rten dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / 'gro ba rgya mtsho nor bu rin po che rnam par phye ba dang / nor bu rin po ches
416b5(phal chen): thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas g.yogs bdag dang / rgyal mtshan rab tu dgrang ba dang / sgo dang ta babs thams cad las 'od zer chos kyi dbyangs su rgyas par 'gyengs
416b6(phal chen): ba rab tu 'byung bas rnam par mdzes par byas pa dang / phyi rol gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis bzhi stegasu brjod du med pas brgyan pa dang / phyogs kun nas theb skas
416b7(phal chen): kyi 'phreng ba nor bu rin po che rtsegs shing shin tu rnam par phye bas rab tu mdzes par kun nas gnas par gyur to// 'dze ta'i 'tshal thams cad kyang chu zheng gab par shin tu
416b8(phal chen): yangs shing rgya che bar kun nas gnas par 'gyur te/ sang+yas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang chu
417a1(phal chen): @#zhed kun tu 'argya che zhing yangs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi brgyan sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / sa bzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod med/
417a2(phal chen): bas kun nas bsgrub pa dang / nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i ra bas kun nas bskor ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ta la'i 'phreng bas mdzes par brgyan pa kun nas
417a3(phal chen): gnas par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag spos chus chu klung mtshad med pa klog mtha' yas par khyil ba'i spos chus yongs su gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog
417a4(phal chen): mang po dang 'dres par gyur la/ g.yas phyogs su khyil zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbyings su sgrogs pas rab tu rgyan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to//
417a5(phal chen): rin po che'i me tog bun ta ri ka'i phreng ba dang / rin po che'i shing gam lo rin po che thams cad kyi pad mo rab tu rgyas shing / shin tu 'phags pas mdzes par brgyan pa dang /
417a6(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs kyi khengs pa rtsegs pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas g.yogs pa/ nor bu rin po ches grangs med pa'i dra ba kun snang
417a7(phal chen): bas brgyan cing mdzes pa dang / nor bu rin po ches gzhal med khang rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan pa grangs med pa spos thams cad kyi ngang kun nas 'byung ba/ 'dug spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan
417a8(phal chen): dang ldan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang / gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i snam bu'i rgyal
417b1(phal chen): mtshan dang / me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / 'phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal ba
417b2(phal chen): gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i snang bas kun tu rgyas par 'gyengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
417b3(phal chen): mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs rab tu sgrogs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin
417b4(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu sgrogs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu
417b5(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon gyis sbyor ba rab tu sgrogs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad
417b6(phal chen): rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rgyal mtshan gyi brgyan rnam par bye ba'i thams cad phyogs kun nas rgyan du gyur pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to// 'dze ta'i tshal gyi/
417b7(phal chen): nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyang lha'i bzhal med khang gyi sprin bsam gyi mi khyab pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur te/ 'dze ta'i mtshal nyid kyang spos sna tshogs kyi shing
417b8(phal chen): grangs med pa'i sprin gyi kun nas g.yogs cing brgyan pa dang / brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi kun nas 'khor cing rgyan pa dang / rol mo bdungs pa
418a1(phal chen): bal/ dang / bkrol ba brjod du med pa'i 'phrin las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las stod pa'i dbyangs dang / nga ro snyan pa 'byung bas
418a2(phal chen): kun brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i pad mo brjod du med pa'i sprin gyi kun nas g.yog cing rgyan pa dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i khri brjod med pa'i steng / lha mdzes kyi
418a3(phal chen): rin po che'i stan ting pa la byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'khod cing de bzhin gshegs pa la stod pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa'i sri kun nas rgyan pa dang /
418a4(phal chen): lha'i dbang po brjod du med pa'i gzugs snyen mngon par 'byung ba'i nor bu rin po rin po che'i 'bru'i sprin gyi kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig kar po'i dra ba'i
418a5(phal chen): sprin brjod du med pas kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig mar po'i khang partsegs pa'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas g.yogs cing brgyan pa dang / rdo rje ltar
418a6(phal chen): bur smra ba'i mu tig gi sprin brjod du med pa'i char mngon par 'bebs pas rab tu rgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de bzhin gshegs
418a7(phal chen): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dkar po'i tshogs bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog
418a8(phal chen): gi mthu' dang byin gyi rlabs bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gyengs pa rnam par
418b1(phal chen): 'phrul pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gcig tu 'azhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par byed pa thams cad la yang dag/
418b2(phal chen): bar gzhol bas byin gyi rlabs yongs su bstan pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba cig la chos kyi dbyings
418b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi gzugs bstan rnam par dmigs pa yongs su bston pa mdzad pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa spu cig tu sngon
418b4(phal chen): gyis mtha'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa yongs su bstan pa mdzad pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams kyi 'od
418b5(phal chen): zer cig gi sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa snang bar 'gyur bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i rtse mo gcig las
418b6(phal chen): sprul pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gyengs pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs
418b7(phal chen): ba rnams ba spu'i sgo gcig nas 'jig rten gyi khams su bsdu ba dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// ji ltar 'dze ta'i
418b8(phal chen): 'tshal de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas/ yongs su dag par kun nas gnas 'gyur ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
419a1(phal chen): phalachos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa na mkha'i mthas rtags pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par kun nas gnas shing rab tu brgyan pa
419a2(phal chen): dang shin tu spang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su rgyas pa dang / 'dze ta'i tshal du yang dag par bzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpas yongs su rgyas pa dang /
419a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor rgya mtsho shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / brgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'babs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba dang /
419a4(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'babs pas rgyan pa dang / zhing thams cad kyi brgyan gyis sprin gyis kun nas g.yogs par brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas thams cad
419a5(phal chen): kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'angs pas brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / gos thams cad kyi shin gyi sprin gyi mdzod dang /
419a6(phal chen): gos kha dog sna tshogs su mdzes pa'i char rab tu 'babs pas brgyan pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / lda ldi dang / se mo de'i sprin gyi char rgyun mi chad par 'babs pas brgyan pa dang / spos sna
419a7(phal chen): tshogs kyis bdugs spos phyogs kun nas/ 'thul ba'i sprin dang / na bun gyi char thams cad kyis lus kyi dbyibs ltar/ mngon par 'babs pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams
419a8(phal chen): cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin las/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i phye ma'i zhi bu'i char rgyun mi chad par rab tu 'babs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi
419b1(phal chen): sprin lha'i bu mo'i lag na khyer ba na mkha'i dbyings kun tu rgyu zhing / 'khor bas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi/ 'dab ma'i dkyil 'khor can/
419b2(phal chen): chu ba mthon dang ldan pa'i ze ba la rol mo bkod pa/ kun nas sgra sbyin cing / dbyangs snyan par sgrogs pas/ brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che
419b3(phal chen): seng ge dra ba sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i phreng ba dang / se mo dos rgyan par kun nas gnas shing snang bar gyur to// de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
419b4(phal chen): pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po// seng ge rnam khe sgyings pa de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdus
419b5(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi sprin sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po'i sangs
419b6(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam gyi lcags gis 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba de byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
419b7(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des snang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas 'phags ste/ na mkha'i dbyings rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis rgyan pa
419b8(phal chen): dang rdza lha rdzas kyi me tog gis sprin gyi char mngon par bab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin char rab tu dgye ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad mo'i sprin gyi char mngon par tor
420a1(phal chen): phal#ba dang lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char rab tu gtang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par babs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi brgyan
420a2(phal chen): gyi sprin gyi char mngon par dgye ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin gyi mngon par grub pa dang / kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad cing shin tu phra ba'i lha rdzas kyi gos kyi
420a3(phal chen): sprin gyi char mngon par babs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi sprin na mkha'i dbyings las byin gyi rlabs pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin rgyan yid
420a4(phal chen): du 'ong bas na mkha'i dbyings rgyas par 'gyings par byed cing / mi byed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas
420a5(phal chen): bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su btan te/ khang pa brtsegs pa brgyan kun dang ldan zhing rin po che'i dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang // seng ge'i khri nor
420a6(phal chen): bu rin po che'i phyogs rab tu snang ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems
420a7(phal chen): dpa'i lus su byin gyi rlabs nas dkyil mo krung cas te 'khod do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
420a8(phal chen): rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po kun nas snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems
420b1(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi shugs thub par dka' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
420b2(phal chen): lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des snang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad spos kyi lda ldi dang / dra bas kun
420b3(phal chen): tu 'brel bar byin gyi rlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lda ldi dang / dra ba chen pos kun nas 'brel bar byin gyi rlabs
420b4(phal chen): pa dang lnga sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis rgyud thams cad me tog thams cad kyi lda ldi dang / 'phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyi rlabs pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi
420b5(phal chen): zhing gi 'khor thams cad 'breng ba dang / lda ldi dang se mo do'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyi rlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad
420b6(phal chen): 'od kyi bzhi rdo rje thams cad kyi 'brengs pas yongs su bzung bar byin gyi rlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul thams cad nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas
420b7(phal chen): kun nas 'brel bar byin gyi rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gos sna tshogs kyi lda ldi kun nas yongs su blangs shing gzung byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs
420b8(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi 'phreng ba dang / lnga ldi mang po'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar mngon par sgrub pa dang / zhing thams cad nor bu rin
421a1(phal chen): bal @#bo che'i dpal gyi 'od zer gyi lda ldi dang / 'greng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyi rlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
421a2(phal chen): rin po che rnam par snang ba'i lda ldi dang / dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyi brlabs par dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bzhi nor bu rin po seng ge yid
421a3(phal chen): du 'ong ba'i 'phreng ba dang / lnga ldi dra bas yongs su bzung bar byin gyi rlabs par byed cing / mi 'byed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom
421a4(phal chen): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ti/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho phyogs su bstan te/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba la rnam par snang ba'i
421a5(phal chen): khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul ste/ rin po che thams cad me tog gi dra ba'i
421a6(phal chen): rgyan gyi kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus byin gyi rlabs nas dkyil mo dkrungs bcas te 'khod do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs
421a7(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ri rab rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan mar me zhes bya ba de bzhin gsheg/
421a8(phal chen): pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes sgron ma sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten
421b1(phal chen): gyi khams brgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra bskyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des stang nas 'khor gyi rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings
421b2(phal chen): thams cad bdugs spos kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu bri ba snyed kyi rgyas par 'geng
421b3(phal chen): ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyas par 'gyengs
421b4(phal chen): ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad bsngags spos kha dog sna tshogs dang dri du mar ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu pha bsnyed kyis
421b5(phal chen): brgyas par 'gyings pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
421b6(phal chen): kyi rgyas par gang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mdangs 'byung bas thams cad kyi rdul gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas
421b7(phal chen): kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan 'od dkyil 'khor sna tshogs
421b8(phal chen): kyi brgyan dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgangs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rin po che'i
422a1(phal chen): @#rgyal po rdo rje snying po kha dog sna tshogs rngan/ rgyun rnam pa tha dad pa'i ri rab kyi sbyin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du bde pa'i rdul /
422a2(phal chen): zla ba snyed kyi rgyas par 'gang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rin po che'i 'dzam bu chu klung 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba'i yul dang ldan pa'i
422a3(phal chen): ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba nyid kyi rgyas par gang ba dang / na mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor blo che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings
422a4(phal chen): thams cad rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba nyid kyi kun khyab par byin gyi rlabs pa dang / sems can khams kyi
422a5(phal chen): yul thams cad kyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
422a6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyas par 'geng ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad na mkha' rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs thams cad
422a7(phal chen): kyi mngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu snang bar yongs su ston cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgra byin ri rab sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra
422a8(phal chen): bsnyed kyi rgyas par 'gongs pa dang / phyogs thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub rab tu snang ba'i 'od
422b1(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyas par 'gyengs pa byed cing / mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams/
422b2(phal chen): gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong te/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ nub phyogs su gtan te
422b3(phal chen): khang pa rtsegs pa'i spos kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi lhun dang ldan pa/ mu tig gi dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che lha'i dbang po rab tu snang ba'i rgyal
422b4(phal chen): mtshan gyi pad ma'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che gser gyi dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i spyod dpan bcings pa'i byang chub sems
422b5(phal chen): dpe'i lus su byin gyi rlabs nas dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// byang gi phyogs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
422b6(phal chen): pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che gos yongs su snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings na mkha'i dpal rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas//
422b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / lhan cig
422b8(phal chen): tu bcom ldan 'das de snang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de las 'phags te/ na mkha'i dbyings rin po che rnams bu'i sprin gyi rgyan par byin gyi rlabs dang / namakha'i dbyings
423a1(phal chen): rin po ches gos kha dog ser po dang / mdog ser po'i sprin gyis rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyi rlabs pa/ na mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos
423a2(phal chen): tshogs kyi dri zhim por byas pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'babs pa'i brgyan gyi brgyan par byin gyi rlabs/ na mkha'i dbyi dpa rin po che'i rgyal po'i nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi
423a3(phal chen): sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyin brlabs pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu rin po che gser gyi 'dog shin tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyi rgyan gyi brgyan par byin gyi rlobs
423a4(phal chen): pa dang / na mkha'i dbyings nor bu rin po che 'bar ba'i gos kyi rkyen gyis brgyan pa par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / na mkha'i dbyings nor bu rin po che skar ma thams cad kyi
423a5(phal chen): gzugs snyan gyi sna tshogs su gyur pa'i gos kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyi brgyan par byin gyi rlabs pa dang / na mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcur kun nas nor bu rin po che'i snam bu 'gro
423a6(phal chen): bo'i rdo ltar snang ba'i sprin gyi yongs su rgyas par byin gyi rlabs pa dang / na mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i dpal rab tu 'bar
423a7(phal chen): ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyi rlabs pa dang / mamakha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor bu'i rgyal po snang ba shin tu gsal bas phyog
423a8(phal chen): kyi dbyings rnam par snang ba'i gos kyi sprin gyi yongs su rgyas par byin gyi rlabs pa dang / na mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi gos kyi sprin gyi nus g.yon
423b1(phal chen): par byin gyi rlobs par byed cing / mi 'byed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na 'a der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom 'das
423b2(phal chen): kha phyag 'tshal nas byang phyogs su bstan te rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri bI dUr+ya'i pad mo'i snying po can dag
423b3(phal chen): mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge 'dzes pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i skar ma'i rgyal mtshan mgo la thogs pa'i byang chub sems
423b4(phal chen): dpa'i lus su byin gyi rlabs nas/ dkyil dkrungs bcas te 'khod do// byang dang shar gyi phyogs tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa
423b5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chen po thams cad du mdzes pa'i rin po che'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa mi
423b6(phal chen): dmigs pa'i spyan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings shin tu 'phrul ba'i smon lam zla ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten
423b7(phal chen): gyi khams brgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das snang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig
423b8(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che'i khang partsegs pa'i sprin gyi kun nas khyibs par byin gyi rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams
424a1(phal chen): la@#cad spos kyi khang brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi kun nas khyab par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad du bdug spos
424a2(phal chen): kyi khang partsegs pa'i sprin gyi kun nas khyab par byin gyi rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum klas pa thams cad tsan dan gyi khang partsegs pa'i sprin gyi kun nas
424a3(phal chen): khyab par byin gyi brlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad me tog gi khang partsegs pi sprin kun nas khyebs par byin gyi rlabs pa dang / 'jig
424a4(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che'i khang brtsegs pa'i sprin kun nas khebs par byin gyi rlabs pa dang / 'jig rteni khams 'jam klas pa thams
424a5(phal chen): cad rdo rje'i khang brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi kun nas khyabs par byin gyi rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khums thams cad gser gyi khang brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi kun nas
424a6(phal chen): khyab par byin gyi rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad gos kyi khang partsegs pa'i sprin gyi kun nas khyebs par byin gyi rlabs pa dang / 'jig
424a7(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa thams cad pad mo'i khang partsegs pa'i sprin gyi kun nas khyabs par byin gyis rlabs par byed cing / mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na
424a8(phal chen): ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das glan ba der dong te/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtsham su btan ste nor
424b1(phal chen): bu rin po che'i khang partsegs pa sgo chos kyi dbyings thams cad las mngon par lta ba dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po spos tshungs pa med pa'i pad mo'i snying po snying can
424b2(phal chen): dag mngon par sprul nas rin po che'i rgyal po me tog gi dra bas yongs su rgyan pa dang / rin po che rgyal po'i mdzod sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i dpyod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems
424b3(phal chen): dpa'i lus su byin gyi rlabs nas/ dkyil mo dkrungs bcas te 'khod do// shar dang lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
424b4(phal chen): med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed gyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprin gyi brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa klu dang rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
424b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'od 'phro dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang
424b6(phal chen): lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des nang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags ste/ na mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi kha dog lta bu
424b7(phal chen): sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / namakha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu'i kha dog gis 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin kun nas khyab par bya ba
424b8(phal chen): dang / na mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / na mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gtu
425a1(phal chen): bal@#pa'i mdzod sku'i kha dog gi 'od kyis dkyil 'khor sprin gyi kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / dbyings thams cad rin po che thams cad rin po rje
425a2(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyi kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / na mkha'i dbyings thams cad pad mo'i 'od kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi
425a3(phal chen): sprin gyi kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / na mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i rgyal po rin po che'i shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'od kyi
425a4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyi kun tu khyadab pa dang / na mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi kun nas khyab
425a5(phal chen): bar bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam
425a6(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings thams cad nyi ma'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyi kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / na mkha'i dbyings thams cad zla ba dang skar ma'i
425a7(phal chen): tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyi kun tu khyab par byed cing mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
425a8(phal chen): gang na ba der dong te/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams su btan te/ rin po che'i rdul dang bral zhing rnam par
425b1(phal chen): snang ba phun sum tshogs pa'i me tog gi khang partsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che seng ge rdo rje pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal /
425b2(phal chen): rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyi rlabs nas dkyil mo dkrungs bcas te 'khod do// lho
425b3(phal chen): dang nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khaMs rin
425b4(phal chen): bo che nyi ma rab tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ye shes kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa'i
425b5(phal chen): sdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba skyed
425b6(phal chen): dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des snang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags ste/ ba spu'i bu thams cad na men+ta 'od 'phro ba'i sprin na mkha'i dmakha'i
425b7(phal chen): dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu bgyi ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rol mo'i 'od 'phyo ba'i sprin na mkha'i ltar yangs pa rab tu skye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad
