425b8(phal chen): nas nor bu rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin na mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i gos 'od 'phro ba spos dang / bdug
426a1(phal chen): bal@#spos sna tshogs kyi rnam par bdug pa'i sprin na mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas klus rnam par sprul
426a2(phal chen): pa'i glog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin na mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che rnam par snang 'od 'phro ba'i sprin na mkha'i
426a3(phal chen): dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spyi ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che gser rab tu 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin na mkha'i dbyings thams cad ltar yangs pa rab
426a4(phal chen): tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams nas rin po che'i rgyal po dpal gyi snying po 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin namakha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga
426a5(phal chen): thams cad nas nor bu rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rgya mtsho ltar dus gsum gyi rgyud rab tu snang ba'i tshul dang / ldan pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin na mkha'i dbyings ltar
426a6(phal chen): yangs pa rab tu dgye ba byed cing / bya ba mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong te/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom
426a7(phal chen): ldan 'das phyag 'tshal nas/ lho dang nub kyi phyogs 'tshams su stan te/ nor bu rin po che chen po 'od zer gyi dra ba phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol ba 'i thig les chos kyi dbyings
426a8(phal chen): thams cad du rab tu snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi sgron ma 'od 'phro ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i/
426b1(phal chen): rgyal po dri ma med pa'i snying po dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po sems can thams cad rab tu 'dzud pa'i dbyangs ldan pa'i btson dpan cings pa'i byang chub
426b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i lus su byin gyi rlabs nas dkyil mo dkrungs bcas te 'khod do// nub dang byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod
426b3(phal chen): du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad kyis snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi ri bo kun nas rnam par
426b4(phal chen): snang ba'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam ye shes dpal gyi bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams
426b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig du bcom ldan 'das des snang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags ste/ mtshan dang dpe byed
426b6(phal chen): bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang lus thams cad nas/ dus gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs bsnyen gyi
426b7(phal chen): sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byed bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems
426b8(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs snyen gyi sprin kun tu skye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad lus thams cad nas dus
427a1(phal chen): 25/ @#gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lus gzugs spyan gyi sprin kun tu dbye ba dang /
427a2(phal chen): mtshan dang dpe byed bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i tshogs kyi gzugs rnyan
427a3(phal chen): mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
427a4(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi mngon gyi sbyor ba'i gzugs snyan mang po'i gzugs stan mang po'i sprin kun tu skye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad
427a5(phal chen): dang rdza lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs bstan rab tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad
427a6(phal chen): dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub dang / byang chub kyi shing gi gzugs snyan gyi
427a7(phal chen): sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
427a8(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs rnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad dus gsum
427b1(phal chen): du 'byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs snyan gyi sprin kun du dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /
427b2(phal chen): lus thams cad nas dus gsum du 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyi gzugs snyen gyi sprin kun tu dgyes pas skad cig skad cig tu nam mkha'i
427b3(phal chen): dbyings thams cad rgyas par dbyings shing mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pa
427b4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams su tan te/ rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs kun nas snang ba snying po'i seng ge'i khri rin po che 'gro rnam pas
427b5(phal chen): dpo can mngon par sprul nas mu tig 'od thub pa med pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che 'od kun tu snang ba'i bcod dben bcing ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i
427b6(phal chen): lus su byin gyi rlabs nas dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang
427b7(phal chen): ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes na mkha' lta bur chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib/
427b8(phal chen): pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par non pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
427b9(phal chen): cho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i brdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
428a1(phal chen): pal/ @#dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des snang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de des 'phags ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'gro
428a2(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi skad dang / sgra dang dbyangs dang / nges pa'i tshig mngon par sgrub pa rgya mtsho rab tu brjod pa dang / dus gsum gyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
428a3(phal chen): 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra rab tu skrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par sgrub pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu sgrags
428a4(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad pha rol phyin pa yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi sgra rab tu skrag pa dang / byang chub
428a5(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor zhing thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu skrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
428a6(phal chen): cad kyi yang dag par rab tu sgrub pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sku la rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu skrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snying po byang chub tu gshegs
428a7(phal chen): pa dang / bdud kyi dkrugs me rnam par mthong ba dang / snying po byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa'i dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu smra ba dang / de bzhin
428a8(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba dang / mdo sde'i tshul dang / ming rgya 'tsho'i dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra skrag pa dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba thams cad dus khyab pa'i
428b1(phal chen): 'khor los 'dul ba'i chos kyi tshul dang // thabs kyi sgra rab tu bsgrags pa dang / ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smon lam ji ltar btabs dang / dge ba'i/
428b2(phal chen): rtsa ba'i khyad pa dang / dus dang thabs dang chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu skrag pa byed cing mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
428b3(phal chen): gang na ba der dong de/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'og gi phyogs su btan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzhal med khang
428b4(phal chen): gzugs snyan du rab tu snang ba'i rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyis mdzod kyi khang partsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che thams cad gzugs kyi pad mo'i snying po yongs
428b5(phal chen): su bzung ba dag mngon par sprul nas rin po che'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs snyan rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi gcod dben mgo la bcings
428b6(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyi rlabs nas dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
428b7(phal chen): pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun
428b8(phal chen): tu snang ba'i dbyangs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi bzhin rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig
429a1(phal chen): bal@#rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu dra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
429a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang / snying lag thams/
429a3(phal chen): cad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad dang gos dang / smad g.yogs thams cad nas byang chub sems pa'i 'khor thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
429a4(phal chen): dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa thams cad dang phyi ma'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa dang / lung stan pa ma byon
429a5(phal chen): ba thams dang / da ltar byung ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad bzhugs pa rnams kyi mngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdzad pa dang ldan pa'i
429a6(phal chen): sngon gyis sbyor ba rgya mtsho dang / len pa dang / sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs snyan mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / ba spu'i sgo dang / lus thams cad dang /
429a7(phal chen): yan lag dang / nying lag dang / tshig gi lam dang / gos dang smad g.yogs thams cad la rab tu snang 'gyur ba rnam par bstan pa dang / tshub khrims kyi pha rol tu
429a8(phal chen): ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu snang bar yongs su bstan pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa yan lag dang / nying
429b1(phal chen): lag thams cad 'thub pa rab tu bstan pa dang ldan pa'i mngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
429b2(phal chen): cad kyi brtson 'grus dang / drag shul dang / rnam par ston pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin
429b3(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan rgya mtsho yongs su tshol zhing rab tu bsgrub pa dang / ldan pa'i mngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar 'gyur ba yongs su
429b4(phal chen): bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul yongs su sgrub cing chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa dang bdog pa
429b5(phal chen): thams cad yongs su stong zhing shin tu zhe gnon pa'i lus dang / de'i gzugs snyan rnam par dmigs par bya bas mngon gyis sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar 'gyur
429b6(phal chen): ba yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing dga' ba dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis lam la 'gro ba thams cad mngon par mos
429b7(phal chen): bar byed pa dang ldan pa'i mngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar 'gyur ba yongs su btan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo
429b8(phal chen): yongs su dag pa'i brgyan dang ldan pa'i mngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar tu snang bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyi pha rol
430a1(phal chen): byin pa rab tu bsgrub pa dang rnam par snan pa dang / rnam par dag par byas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su
430a2(phal chen): bstan pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis rgyas par rkang pa te byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i
430a3(phal chen): mngon gyis sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa byed cing / mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba dong
430a4(phal chen): steH'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ steng gi mchog su btan te/ rdo rje'i dbang po sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po can gyi khang pa rtsegs
430a5(phal chen): pa dang / seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang / in dra ni li'i pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas kun brgyan pa dang /
430a6(phal chen): rin por che'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dbyangs su sgrogs pa'i phreng ba rab tu 'chang ba dang / mgo la rin po che'i spyod dpan thogs pa'i/ byang chub sems
430a7(phal chen): dpa'i lus su byin gyi rlabs nas/ dkyil mo dkrungs bcas te 'khod do// / 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas 'phel po che zhes bya las//
430a8(phal chen): bam po brgyad cu gya bdun pa'o// / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas par byang chub sems dpa' kun bzang po'i
430b1(phal chen): spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas zhal du lta ba ye shes yongs su dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs
430b2(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi chos 'khor lo dang / mdo sde'i tshul gsungs rgya mtsho la rna ba yongs su gzhol ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba la pha rol tu
430b3(phal chen): phyin pa'i mchog thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong ba/ skad cig skad cig tu yongs su btan par rnam par 'phrul pas 'byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi
430b4(phal chen): khams thams cad du lus cig gi rgyas par gangs pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lus/ mngon par 'byung zhing rnam par
430b5(phal chen): snang ba rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu snang zhing khong du chud pa ston pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul
430b6(phal chen): ba'i dus la 'dod par bzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rab tu sgrogs pa'i yul dang ldan pa/
430b7(phal chen): sems can gyi khams thams cad rgyu ma lta bur shes pa rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mig g.yer lta bur khong du chud pa srid pa'i rgyud du skye ba thams cad
430b8(phal chen): rmi lam lta bus shes pas 'byung ba las rnam par smin pa thams cad gzugs lta bur shes pas/ rnam par dag pa ye shes mngon par sgrub pa thams cad smig sgyu lta bur
431a1(phal chen): la@#mngon par shes pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / ye shes/
431a2(phal chen): kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mi 'jig pa'i khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ros rnam par gnon pa/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pa'i rgya mtshor zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams
431a3(phal chen): cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi nges pa'i tshigs gi ye shes rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang na mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / ldan pa chos
431a4(phal chen): thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ bdud kyi
431a5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor thams cad thams cad rnam par dkrug pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ dus gsum thams cad shes pa'i stobs la rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad la ye shes
431a6(phal chen): sgrib pa med pa rab tu thob pa/ gnas med pas na mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa len pa na mkha' lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ srid pa thams
431a7(phal chen): cad mi dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod rgyun/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho rab tu zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad/ tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi sgor zhugs
431a8(phal chen): ba 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gcig nas gcig tu bzud pa'i/ rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad du skyes pa'i lus yongs su
431b1(phal chen): ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs phra ba dang / rgya che ba dang / yangs pa dang / dog pa sna tshogs rab tu rtogs pa shin tu phra bar zhing rgya chen po yang dag par
431b2(phal chen): bzung ye shes khong du chud pa dmigs pa chen po shin tu phra bar shes pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang sems kyi skad la 'brogs pa rab tu thob pa dang / de bzhin ga
431b3(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa sems kyi skad cig gis phyogs rgya mtsho
431b4(phal chen): thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa sha stag te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi de lta bu'i yon tan/ tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dag
431b5(phal chen): sha stag gi 'dze ta'i tshal thams cad yongs su rgyas par 'gyur kyang / nyan thos chen po sha ri'i bu dang / me'u 'gal gyi bu dang / 'od srung chen po dang / nam gru dang / rab
431b6(phal chen): 'byor dang / 'gag med dang / mos pa dang / kra t+ya'i bu dang / byams gangs gi bu la sogs pas/ 'dze ta'i 'tshal na 'khod bzhin tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
431b7(phal chen): 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi brgyan de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang // sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul
431b8(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par yang mthong ngo //
431b9(phal chen): rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
432a1(phal chen): la/ @#byang chub sems dpa'i yul bsam gyi mi khyab pa de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas
432a2(phal chen): 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nye bar 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub
432a3(phal chen): sems dpa'i cho 'phrul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs su khod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i se ge'i khri brgyan dang
432a4(phal chen): byang chub sems pa'i khang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam
432a5(phal chen): par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'gyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bsnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang /
432a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' lung btan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon du mdor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
432a7(phal chen): chos kyi lus rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi lus rnam par dmigs pa dang /
432a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'tshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyi
432b1(phal chen): dkyil 'khor 'pho mtha' yas pa'i rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa'i sprin kun tu bgye ba dang / byang/
432b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i phyogs kyi dra ba rgya mtshor gangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul ba yang ma mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na//
432b3(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs pa'i phyir te/ de dag gis ni sngon sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma rtsags so// de dag la ni mngon
432b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan dang / rgyan yongs su dag par
432b5(phal chen): bstan pa mdzad do// de dag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par brjod pa ma mdzad do// de dag gis ni sngon 'khor
432b6(phal chen): ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sems can rnams bla na med pa yang bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba ma byas so// de dag gis ni gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la/
432b7(phal chen): byang chub tu skyed pa rab tu bzhag pa ma byas so// de dag gi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdungs rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin no// de dag gi ni sems can
432b8(phal chen): thams cad yongs su smra ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin no// de dag gi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba ma byas so// de dag gi
433a1(phal chen): pa lamangon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi lam dmigs pa ma byas so// de dag gi
433a2(phal chen): ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar brtsegs pa ma byas so// de dag gi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
433a3(phal chen): ba yongs su ma sgrub so// de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i mngon par shes pa khong du ma chud do// de dag gi ni byang chub
433a4(phal chen): sems dpa'i mig gi lam gyi rnam par dmigs par bya 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mongs ma yin pa'i byang chub tu dmigs pa'i dge rdzi ga/ byang chub sems
433a5(phal chen): dpa'i smon lam chen po las byung ba khong du ma chud do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kun gyi ni byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi rmig gi lam
433a6(phal chen): gyi rnam par dmigs pa thun mongs ma yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i rgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyi sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa'i
433a7(phal chen): 'du shes sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin pa byin gyi rlobs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa khong du ma chud do// de bas
433a8(phal chen): nyan thos chen po mchog gi bzung dang / bzang po'i zung las stsogs pa de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de mi mthong ngo mi thos so//
433b1(phal chen): shes so// khong du mi chud do// mi rtogs so// mi rig go// yid ma ches so// mi sems so// rnam par mi lta'o// rdzogs par mi lta'o// nges par mi sems so// nye bar mi sems
433b2(phal chen): so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul te/ nyan thos kyis spyod yul ma yin/ de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khor kyang sangs rgyas kyi
433b3(phal chen): rnam par 'phral ba de dag mi mthong ste/ de dag la de dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med do// de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phral ba de dag mthong du/ de lta bu'i ye shes
433b4(phal chen): kyi mig rnam par ma dag go// dmigs pa chung ngu la rgya chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jug tu ting nge 'dzin de lta bu med do// de dag shes pa dang lta ba 'am/ khong du chud par bya ba
433b5(phal chen): 'am rtogs par bya ba 'am/ rgyas par dgang ba'am/ 'jug par bya ba 'am/ rnam par lta bar bya ba 'am/ nyams su myongs par bya 'am/ gnan pa 'am rnam par gnan pa 'am/
433b6(phal chen): gzhan gyi thos par bya ba 'am/ bstan par bya ba 'am/ smos par bya ba 'am/ yang dag par bstan par bya ba 'am/ bstan par bya ba 'am/ sbyin par bya ba 'am/ de la sems can
433b7(phal chen): rnams yongs su bskul bar bya ba 'am/ sbyar bar bya ba 'am/ rab tu 'god par bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos nyid la sems can dgod par bya ba yang de/
433b8(phal chen): dag la de lta bu'i rnam par thar par med do// de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul med do// de lta bu'i khyu mchog gis thu med do// de lta bu'i dbang po med do// de lta bu'i gnas med do// de lta bu'i/
433b9(phal chen): de lta bu'i sems med do//
434a1(phal chen): la/ @#'du shes med do// de lta bu'i smig gi mthu zed do// de lta bu'i ye shes med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni de sngar nyan thos kyis theg pas 'byung
434a2(phal chen): nyan thos kyi lam gyi yongs su sgrub pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa nyan thos kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa/ bden pa snang ba shes pas nges
434a3(phal chen): bar rtogs pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa shin tu zhi ba'i mthar thug pa/ snying rje chen po bsam pa med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad mi lta mi ldog pa/ rang gi don
434a4(phal chen): grub pa dang / de dag ni 'dze ti'i tshal de nyid du kun nas 'dus ste 'khod la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dang / g.yas g.yon dang / rnam na bcom ldan 'das la
434a5(phal chen): mngon tu lta bar gnas kyang 'dze taSh+Ti der sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma 'gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma
434a6(phal chen): sgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsdugs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la smon lam yang dag par ma btabs pa dang /
434a7(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par ma sgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma sbyangs pa de dag gi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par
434a8(phal chen): 'phrul pa de la 'jug cing rtogs par bya ba da / blta zhing khong du chud par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de na byang chub sems dpa'i rigs dang ldan pa rnams kyi/
434a9(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag par ma zhugs pa dang
434b1(phal chen): mig gi lam gyi lta ba yin gyis nyan thos kyi mig gi lta ba ma ma yin no// de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag mdze ta'i tshal de nyid nas khod kyang de bzhi gshegs pa'i rnam par/
434b2(phal chen): 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa yang mthong bar ma gyur to// de yang
434b3(phal chen): 'di ltas te dper na/ 'ga' 'ga'i chu klung chen po'i dogs pha rol tshu rol du yi dgas dkres pa dang sgom pas rab tu mnar ba/ gcer ba/ gos med pa/ lus kyis 'dog
434b4(phal chen): ba dang / kha dog dang 'tshig cing cholnga pa/ rlung dang nyi mas bskams pa/ bya rog mang pos rtse ba/ spyad kyi dang / was mtho 'tshams pa stong du mang po kun nas kyang 'ga'
434b5(phal chen): 'ga'i klung gi mthong ste/ sgrib pa'i las kyis bsgrib pa'i phyir/ la las ni skams te chu med pa'i mthong ngo // la las ni thal bas yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // de
434b6(phal chen): bzhin du nyan thos chen po gnas rten de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma rig pa'i ling tog gi mig kun
434b7(phal chen): nas 'khebs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus yongs su bzung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong /
434b8(phal chen): ma shes so// 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma chen po 'dus pa'i skye bo mang po'i dbus su mi la la ni zhag gnyid kyi ltos te/ log par gyur nas/ de gnyid log pa'i
435a1(phal chen): bal@#rmi lam du/ gnas de nyid na lha'i grong rdal brgya sbyin gnas bstan 'dzes pa dang ri rab kyi steng shing dang bcas pa bzang shing gi ra ba'i
435a2(phal chen): 'khor dang bcas pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi gang ba/ lha'i bu khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snyed gnas pa/ lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyi yongs su gang
435a3(phal chen): ba dang rdza yid bzhin gyi shing lha rdzas kyi gos dang / mu tig gi 'breng ba dang / rin po che'i brgyan dang / se mo do sna tshogs mang po sbyin pa dang / lha rdzas bsil snyan
435a4(phal chen): sna tshogs rlud kyi yongs su bskyod cing sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong la snyan pa'i sgra sbyin pa'i bsil snyan gyi shing mang po dang // dga' rtse mo'i brgyan rnam pa sna tshogs
435a5(phal chen): mthong bar 'gyur la lha'i bu mo mang pos klus blangs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo byas pa'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing sman pa thos par gyur te/ bdag nyid kyang de na 'dug/
435a6(phal chen): ba snyam byed la/ lha rdzas kyi brgyan gyi klub pa'i gnas de dag thams cad mthong bar 'gyur kyang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po de dag gi gnas de nyid na 'khod bzhin du
435a7(phal chen): mi mthong mi shes khong du mi chud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni skyes bu'i gnyid kyis log pa dang de nyid kyi rmi lam gyi lta ba yin gyis/ gnas de nyid na khod kyang skye bo mang po
435a8(phal chen): de dag gi lta ba ma yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'jig rten gyis dbang po byang chub mngon par mos pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi/ byin gyi rlabs chen
435b1(phal chen): po dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs ma nor bar shin tu rgyags pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam shin tu mngon par sgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
435b2(phal chen): ba'i yon tan thams cad shin tu zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam rgyan chen po dang ldan pa la shin tu gnas pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi chos
435b3(phal chen): nyid dang / yan lag rnam pa thams cad du shin tu rdzogs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya
435b4(phal chen): rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting dzin gyis rnam par
435b5(phal chen): spyod pa thams cad la rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi spyod yul thams cad la chags pa med pa rnam par spyod pas/ bsam gyi mi khyab
435b6(phal chen): ba'i sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi mthu chung ba de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa de dag gi mthong zhing khong du chud par gyur kyang / nyan thos chen po mchog
435b7(phal chen): gi bzungs dang / bzang po'i bzungs la sogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i mig med pas mthong bar ma gyur/ shes par ma gyur to// 'di lta ste/
435b8(phal chen): dper na/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can sman gyi 'byung gnas kyi gang ba sngags dang / rigs sngags dang / sman gyi tshul dang / blang ba'i rgyus shes shing rig sngags
436a1(phal chen): bal@#sgrub pa'i skyes bu gnas pa spun gyi chos thams cad shes pa sman blangs pa'i lus byed kyang / ri bo'i dbang po de nyid gnas pa'i byugs
436a2(phal chen): dang ba lang dang / ra lug 'tsho ba dang / mngon pa dang / de ma yin pa'i mi sman gyis tshul mi shes pa gzhan dag gi sman de dag gi cho ga dang / sman gyi ro dang /
436a3(phal chen): mthu dang / yon tan dang / byin dang / thabs dang / 'phros pa mi shes so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis yul la
436a4(phal chen): zhugs pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul gyi 'byung ba de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag mthong yang /
436a5(phal chen): nyan thos chen po mchog gi gzungs dang / bzang po'i bzung la sogs pa dang / rang gi gos tshim par gyur pa/ gzhan gyi gos pa yal bar gzhog pa/ gtang snyoms can de
436a6(phal chen): dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na gnas kyang / tshe 'di la bde bar spyod pa bde zhing dga' bar gnas pa la la bar te de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa'i
436a7(phal chen): yul pa ste de dag khong du mi chud do// 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa gter brgya stong du mar gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs
436a8(phal chen): pa gter brgya stong du mar gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su gang ba'i 'di lta yang rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / gtor gyis rgyus lA shIng byang ba'i
436b1(phal chen): miHrin po che rtags pa'i gtsug lag gis blo shin tu sbyangs pa/ gter gyi tsug lags dang / rgyus dang / ngan tags rgya nobs par longs pa/ bsod nams rgya chen po'i stobs
436b2(phal chen): kyi bstan pa dag/ de las rin po che ci 'dod par blangs shing / bdag kyang yongs su tshim par byed/ pha dang ma la yang legs par rim gro byed/ bu pho mos kyang legs par
436b3(phal chen): bsos pa byed cing / de ma yin pa'i sems can rgan pa dang / na ba dang dbul ba dang / nyam nyes pa dang / kha zas dang / gos kyi mi sbyor ba rnam la bstud cing khyad par go sha
436b4(phal chen): byed la/ nor gyi dga' nyams su myong bar byed cing sems can rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / gter gyi rgyus mi shes pa/ bsod nams ma byas pa/ rin po che la sha'i mig
436b5(phal chen): yongs su ma dag pa de man nyid kho na khod kyang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas de dag dang / rin po che'i gter de dag khong du chud mi shes pas rin po che yang blang du med do//
436b6(phal chen): rin po che'i don kyang byar med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bsam gyi mi khyab pa la ye shes kyi smig shin tu rnam par dag pa/ de bzhin
436b7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul bsam gyi mi khyab pa la zhugs pa la de dag 'dze tra'i tshal na 'khod cing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong la/ chos kyi tshul
436b8(phal chen): rgya mtsho la 'jug cing / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag brgya yongs su sgrub te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro la brtson zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba la
437a1(phal chen): phal@#mngon par brtson te bde ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can de dag yongasu sdus kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul/
437a2(phal chen): pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po kun nas bsdus pa de lta bu'i yang mthong ma shes so// 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la lA mi gnyid log kyi skabs ste/
437a3(phal chen): rin po che'i gling du phyin par gyur na/ der rin po che'i gling der phan tshun 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba med/ 'dug pa dang / nyal ba byas kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas de mi mthong ngo //
437a4(phal chen): rin po che'i shing dang / gos kyi rin po che dang / spos rin po che dang / rin po che thams cad kyang mi mthong la/ rin po che de dag gi spyod yul lam/ rin mthang ngam/ yongs su
437a5(phal chen): spyad pa'i rgyus kyang mi shes pas/ de ni rin po che de dag len kyang / rin po che'i don kyang nyams su myongs par mi byed do// gang gis mig la sgrib pa med pa de dag thams cad shing //
437a6(phal chen): shes so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i chos rin po che'i gling chen por phyin pa de dag gi bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyu tu gyur pa
437a7(phal chen): mngon du gyur te/ mdze ta'i tshal na bzhugs zhing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa yongs su ston pa/ mthong yang nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gA
437a8(phal chen): ba'i zhabs kyi drung de nyid na gnas shing spyod kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul de dag mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i
437b1(phal chen): tshogs mang po de lta bu'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas/ chen po yang dag mthong bar 'gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba
437b2(phal chen): dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyi mi khyab pa de dag ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi ma rig pa'i gos kyis ye shes kyi mig bka' ba de dag la byang chub
437b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig yongs su dag pa de lta bu med do// de dag gis chos dbyings gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa la 'jug pa de lta bu khong du chud do// 'di lta ste dper/
437b4(phal chen): naH mig yongs su dag pa rngu dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan zhes bya ba rab rib dang / mun pa thams cad dang mi 'grogs pa yod de/ de la mi la la zhig gis thob
437b5(phal chen): par gyur na/ de rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas/ mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nag shin tu gnag par gyur pa'i nang na/ sems
437b6(phal chen): can bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong kun nas 'das pa dang / cho ga dang spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / mun pa'i rab rib kyis mig yongs su khrug par 'gyur ba'i
437b7(phal chen): mi'i khrod na 'dug cing rnam par rgyu ba la phan tshun 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyod kyang de dag gis/ skyes bu spyod lam sna tshogs kyi
437b8(phal chen): spyod pa de mi mthong ngo // mi shes so// skyes bu de ni 'gro ba'i chen po dang spyod lam dang / cho ga sna tshogs kyi rnam par spyod pa dang / phyogs tha dad du mngon par ltas pa
438a1(phal chen): la@#dbyibs kyi rnam par tha dad pa/ kha dog gi rnam pa tha dad pa/ dmigs pa'i tshul tha dad pa/ thams cad kyang mi mthong ba med do// de bzhin tu/
438a2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor mnga' ba/ rnam par dag cing chags pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen
438a3(phal chen): gzigs ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa mdzad kyang / nyan thos chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
438a4(phal chen): dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul chen po de mthong bar 'gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs chen po de lta bu yang
438a5(phal chen): mthong bar 'gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na dge slong la la zhig skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi dbus su sas khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs sam/ chus
438a6(phal chen): khyab pa 'am/ mes khyabs pa 'am/ rlung gi khyab pa 'am/ sngon pos khyab pa'am/ ser pos khyab pa 'am/ dmar pos khyab pa 'am/ dkar pos khyab pa 'am/ lhas
438a7(phal chen): khyab pa 'am/ sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyi khyab pa 'am/ sgra dang dbyangs kun nas bral ba dang / dmigs pa thams cad kyi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
438a8(phal chen): zhugs na/ 'gro ba mang po'i tshogs de dag gi chu'i phung po de mi mthong ngo // me'i snang ba de yang mi mthong ngo // sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyi khyab pa dang / dmigs
438b1(phal chen): ba can du khyab pa'i bar du yang mi mthong ste/ ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par spyod pa rnams ni ma rtogs so// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas
438b2(phal chen): kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yul rnam par sprul pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa de dag yongs su bstan pa mdzad na/ nyan thos chen po de dag gis mthong shing shes par ma 'gyur ste/ byang chub sems
438b3(phal chen): dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul de dag mthong ngo // khong du chud do// skye ba sgrub par mi ni mig gnyis bskus ma thag
438b4(phal chen): tu/ skye bo mang po thams cad kyi lus mi mthong ngo // 'dug gam/ 'greng yang rung ste/ 'gro ba mang po thams cad mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dzin rten
438b5(phal chen): las 'das par 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul las yongs su 'das pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig gis
438b6(phal chen): shes par bya ba des/ 'gro ba thams cad gzigs kyang nyan thos chen po de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo // 'di lta ste dper na/
438b7(phal chen): mi'i tsher 'grogs pa'i lha rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba ni des mi de mthong yang mis lha de mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul
438b8(phal chen): la bzhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kun nas 'dus pa rin po che'i dbus su/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs su brtan pa mdzad kyang / nyan
439a1(phal chen): @thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / cho 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
439a2(phal chen): 'khor gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong ba ma shes so// 'di lta ste dper na/ dge slong sems can thams cad la dbang gis pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa dang /
439a3(phal chen): 'du shes dang tshor ba mgog pa la snyom par zhugs pa ni shes pa med la tshor ba med pas/ dbang po drug gis kyang bya ba gang yang nyam su myong ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa
439a4(phal chen): yang dag pa ma yin la 'jig rten gyi rnam par spyod pa thams cad gnas rten yod kyang snyom par zhugs pa de nyid kyi byin rlabs dang mthus de mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du/
439a5(phal chen): nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de na yang rnam par spyod la/ de dag la dbang po drug kyang yod des/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'phrul/
439a6(phal chen): pa dang rdza khyu mchog gis mthu phyung ba dang / cho 'phrul de dag mthong bar mi 'gyur/ khong du chud par ma gyu to// byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag dang /
439a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang khong du ma chud ma mthong / ma shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni zab cing yang la tshad med de/
439a8(phal chen): blta bar dka' zhing rtogs par bka' ste/ khong du chud par dka' la/ 'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'das so// sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyi mi khyad ste nyan
439b1(phal chen): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi 'dus pa'o// de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'od cing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na spyod kyang
439b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag kyang mthong ngo // 'dze ta'i tshal 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa/ bsam
439b3(phal chen): gyi mi khyab par rnam par dag pa'i yon tan dang / rgyan yongs su 'dus pa/ de yang ma mthong / ma shes te/ de ni de'i snod du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub
439b4(phal chen): sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon gyi gtsug gi 'od zer rab tu snang bas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ltos
439b5(phal chen): shig sems can dam pa yi// sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab/ rgyal bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa/ mdze ta'i rgyal mtshan 'dis stan s+ho// rang 'byung rnams kyi
439b6(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs// grang du med par 'byung ba la// sangs rgyas chos tshul mi shes pa'i// 'jig rten kyang mgo rmongs so// chos kyi rgyal po'i cho 'phrul dag/ tshad
439b7(phal chen): med bsam gyi mi khyab cing // shin tu zab la 'byung ba yin// de la 'jig rten 'bab mi nus// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kha dog mdog/ mtshan gyi shin tu rnam par klubs/
439b8(phal chen): yang dag sangs rgyas skyed pa'i// chos rab de dag mtshan nyid med// rnam 'phrul mtha' dang dbus med la// tshig gi lam gyi brjod dka' ba'i// rnam 'phrul shin tu zab pa//
440a1(phal chen): la/ @#dag/ rgyal bas 'dze ta'i tshal du stan// rgyal sras bdag nyid che ba'i rnams// zhing rnams bsam yas bye ba gnas// rgyal ba'i zhal stur
440a2(phal chen): mos dka' ste/ kun nas 'dus pa'i tshogs ltos// smon lam yongasu phun sum tshogs// spyod lam spyod pa chags med pa// de dag bsam pa shes par ni// 'jig
440a3(phal chen): rten kun gyi mi nus so// de dag sems dang spyod yul dang // spyod pa dag kyang nyan thos dang // rang rgyal thams cad yongs kyi kyang / rnam pa kun tu shes mi nus// rgyal
440a4(phal chen): rgyal sras shes rab chen po'i rnams// gzhan gyis thub dka' bam byed po// dpatu rgyal mtshan ma 'dres shing // ye shes sa la gzhol gyur pa// ting 'dzin dpag tu
440a5(phal chen): tshad med la// grags chen snyam par gzhag pa'i rnams// chos dbyings thams cad rgyas bkang zhing // rnam par 'phrul pa kun kyang ston// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
440a6(phal chen): thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs kyi rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par ltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras//
440a7(phal chen): bsod nams snying po shes rab ni// byang chub spyod pa'i tshul rtogs shing / 'jig rten kun la bde byed pa'i// bde gshegs sku las skyes pa ltos// yid bzhugs
440a8(phal chen): blo gros mtha' yas shing // shin tu snyam bzhan sems ldan pa// mtha' dang dbus zab pa'o// ye shes brgya mtsho spyod yul can// brgyan rab mang pos mdzes byas da'i/
440b1(phal chen): 'dze ta'i nags tshal rgya che ba// byang chub sems dpas kun rgyas shing // bde bshegs bzhugs pa'i gnas gyur pa// gnas med mi gnas gyur pa'i rnams// phyogs
440b2(phal chen): rnams bcu nas kun 'das ste// pad mo'i bstan la 'khod la dag/ rgya mtsho mngal lta bar bgyis// gnas med len pa med pa'i rnams// spros med cing mi rten la/
440b3(phal chen): rdul bral chags pa'i sems med pa// chos kyi dbyings la bzhol ba dang // ye shes pargya chen rab dpa' ba// rdo rje sem ni sems ni mi g.yo zhing // grub med pa'i/
440b4(phal chen): chos rnams la// mya ngan 'da' bar gang ston pa// phyogs bcu'i zhing mang bye ba'i rnams// grangs kyi mchod kun nas 'dus/ yang dag sangs rgyas drung du lhags/
440b5(phal chen): gnyis kyi 'du shes rnam par spangs// rang 'byung shAkya seng ge yi// rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag mthong // de'i byin rlab dam pa'i sa// byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag/
440b6(phal chen): lhags// sangs rgyas chos la byed pa med// chos dbyings bzhi la'ang de bzhin te// spyod pa rtsam du yongs byed pa'i// pha rol phyin pa'i rgyal ba'i sras// chos kyi//
440b7(phal chen): dbyings dbyer med pa'i// mtha' lu thug pa de dag gnas// tshig rnams yongs su zad med pas// chos la dbye ba'ang rab tu byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
440b8(phal chen): dpal kun 'phags pa'i gzi brjid rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par ltas ste// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smra so// ltos shig
441a1(phal chen): bal/ @#sems can dam pa'i// ye shes dkyil 'khor shin sangs// dus dang dus min mkhyen mdzad cing // sems can rnams la chos kyang
441a2(phal chen): ston mu stegs 'dus pa'i tshogs 'dus pa'i// rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'joms// sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du// rnam par 'phrul pa yongasu ston// phyog
441a3(phal chen): na mi bzhugs bde gshegs rnams// sangs rgyas yul gyi rjes ma bzhud// tshad med pa dang tshad yod las// thub pa chen pos 'das pa min// nyi ma mkha' las
441a4(phal chen): 'gro ba ni// nyin par dgreng ba mos pa med// de bzhin mkhyen pas mkhas ston med// dus gsum chags pa med pas brjod// zla ba nya'i mtshan mo la// bzla ba'i dkyil
441a5(phal chen): 'khor 'phags par snang // de bzhin chos dkar yongs su rdzogs pa yin// mgon po rnams kyang mthong ba yin// bar snang na mkha'i dbyings 'di las// nyi ma'i
441a6(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rgyu ba yin// grwar yangs thogs pa med par 'gro// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul de bzhin no// ji ltar na mkha'i phyogs rnams kyis// zhing rnams kun la
441a7(phal chen): mi gnas pa// de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma'i// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul shes par bya// ji ltar sa ni 'jig rten na// lus can kun gyi gnas yin pa// 'jig rten
441a8(phal chen): sgron ma'i 'jig rten na// chos kyi 'khor lo de ltar gnas// ji ltar rlung ni chags med par// mkhas nas mgyogs par rab rgyu ba// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid
441b1(phal chen): kyang / 'jig rten khams su rab tu rgyu// ji ltar bcu'i phung po la// zhing rnams 'grang ba kun gnas pa// de bzhin dus gsum sangs rgyas kyang // ye shes tshogs
441b2(phal chen): la rab tu gnas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po chags pa med pa'i rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par ltas
441b3(phal chen): te/ de tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ji ltar rdo rje ri dang brag/ zag yag shin tu mtho yod pa// ji ltar 'jig rten kun skyob// sangs rgyas
441b4(phal chen): mngon par 'phags pas mtho// ji rgya mtsho'i chu chen dag/ tshad med sgrog pa med par ltar// sangs rgyas mthong ba'ang de bzhin te// 'jig rten kun gyi spyod pa
441b5(phal chen): spyod// rgya mtsho'i chu las 'phags pali// ri bo ri rab ji 'dra ba// de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yang // chos kyi mtsho las mngon par 'phags/ rin chen
441b6(phal chen): kun gyi 'byung gnas kyi// rgya mtsho rgyas pa ji bzhin du// rang 'byung ye shes de bzhin ste// mi zad skad cig rab tu mkhyen// mgon po'i ye shes shin tu
441b7(phal chen): zab/ tshad med de bzhi dgrang du med// de bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa// bsam gyi mi khyab tshad med ste// rgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ston pa yi// sgyu mkhan mkhas
441b8(phal chen): pa ji lta ba// de ltar sangs rgyas mkhyen dbang // rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston// yid bzhin nor bu rnams dag pa// bsam don rdzogs byed ji lta ba//
442a1(phal chen): la/ @#de bzhin bsam pa dag pa la// rgyal ba smon lam rdzogs par mdzod// 'od snang gsal ba byed pa yi// rin chen rnam snang ji wA
442a2(phal chen): badz+ra de ltar thams cad mkhyen bdag pa// 'gro ba'i bsam pa gsal bar mdzad// ji ltar phyogs la mngon lta ba la// rin po chen zur brgyad rang gnas pa// de bzhin
442a3(phal chen): chags med sgron ma yang // chos dbyings rab tu snang ba mdzad// chu dang rin chen 'od de gsal// ji ltar dri med chu deng byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas mthong bas kyang // 'gro ba'i
442a4(phal chen): dbang po dag par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su smon lam rab tu 'phrul pa'i zla nga rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam
442a5(phal chen): bar ltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag smras so// phyogs 'di in dra ni la yis// kha dog mdog cing byas pa ltar// sangs rgyas mthong bas skyes dgu rnams/
442a6(phal chen): de bzhin byang chub mchog tu gyur// sangs rgyas rdul phran re re la// rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rnams// tshad kyi zhal du med pa ston// byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag mdzad/
442a7(phal chen): mtha' yas grub par dka' ba ste// de ni slad 'byung shin tu rab// blo stan ye shes yul des// 'jig rten rnam ni 'bab mi nus// byang chub sems dpa' sgrub ston tu/
442a8(phal chen): rgyan rnams phun sum tshogs pa dang // sangs rgyas tshul gyi rnam sbyangs pa'i// chos kyi dbyings la 'byug pa ston// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams bsam yas pa/ blo ldan skor sa
442b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyis// kun nas gang bar gyur pa yang // rgyal ba de la ston pa mdzod// chos kun mnga' gyur ston pa mdzad// shAkya khyu mchog skyes par 'gyur// de'i cho 'phrul/
442b2(phal chen): tshad med ga/ 'di dag rab tu 'byung ba yin// rten pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs rnams// tshad med rnam par gzigs gyur nas// rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa// tshad med gzi
442b3(phal chen): can ston pa mdzad// 'jig rten mgon po rgyal sras rnams// chos kyi dbyings la slob pa mdzad// chos rnams thams cad yongs la yang // chags med ye shes spyod yul 'gyur//
442b4(phal chen): skyes bu dbang po byin rlabs kyi// cho 'phrul brgya dang rab ldan zhing // 'jig rten thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i// chos kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu 'khor// sems can gtso bo'i yul
442b5(phal chen): yang ye shes dkyil 'khor yongs sbyangs shing // shes rab chen po klu chen rnams// 'jig rten thams cad 'brel par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi don gyi
442b6(phal chen): blo gros bzi brjid rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// drang song dam pa'i mchog
442b7(phal chen): rnams kyis// dus gsum nyan thos gang 'byung ba// de dag kun gyi bde bshegs kyi// gshegs thabs 'jog 'deg mi shes so// dus gsum ma lus thams cad kyi// ma
442b8(phal chen): nor rang rgyal gang byung ba// de dag gis kyang mgon po yi// gshegs thabs 'jog ldeg mi rig go// ma rig mun pas bsgrib pa rnams// khyi ltar ltong la rgyus pa yis// sems
443a1(phal chen): #can de 'du kun gyis ni// mgon pa mi shes thom mi dgas// rgyam bachad mas gzhas bzhin// de ni gas par mi nus ste// sangs rgyas chags
443a2(phal chen): med ye shes can// tshig gis lam las shin tu 'das// zla ba nya rgyas 'od mnga' ba// btan pa mtshan gyis rnam par bris// de ni skal ba dpag yas par// rnam 'phrul
443a3(phal chen): thogs med spyod pa mdzad// tshug sgo re res sangs rgyas la// shin tu mnyam bzhag bsam byas kyang // bskal pa bye ba bsam yas pa// brjod du med pa zad gyur gyi//
443a4(phal chen): rang 'byung rnam gyi yon tan las// phyogs gcig cha'i mthar mi byin// sangs rgyas de'i zhal bltas kyang // sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab// gang zhig de la smon
443a5(phal chen): byed cing // gang zhig yid kyi dga' mos pa// de dag kun kyang de 'dra ba'i// spyod yul blta dka' 'thob par gyur// bsod nams ye shes mtha' yas shing // tshogs
443a6(phal chen): chen yangs pas rnam smon pa// dri med blo ldan sems gnas pa// de dag 'di'i tshul du 'jug/ de dag smon lam rgya chen bas// sems dang sdom pa brgya che ba// rgyal ba'i
443a7(phal chen): spyod yul thob gyur cing // byang chub rgya chen non par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par mthong ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po sangs
443a8(phal chen): rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// chags med ye shes sku mnga' ba// rang 'byung rnams ni skra med des/
443b1(phal chen): bsam yas ye shes yul mnga' ba// de dag bsam par mi nus so// phrin las dkar po bsam yas pas// sangs rgyas sku rab bsgrubs pa'i phyir// de la 'jig rten gsum
443b2(phal chen): mi mgo// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po mdzes// chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam sbyangs pas// 'jig rten kun tu snang ba mdzad// sangs rgyas byang chub sgo yin te// ye shes kun gyis
443b3(phal chen): gnas chen no// chags pa thams cad rnam par spang // rdul med spros pa mi mngalo/ ye shes 'od zer rab 'gyed pa// 'jig rten kun gyi nyi ma 'dra// khams gsum thams
443b4(phal chen): cad rnam spyod pas// srid pa'i 'jig rten rnam par spyod// byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa mdzad// byang chub 'byung gnas de bzhin no// kha dog kun la gnas pa med// sem
443b5(phal chen): can kun la bsam yas pa'i// kha dog tshad med yongs su ston// skad cig gcig las sangs rgyas kyi// byang chub bsam yas sbyangs pa na// de'i ye shes mthar phyin pa pa/
443b6(phal chen): rtag par sus kyang mi nus so// ye shes gtan pa zad mi shes// rang bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba med// de la dus gsum rgyal ba kun// skad cig gcig gi rab tu brjod// rtag
443b7(phal chen): bar las gzhan yongs stang te// shes ldan byang chub don nyer bas// sems la sems shes bya bar yang // de la sems skye med par bsam// gang gis sangs rgyas skyed pa'i//
443b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam mi khyab// de dag spyod pa'i yul ma yin// shin tu zab pas tshigs lam spangs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon/
443b9(phal chen): kha dog mtha' yas stan mdzad kyang /
444a1(phal chen): dri dka skyo bar mi 'gyur
444a2(phal chen): pa la@#lam dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dran
444a3(phal chen): ba rmongs pa med pa rnams// chos 'dzin shin tu nges rtogs shing // blo gros bsam gyi mi khyab la// byang chub rgya mtsho mi zad pa// de dag yid ni 'di la nges// de dag spyod pa'i
444a4(phal chen): spyod yul yin// de dag shes pa 'dir mi g.yo// de dag 'di la the rtsom bcad// de dag yid kyang zhum mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas chos la rab gzhol ba ba// de dag sems
444a5(phal chen): kyang rab tu 'byung // de dag dang ting 'tshugs cing // yang dag 'phags pa rab tu skye// dmigs med gnas pa med pa'i// ye shes 'di la re dag dag la/ bskal pa
444a6(phal chen): ba bye bar bsags pa'i// yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge ba'i chos// ye shes 'di 'dod tshungs med pa// de dag thams cad yongs su bsngo// 'khor ba'i nang na rgyu yang //
444a7(phal chen): 'khor ba dag la gnas pa yin// sangs rgyas chos rnams rab rtogs pas// sangs rgyas yul la rab tu rtse// sems can khams na ji snyed du// 'jig rten bun
444a8(phal chen): sum tshogs rgyu ba// de dag thams cad bstan pas spangs// sangs rgyas phun sum tshogs la gnas// sangs rgyas rtag tu 'byung gyur kyang // 'jig rten don med rag
444a9(phal chen): tu gnas// chags mod spyod pa de dag ni// rtag tu sems can don la gnas// de dag spyod pa chungs med des// lus can kun gyi bsam mi khyab// 'jig rten bde ba kun
444b1(phal chen): sems pas// de dag sdug bsngal rnam par bzlog/ 'dzin rten kun la snying rtse zhing // byang chub ye shes rnam dag pas// de dag 'jig rten snang bar 'gyur// 'jig rten
444b2(phal chen): thams cad rab tu 'grel// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i rgyal pos// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par ltas/
444b3(phal chen): te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bskal ba bye bar phrag brgya yang // sangs rgyas sgra ni rab tu dkon// the tsom thams cad bcod pa pa'i// gzugs kyi
444b4(phal chen): sku ni mthong gyur la// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig du// ngoms zhing tshims pa skyer mi thub// mi'i dbang po'i sku gzugs la// rgyal ba'i sras rnam lta ltung zhing // rang
444b5(phal chen): gi dge ba chags med pa// bzhan don brtson pa byang chub bsngo/ 'thub pa chen po'i gzugs kyi sku// de las mtha' dang yang dag shes// chags med ye shes 'byung gyur
444b6(phal chen): pas// de ni sangs rgyas byang chub sgo// sems can bsam byas tshad med pa// snang bar mdzad de theg chen la// btsud nas thob pa chen po'i mchog/ byang chub dam pa
444b7(phal chen): lung yang ston// bsod nams chen po rang bzhin zhing // ye shes dkyil 'khor shar cing 'byung // 'jig rten tshad med kun tu snang // bsod nams phung po rnam 'phel
444b8(phal chen): 'dzad// sdug bsngal dra ba rab tu bcod// ye shes phung po rnam par sbyong // gang+gA rgyal ba bsnyen skur ba// de dag ngan song 'jig pa med// rkang gnyis dam pa mtho
445a1(phal chen): @#'gyur na// shin tu yangs pa'i sems skye ste// 'od snang gsal ba shes rab mthu// grangs med pa yang skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas skyes
445a2(phal chen): bu mchog mthong zhing // byang chub dam par nges par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs par gyur bya zhes// de dag kun kyang nges par sems// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
445a3(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi bzhi yongs su rtogs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// yon tan mtha'
445a4(phal chen): yas bun ldan pa// shAkya'i khyu mchog thub mthong nas// yongs su bsngo ba byed pa'i sems// theg pa che la mngon par dga'// sems can kun gyis don gyi phyir/
445a5(phal chen): thugs rje mnga' ba tan pa rnams// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur// bskal pa khrag khrig phrag rgyar yang // sems can
445a6(phal chen): don la rtson mdzad pa'i// sems can rnams la lus can rnams// kun gyi lan klan cis kyang nus// ngan song gsum po mi zad par// skal pa bye bar bcos pa'i/
445a7(phal chen): chags po thams cad bzlog mdzad pa'i// ston pa'i mi mthong ma yin no// sems can kun gyi rgyud rnams ni// sdug bsngal phung po ci yod pa// ma lus nyams su
445a8(phal chen): bzod nus pa'i// sangs rgyas mi mthong ma yin no// 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad na// tha dad ngan song rgyud yod pa// de dag yun rings gnas bla'i// sangs rgyas
445b1(phal chen): mi thos ma yin no// sems can dmyal ba re rer yang // bskal pa tshad med gnas bra'i// mtha' las rgyal bas bskyes pa'i// byang chub mchog las ring gnas
445b2(phal chen): min ci zhig phyir ngan song du// yun rings gnas par 'dod ces na// rgyal ba'i dbang po mthong ba ni// ye shes 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur phyir// rgyal ba
445b3(phal chen): 'jig rten mthong na yang // sdug bsngal thams cad chad par 'gyur// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod yul gyi// ye shes khong du chud pa 'byung // sangs rgyas
445b4(phal chen): mi yis mchog mthong zhing // sgribs pa thams cad zad par 'gyur// byang chub gang gis thob pa'o// bsod nams tshad med 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs
445b5(phal chen): rgyas mthong bas sems can rnams// the rtsom yid gnyis chad par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten gyi// bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/
445b6(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la rnam par ltas te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ti
445b7(phal chen): nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par 'gyings pa ste nyid kyang rnam par bye ba dang // rgya cher brjod pa dang / gsal bar bya ba dang / rab tu brjod pa dang // yang dag par btan pa dang /
445b8(phal chen): shin tu snang bar byed pa dang / rab tu bsal bar bya ba dang / man ngag gtan pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul na mkha' dang snyam pas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang
446a1(phal chen): #chos kyi dbyings snyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi khams snyam pa nyid dang / 'jig rten thams cad snyam pa nyid dang / las
446a2(phal chen): kyi rgyud thams cad snyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi spros pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi snang ba mnyam pa nyid dang /
446a3(phal chen): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par
446a4(phal chen): 'byings pa 'di nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstan pa'i tshul bcus yang dag par rab tu ston ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings thams cad du/
446a5(phal chen): togs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa btan pa dang / 'di ltas ste namakha'i dbyings kyi klas pa'i sangs
446a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i bur thug pa'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su brjod pa bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
446a7(phal chen): thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs su skye ba dang / mtha' dang dbus med pa'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo rgya mtsho yongs su brjod cing bston
446a8(phal chen): ba dang / e nyenam mkha'i dbyings kyi klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun snying po/
446b1(phal chen): byang chub la mngon du gyur pa'i gnas bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar sprul pa ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems skad
446b2(phal chen): cig la rab tu skye zhing / chos kyi dbyings rgyas par dge bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho bzhi rnam par byin
446b3(phal chen): gyi rlabs cing / lus cig gi brgyas par dgang bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste dmigs pa'i bzhi thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa dus gsum
446b4(phal chen): thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par btan pa dang / 'di lta ste zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la dus gsum
446b5(phal chen): gyi zhing gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho yongs su bshad cing bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste dus gsum
446b6(phal chen): gyi sangs rgyas kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas rab tu brjod pa phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis rlabs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par
446b7(phal chen): 'byung ba stan pa dang / 'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings dang / mnyam pa'i seng ge khri dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang snying po byang chub kyi rgyan
446b8(phal chen): tha ma dad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha mi dad pa rab tu skor ba phyi ma'i mthar byin gyi rlabs bstan pa'o// skye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar seng ge rnam par 'gyings
447a1(phal chen): b.laba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyan pa bcu po de dag la sogs pa shin tu stan pa shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag ni de bzhin
447a2(phal chen): gshes pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par 'gyings
447a3(phal chen): ba 'di nyid kyis don gyi phyogs btan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa yi nal du lta zhing / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya
447a4(phal chen): thams cad la rnam par ltas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha'
447a5(phal chen): dang dbus med pa la rnam par ltas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyi mi khyab pa yang dag par gzhol ba la rnam par ltas nas/ ye shes bsam gyi
447a6(phal chen): mi khyab pa'i sgyu ma'i chos nyid la rnam par ltas te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid bsam bsam gyi mi khyab pa la rnam par ltas nas/ mtha'
447a7(phal chen): dang dbus med pa'i ngag gi lam dang / nges pa'i tshigs dang / chos kyi tshul thams cad la rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smraso//
447b1(phal chen): ba spu cig la rgya mtsho rgyal ba'i zhing // zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang nyam/ de nas sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor/ kun gyi yongs bskor
447b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bden pa bzhugs// spu cig rtsel zhing mangs rgya mtsho rnams// snying po byang chub pad mo'i bdan gnas pas/ chos dbyings rgya chen yongs su
447b3(phal chen): rgyas dkang zhing // shing drung dam pa kun nas mgon po rnams/ zhing rnams kun gyi brdul bran rab mang skyed/ rgyal ba spu rtse gcig la yongs su zhugs/
447b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi yongs skor/ kun kyang bzang po spyod pa ston pa mdzad/ zhing mchog gcig nas rgyal ba bzhugs gyur kyang / byang chub
447b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i sprin mang mi zad pa/ de dag phyogs ma lus thams cad 'byam klas shing kun kang zhing kun 'og// zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran nyam pa'i/
447b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho 'od/ phyogs bcu'i chos dbyings rgyas par kun kang zhing / ston pa de la kun kyang 'khor nas ldang / zhing rnams
447b7(phal chen): kun tu gzugs snyan ra tu ston/ chos kyi rgyal po ye shes rgya mtsho// de dag kun kyang bzang po spyod la gnas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dod/
448a1(phal chen): 'byum klas zhing rnams kun 'od spyod cing / byang chub dpa'i dga' ba rang gnas te//
448a2(phal chen): chos kyi sprin snyan pa'o de dag ni// zhing cig tu yang skal pa bye bar spyod// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
448a3(phal chen): baspyod pa byed// chos kyi gang chen mtsho rnam par snang // smon lam rgya mtsho kun la rab tu 'jug/
448a4(phal chen): de dag sangs rgyas sa'i spyod yul gnas/ rgyal ba'i chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba yi de dag
448a5(phal chen): kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes/ sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang / rnam par 'phrul pa
448a6(phal chen): rgya chen yangs la 'jug/ bde gshegs chos dbyings kun tu rgyas bskang zhing / zhing rnams kun
448a7(phal chen): kyi rdul phran ji snyed pa'i/ sku'i sprin rnams rtag tu byed mdzod cing / chos kyi char gyi byang chub
448a8(phal chen): rab la 'god// dge'o// bkra shis dpas 'bar 'jam gling brgyan du shog/ gzhus sa/
